122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150205_Lines: I will always lend a hand.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150157_Lines: I thought it was sound you symbiotes didn't like. Lightning too?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150112_Lines: I will not make the same mistakes again.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150142_Lines: I have no need for weapons. Nature's full fury is mine to command!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150398_Lines: And I loved you once as well, T'Challa… and lost you far too soon…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150315_Lines: If we X-Men know anything, it's change.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150339_Lines: We must clear a path to the tower!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150286_Lines: We must keep control of this area!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150233_Lines: We must stop Loki from destroying Yggdrasill.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150397_Lines: You loved me once. I could see it in the way you looked at me when the Gala began.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150377_Lines: Let us strike our foes like bolts of lightning from the heavens!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150062_Lines: I'll make good use of it.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150353_Lines: Unlike you, my powers rarely allow me to go undetected, Susan.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150314_Lines: Something I have learned all too well…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150147_Lines: I wonder what the T'Challa I knew would have thought about this.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150196_Lines: I flushed the Punisher into the open again.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150312_Lines: It is my brothers and sisters on Krakoa that I am concerned for. What of them?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150156_Lines: I didn't have to imagine it. The people of Wakanda did.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150002_Lines: I am a mutant, and proud to be one.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150127_Lines: I have been a street urchin, and Regent of the Solar System. But I am always Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150271_Lines: Mark this location! An enemy was here.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150087_Lines: An old enemy, vanquished at last.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150380_Lines: I will not use my powers to spill needless blood… even if you are the one pulling the trigger…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150370_Lines: I make bad weather look good.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150152_Lines: I'm sure you can smell it. I sense it too. An evil presence, watching us.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150009_Lines: I can feel the currents and electricity in my veins.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150182_Lines: I better give this nest a shock!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150117_Lines: My lightning power is still converging.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150321_Lines: I know Dracula well… and I can feel his presence nearby…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150025_Lines: So you didn't earn it, Mister One Percent.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150026_Lines: Manifest your Soulsword and let's get going.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150022_Lines: Please, Steve. You know too well that we are more than what we stand for.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150250_Lines: Chronovium has transformed these herbs. I remember them differently.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150272_Lines: Enemies were here. They may still be.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150243_Lines: Our enemies are slowing our progress too much.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150007_Lines: Billions of people are counting on us to put the timelines back where they belong.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150244_Lines: Worlds depend on us getting Spider-Zero to the Weaver. Go!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150131_Lines: Krakoa brought mutants together. So here we must make our stand.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150073_Lines: There is little time! Hit them with all we have!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150018_Lines: Chronovium has driven Krakoa insane. We have to figure it out on our own.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150094_Lines: You are a mighty ally, Wanda Maximoff!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150334_Lines: It is time we paid Dracula a visit…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150023_Lines: There were indeed witches and mages amount my ancestors, Stephen.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150139_Lines: I did. And as soon as we fix what Doom did, I'm going back.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150128_Lines: When you have been powerless, having power  means something.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150173_Lines: Moon Knight placed an ankh here.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150384_Lines: There are days where I can barely begin to fathom it myself…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150132_Lines: Doom — both Dooms — will answer for their crimes.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150375_Lines: Come, friend. We have a great battle ahead of us and no time to delay!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150316_Lines: In some ways, I think that may be a good thing…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150285_Lines: Mark this area, and take it!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150015_Lines: I think there are other priorities first.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150320_Lines: So many innocents dragged into this darkness. We must save them all!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150014_Lines: So, your Wakanda has gone galactic.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150195_Lines: The Punisher is on the move again!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150148_Lines: Asgard under Loki's rule…the timelines are truly crazed.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150305_Lines: The oceans shall claim you once more.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150153_Lines: Peni Parker. I am glad to have a local to show me around this Tokyo.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150188_Lines: Rocket's Beacon called down some lightning.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150086_Lines: How could it come to fighting T'Challa?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150171_Lines: We are in the sniper's sights!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150074_Lines: We must bring our full might to bear — now!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150381_Lines: Jean… Is that you? Can you hear me?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150331_Lines: Avengers Tower is our destination. Shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150376_Lines: It is clear that you are less than pleased with my presence here. Why is that?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150210_Lines: I see I have made an impact.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150187_Lines: Ankhs do not handle lightning very well.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150322_Lines: The time for pageantry is now over, it seems.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150379_Lines: They often do, Natasha. How would you use them, exactly?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150245_Lines: We are nearing Budokan… but not fast enough.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150163_Lines: Stand firm, stand firm! We are winning!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150144_Lines: Ah, Thor, are you here to compare lightning?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150329_Lines: We shall use Knull's essence as a weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150302_Lines: Namor has called forth allies from the depths.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150306_Lines: Namor's subjects no longer pose a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150330_Lines: We cannot allow Knull's darkness to spread further.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150076_Lines: Be vigilant. The enemy is near.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150019_Lines: In times such as these, Logan, we have to be able to walk and chew gum.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150221_Lines: Am I making you all jealous?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150373_Lines: Mother Nature can be quite unpredictable, child. Especially when I am around.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150349_Lines: Emma. Always a pleasure to face extinction by your side.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150010_Lines: You don't have to be humble to be a hero. I'm not.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150150_Lines: Spider-Man. Have you encountered other Spider-People here?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150238_Lines: Spider-Zero! You drive and we will protect you.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150235_Lines: Courage, Spider-Zero. We will get you to the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150013_Lines: Try and keep yourself under control, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150340_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E.'s mission must be completed without delay!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150332_Lines: We will deliver you safely, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150004_Lines: Power is a great gift. It must be used wisely.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150006_Lines: In times like these, people with power must be at their best.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150310_Lines: Be careful. There are some forces that even I cannot alter.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150151_Lines: I don't think it's a secret.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150189_Lines: The Beacon is no longer broadcasting.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150186_Lines: This ankh is gone. Are there others?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150005_Lines: If these worlds come apart, countless people will die. I must stop it.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150268_Lines: Much of this can be brought crashing down.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150301_Lines: These beasts have come to defend their king.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150351_Lines: It depends who is asking… Jean Grey or the Phoenix Force?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150357_Lines: This city is teeming with Dracula's minions.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150324_Lines: A grim reminder of how mortal we all are… even the gods…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150065_Lines: It belongs to the goddess now.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150335_Lines: This sacred land shall not fall to Ultron!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150251_Lines: So this is what wove the fabric of the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150273_Lines: A fine spot for a crushing attack.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150276_Lines: This would be a difficult place to attack.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150158_Lines: Then if we see any hostile symbiotes, they're in for a surprise.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150347_Lines: Was there anything you failed to find out there amongst the stars?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150143_Lines: Our troubled past is not my primary concern right now, Wanda. It is the future that has me worried.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150348_Lines: Then it is good you have returned, Jean. For you will always have one here.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150385_Lines: That was ages ago, Eric… and I was only a vampire for a short time…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150354_Lines: And I shall rip the heavens themselves asunder if need be!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150352_Lines: Then my winds shall be at your back, my sister!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150197_Lines: Lightning is not good for electronic spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150344_Lines: We will not fail you, Arakko! So swears your regent!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150100_Lines: I can't believe we lost Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150027_Lines: Quite true, Illyana. Who taught you that?
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150029_Lines: Wind and thunder are by your side.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150118_Lines: The thunderstorm is about to hit.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150111_Lines: The wind will only blow stronger.
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150257_Lines: The power of the storm gathers…
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150003_Lines: Wind, cloud, and storm, hear my command!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150066_Lines: Wind and thunder watches over this land!
122_HeroVoice_1015_ST.1015001_HeroVoice_10150358_Lines: My winds and your flames could prove quite the lethal combination.

122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160453_Lines: The title of "Lord" should be reserved for those with royal blood.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160349_Lines: …Your king will be more than glad to regale you with epic tales of his glory!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160298_Lines: Not even a tiny bit? Come now.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160433_Lines: You know me so well, mortal. I'm flattered. Truly.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160015_Lines: A new world is aborning—a shuffling of the galactic guard, if you will. You could be part of it.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160122_Lines: That was nothing for a god.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160308_Lines: All things have an end, brother, save Loki's ambition…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160350_Lines: Gather close and Loki shall tell you how he vanquished the Midgard Serpent and struck down Surtur himself!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160021_Lines: and no no no, I'm an Asgardian, dear. I was BORN a god~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160401_Lines: No King shall ascend to the throne this day!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160415_Lines: The core must be delivered or Arakko falls!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160078_Lines: Oh I'm fine, don't mind me~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160003_Lines: Don't lie to me, I INVENTED every trick.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160417_Lines: I play the role I must to prevail. And it seems the next act is about to begin…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160139_Lines: Why would anyone want order when they could enjoy chaos?...
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160086_Lines: Perhaps we should just ask them to leave?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160217_Lines: Five. I'm on a bit of a streak.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160140_Lines: Everyone loves a trickster — until the trick is played on them.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160014_Lines: Really? Well, a small price to pay to keep the Elder off my plans.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160085_Lines: Do they really believe they can keep this from a KING? How adorable~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160429_Lines: Yet even I would not have dared to align myself with Knull. You went too far, Milady.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160389_Lines: Hiding from sight is a simple task for the God of Mischief.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160026_Lines: And then we grew up. Well, one of us did. You remain a stupid child.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160008_Lines: What is a hero? An overgrown child with a weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160222_Lines: You should not have made me angry.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160223_Lines: Did you think I would forget you?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160131_Lines: Your god is wounded! Are you mortals blind?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160242_Lines: Are you stuck in these cursed debris? No? Then move!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160080_Lines: You should all be very proud.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160105_Lines: Oh you should let the REAL monster out, Banner.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160192_Lines: You're just a man again, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160418_Lines: Another of your convoluted contraptions? I have magic at my fingertips!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160420_Lines: I am not human at all. I am a god! And you would be wise to treat me as such.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160296_Lines: After YOU picked him clean, I knew I would get blamed… so I made him forget.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160041_Lines: Replacing mortals, you mean. Even once you have done that, we Asgardians will remain.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160388_Lines: Your illusions are quite adequate… for a mortal…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160424_Lines: Your foes call you Daywalker, do they not?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160292_Lines: You're a man of few words, aren't you?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160328_Lines: Those magnetic powers of yours… How well do they work on Uru?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160299_Lines: Believe it or not, Doreen Green of Midgard, I'm helping.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160347_Lines: You dare sully the throne of Loki, King of Asgard?!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160419_Lines: Fortunately, the success of my spells does not hinge upon your belief in them.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160321_Lines: There's your mistake, mortal. You assume I had one in the first place.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160302_Lines: I hope you detected my irony.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160186_Lines: The beacon needs a rebirth of its own.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160414_Lines: Ultron will be victorious if we do not move!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160184_Lines: You need fear the ankh no longer!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160436_Lines: The Phoenix. From what I understand, you knew my father. Quite well.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160263_Lines: Much useful rubble could be created here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160277_Lines: Do not leave me to fight on my own!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160239_Lines: The tree will be fully tapped soon, unless we speed our progress.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160315_Lines: Who are you to judge my worth? That duty belongs to the gods alone.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160395_Lines: No one gets to exterminate mankind, golem… unless it is me…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160305_Lines: You are living proof that even the most brilliant mortal is a fool, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160134_Lines: Even a god gets tired sometimes.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160113_Lines: It's the green monster I want anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160303_Lines: The mighty Magneto. We have much in common.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160004_Lines: I am Loki, God of Mischief and the King of Asgard!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160145_Lines: Well, this is a place one cannot leave quickly enough.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160101_Lines: Whoa, just another soldier, after all.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160451_Lines: Ah! You are a modern day bard! Perhaps you should write a ballad about me!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160226_Lines: Oh dear. Bit of a drop there.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160072_Lines: Ouch it hurts… No I lied.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160225_Lines: Ouch. It is a long way down.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160037_Lines: Oh, this is hardly the only world.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160353_Lines: Hmph. A paltry showing compared to the glorious Archive of Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160121_Lines: Ehhh, they dare to lay hands on ME?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160291_Lines: Ah, the legend himself. The Jade Giant. The Taciturn Terror.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160330_Lines: Ah, the king of Midgard's seas. Have you come to pledge your fealty?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160031_Lines: Oh I did. Several times. Lovely torture machines.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160029_Lines: Oh, spare me your heroic platitudes, brother.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160454_Lines: Ah, then it seems we actually share something in common, you and I.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160323_Lines: Well… I suppose I am due to learn a few new tricks…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160294_Lines: I know you believe that. But time, as we shall see, doesn't always move in a straight line…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160312_Lines: You are among the few mortals who could prove me wrong, Strange. You're welcome to try.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160355_Lines: This is a place where kings are made. Kneel now and save yourself the embarrassment.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160132_Lines: Form up here! Don't waste my time!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160403_Lines: Avengers Tower? I am not exactly welcome there…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160024_Lines: Ultron, I don't suppose you have a most HATED Avenger in -
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160427_Lines: You shine brighter than any gem in Odin's Vault, milady. And cut deeper as well.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160013_Lines: Mantis, yes, I'm a GOD, but stop staring at~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160431_Lines: Well… I suppose Fenris Wolf could use a few extra snacks…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160039_Lines: Well dear, how ELSE is anything  done in this universe?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160425_Lines: If Knull has his way, every starwill be snuffed out. Thus, no more days in which to walk.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160458_Lines: It was called Gram. A weapon of ancient magic. The Sword of Truth.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160189_Lines: Cosmic yarn will no longer be amplified here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160317_Lines: Your Majesty. Splendid empire you have here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160390_Lines: How dare you insult the king of Yggsgard so?!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160411_Lines: To the tower… despite my better judgment…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160181_Lines: Ms. Parker has left us a gift.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160352_Lines: Tread lightly. Odin is trying to sleep. Hopefully, for many centuries to come…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160318_Lines: And so we shall…at least with yours.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160391_Lines: Absolutely not! I am part Frost Giant. There is an enormous difference!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160143_Lines: When Doom has been brought to heel, I will choose Asgard's future.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160394_Lines: A gala fit for a king! Really, you shouldn't have…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160380_Lines: Bravo, Hela. We still have much to do…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160129_Lines: In a few moments, you shall see the extraordinary power of the trickster god!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160421_Lines: Clearly, you have never met my father Odin…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160405_Lines: Apparently, Yggsgard's resident rodentia needs rescuing.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160016_Lines: loyalty is a powerful bond… and also a terrible weakness.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160157_Lines: We will soon be out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160177_Lines: The Punisher has become a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160193_Lines: The Punisher is out of his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160011_Lines: I too am a son of Odin.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160413_Lines: We shall not fail you, my rodent friend…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160240_Lines: We have not yet reached the heart of the Web.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160280_Lines: We must make this territory ours.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160270_Lines: Here we must make our stand!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160281_Lines: This is the place we must defend!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160408_Lines: We must deliver this dark essence beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160227_Lines: We are at a numerical disadvantage.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160158_Lines: Our attack is about to fail! Finish them!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160238_Lines: We really must move this operation along.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160332_Lines: We have both adorned ourselves in gold. What have you beneath that shimmering skin that makes you any better than I?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160034_Lines: I consider many things. But not that.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160426_Lines: I am merely pondering how you and I might forge a mutually beneficial alliance.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160094_Lines: I am more than just a trickster.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160009_Lines: I can be anyone, but I choose to be Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160324_Lines: I am here to defend the Web, just as you are.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160432_Lines: I am no threat to you, Spider. Today, we share mutual foes.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160196_Lines: I have wrecked the spider nest!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160202_Lines: I am a true team player.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160435_Lines: I am nigh immortal, you cretin. Strike me down and I will be reborn anew!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160042_Lines: I am Loki… or am I?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160237_Lines: I have met Bast. I suggest we do not disappoint her…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160141_Lines: I have seen many futures, and most of them are bad.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160138_Lines: I am wily, unreliable, vindictive…and yet oddly compelling. Don't you think?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160327_Lines: Perhaps you have not yet brought her the right nuts?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160245_Lines: I suspect T'Challa is growing impatient…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160300_Lines: Too grand to put in a nutshell, dear.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160306_Lines: I'm saying that you have spent your life trying to surpass your father, so you should understand what you see here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160128_Lines: My sorcery still needs time to prepare.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160404_Lines: I know you, Ratatoskr. What an unlikely savior…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160392_Lines: I will never understand why Midgardians adore this wretched city so…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160397_Lines: Perhaps I shall take the King in Black's throne for myself…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160284_Lines: Escort this conveyance where it must go.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160285_Lines: Trap this vehicle and stop it.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160326_Lines: How can I usurp what was destined to be mine? Come, let us see if Ratatoskr is in the World-Tree.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160090_Lines: They are in front of us. Idiots.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160266_Lines: The enemy was here, and might well be again.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160228_Lines: They are many and we are few.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160416_Lines: So I have been told, by the All-Father and countless others.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160282_Lines: Hold this place at all costs!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160007_Lines: Time has unravelled. Who will stitch it together again? Me.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160271_Lines: A defensible spot. We shall use it!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160025_Lines: oh really? Not Hank Pym, or Anthony Stark, or I don't know, Thor?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160028_Lines: Though most unlike how either of us pictured.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160430_Lines: Why would these meddlesome rodents of yours be welcomed back to Yggsgard?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160434_Lines: Who let this mangy beast out of its cage?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160249_Lines: It is prudent to withdraw for the moment.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160194_Lines: That's the last of the spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160010_Lines: Some may call this entanglement CHAOS; I only see… opportunities.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160002_Lines: I am accused of loving chaos. It is True.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160084_Lines: Has anyone bothered to consider a defense?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160297_Lines: You must teach me some of your chaos magic, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160198_Lines: Raise your heads, friends! The sniper is gone.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160040_Lines: You mechanical man, we can help each other achieve our goals.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160179_Lines: A nest of mechanical spiders? Lunacy!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160142_Lines: Doom has overreached, and we must correct him.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160331_Lines: Such fire for one so unusually damp. We should get along swimmingly!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160313_Lines: Welcome, Sorcerer Supreme. Asgard has need of your powers.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160108_Lines: The Destroyer can do that too.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160218_Lines: I am, after all, a god.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160165_Lines: Nothing keeps me down for long.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160304_Lines: Quite so. For a mortal you are very perspicacious.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160437_Lines: Yes, my father's love knew no bounds. Nor did his anger.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160290_Lines: I'm right here. With healing magic.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160348_Lines: Loki does not ask for much from his loyal subjects. Just their undying adoration.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160428_Lines: You have been quite busy since you left Yggsgard, Hela.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160309_Lines: Our father is old, and tired, brother. And a new war needs new stories, does it not?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160357_Lines: These Wakandans should consider praying to a different god. I happen to be free…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160020_Lines: Well well, the Mutant Goddess of Krakoa! It's been a while.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160319_Lines: Splendid. Another mortal warrior, at my service.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160452_Lines: A shame. There was a time when Midgardians appreciated true art.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160109_Lines: I only wish I had done it myself!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160102_Lines: Pathetic, I'll make a better Supreme!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160244_Lines: Quite a spectacular setting…but we cannot stop to savor its beauty.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160329_Lines: Perfect. Why bother being worthy when your friends can do the heavy lifting for you eh?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160124_Lines: That's right, let your enemies underestimate you.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160005_Lines: God of Lies? If you wish. What society can exist without lies?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160385_Lines: I had more tricks than they had arms.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160032_Lines: And I shall, your unholiness, right after I have my time to rule!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160400_Lines: Knull shall be brought low by his own essence! The irony!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160383_Lines: Loyal squids? And all I have are ravens? Really…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160386_Lines: Were they truly the best you had, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160160_Lines: Remain steadfast! We have nearly won.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160146_Lines: What a fascinating entity the Weaver must be.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160159_Lines: Our victory is nearly at hand!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160396_Lines: All-Black is here. I can still taste its oblivion.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160001_Lines: Without chaos, life becomes a predictable, orderly prison.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160356_Lines: An herb fit for a king. Perhaps we should grow this in the Bifrost Garden…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160082_Lines: I dislike frontal engagements, but we must strike here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160233_Lines: Spider-Zero, I trust you will introduce me to the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160127_Lines: The God of Mischief greets you.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160043_Lines: Make way for the God of Mischief.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160322_Lines: I've always considered myself more of a disruptive force really.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160351_Lines: Who dares disturb the sacred Archive of Asgard?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160176_Lines: This man turned himself into a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160173_Lines: Who might appear through this portal?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160262_Lines: All of this would easily be collapsed.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160410_Lines: This automaton must complete its mission.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160387_Lines: The monsters of Midgard are mere distractions.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160354_Lines: Female warriors, akin to our own Valkyrior. Wakanda's king has good taste.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160384_Lines: Namor has a loyal army of his own, it seems…
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160230_Lines: This seems wrong, but I suppose we must.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160393_Lines: I must have words with this Dracula. From one immortal king to another.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160402_Lines: Is this strange little machine truly our only hope?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160033_Lines: That means I get to do it once!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160209_Lines: Didn't see that coming, did you?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160083_Lines: TIS a territorial assault? More like a terrible INsult.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160457_Lines: An enchanted sword suits you well. My blade was far superior, though.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160310_Lines: I do seem to have unique gifts.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160286_Lines: Here is the cargo we must intercept.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160407_Lines: This core will undo what Ultron has wrought here.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160081_Lines: Attack! That place WILL be mine!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160316_Lines: Then allow me to send you back to her with your tail between your legs.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160406_Lines: Arakko's fate is grim unless we act.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160220_Lines: What were the rest of you doing?
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160409_Lines: Forge ahead to the depths of Klyntar!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160114_Lines: The Captain is down, everyone listen to me now~
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160035_Lines: Asgard will be mine. If it takes an egomaniac mortal destroying timelines to make that happen, so be it.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160012_Lines: Asgard needed new leadership. It needed me.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160144_Lines: My realm, my Asgard! Your true leader has returned!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160412_Lines: The vampires must not win this day!
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160252_Lines: I will soon show my ultimate power.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160006_Lines: Sorcery and deception always defeat the clenched fist.
122_HeroVoice_1016_ST.1016001_HeroVoice_10160251_Lines: Wellsprings of magic need time to refill.

122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170269_Lines: Sorry, folks. End of the road.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170335_Lines: We don't stop until Ultron's circuits are fried!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170329_Lines: Don't give in to the darkness. We've got this!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170266_Lines: Let me know if you need me to drive.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170204_Lines: Turned up the heat, just for you.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170039_Lines: That hurt way more than it should've….
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170265_Lines: No way they're taking this place from us.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170121_Lines: Dude! Those are some sick tunes you're blasting!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170296_Lines: I'm gonna have to stop you. You know that, right?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170306_Lines: Haha, funny coming from the one guy that I could melt into slag in seconds!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170040_Lines: Ahh you think you can hurt me?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170295_Lines: So… you're trying to start another war with the surface world, huh? Hasn't that gotten old?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170207_Lines: That's how you go out? Really?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170354_Lines: You're lucky I hate the smell of burning fur, buddy…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170020_Lines: You think you're a genius, but the smartest thing you ever did was marry my sister.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170308_Lines: So, who's the better Torch? Me or that guy from World War II?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170100_Lines: Man, my hair's all messed up!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170191_Lines: Who's the man? Yeah, It's me.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170129_Lines: Symbiotes hate fire, right? Does that make me safe… or a target?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170281_Lines: Say that again and you'll get a face full of flames, ugly!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170305_Lines: Get ready to watch me burn up the battlefield, robo-dude!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170064_Lines: We have to take the fight to them!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170222_Lines: We "mere mortals" could sure use some divine intervention!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170089_Lines: Come on, Loki. I'm not falling for that.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170326_Lines: Stay close. I'll light us a path through the park.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170120_Lines: No need for scientific explanations. Just tell me what to burn.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170128_Lines: All those webs… Ugh… This place is a serious fire hazard!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170001_Lines: I get sick of people asking me for a light.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170156_Lines: Another day. Another portal to the unknown.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170115_Lines: Is it hot in here or is it just me? Oh right. It's totally me!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170297_Lines: With enough effort, I can burn brighter than the sun!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170307_Lines: Jim Hammond, right? Cool dude, but he was no Johnny Storm!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170278_Lines: You're making this sound like a double date, but I don't see any hotties.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170225_Lines: We need to burn rubber… Or webs…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170263_Lines: Think we can take this place?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170158_Lines: Whoa! The Doc is sneaking in through the back door…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170350_Lines: Wow. That is a pretty good pickup line! What are you doing after this…?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170010_Lines: Am I a hotshot? Yeah. I'm a hotshot.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170211_Lines: Yikes! There's too many of them!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170167_Lines: Oops! I think I broke ancient history... again…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170124_Lines: Whoa! Hey! Whoa! Sorry, little buddy. Wasn't trying to dehydrate you. My bad!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170139_Lines: Whew! I needed that more than you know.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170060_Lines: Yo, let's step it up for the competition!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170299_Lines: Good news! Ben's gonna punch the timestream into shape! Problem solved!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170123_Lines: Well, aren't you the sweetest thing that ever crawled onto dry land?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170049_Lines: Yo am I untouchable or what?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170029_Lines: Human Torch in the house, yo.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170108_Lines: Any kind-hearted friend to heal me?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170313_Lines: Ugh! Is this night ever gonna end?!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170174_Lines: Huh. Guess that turret can't fire if it's molten metal…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170136_Lines: Ah! Like a day at the spa!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170210_Lines: They've got the numbers on us.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170015_Lines: Hey, Dr. Banner, what's a Gamma Door Portal?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170125_Lines: You know, they say fire and ice don't go together, but you and me --
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170164_Lines: Hey! What's with all the spider-bots?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170090_Lines: Hey, New York girls are tougher than this!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170231_Lines: I should probably melt this down before we go…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170332_Lines: Hang tight, H.E.R.B.I.E. We're almost there.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170130_Lines: Spidey got his own high-tech metropolis? Where's my futuristic city?!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170107_Lines: The superstar is ready to rock!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170132_Lines: Oh, man. Look at all this stuff! Reed would love it out here!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170318_Lines: Yikes! This place could really use some brightening up. Good thing I'm here!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170283_Lines: Great! Haha… Umm… how many of those end up with us alive at the end?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170133_Lines: Thanks, T'Challa. But you know me. I'm as down to Earth as they come.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170289_Lines: Gross! What are these things, Namor?!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170135_Lines: Okay… how about a God of Awesomeness then?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170376_Lines: Well, if he's the king of darkness, maybe I just need to turn up the light instead of the heat.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170317_Lines: Okay. Who slayed the Celestial? Seriously… Not cool!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170302_Lines: Fair point. Guess I'll set my flames to "bake" instead of "broil"…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170227_Lines: If we fail, you're telling T'Challa!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170079_Lines: My sister? What kind of world is this…?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170202_Lines: Perfection. Did you expect any less?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170016_Lines: Yeah yeah. Reed's been working on it so hard as if… someone put that idea into his head…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170160_Lines: Look out for the enormous weapon of mass destruction!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170152_Lines: Heads up! We've got a sniper over here!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170017_Lines: Spider-Man! We're gonna make a great team.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170014_Lines: Taking a pic of yourself with your phone!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170229_Lines: I wonder if the Baxter Building is still standing…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170175_Lines: Melted your bullets, Frank. Not sorry for a second.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170165_Lines: Broke your priceless artifact. Send the bill to Benjamin J. Grimm.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170005_Lines: Hurry up, I got a date in another dimension.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170083_Lines: Look at big-brain Reed, getting heroic!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170330_Lines: Get this sludge moving or we're cooked!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170301_Lines: What's the problem, sis? Afraid to turn up the heat?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170161_Lines: Punisher's turret is fired up. Stay clear!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170148_Lines: Can't get rid of me that easy! Just ask Ben!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170334_Lines: If we ever want to see the sun again, we need to move!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170212_Lines: I think we may be outnumbered.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170131_Lines: I… can't even argue with that one…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170041_Lines: I don't need healing. I'll be fine.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170057_Lines: Flame off so we can all high-five!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170352_Lines: I have been going supernova since I was a teenager. I'm good, old man.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170011_Lines: I've been saving the world since I was a teenager.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170149_Lines: Okay… How about we try this again?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170063_Lines: You know we can't talk our way through this, right?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170214_Lines: We're gonna get there… and we'll look hot doing it!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170203_Lines: And I think we're done here.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170221_Lines: We'd better start burning some rubber!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170333_Lines: We need to get to that castle. Fast!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170321_Lines: We're going beneath the surface? Swell.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170249_Lines: I think I found bad guy HQ!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170315_Lines: I'm ready to set the fashion world on fire… but I'll try not to do much damage to Krakoa…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170118_Lines: Gotta try to keep my cool. Which, for me, is NOT easy…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170172_Lines: Rocket's weird amplifier has been shut down.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170293_Lines: I've heard dried squid is a tasty treat!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170216_Lines: Always wanted to ride the webs!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170007_Lines: I like to make fire puns. They are pretty hard.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170003_Lines: I'm the brightest in the sky!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170092_Lines: Oh my God, they got Ben?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170374_Lines: If the sun won't rise on it's own, Benjy-Boy, I'll just have to be the next best thing!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170059_Lines: Hey, we need that zone, too, don't we?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170058_Lines: Still burning hot, no time to celebrate!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170260_Lines: Could use some help over here!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170298_Lines: Then it's a good thing you brought those shades! Let's light it up, baby!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170250_Lines: Looking for losers? Here they are!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170176_Lines: Sorry, Punny, but your turret license has expired.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170154_Lines: I think Rama-Tut lost one of his toys…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170280_Lines: Come on, seriously? Who invited Spidey's evil twin?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170262_Lines: We need to secure this location.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170355_Lines: According to Ben, you still are…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170062_Lines: They're gonna come after us, and soon.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170369_Lines: Yeah, they suck. Literally. But now that you're here, the forecast is improving.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170215_Lines: Time to save the multiverse, Zero!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170314_Lines: Time to light it up… preferably without burning down every tree in the park…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170328_Lines: Time to send Ultron back to the scrap heap!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170349_Lines: Am I crazy, or are you totally checking me out, Mantis?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170008_Lines: Anyone want a selfie with me? …No? Tough crowd.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170013_Lines: Anyone want a selfie with me?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170259_Lines: Anyone free to lend a hand?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170126_Lines: Depends. Would that be a bad thing?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170019_Lines: Ben! Man, am I glad to have you on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170325_Lines: All aboard the 4-Train! Next stop, Dracula's Castle!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170002_Lines: I talk a lot, I fly a lot, I win a lot.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170026_Lines: I didn't catch that? Um, okay. So, no hard feelings if you get a little accidentally singed, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170082_Lines: And that's why we follow Cap.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170267_Lines: Pedal to the metal! Let's roll!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170316_Lines: This is not what I remember Mars looking like the last time we were here…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170168_Lines: Rocket's beacon is in meltdown mode.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170171_Lines: I turned Rocket's cosmic amp off.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170105_Lines: The fire will have to burn a little longer.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170182_Lines: That sniper's plans just went up in flames.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170151_Lines: A sniper? I thought I was the resident hot shot…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170116_Lines: You play with fire, you're gonna get burned!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170380_Lines: You know what time it is, Ben?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170119_Lines: Reality is collapsing again? Guess it must be Tuesday.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170220_Lines: Wakanda is counting on us. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170218_Lines: Life and Destiny, here we come!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170384_Lines: Come on, Ben, say the thing!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170245_Lines: Wonder how well this stuff burns…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170170_Lines: The Raccoon is gonna be so mad about his beacon…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170009_Lines: The Fantastic Four is my family. They mean more to me than anything.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170309_Lines: Wait… did Captain America just make a joke?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170134_Lines: You're the God of Thunder, right? Does Yggsgard need a God of Fire?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170375_Lines: Leave Knull to me, bro-in-law. Symbiotes hate fire!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170291_Lines: Looks like Namor called in his swim team.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170246_Lines: Time to do some fire damage!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170336_Lines: Keep pushing! We can't let Ultron take Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170351_Lines: Better keep your distance, Logan. Wouldn't want your claws to get all melty.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170303_Lines: I'll be whatever you want, beautiful.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170359_Lines: And we both look pretty hot doing it! But I bet you can't go full supernova!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170371_Lines: You wanted an A-Lister at your big party, Emma? Well, now you've got him!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170322_Lines: Let's bring a little light to the darkness below…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170127_Lines: Let's see if Hydra's limbs regrow when they're burned off!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170179_Lines: Hope you like your spiders well done!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170294_Lines: Who wants some deep fried octopus?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170370_Lines: Now you're talking! Hope you like your vampires extra crispy!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170279_Lines: Likewise, Pete. Let's torch some vampires!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170356_Lines: Thanks… but I'm pretty sure you've got me beat when it comes to "hotness" too!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170331_Lines: If you don't give up, H.E.R.B.I.E., neither will I. Deal?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170323_Lines: When have I ever let you down, H.E.R.B.I.E.? Wait… don't answer that…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170324_Lines: How about I let you save the day this time, H.E.R.B.I.E.?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170166_Lines: Tell Khonshu I'm sorry I trashed his stuff.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170234_Lines: Need more time to warm up.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170300_Lines: And you wouldn't have it any other way, you big lug.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170327_Lines: This core should cure what's ailing Arakko.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170122_Lines: Tell you what… After this, I'll hook you up with my personal playlist.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170223_Lines: All reality is on the line here! Let's move!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170253_Lines: Not a bad place to stand our ground…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170088_Lines: Scary robot, for the win… I guess…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170184_Lines: That's how the FF does it!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170290_Lines: Those have to be Namor's weird friends.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170304_Lines: That sounds like the worst first date ever…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170141_Lines: This may be our last chance!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170163_Lines: Some sort of weird robot spider nest…
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170038_Lines: What the ugh?! Can't even move!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170025_Lines: This might be a little awkward because of the fire thing, but —
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170159_Lines: That's a big turret Frank. Trying to make up for something?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170155_Lines: This has Moon Knight written all over it. In hieroglyphics.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170252_Lines: This might be the best place to attack.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170117_Lines: Step aside and let a real hero show you how it's done.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170077_Lines: That couldn't be the real Ben, could it?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170282_Lines: So… you've got a plan brewing in that big brain of yours, right, bro?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170360_Lines: Oh… How about we just call it a tie?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170030_Lines: Get in line, here comes Johnny~
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170006_Lines: Reed's the brains, Sue's the bedrock. Ben and I do the face-punching. Or face-burning.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170023_Lines: Reed's probably got some special insight about Doom, right?
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170373_Lines: I'm sure Reed has some scientific explanation neither of us would fully understand.
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170162_Lines: Little metal spiders? UGH! So creepy!
122_HeroVoice_1017_ST.1017001_HeroVoice_10170066_Lines: Team, we have to step it up!

122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180014_Lines: :-sigh- Sure, why not. Please let me meditate!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180156_Lines: It's called Kamar-Taj, not exactly on any brochure.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180160_Lines: This is a cosmic mystery given true form. Astonishing.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180137_Lines: Warlock is a curious name for one with no arcane powers.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180186_Lines: Destroy these ankhs where you find them.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180217_Lines: An arcane assist, so to speak.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180011_Lines: Everything most decidedly does not happen for a reason.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180310_Lines: Power from The One Below All!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180194_Lines: I had not seen so many spiders since…never mind.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180233_Lines: Ha, next time I might let someone else help.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180034_Lines: There's serious ancient evil lurking behind the walls here. We need to hurry.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180142_Lines: Somehow I don't think she's interested in what I think.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180345_Lines: Do not stray from your course, my robotic friend.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180149_Lines: But not as much as mine.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180019_Lines: No, burning through life too fast.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180163_Lines: Every battle against Doom matters. You'll find that out when Krakoa gets to this timeline.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180246_Lines: Yggdrasil will not survive without our help. Go!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180358_Lines: Preferably before it manages to drag any of us back with it.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180322_Lines: Perhaps a divine exorcism is on order… once our work here is done…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180231_Lines: Five! Surely the remaining enemies will avoid me.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180022_Lines: Illyana, dear, remember you're more than welcome in the Sanctorum.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180085_Lines: A man rarely survives his own obsessions. Blade could not.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180071_Lines: They will strike, and I suspect it will be soon.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180099_Lines: One couldn't win without the other.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180025_Lines: He may be in league with yet darker forces. We must hunt him down and sever his alliances.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180309_Lines: By the Hoary Hosts of Hulk!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180035_Lines: By the Vishanti, Strange is here!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180342_Lines: Let us hope this core undoes Ultron's efforts.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180314_Lines: What have you summoned now, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180153_Lines: You have no idea how long I have been waiting for this day…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180147_Lines: You mean Dooms…and they'll have to sort each other out first.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180063_Lines: Your blows will not affect me.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180018_Lines: You know, Johnny, you remind me of myself back in college.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180050_Lines: You would block healing from a doctor?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180349_Lines: Make haste! Arakko will not survive much longer!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180073_Lines: We must take the battle to them, and soon.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180348_Lines: If we delay any longer, Dracula will prevail.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180219_Lines: Not worth wasting magic on you.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180298_Lines: Guide this vehicle to its destination!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180259_Lines: We cannot allow Bast to be corrupted any more. Faster!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180062_Lines: Strike at me if you dare!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180344_Lines: Onward! The King in Black must not rise!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180197_Lines: No symbol of Khonshu can resist Doctor Strange!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180185_Lines: Another ankh. Who will rid us of Moon Knight?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180329_Lines: Well, the Mutants did promise us a party to remember…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180177_Lines: Ancient One, I hope my successes make you proud.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180114_Lines: The Mystic Arts won't fail me again.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180167_Lines: Wherever the fight against Doom goes, there I will go too.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180028_Lines: Ah, your idealism refreshes a battered old soul.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180321_Lines: On occasion. But to serve as one's avatar must be exhausting.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180032_Lines: Because I'm a doctor, I pull people from your grip for a living. Also I charge a lot.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180004_Lines: All those crises I quietly put out, you have no idea!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180164_Lines: You can see a lot from the astral plane.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180016_Lines: It is my only world, and I will fight for it.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180286_Lines: We could hold off anyone here.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180195_Lines: These mechanical arachnids are no more!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180173_Lines: Hold firm! Time is on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180031_Lines: The fate of many worlds is at stake. It is a mighty quest.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180260_Lines: The Orisha suggest we pick up the pace a little.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180330_Lines: Ultron's virus is spreading fast. Good thing there's a Doctor in the house!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180132_Lines: By Oshtur, there are baby wizards everywhere these days. If I had the patience, I would open a school.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180326_Lines: Fortunately, you've one of the few of us equipped to handle both.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180353_Lines: Things must be dire if you are willing to factor magic as a possible solution.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180159_Lines: A noble place, under the boot of a vile usurper.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180138_Lines: No one chooses their birth name. But after that, you may call yourself what you like.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180188_Lines: Another Strange works his portal magic!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180171_Lines: My life was in peril. Thank you.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180239_Lines: I suggest you learn to fly.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180203_Lines: Cosmic Yarns will go unamplified, I fear.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180131_Lines: The Time  Entanglement is a vexing problem, even for the Sorcerer Supreme.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180340_Lines: We must confront Dracula himself to lift this curse.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180206_Lines: The Punisher's armored turret is broken!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180327_Lines: I swear by the all-seeing Agamotto that the sun will soon rise once more!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180247_Lines: We will guide Spider-Zero to the Weaver!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180066_Lines: Advantage gained in the material plane.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180341_Lines: Ultron's influence over this land must be broken.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180251_Lines: We must deliver this Statue of Bast to T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180086_Lines: We must undo the Entanglement. Perhaps that will bring him back.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180257_Lines: We must get to the Shrine immediately!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180075_Lines: Our time is short. Finish them!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180030_Lines: We're in this together, Tandy Bowen. Get the stars out of your eyes and let us fight.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180295_Lines: Our mission has led us to this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180072_Lines: They are preparing for our assault.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180244_Lines: We lack strength for this encounter.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180279_Lines: I have tagged a foe. Hunt them!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180150_Lines: We find ourselves caught in a battle between two Dooms with no way of truly knowing which one of them is right.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180096_Lines: Letting the Darkchild out, I see.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180315_Lines: I cast you back to the depths!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180023_Lines: I am. But books and tea will teach you how to cope with it. They worked for me~
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180236_Lines: I have the final word. As always.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180234_Lines: Hahaha, It's difficult to keep up with me, I know.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180207_Lines: I have forced the Punisher into the open again!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180139_Lines: One sorcerer to another: What's the source of your power?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180122_Lines: My life force is fading! I require urgent treatment!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180121_Lines: I am ready to unleash my mystic power!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180125_Lines: My magic is on the verge of depletion...
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180229_Lines: Three! A tribute to my powers.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180037_Lines: I see you have need of Doctor Strange.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180144_Lines: I know. Loki might have cast a spell of silence in the Tower, but I could hear you loud and clear on the astral plane.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180323_Lines: I have noticed the similarities. Particularly when ensnared in their tentacles.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180331_Lines: After all I have seen, few things truly shock me. But this… This is new…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180151_Lines: I have done that, Wanda. I can assure you, we most certainly would not.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180061_Lines: Usually I create my own shield.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180068_Lines: This area WILL be ours, I've seen the future.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180161_Lines: So. Thousands of futures and the only surviving Asgard is one you rule?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180235_Lines: All fall before the Sorcerer Supreme!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180347_Lines: We will not fail you, Ratatoskr.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180258_Lines: Too much delay adds up to failure. Hurry.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180245_Lines: We must and shall save the World-Tree!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180317_Lines: You devotion to Namor sealed your fate…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180280_Lines: Here is an enemy to pursue.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180325_Lines: The timestream is collapsing, Eric. The effects can be disorienting.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180006_Lines: Once I saved lives with a scalpel. Now I do it with a spell.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180029_Lines: Astral projection makes me feel old.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180146_Lines: I did. But I'm not entirely certain where I got out to.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180328_Lines: Despite the obvious, it is unlikely this mission will be a walk in the park.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180198_Lines: Let Moon Knight protect his ankhs if he dares!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180001_Lines: There is only one Sorcerer Supreme.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180134_Lines: Doom is a powerful magic adept. I expect we will face each other again…soon.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180074_Lines: There is no time to be subtle. Attack!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180017_Lines: Ororo, I sense a strong magical lineage within you…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180010_Lines: Every spell cast has its price, and my debt is deep.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180254_Lines: Every delay makes Loki stronger. Hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180211_Lines: The spider nest is no more.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180143_Lines: Nobody can keep me locked up for long.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180097_Lines: Nobody can stand up against a full-strength Scarlet Witch.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180100_Lines: Without Spider-Man, New York has lost its heart.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180357_Lines: Agreed. It usually means that something sinister has crawled out of hiding.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180083_Lines: By the Fangs of Farallah, that was a fine battle!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180024_Lines: Tyrone, I think I found a way to sever your connection with the darkforce.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180104_Lines: Loki, gone? Surely he'll be back.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180087_Lines: Loki is a god, but I'm SUPREME!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180116_Lines: By the Shades of the Seraphim, I return!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180256_Lines: At this rate, Spider-Zero will be an old woman when we get there.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180141_Lines: It is good that you're keeping Wakanda's spiritual traditions alive.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180213_Lines: The sniper was no match for me.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180015_Lines: Trickster! Where will you play your tricks when the world disintegrates?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180084_Lines: The Winds of Watoomb blow fair this day!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180013_Lines: Exactly. I'm the master of MYSTICAL arts, aren't I?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180003_Lines: Open your eyes, reality is but an illusion.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180250_Lines: Spider-Zero must reach the Budokan. This is our duty.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180002_Lines: When science failed me, magic was there.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180098_Lines: Thor, sometimes I forget you were literally born for this.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180332_Lines: Knull is trapped in the planet's core. Let us do what we must to keep him there.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180336_Lines: Now, to deliver the key to Knull's demise.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180343_Lines: Knull's darkness will not snuff out our light! Move!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180335_Lines: Knull's essence… I've never felt such evil…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180350_Lines: We must forge ahead if we wish to restore Arakko.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180117_Lines: The Vishanti guide us to retreat!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180007_Lines: The Vishanti sent me to the Ancient One. It was my destiny.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180129_Lines: I would knit the dimensions back together if it were within my power.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180360_Lines: I have a feeling that you are far more qualified for that task than I, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180158_Lines: The energies of this planet are a miasma in my soul.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180112_Lines: Mortal pain is no match for the Sorcerer Supreme!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180009_Lines: The Sanctum Sanctorum is my refuge, my fortress.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180175_Lines: Another falls to the Sorcerer Supreme.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180118_Lines: The Sorcerer Supreme sends his greetings.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180113_Lines: The Sorcerer Supreme lives once more!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180005_Lines: As Sorcerer Supreme, I oversee other magical adepts.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180262_Lines: I do not share the Wakandan faith, but I feel the power in this place.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180209_Lines: I have made the nest disappear.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180249_Lines: Protect Spider-Zero as she traverses the city!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180033_Lines: He should. Also I see you're not taking his advice.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180176_Lines: Feel no shame in defeat by Doctor Strange.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180324_Lines: I may take you up on that offer… should I manage not to be devoured first…
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180248_Lines: A journey into mystery, yes! Ride!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180364_Lines: I swore an oath as a surgeon that prevents me from harming innocents.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180228_Lines: Who else among us has three?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180155_Lines: This is a terrible idea, for reasons I will not bother to enumerate.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180363_Lines: Not long ago, Dracula's minions were merely everyday citizens.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180346_Lines: The creatures of the night shall not stop us!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180261_Lines: Artifacts of vast power. They must be protected.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180252_Lines: We shall protect this sacred Wakandan statue.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180294_Lines: Here is the prize we seek.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180284_Lines: This is where we must attack!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180162_Lines: Quite convenient for you that you are the sole witness to this future.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180145_Lines: It is indeed troubling, Thor. The mystic community on Earth is helping me monitoring all kinds of dimensional disturbance.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180189_Lines: This portal is not my creation.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180277_Lines: Much to bring crashing down around here.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180263_Lines: The emanations of power here…nearly overwhelming.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180026_Lines: Even the astral realms are torn apart by the Timestream Entanglement.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180191_Lines: A man named Castle becomes a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180152_Lines: I see. Are there any other means you consider worthy of exploration? Something beyond your many areas of expertise, perhaps?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180133_Lines: What are they like, these other worlds where I do not exist?
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180008_Lines: Some call me arrogant. Mostly they are jealous.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180069_Lines: There is our objective. Prepare to fight for it.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180354_Lines: Then it's a good thing I happen to have a few up my sleeve, Reed.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180313_Lines: Vile creatures have risen from the realm below.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180316_Lines: Foul creatures! Return to the seas at once!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180202_Lines: The beacon calls no one now.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180205_Lines: By the Moons of Munnopor, I destroy this amplifier!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180092_Lines: Keep your balance, you two. Stay in control.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180081_Lines: The Eye of Agamotto foresaw this.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180339_Lines: Ancient beast of Yggsgard, we shall guide you.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180223_Lines: By the Hoary Hosts of Hoggoth, I triumph!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180359_Lines: I am afraid my brand of magic has limited effects on technology.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180124_Lines: The Mystic Arts flow through me!
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180130_Lines: Magic is not to be owned, but to be felt. Experienced. Lived.
122_HeroVoice_1018_ST.1018001_HeroVoice_10180012_Lines: The occult threats to this world are many, and they grow stronger.

122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200180_Lines: A portal! Be ready to fight!
