122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200184_Lines: A nest of tiny spider bombs!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200076_Lines: Our goal will not be achieved without a fight.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200010_Lines: Don't hold in your emotions, let them out.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200286_Lines: Defend this place no matter what!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200244_Lines: Yggdrasil needs us! Asgard needs us!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200224_Lines: Maybe I made myself too powerful.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200001_Lines: People often mistake empathy for weakness.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200108_Lines: They can't defeat the wind and thunder!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200227_Lines: One must not give in to hate, but one can still enjoy revenge.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200228_Lines: Revenge is the most visceral of impulses.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200007_Lines: Sometimes you can reason with people and sometimes they need a kick in the teeth.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200231_Lines: You should not have stepped there.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200207_Lines: You don't have to fight alone.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200153_Lines: You seem very anxious about your role as protector of this Web.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200031_Lines: That's a lie. I sense that you DO care for your subjects.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200104_Lines: Do you have to burn everything?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200144_Lines: How do you contain such vast energy as the weather?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200100_Lines: Your light daggers are strong, sister.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200099_Lines: Your arrow cuts through the air.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200229_Lines: You got too close to the edge.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200024_Lines: That you need a bigger gun?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200348_Lines: To protect the sanctity of life. Isn't that what you were built to do?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200013_Lines: Pausing in your war against all life, Ultron?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200238_Lines: Never fear, we will soon reach the Weaver!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200310_Lines: I sense your concern. But you have already proven your worth. If this battle is to be won, it will be because you were on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200247_Lines: We still have a dangerous path to travel.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200334_Lines: On we go, to the tower of Avengers!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200338_Lines: Faster! This island is being consumed by Ultron!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200147_Lines: I sense the presence of an ancient evil.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200095_Lines: Poor Rocket. I never wanted to fight him.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200011_Lines: Sometimes empathy is a heavy burden to bear.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200336_Lines: The king of the vampires awaits…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200318_Lines: Oh, my… Am I the only one who can hear Arakko screaming?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200025_Lines: Well… You ARE stretched thin lately.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200027_Lines: Oh, uhh, they are… the cutest animal on Earth!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200325_Lines: Hello, little friend. We're here to help.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200225_Lines: Hey, team, step it up a little!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200165_Lines: Soon they will fail, if we stay strong!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200304_Lines: What lovely beasts. A shame they fight against us.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200315_Lines: Without the sun, it's a miracle there's any life left here at all…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200151_Lines: Quill, why did you crash the Milano here, of all places?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200256_Lines: Good things come to those who wait.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200154_Lines: Would you feel better if I told you that all super heroes feel the same way?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200008_Lines: If the timelines are merged again, I wonder which version of me will survive.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200319_Lines: Rest easy, ancient one. We will avenge you.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200307_Lines: Rest easy now, my gelatinous friends.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200132_Lines: One may feel empathy for an enemy, and still destroy them.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200149_Lines: Peter Quill says it's your fault the Milano crashed here.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200142_Lines: I sense great worry in you, Peter. What troubles you so?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200340_Lines: Easily. All that power is nice. But being alive? That's the true adventure.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200205_Lines: It pleases me to be helpful.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200335_Lines: Dracula is near. I can feel his presence.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200074_Lines: Team, they are taking over the area, be swift!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200198_Lines: Punisher is out of his turret again!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200079_Lines: These are the final moments! Strike harder!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200223_Lines: I defeated them all by myself!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200019_Lines: I don't have to read your mind to know what you're thinking.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200118_Lines: I built myself a new body. Like it?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200022_Lines: I am happy to see you too. And happy we will be in this battle together!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200189_Lines: We need not fear the ankh anymore!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200136_Lines: We fight for the survival of worlds — not for personal glory.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200242_Lines: Protect the Statue of Bast at all costs!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200330_Lines: We must cleanse this living planet of Ultron's influence.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200312_Lines: We will get you back home… if your timeline still exists…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200246_Lines: We must reach the Weaver to save the Web!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200288_Lines: Here is the vehicle we must protect.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200236_Lines: We must cut off Loki's supply of chronovium!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200164_Lines: We must hold out a little longer.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200253_Lines: We must cast this monstrosity out from our world.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200249_Lines: We must traverse the entire Hall of Djalia!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200071_Lines: We are on our way to victory!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200287_Lines: Our duty is now to protect this place!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200248_Lines: We're closer, but we must hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200057_Lines: I am wounded! Who will help?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200101_Lines: I wouldn’t mess with Groot, that's for sure.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200072_Lines: We'll win. I can feel it!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200201_Lines: I have removed the spider threat.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200299_Lines: I have transcended the physical realm.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200150_Lines: I am kidding! Sometimes it is fun to wind you up, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200012_Lines: I must regroup with the rest of the Guardians, the Collector MUST be stopped!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200032_Lines: I will remain loyal to my friends.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200127_Lines: I can feel the power of nature.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200243_Lines: I feel the tree's pain! We must hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200311_Lines: I sense great sadness in you.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200196_Lines: I forced the Punisher out of his turret!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200029_Lines: I can manage. Then we'll free everyone from the Collector's Themepark, yes?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200006_Lines: I was a prisoner of the Collector. One day I will get even.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200328_Lines: I happen to be good friends with a rodent…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200171_Lines: I live to fight another day!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200258_Lines: I am bursting with life energy!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200206_Lines: You needed some help, didn't you?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200300_Lines: My spirit still lingers on this plane…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200077_Lines: I'm getting old waiting for us to attack.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200320_Lines: I can feel Knull stirring within this world. We can't let him reclaim his throne.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200337_Lines: I can feel Arakko's pain. We must act now!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200155_Lines: I don't think you despise Banner quite as much as you want everyone to think.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200301_Lines: I am not ready to move on. Not yet.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200119_Lines: I have some scores to settle!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200014_Lines: I'll be ready. But for today, we fight a common enemy.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200289_Lines: Escort this vehicle to its destination.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200341_Lines: I apologize. Your soul burns so bright. Almost more intense than your flames.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200105_Lines: Groot? Please, can you come back?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200342_Lines: Saving the timeline from total collapse. Care to join me?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200030_Lines: I thought you should know there're Asgardians imprisoned in the Collector's Themepark, King of Lies.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200075_Lines: They will attack until we defeat them once and for all.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200233_Lines: We do not have the numbers to match them.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200097_Lines: Mantis and Rocket make a great team!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200137_Lines: We may have to ally with one Doom — temporarily — to defeat the other.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200073_Lines: They want what we want, team!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200120_Lines: Friends, we need to fall back!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200135_Lines: Doom must be a broken man, to be so careless with so many lives.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200023_Lines: Groot, you know just what to say.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200106_Lines: Any timeline is better off without Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200145_Lines: Yes. It is the same with me and life energy.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200017_Lines: Hulk, is there something on your mind? Can I help?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200191_Lines: Rocket's Beacon has ceased its signal.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200241_Lines: T'Challa needs this sacred totem at once.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200203_Lines: The sniper is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200308_Lines: Reality is ending… yet you remain calm and serene. How?
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200237_Lines: The Web needs the Weaver, and the Weaver needs you, Spider-Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200133_Lines: Life energy is my eternal guide, and the source of my powers.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200005_Lines: Life energy is a powerful weapon against evil.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200251_Lines: Even on the screen, he radiates a terrible evil.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200015_Lines: Fascinating. I can detect strange emanations from you, but no real emotions or feelings.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200002_Lines: Such an emotional time, I like it!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200091_Lines: How terrible, to injure a tree.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200139_Lines: Is it? I just meant the feeling I could sense.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200094_Lines: The Entanglement turns Guardian against Guardian.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200181_Lines: Uh oh. Punisher's in turret mode!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200323_Lines: Knull's dark soul can be used against him.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200305_Lines: Namor abused their loyalty. He must pay.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200245_Lines: The Weaver needs Spider-Zero's help! Onward!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200018_Lines: Gladly. -gasp- There is something else in you, something… unnatural!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200240_Lines: Spider-Zero, you will reach the Budokan. That is my promise.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200309_Lines: If only we all could find such peace in the face of potential annihilation.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200235_Lines: Let us save the great tree!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200326_Lines: We can help you achieve your directive, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200333_Lines: Do not deviate from your programming, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200332_Lines: Not much further until we are underground.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200146_Lines: What a horrible, corrupted life this place must breed.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200324_Lines: Such darkness. The sooner we deliver this, the better.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200185_Lines: Spiders from this nest are hunting us!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200252_Lines: Oh, these ancient powers…they speak to me.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200306_Lines: Poor creatures. They served a cruel king…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200302_Lines: These creatures obey Namor's every command.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200303_Lines: Such gentle creatures, forced into war…
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200274_Lines: A fine place for an attack!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200257_Lines: It's life energy. It takes time to grow.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200317_Lines: The island itself lives and breathes like we do. We have to protect it at all costs.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200148_Lines: This web…what powerful energy emanates from it.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200316_Lines: This place was once so green and vital. All that's left is darkness and decay.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200268_Lines: So much we could destroy here!
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200267_Lines: Much of this could be destroyed.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200329_Lines: This core is Arakko's only hope.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200239_Lines: The path to the Budokan is dangerous. We will protect you.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200339_Lines: That was a long time ago. Now, I am just Mantis.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200134_Lines: Evil is a rejection of life. Thus I am a guardian against evil.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200190_Lines: The Beacon needs to heal itself.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200004_Lines: The Guardians of the Galaxy value ALL life.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200009_Lines: The Guardians of the Galaxy are misfits who make me feel at home.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200226_Lines: Revenge is mentally unhealthy…but very satisfying.
122_HeroVoice_1020_ST.1020001_HeroVoice_10200347_Lines: Arakko is being consumed by a techno-virus. Can you reverse it?

122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210117_Lines: Be a super hero, got to be an optimist.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210005_Lines: Once an Avenger, always an Avenger!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210125_Lines: Oh good, the perfect human's here to make me feel inadequate.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210322_Lines: We do whatever it takes to stop Ultron!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210231_Lines: Is Yggdrasill looking a little wilted? Step on it!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210239_Lines: Why does everyone love giant robots so much?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210376_Lines: …which means your fists and my bow may be the only things left uncompromised. Copy that.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210304_Lines: Guy with arrows versus god of darkness? Sounds like an even match…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210173_Lines: What kind of lunatic makes exploding spiders?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210059_Lines: Get off my turf or I'll drop you on the spot!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210331_Lines: We sure have come a long way since we first joined the Avengers together, way back when…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210298_Lines: "Cut off one head, two more shall take its place."
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210203_Lines: Oh, they took cover? No problem.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210142_Lines: But how'd you get to Battleworld from here?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210297_Lines: You know what they say about Hydra, right…?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210139_Lines: Did you ever imagine Wakanda could turn into this?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210214_Lines: You had to know I'd be back.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210181_Lines: Yarn Amplifier's down! Try something else, Rocket!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210200_Lines: Can't dodge this one. It knows where you've been.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210029_Lines: Hawkeye to team: I'm in the field.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210145_Lines: Truth is, I wasn't the same without the Avengers.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210152_Lines: Hang on just a little longer!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210227_Lines: Ready to get this buggy rolling?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210274_Lines: Ready to defend? You better be.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210167_Lines: Buckle up, Strange popped a portal!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210329_Lines: You're not the only one who can handle a sword, Blade. I used to be Ronin, remember?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210102_Lines: I think I twisted my shoulder.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210017_Lines: Don't hit me with thunder, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210174_Lines: Don't let the spiders get close!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210055_Lines: High fives all around, people. That rocked.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210355_Lines: It's done just fine for me so far. Why abandon a classic?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210232_Lines: Move it! Loki's already gotten too much sap.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210330_Lines: Yeah… but I was the original.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210143_Lines: Here we are again. You holding up okay?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210061_Lines: Enemy territory sighted. ...How did I miss them?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210230_Lines: One ancient panther totem, coming right up!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210072_Lines: It's too easy when you never miss.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210103_Lines: Retreat! We need patience to complete the mission.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210335_Lines: Ugh! These symbiotes are so gross!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210354_Lines: Okay, maybe I'm not that good… but I'm working on it!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210144_Lines: Oh, I don't know. Maybe because last time you were here, Hydra tried to turn you into some sort of supernatural killing machine.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210246_Lines: All I need now is targets.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210374_Lines: Whew. Okay. Cool. Glad it's not just me!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210120_Lines: I think I'm pretty relatable, compared to Namor or someone like that.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210130_Lines: We do make a pretty good team. And Kate's not returning my calls, so… Whaddaya say? Wanna be my new partner?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210023_Lines: Yeah, I remember this place. I bet they remember me, too.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210182_Lines: Ahh, I wrecked it. Now I'll never know what Cosmic Yarn is.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210217_Lines: Ohh, that is a long fall.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210100_Lines: Hey at least my quiver's refilled~
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210194_Lines: Hey, you looked like you could use a hand.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210019_Lines: Hey, big man. You ready to—
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210332_Lines: Hey… If anyone could outrun the end of all that is, Wanda, it's your brother.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210238_Lines: The king wants his kitty statue. Let's speed it up!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210229_Lines: If the king wants his statue, we're gonna deliver.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210062_Lines: Hit em back before they get their defenses set up.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210153_Lines: Stay strong, they can't keep this up forever!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210321_Lines: Ultron doesn't get to win this time. Let's move!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210155_Lines: Another one for the good guys.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210294_Lines: Yeah, I'm not going to even pretend I know what that meant.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210131_Lines: Eh. I'll take what I can get.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210021_Lines: Good, 'cause I didn't bring anything else.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210075_Lines: Think about what you did, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210057_Lines: We need to get after it if we're gonna complete the mission.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210236_Lines: If we don't get Spider-Zero to the Weaver, we might lose the Web!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210119_Lines: If the world didn't need Super Heroes, I'd work at carnival.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210307_Lines: If this can of goop can really finish Knull, let's put it to good use.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210245_Lines: These arrowheads need a lot of fine-tuning.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210318_Lines: Almost to Avengers Tower! Stay on target!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210234_Lines: Get Spider-Zero to the Weaver, now!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210326_Lines: We always help our own, even if we have to go to Hell and back.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210311_Lines: As if this mission wasn't weird enough already…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210003_Lines: Anybody can shoot a gun. A bow, now…that takes skill.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210010_Lines: When you're surrounded by gods and cosmic wizards, you gotta keep your head.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210302_Lines: How come it's always gotta be Ultron…?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210118_Lines: One of these days, I need to sit down with Rocket and exchange ideas.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210026_Lines: It's worse than I thought! We need to do this fast!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210002_Lines: Becoming an Avenger was the best thing I'll ever do.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210244_Lines: I can't do it every second.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210129_Lines: I don't know, man. But it sure won't happen if people like us don't make it happen.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210127_Lines: Why would I plan to miss?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210295_Lines: I've run missions here before. You might want to stick close to me.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210128_Lines: Back atcha, Nat. Show me where I can get a shot at Doom.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210228_Lines: We can get you to Budokan. No problem.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210224_Lines: We're rolling. Hang in there, big tree.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210063_Lines: If we're gonna take this objective, we better do it fast.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210264_Lines: We have to make a stand here.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210308_Lines: We've gotta go under the planet's slimy surface? Great…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210014_Lines: I'll customize one just for that.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210241_Lines: I'd like to try that herb, but I hear there are…side effects.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210107_Lines: I'm ready to give them the final shot.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210362_Lines: I'm more than a marksman! I was trained in swordplay by Jacques Duquesne himself!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210197_Lines: Can't let the arrows do all the work.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210141_Lines: So, I heard the story of how you bonded with Spider-Man in Battleworld.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210175_Lines: So sue me, I like smashing ankhs.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210177_Lines: I got this ankh taken care of.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210009_Lines: I gotta admit, it's fun getting in the lab and coming up with new arrowheads.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210213_Lines: I need to be better about sharing.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210184_Lines: I kicked the Punisher out of his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210188_Lines: I took care of the spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210180_Lines: I got your beacon, Rocket? What else you got?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210353_Lines: Better. I could hit a single spider dangling from a web from a mile away.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210192_Lines: I'm a better sniper than their sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210356_Lines: I'm open… but only if it fits on an arrowhead.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210099_Lines: We are done when I SAY we're done!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210373_Lines: I know you're not the Natasha from my timeline, but…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210001_Lines: I never miss, I CAN'T miss.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210060_Lines: I saw them snuck up miles away!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210004_Lines: I think I was chosen to do some good in the world.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210357_Lines: I'd prefer to strike 'em like an arrow from my bow.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210336_Lines: I forgot you bonded with one of these things. Was it worth it?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210137_Lines: So you're like your reality's version of Spider-Man!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210136_Lines: So that web is holding the Multiverse together? Okay.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210338_Lines: So, are all these people really… you know…? Or can we still find a way to bring them back?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210342_Lines: That's what Tony used to say to me back in the day. Guess who's still an Avenger?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210337_Lines: Got a lock on our targets, Tony?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210256_Lines: Bring it all down, use it.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210314_Lines: Sorry, Ultron. Arakko's under our protection.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210221_Lines: Way too many of them to fight.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210312_Lines: This should be a walk in the park!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210352_Lines: Trust the data. I don't miss.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210361_Lines: Think I could give that new fancy sword of yours a swing, Blade?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210064_Lines: Time is not on our side, people.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210132_Lines: We both know what we signed up for, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210186_Lines: Broke the turret. Punisher is mobile again.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210051_Lines: Hit me. I won't feel it.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210293_Lines: Jeff! So glad I found you, little guy. Kate's been worried sick. Where have you been anyway?!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210135_Lines: This place gave us both Gorr and Knull? Feels like bad luck to me.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210058_Lines: Every fight is for all the marbles.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210116_Lines: Every fight, I say to myself: I might go down, but I'll go down swinging.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210313_Lines: Where's Hank Pym when you need him?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210310_Lines: Never thought H.E.R.B.I.E. would be the big hero...
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210082_Lines: Hey you really DON'T need the big guy, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210212_Lines: What can I say? I don't miss.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210296_Lines: Right. It'll be like shooting fish in a barrel! Umm… Not that I'd do that or anything. I mean, that would just be… You know what? I should probably go…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210025_Lines: It's cool. Now I know my way around.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210090_Lines: Loki is down! Wait, he's on our side?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210300_Lines: Good old Central Park. Dangerous in any timeline!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210333_Lines: Explosive arrows. Hypersonic drills. You name it!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210237_Lines: T'Challa does not want to be kept waiting, people.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210162_Lines: Sniper! Don't let em get a bead on you.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210006_Lines: I was out there, alone. And I… really needed someone to argue with.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210022_Lines: Auto lock with your big guns all you want, little bro. It takes real marksmanship to nock, aim and release. ;)
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210172_Lines: Electronic spiders? Oh, come on, man.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210081_Lines: Save some for the rest of us, Captain Asgard!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210289_Lines: Looks like we're about to get inked!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210359_Lines: See, this is one of those times when I really wish I had superpowers…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210011_Lines: You know what my real superpowers are? Patience and common sense.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210334_Lines: I don't… but now I'm suddenly wondering if I should…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210115_Lines: My years away from the Avengers taught me how much they meant to me.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210325_Lines: Hydra's gotta be furious we found their top-secret base. Good!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210317_Lines: Clear a path to the tower! Now!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210287_Lines: Squids? Good thing I brought a lot of arrows!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210047_Lines: Wait, they can't hurt me, really?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210008_Lines: Wait, who took my boomerang arrows?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210111_Lines: My spirit is droping, but I'm still standing.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210134_Lines: Seeing Loki in charge must drive Thor crazy.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210007_Lines: What's wrong with purple? I like purple.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210291_Lines: So much for your squids, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210080_Lines: You finally wake up, old man?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210316_Lines: No way Knull claims the throne on our watch!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210074_Lines: Honestly? Didn't think I could take Thor.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210154_Lines: Purple's not so funny now, is it?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210341_Lines: Hate to break it to you, but Hawkeye is just a codename. But I bet my pal Sam would love to meet your bird buddy.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210328_Lines: Don't know what those murals mean, but they can't be good!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210233_Lines: The Web's in danger. We have to push harder.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210235_Lines: We're not to the Shrine yet. Time's running out.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210226_Lines: Shrine of the Weaver, here we come!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210225_Lines: Spider-Zero, we're gonna get you to the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210303_Lines: It took more than an arrow to bring this guy down…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210133_Lines: Honestly? I'm sorta glad we haven't. I'm way to good at this to retire so soon!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210240_Lines: Anyone see any interesting-looking arrows? No?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210140_Lines: Guess that's true. But it helps if you have Vibranium.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210079_Lines: Felt kind of weird to fight with a tree.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210292_Lines: What else you got, Namor? Angry starfish?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210218_Lines: It's not the fall, it's the landing.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210301_Lines: This is not the island getaway I was hoping for…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210290_Lines: That was disgusting, Namor… but kinda fun…
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210358_Lines: Nah. I just like to be able to hit the same place more than once if needed!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210319_Lines: This is no picnic, but we don't have another option!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210024_Lines: This place gives me the creeps.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210327_Lines: There's some bad energy in this place. Up to us to wipe it clean!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210275_Lines: This is where we hunker down and defend.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210299_Lines: These vamps really sunk their teeth into the Big Apple.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210272_Lines: This is our target, right here.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210277_Lines: A lot depends on this cargo.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210163_Lines: Moon Knight's leaving ankhs all over the place.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210315_Lines: We get underground, we win this. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210201_Lines: Usually you have to lead a target. Not with this arrow. Nice.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210360_Lines: I'm hoping charisma is at the top of your list. Because otherwise, I'm in big trouble.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210138_Lines: Oh, is there a Hawkeye in your world?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210020_Lines: Took the words right out of my mouth.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210223_Lines: Operation Stop That Tapping is underway.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210199_Lines: Move all you want. I'll just aim where you were.
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210088_Lines: Wait, does that mean Ragnarök is coming?
122_HeroVoice_1021_ST.1021001_HeroVoice_10210027_Lines: Hawkeye's back. It's been a while…

122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220333_Lines: …it could very well be the last war we ever fight.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220015_Lines: Whatever happens, we'll still be together.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220290_Lines: We can't let them get any further!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220395_Lines: We can't let Ultron corrupt Krakoa any longer.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220284_Lines: Claim the area for our team!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220247_Lines: Clear the way to the World Tree!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220361_Lines: Their tentacles have always burrowed deep. But now may be a chance to sever them for good.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220407_Lines: Coming from you, that really says something, Adam.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220008_Lines: Almost everyone knows what's right. Not everyone does it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220431_Lines: From Germany to the edges of space, we're still fighting to keep evil at bay.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220376_Lines: I have a feeling he would be proud, T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220032_Lines: He's my favorite thunder god, that's for sure.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220031_Lines: He didn't lie.I presume you didn't?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220238_Lines: We've got our mission. On to the World Tree!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220369_Lines: As it turns out, time is the one thing I have to spare…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220348_Lines: But as long as we've still got a little Brooklyn inside of us, Buck, I have a feeling we'll be just fine.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220339_Lines: I certainly hope so. I won't let you become another Bucky.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220030_Lines: You'll do just fine, kid. I've been there, too.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220344_Lines: Whatever vendetta you have against the surface will have to wait.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220061_Lines: You dish it out, I can take it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220372_Lines: And yet you don't seem all that thrilled, son.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220012_Lines: You know I wouldn't have left you behind if—
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220357_Lines: Ever been inside a volcano that's also a gateway to a dimension of tentacled monsters?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220279_Lines: It's up to us to defend this zone.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220017_Lines: We're gonna need your sharpshooting, Clint.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220043_Lines: I know you just left here, Clint, but we're going back in.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220036_Lines: Clint, good to know you're still a rebel deep down.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220272_Lines: Hit this place with everything you've got.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220448_Lines: As amazing as these symbiotes are, the evil of their creator can’t be left to spread unchecked.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220351_Lines: Funny story, but I was actually turned into a werewolf once…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220011_Lines: Run the tactics again, everything has to be water tight.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220350_Lines: Blade, rumor has it you've been a one man army against the vampire threat.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220249_Lines: We can still get you there, Zero. Don't worry.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220318_Lines: Don't quit now. We're almost to the tower!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220335_Lines: Forget the card, son. Just show us that man who carried it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220367_Lines: Easy, kid. I'm just giving you a hard time. Let's fight the bad guys.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220187_Lines: That's a weapon of war, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220189_Lines: That's a WMD if I've ever seen one, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220202_Lines: Weapons of war don't belong on the streets, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220316_Lines: We keep pushing on, even if there's no light left.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220229_Lines: History won't be kind to you.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220454_Lines: A testament to Hela's cruelty… but justice will always triumph over evil.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220162_Lines: Freedom doesn't come without a fight.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220308_Lines: If we deliver this essence, we might stand a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220113_Lines: Don't know how you did that trick, Stephen… but I'm impressed!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220409_Lines: Jim Hammond was the original, Johnny. But you've added a modern flare.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220047_Lines: You’re the authority. Let's do it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220441_Lines: I… feel a little uncomfortable with the way you're looking at me, ma'am...
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220375_Lines: Wakanda has come a long way since I fought alongside your father.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220432_Lines: Ha! No matter the timeline, there are always bullies to put in their place. You with me, Buck?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220457_Lines: How's life on Krakoa treating you, Logan?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220160_Lines: This is war. We keep fighting until we can't fight anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220420_Lines: We don't stop fighting until Hydra's plans are derailed.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220410_Lines: Tony Stark isn't the only Avenger with a sense of humor, you know.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220042_Lines: Everyone. No matter who shows up on the other team, just focus on the rift, and remember they're in our way.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220094_Lines: Just here to do my duty.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220435_Lines: Ultron is transforming Arakko's ecosystem into something completely inhospitable to organic life.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220430_Lines: Humans don't need to be perfect to make a difference, Ultron. It's a shame you're not programmed to see that.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220114_Lines: I still think you're too dangerous, Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220419_Lines: If we don't stop Hydra, this world is in serious trouble.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220436_Lines: If you think he's going to stop at Mars, you've clearly forgotten the lessons we learned back in the war.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220003_Lines: If we don't stand up for what's right, who will?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220009_Lines: Alright. If anyone needs me, I'll be in my iceberg :)…That was… a joke. I can joke too, you know.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220383_Lines: If Knull could slay a Celestial, there's no telling what he could do next…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220374_Lines: If we can get you back on that throne, the honor will be all mine, Thor.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220099_Lines: There aren't any words. I'm sorry, Buck.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220157_Lines: Should've stuck to the depths, boys.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220155_Lines: Heads up! Invaders from the deep!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220192_Lines: Careful. We've got a robot infestation.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220246_Lines: Not much further. Keep that cart rolling!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220102_Lines: Guess the one thing Venom can't stomach is justice!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220046_Lines: Hate to ask you to come back here, Buck.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220013_Lines: Neither is Brooklyn. But we'll carry on.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220037_Lines: I go where I'm needed, Bruce. You know that.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220028_Lines: Sure you're okay with this, Bruce?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220122_Lines: Bruce, if you want off the field, just say so!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220366_Lines: Well, I hope this version proves worthy too.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220243_Lines: Hope that Spider-Mobile is up to the task.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220417_Lines: Leave it to Bucky to escape certain death yet again.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220381_Lines: Good thing my shield always matches my outfit.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220138_Lines: Starting to get into the swing of things!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220188_Lines: That turret should be outlawed, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220368_Lines: Of course. But as long as they keep coming back, I'll be here to fight them.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220236_Lines: The numbers aren't in our favor.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220463_Lines: Glad to see you again, Widow. I owe you for saving my life back at Alchemax.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220423_Lines: It's nice to know that, even in my absence, I helped inspire the next generation of heroes…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220404_Lines: Want some free advice? Just be you, son. That's more than enough…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220203_Lines: You'll need heavier ordinance than that to beat me.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220014_Lines: Just like the first time we went after Hydra.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220027_Lines: I don't, And Quill was right. You DO have, and I quote, "one helluva tactical brain in that tiny skull".
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220161_Lines: I fight for more than a flag. I fight for an idea. One bigger than all of us.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220429_Lines: I don't know about that. I'm just a man fighting for a better tomorrow.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220362_Lines: I don't know about every timeline. I just help where I can.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220341_Lines: We're at war. Kidding is for later.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220317_Lines: We won't let you down, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220104_Lines: We don't need kings and shady gods.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220271_Lines: We can really let loose here.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220252_Lines: We promised T'Challa we would deliver. Don't quit now!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220319_Lines: We've got a date with Dracula. Let's not be late!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220280_Lines: We don't give up this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220312_Lines: Let's take this battle straight to the vampire in charge.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220359_Lines: I'm with you, Thor. We won't let that happen.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220456_Lines: I'll do my best not to let you down.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220342_Lines: What could you and I possibly have in common, Magneto?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220093_Lines: We're gonna do what we have to do.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220336_Lines: I'm told that magic of yours could be the key to saving us all, young lady.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220354_Lines: I fought alongside another Human Torch, back during the war.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220338_Lines: I'm not eager to put another young life at risk on the battlefield.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220408_Lines: I've been doing this a long time. No one's managed to extinguish me yet.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220462_Lines: Be careful. There's nothing Magneto wouldn't do to protect his people.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220378_Lines: I get the feeling we may not be as similar as you think…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220425_Lines: I'm not doing it for recognition. I'm fighting because it's the right thing to do.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220201_Lines: I shut down the raccoon's amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220411_Lines: Fine by me. I was never much of a dancer anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220466_Lines: I was overdue for an upgrade…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220458_Lines: I hear you. Last time I was on a beach, I was storming it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220002_Lines: I do the absolute best I can. Every time.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220001_Lines: I was always meant to be a soldier.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220066_Lines: Let's see if you think I'm weak.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220337_Lines: I have faith you won't let that happen. I hope you do to.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220309_Lines: I know the way to Avengers Tower. Follow me!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220444_Lines: I'm perfectly happy how I am. 100% human.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220143_Lines: I've still got plenty of strength to fight on!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220293_Lines: Can't remember the last time I saw Broadway go this dark…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220355_Lines: I guess I'm about to find out if that's a good thing or a bad thing.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220371_Lines: Maybe we show a bit of mercy… but you've got the right idea.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220085_Lines: Team, let's end their unlawful occupation now!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220211_Lines: You can always count on me, partner.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220095_Lines: I'm a soldier. This is war.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220064_Lines: Healing is for after the fight.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220133_Lines: The fat lady isn't singing yet.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220427_Lines: Everyone is looking at me as if they know me… It's a strange feeling…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220040_Lines: All bad things eventually lead to Hydra.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220105_Lines: Don't make me do this, Tony!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220108_Lines: Suit looks good on you, Tony!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220073_Lines: Two's better than one, I guess.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220237_Lines: They've got more soldiers than us.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220360_Lines: No matter how much things change…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220010_Lines: Past or future, as long as folks're living on their knees, I'll keep standing up.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220045_Lines: We also need to do this right, Clint. Now lead the way.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220437_Lines: Star-Lord, you're the expert when it comes to space. I'll be following your lead.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220334_Lines: Funny. I heard you were an Avenger once…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220181_Lines: A mystical artifact of some sort.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220033_Lines: You know, between Wakanda and Krakoa, I was afraid that we couldn't connect on a personal level any more, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220116_Lines: You got a believer in me, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220394_Lines: Just like Krakoa, Arakko must be liberated!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220239_Lines: We don't stop until we reach Yggdrasill.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220346_Lines: There's darkness inside all of us, son. Understanding it is what makes us human.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220005_Lines: Never forget who you are fighting for.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220257_Lines: Proof that one person should never possess this much power…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220331_Lines: Nah, I just got bounced around the timestream a little. You know there's a world where I got out of the ice in the last millennium?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220412_Lines: True. But right now, I need you to focus on cutting up something else, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220248_Lines: Stand back, folks. Spider, coming through!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220082_Lines: You know we're going to have to fight.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220081_Lines: Team, thin their number and secure the perimeter!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220356_Lines: Just a heads-up. Things get weirder the farther in you go.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220200_Lines: Rocket's amplifier won't bother us again.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220026_Lines: Rocket, I'm counting on you on the battlefield.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220269_Lines: I want eyes on this location.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220330_Lines: Until it doesn't need saving anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220112_Lines: See, Clint? I knew you cared!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220415_Lines: Looks like Hydra is under new management.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220230_Lines: Looks like you were outranked, soldier.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220418_Lines: Seems this canary broke out of his cage.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220347_Lines: Would you look at us… The man out of time and the cyborg assassin.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220173_Lines: Just in the nick of time!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220006_Lines: You can't be brave without being afraid first.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220039_Lines: Real soldiers do the right thing. Not the easy thing.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220370_Lines: The real monsters are the men who fight in Hydra's name.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220438_Lines: A true leader knows when to step back and listen to the expertise of others, son.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220377_Lines: Really? Where did you serve, son?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220125_Lines: Too bad, we might actually need Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220159_Lines: Squid soldiers down. Now on to their king.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220044_Lines: Wait'll you see the basement. And by the way, thanks for busting Bucky out.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220171_Lines: I'll be ship shape in no time!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220018_Lines: Thor! We're going to need a little Asgardian muscle.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220315_Lines: No stopping until we're sure Knull is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220307_Lines: Knull doesn't rise on our watch. Got it?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220154_Lines: What on Earth has Namor done now?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220158_Lines: Is that the best you've got, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220343_Lines: Can we count on you as an ally, Namor, just like in the old days?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220461_Lines: Rumor has it you're considering an alliance with Krakoa, Namor. Why?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220287_Lines: Don't let this vehicle stop moving!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220253_Lines: Keep going! America doesn't let its allies down!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220352_Lines: Not as long as there's still a brighter tomorrow to fight for, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220245_Lines: America and Wakanda always stand together.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220141_Lines: Captain America calling for medical assistance.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220052_Lines: Captain Steve Rogers, at your service.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220131_Lines: You think I'm too old for this?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220183_Lines: I'll bet this is Moon Knight's doing…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220428_Lines: I haven't led a fighting force of this magnitude since the war. What if I don't live up to your expectations?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220004_Lines: Freedom's an IDEA that'll never die!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220464_Lines: Well, I'd still like to find a way to repay your kindness.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220365_Lines: It may have some fancy new gadgets, Bucky, but the people haven't changed all that much.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220080_Lines: We've won the battle. But the war's not over yet!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220382_Lines: This may not be my nation, but I'll still fight for it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220207_Lines: I took out the spiders at their nest.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220250_Lines: Spider-Zero's mission isn't over yet. So neither is ours.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220240_Lines: You've got quite a crew on your side, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220242_Lines: We've got quite the mission ahead, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220241_Lines: Keep believing, Spider-Zero, and we can't fail.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220251_Lines: We'll have the path clear in no time, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220035_Lines: When it starts, follow my lead, any questions?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220048_Lines: It'll be awkward if we run into my prom date.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220165_Lines: Nice to see a nation reach its full potential.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220320_Lines: Let's end this eternal night once and for all!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220442_Lines: Honestly? I'm not so sure about that…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220459_Lines: Wish I could say the same. But in my timeline, I'm not sure we ever crossed paths.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220075_Lines: Thanks, I can still take it.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220403_Lines: That's very kind of you to say, Lin Lie.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220426_Lines: Thanks, but I think I'll pass. No man deserves that much power. Not even the very best of us.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220022_Lines: All right, then. Welcome to the resistance.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220310_Lines: This is a big job for a little robot. But H.E.R.B.I.E.'s up to the task.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220195_Lines: Tell Khonshu to stand down, soldier.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220231_Lines: Good try. But not nearly good enough.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220358_Lines: Not the Asgard I remember, that's for sure.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220016_Lines: Not the first time. Won't be the last.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220166_Lines: This world is pure darkness. It's up to us to shed some light.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220256_Lines: This era sure has a strange definition of justice…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220455_Lines: And what am I to you now, all these years later?
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220038_Lines: Well, son, if you're anything like the Frank Castle from MY timeline, you ARE the dirty war you're trying to end.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220255_Lines: Wakanda's own version of the Super-Soldier Serum.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220311_Lines: Never seen a squirrel quite like this one…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220163_Lines: This place sure makes me miss the good old U.S. of A.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220379_Lines: Unless they can bite through Vibranium, I beg to differ.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220285_Lines: This place is ours to lose.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220396_Lines: This is our one chance to free Arakko. We can't waste it!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220363_Lines: This way. Keep an eye out for tentacles.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220254_Lines: This nightmare has Zola's fingerprints all over it…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220294_Lines: Despite the setting, this is going to be no picnic.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220393_Lines: This core can free the island from Ultron's control.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220199_Lines: Whatever that amplifier was, it's off now.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220460_Lines: Then I look forward to finding out exactly what I saw in you.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220353_Lines: Maybe today's the day we finally change that, old friend.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220206_Lines: I think I got all those spider-bots.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220023_Lines: That's because we always answer the bell.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220443_Lines: Not the one I've been fighting for all these years!
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220332_Lines: Two soldiers who would do anything to protect their nations.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220373_Lines: Adjusting to a new world, no matter how familiar, is never easy. I would know.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220345_Lines: It's nice to have another genuine force for good on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220416_Lines: Different leader, but still the same old Hydra.
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220164_Lines: I'll never get used to these magical realms…
122_HeroVoice_1022_ST.1022001_HeroVoice_10220384_Lines: King in Black? I prefer Red, White, and Blue myself.

122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230163_Lines: A symbiote? Ugh. I hate these flarkin' things.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230146_Lines: Once we get this timeline thing sorted out, I'm taking a long vacation somewhere with lots of stuff to steal.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230263_Lines: People usually don't let me into shrines.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230083_Lines: Let's go and blow up some dummies!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230253_Lines: Revenge is what gets me up in the morning.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230415_Lines: Cuz last time we teamed up, your lightnin' zapped off half of my fur! That's why!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230112_Lines: Aw, no, Groot…now I gotta grow you from a twig. Again!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230317_Lines: Stop this thing in its tracks!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230348_Lines: Nah. I'm just here to blast some symbiotes into puddles of plasm!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230002_Lines: You can count on me, I got a plan.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230159_Lines: That's some nice armor you got there, sweetheart. How much you want for it?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230108_Lines: You did that with your weak human eyes?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230027_Lines: Really? Then how come everyone keep calling me a raccoon? I'm a badass!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230191_Lines: They're up against it. We just gotta hold on.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230078_Lines: I'm gonna take their flarking home!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230029_Lines: Fer what he did to ya? I'll MAKE that flarking Elder of the Universe regret even being born!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230211_Lines: What kind of person makes nests of explosive spiders?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230151_Lines: A love of things that explode?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230179_Lines: Your name is Jeff? Okay, Jeff.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230001_Lines: Who are you calling a raccoon, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230175_Lines: You live here? What's it like having the giant spiderweb over your head all the time?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230418_Lines: So you're the almighty Phoenix, eh? Not as big as I expected…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230188_Lines: I was a little messed up there, thanks.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230011_Lines: Are you actually made out of orange rocks?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230387_Lines: You know, I used to hang out in the hollowed out head of one of these giant jerks.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230406_Lines: What kinda wildlife do ya think they've got on Krakoa, anyway?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230036_Lines: What, humans? They don't understand anything because they never listen.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230411_Lines: That "tree" is a Flora colossus. And his name is Groot.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230166_Lines: You… made a plan? Huh. Guess there's a first time for everything!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230417_Lines: It's not so much that I get seen. It's that folks hear me comin' from a mile away.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230258_Lines: We can't take that many of em.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230352_Lines: Gather 'round, Earth rodents! Rocket's gonna show ya how it's done!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230270_Lines: We better speed up or that tree's gonna be all dried up.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230360_Lines: You guys ready to overthrow a king? Let's do this!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230284_Lines: Ready to get your Yarn on?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230375_Lines: With my skills, I'll have our ship flyin' again in no time! Just you wait and see! There ain't nothin' I can't fix!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230111_Lines: Blade. That guy wins with style.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230361_Lines: Don't worry, H.E.R.B.I.E. I look out for the little guys.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230274_Lines: I feel like we should have been there already.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230074_Lines: Don't mind me, I'm just dying.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230155_Lines: No, I don't know what the Timestream Entanglement is.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230272_Lines: Hit it, we got a shrine to get to!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230102_Lines: Not too many things impress me, but Storm? Pretty flarkin' impressive.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230410_Lines: I'm impressed, kid. That's some serious tech you're wearin' there.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230220_Lines: Where's the other Rocket so I can mock him?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230217_Lines: This other Rocket's beacons are so flimsy!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230160_Lines: How 'bout just one arm? No? Aww, come on! You're killin' me, kid!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230266_Lines: Just a little pleasure cruise, right?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230218_Lines: I make the beacons around here. Nobody else!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230091_Lines: Long as I got bullets, I win.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230359_Lines: We deliver this to Knull, he's done for!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230198_Lines: That sniper's gonna be sorry if I ever get close.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230034_Lines: What have you done to your armor, Stark?! Didn't know you could make it any uglier!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230019_Lines: Steve Rogers, Pete said you VOLUNTEERED to be experimented on, that true?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230354_Lines: As living planets go, at least Arakko's one step up from Ego…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230408_Lines: Okay, Jeff, I've got a plan, but it's gonna take expert timing and perfect precision…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230016_Lines: Ugh. Fine. We'll save the world.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230168_Lines: Yikes. I mean, technically I ain't a raccoon… but somethin' tells me I shouldn't push my luck.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230372_Lines: No givin' up! We still got some bite left in us!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230314_Lines: We gotta move this jalopy along!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230103_Lines: Whoa did you see that green ape? I want one!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230081_Lines: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hold up, team!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230104_Lines: Aww the twig's all grown up!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230107_Lines: Whoa, imagine what you can do with more arms!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230260_Lines: Whoa, we need some backup here.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230105_Lines: Ohhh I really like her armor!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230202_Lines: Whoa, these keyhole things are dangerous!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230219_Lines: Hahahaha, that other Rocket is gonna be so angry about his amplifier!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230196_Lines: Haha, you ain't got rid of me yet!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230149_Lines: What, are you kidding? Everything's for sale!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230158_Lines: Ha! My totem is a gun. Also, what's a raccoon?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230165_Lines: Never a dull moment for our crew, eh, Quill?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230405_Lines: Whoa! Hey! Bite them! Not me!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230339_Lines: Yikes! What the flark are these things, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230382_Lines: Eh. It was worth a try.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230345_Lines: Well, well. Look who's back to save the entire flarkin' universe.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230037_Lines: What, don't got a raccoon joke like everyone else?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230396_Lines: This Celestial may have come crashin' down, but at least it got the Milano flyin' again!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230228_Lines: Aw, man, I gotta make another beacon?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230222_Lines: Ah crap, I destroyed the turret. Now I can't steal it.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230134_Lines: Yo! Rocket needs some healing here!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230021_Lines: Hey Hawkeye, why you bring a bow and arrows to a gun fight?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230025_Lines: Hmmm… I DO miss the jailbreaks. I'll call Drax. You're a sweetheart, Mantis.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230341_Lines: Well, at least the grossest part of the battle is over…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230125_Lines: Oh ho ho, I'm gonna get some revenge.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230079_Lines: Grrrr ya think ya can take from ME?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230127_Lines: Oh I'm not gonna make it easy.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230136_Lines: Yeeeeaaahhhhh! Rocket is full of energy!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230224_Lines: Hey, Skull Boy! How much for the turret?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230017_Lines: Hey, I like your firearms. Never thought I'd find someone with the same taste on this backward planet.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230030_Lines: Hey, I'm looking for a giant tree and some humanoid morons. Seen em? They're kinda my only friends.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230148_Lines: Hey, I saw that turret thing you do. How much you want for it?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230200_Lines: Hey, sniper! Rocket's coming for you!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230169_Lines: Hey. Thor. Lemme see the hammer.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230187_Lines: Hey! Mind if I join ya, pal?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230347_Lines: Hey, at least it ain't caked into your fur, Grimm!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230114_Lines: Hey the human host is down!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230399_Lines: Yeesh. I thought this planet was nasty when we crashed on its surface. I had no idea!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230267_Lines: The king wants his cat figurine? Okay, whatever.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230268_Lines: Doesn't the king have servants to move his tacky statues?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230005_Lines: I do the right thing unless the wrong thing is more fun.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230086_Lines: More bad guys. Just what we need.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230132_Lines: Amplifier in preparation, show some patience!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230232_Lines: I got the sniper before the sniper got me! HAHA!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230106_Lines: Quill, you got one! I can't believe it!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230311_Lines: Here's job one: Capture this area.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230113_Lines: Quill's gone? That's…well, I guess it'll be a lot quieter.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230015_Lines: Quill, you got your ship? Cause if you do, let's get out of here.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230116_Lines: Ultron's wasted. I want the thruster!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230432_Lines: Well, whaddaya say, lady? Are we burnin' this slimeball to cosmic ash or not?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230416_Lines: I like your style, lady. Stealth has never really been my strong suit.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230164_Lines: Fine… but try not to drip any protoplasm on me. I just washed my fur!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230227_Lines: Okay, the spider nest is gone.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230315_Lines: Move this thing down the road!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230374_Lines: Arakko's in big trouble if we don't get this done!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230223_Lines: If I don't get a turret, nobody gets a turret!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230203_Lines: The keyholes are more dangerous if there's more than one.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230133_Lines: Cosmic Yarn Amplifier, ready to be deployed!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230229_Lines: Crap. Those beacons don't grow on trees, you know.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230174_Lines: Magnificent, shmagnificent. Let's do the job and get out of here.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230364_Lines: Us rodents gotta look out for each other!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230300_Lines: We should light em up here.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230178_Lines: Right where you crashed it! Admit it!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230172_Lines: You couldn't pay me to go up in that web.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230231_Lines: Ha! You call yourself a sniper?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230259_Lines: Even I can see we're outnumbered.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230412_Lines: A bow? Really? Ain't that a bit outdated, pal?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230153_Lines: Oh yeah, what's not to love?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230020_Lines: Definitely against my will! I don't wanna go back there, too much buried history buried.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230150_Lines: There's no shooter like me, buddy.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230035_Lines: Flark you do, I know that Earther tone! Uhh what's it called…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230395_Lines: Let's finish Knull already so I can wash this alien goop outta my fur…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230129_Lines: Get out of here! What are ya'll waiting for?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230436_Lines: Any clue how we're supposed to take out a literal god on his home turf?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230404_Lines: Easy, buddy! We're s'posed to be partners!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230142_Lines: When the chips are down, you want your heroes a little roguish and scruffy. Like me.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230082_Lines: We're gonna need a battle cry!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230167_Lines: I'll make it worth your while, Bucky. Go on. Name your price.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230275_Lines: We're on a mission for the king! Hit the gas!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230143_Lines: We guard the galaxy, sure, but sometimes we take stuff other people are guarding.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230093_Lines: Are we winning? I know I'm having a great time.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230209_Lines: Wonder if I can steal that turret thing.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230041_Lines: What the -- Hey, nobody told me they're experimenting on living beings?!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230397_Lines: Wow. This thing sure looks a lot more impressive when you're this close to it…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230008_Lines: I like hanging around Groot because he gets me.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230278_Lines: Wonder what I could get for these plants on the black market at Knowhere…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230351_Lines: I'll never understand what Quill sees in this lousy planet…
