122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230170_Lines: I just wanna see if it'll charge up my gun. C'mon. I'll give it back.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230018_Lines: Let's see… Ion turret, photon reaction chaingun, mini black hole
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230095_Lines: Is that two for one? Did I get both of them?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230099_Lines: I'm taking an arrow for a souvenir!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230162_Lines: I'm never coming anywhere near your flarkin'realm. You can count on that.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230070_Lines: Can't beat a thick coat of fur.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230221_Lines: My amplifiers are so much better than these.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230414_Lines: I know what we gotta do, lady. And I'm gonna do it as far away from you as possible.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230014_Lines: I know, how do we keep ending up in these situations?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230141_Lines: I'm a good guy who occasionally takes stuff that doesn't belong to him.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230294_Lines: I wanna watch all this stuff fly around.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230225_Lines: I took care of the creepy-crawlies.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230381_Lines: Same as you, pal. I'm worthy. Wanna trade?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230413_Lines: I've got a chronometric field generator that might make ya change your mind!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230362_Lines: I'll get ya to Avengers Tower in no time!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230385_Lines: So, you really talk to these little tree rats, huh? How's that goin' for ya?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230145_Lines: So there are two Dooms, huh? Sounds like overpopulation.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230192_Lines: Put em down so they stay down.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230190_Lines: Hold em off! We almost got this.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230176_Lines: It would really get on my nerves.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230076_Lines: Done! What's next? Do we even have a plan?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230373_Lines: That virus is gonna spread if we don't do somethin'…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230421_Lines: I'm sure there'll be plenty of other lunatics you can use those swords of yours on.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230065_Lines: Invincible? Oh, yeah, I like that.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230236_Lines: My good deed for the day.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230353_Lines: If I'd known there was gonna be a party, I would've gotten groomed first!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230346_Lines: Did I? Huh. I guess sarcasm is my default setting. You are gonna save the universe, though, right?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230435_Lines: Nah. Halfworld is a mess, too. Guess we can’t choose where we came from, eh?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230180_Lines: Yeah, none of us like Loki. So let's go save Asgard, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230366_Lines: Time to wipe Ultron from the face of Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230024_Lines: Mantis, people keep calling me grumpy, am I grumpy?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230028_Lines: Mantis, Pete just put Klyntar on top of the list. How you holdin' up?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230365_Lines: This core should end our little Ultron problem.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230264_Lines: The Web of Life and Destiny! Bring it on!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230060_Lines: C'mere and see if I'm weak.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230207_Lines: Turret mode? How come I don't have a turret mode?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230144_Lines: From what I hear about this Doom character, I don't think I'm gonna like him very much.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230069_Lines: Shoot me! Go on, try it!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230363_Lines: Leave this one to the rodents, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230371_Lines: Never trust a squirrel to do a raccoon's job…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230379_Lines: Grimm was right about you. If you were a star, you'd be a total Class M.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230434_Lines: Next time you invite me over to your place, Venom, remind me not to say yes…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230092_Lines: This is way more fun than it should be.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230023_Lines: Bingo! Where do I find one?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230156_Lines: Yeah, as soon as the brain trust builds the other gizmo, we'll all get to go back home.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230186_Lines: It's you and me again, old buddy!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230323_Lines: Doc Rocket is in the office.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230204_Lines: Where there's a portal, pretty soon there are bad guys.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230277_Lines: See that? Missing.' Look what Quill did.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230437_Lines: You gotta be kiddin', lady! Knull is older than the universe itself!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230386_Lines: Yeah? How about the local raccoons? I bet they've been up to something awesome too, right?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230057_Lines: Who says I need healing anyway?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230369_Lines: We gotta get to that tower! Now!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230342_Lines: Done. Remind me never to go swimmin' again…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230338_Lines: Squids? Namor wasn't bad enough on his own?!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230118_Lines: Wait. Isn't he the guy who was supposed to solve all this?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230409_Lines: Aww, I'm just messin' with ya! All you gotta do is swallow everybody whole! Got it?!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230380_Lines: Plenty hot on the surface, but not exactly the brightest…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230337_Lines: Namor called in backup. And boy are they ugly!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230340_Lines: Namor's eight-armed pals are officially fish food.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230368_Lines: No way can we risk Knull makin' a comeback!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230251_Lines: Yeah, that's right. I got em all!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230117_Lines: I made fun of her, but she was a good friend.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230226_Lines: Spider nest is no longer a problem.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230439_Lines: Fine… but only if you tell Quill it's because of the whole genius thing…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230230_Lines: Okay, hold your horses, I'll deploy another beacon.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230438_Lines: Finally! Someone who recognizes and appreciates my technological genius!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230419_Lines: Speakin' of which, if you're lookin' for planets to burn, I know a few that deserve it.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230003_Lines: Just say it, there's nothin' I can't fix.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230184_Lines: Long story. Mostly it's Quill's fault.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230254_Lines: Are there seriously people who don't like revenge?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230084_Lines: Seriously, time is not on our side here.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230004_Lines: Some of my best friends are crooks and villains.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230010_Lines: Call me a raccoon, we're gonna have a problem.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230376_Lines: Nobody better put a hand on my equipment! This stuff is for professionals only… and that don't mean you!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230007_Lines: Y'all buncha dead weights, I can do this myself.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230420_Lines: You as glad as I am that all that nonsense with Dracula is over?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230269_Lines: Get to the flarkin' tree already!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230367_Lines: Gotta get this thing under the surface, quick!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230370_Lines: Come on! Let's get this bolt-head in gear!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230088_Lines: You better get a look behind you!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230271_Lines: Step on it, we got a web to save or something.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230398_Lines: Good thing the Milano and the Celestial were so close. Not sure those hackjob Nega-Bands woulda worked otherwise…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230062_Lines: That put a pep in my step.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230199_Lines: Sniper? Just what this day needed.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230201_Lines: What are these weird keyhole things, anyway?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230279_Lines: Those tanks give me the willies. Too much like a bad memory.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230310_Lines: This spot is ours to take.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230313_Lines: It's ours! Now hang onto it.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230394_Lines: It's kinda like bein' on Knowhere… but without any of the good parts…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230356_Lines: Gonna need a long shower after this to get all the symbiote outta my fur…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230185_Lines: Hey! Nice view from up here!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230173_Lines: This is where the black blobby things come from? Pft,  figures.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230009_Lines: THIS looks like a gig for the Guardians of the Galaxy.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230128_Lines: Things are gonna be different this time!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230349_Lines: Already better than any plan Quill ever had!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230276_Lines: Does this thing even have a gas pedal?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230216_Lines: Only one Rocket gets to make beacons: me!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230355_Lines: It ain't Knowhere, but I've visited worse…
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230233_Lines: No more sniper, if you were wondering.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230147_Lines: Friends have saved my life far more times than weapons.. Even so, it's always nice to have a couple of weapons.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230208_Lines: The skull guy made himself into a turret!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230433_Lines: Then spread those wings and set yer flames to high! We're roastin' some symbiotes!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230388_Lines: So what are we gonna do with this one when we're done? Turn it into a vacation rental?
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230087_Lines: Those guys are about to shoot at us.
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230333_Lines: Get ready to lock and overload!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230006_Lines: We can pull it off, I've been in worse gangs
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230115_Lines: Hawkeye's down, dibs on the boomerang arrow!
122_HeroVoice_1023_ST.1023001_HeroVoice_10230080_Lines: -sigh- Seriously, stay away from my scutt!

122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240301_Lines: The king of the seas has called forth his own army…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240376_Lines: We face the end of all that is… and yet you cannot seem to stop dancing? Curious…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240023_Lines: Too bad I can't have you in MY realm, little king.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240093_Lines: Did you really think you could play god, little mutant?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240315_Lines: What a dismal place Midgard has become. I love it!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240303_Lines: What strange beasts from Midgard's depths!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240333_Lines: The citadel of Midgard's heroes awaits us!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240203_Lines: For revenge I would burn universes.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240369_Lines: Better to reach for glory than to sit on a throne that has lost all meaning… My Lord…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240329_Lines: For Arakko's sake, I choose life this day.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240297_Lines: Why should Asgard not be mine? That is the real question.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240060_Lines: Destroy them and bring me their souls!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240340_Lines: Perhaps. If only you had some…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240196_Lines: Who would claim one of these five I have won?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240300_Lines: The Lord of Asgard is reborn!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240171_Lines: Your turret won't protect you from me!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240120_Lines: My realm is the great river, into which all others flow.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240153_Lines: A portal. The mortal wizard comes.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240381_Lines: Yet I have never seen a soul quite so weary. I can bring it the peace it deserves.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240026_Lines: Who dares summon the Queen of Hel?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240142_Lines: Who could fight the Goddess of Hel?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240285_Lines: Why do you say that, man of gold?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240087_Lines: Quite an efficient machine, I like it.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240396_Lines: You had the chance before and failed. What makes you think you'd do any better now?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240370_Lines: You think you know the cold, child? You wouldn't last a night in Niffleheim.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240345_Lines: The darkness in you runs deep. How do you not succumb to it?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240349_Lines: This King in Black you speak of sounds unfit to rule.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240272_Lines: Why, would you like a tour? I warn you, entering is easier than leaving.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240019_Lines: You'll soon find time is meaningless in the afterlife.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240279_Lines: You are one of Knull's creatures.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240206_Lines: You didn't see the drop there?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240022_Lines: So you say. But even a living island will meet its end…eventually.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240016_Lines: Odinson. Your realm is in peril.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240047_Lines: Nothing you do can hurt me!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240310_Lines: Such a noble heart will lead you to Valhalla instead of my domain. A pity.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240002_Lines: Can you pass the trial of your soul?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240280_Lines: Your god is greedy. I warned him to stay away from what is mine.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240184_Lines: The dirt is where your face belongs.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240201_Lines: Did you not know who you fought?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240067_Lines: You'll want to protect your rear.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240138_Lines: The clock will call you cowards if you do not attack!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240072_Lines: The legions of Hel are beyond counting!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240105_Lines: …The horrors I'll make for them in Hel!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240165_Lines: Rebirth is not how we do things in Hel.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240110_Lines: Hel will be unleashed in a few moments.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240108_Lines: Greetings from the Queen of Hel.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240010_Lines: My Hel is NOT a burning pit, it's a realm of trials.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240003_Lines: My domain will one day encompass all souls.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240077_Lines: I could use a soldier like thou in Hel.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240197_Lines: Mortals. Please. Can't you keep up?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240004_Lines: Every mortal is my subject. I rule all.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240339_Lines: If you should fall, mortal, riches will not buy your way out of my realm.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240312_Lines: Do not sell yourself short. Your head would make an excellent trophy.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240225_Lines: Make haste! I would see what T'Challa does with this totem.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240189_Lines: A dagger to the heart tends to end things.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240177_Lines: One little sniper? A distraction for the Queen of Hel.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240122_Lines: All the Ten Realms, and much beyond, would lie easily within Niflheim's borders.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240074_Lines: The Ten Realms shall be mine!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240205_Lines: Another soul falls into my realm.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240149_Lines: I have spied a sniper! Hunt them!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240352_Lines: Release them to me and they will never know pain again.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240373_Lines: The crows of Nastrond would not dare to disobey their mistress.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240092_Lines: Aww, the black kitty is down.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240286_Lines: Ah, but if they all ceased to exist, we would both be out of business, would we not?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240380_Lines: Hmm… You do not shudder in my presence as most mortals do...
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240314_Lines: Hmm. I suppose this is why they say never to meet your heroes…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240309_Lines: Hmm… A little small for a Kronan, are we not?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240344_Lines: Aww… Sweet, innocent spider. We shall see about that…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240084_Lines: Well, Midgard has a worthy sorcerer after all.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240308_Lines: For all the fresh souls you have delivered to my domain over the years.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240368_Lines: Of all people, Loki, you cannot blame me for seeking new opportunities to gain power.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240295_Lines: Across every timeline, brave Captain America fights tyrannical Hydra.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240090_Lines: In his final moments, did Magneto feel regret?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240121_Lines: Among Asgardians, Loki has cleverness and Thor courage…but only I the vision to seize the future.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240320_Lines: This throne is more befitting of a Queen…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240260_Lines: Seize this area! Make it ours.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240281_Lines: What manner of creature are you?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240091_Lines: The Odinson? Fallen? Surely Ragnarok is next.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240317_Lines: Hela has arrived. Now the festivities may truly begin!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240146_Lines: No goddess is ever truly gone. Fight!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240199_Lines: Next I will pretend to let you compete.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240337_Lines: If Ultron succeeds, Arakko's soul will be lost.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240375_Lines: What if I told you I could return those beloved souls… for a price…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240350_Lines: Such vast power belongs in the hands of a far more seasoned ruler.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240287_Lines: Why would I destroy a beautiful thing when I could rule it?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240374_Lines: Such a noble hero, yet death hangs over you like a shroud.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240162_Lines: Ankhs symbolize life. Therefore I destroy them.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240336_Lines: Your soul will not be claimed this day, rodent!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240247_Lines: Take caution. The enemy was here.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240371_Lines: You jest, but your powers feel like nothing more than a summer breeze to me.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240224_Lines: Shall we deprive the king of his precious statue? No! Go faster!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240332_Lines: The false king must not ascend!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240385_Lines: Now, now. We have matters of multiversal importance to deal with. Shall we call a truce?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240342_Lines: It should be a delight… as long as no one invites Mephisto…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240365_Lines: While Knull fends off the Phoenix's spark from his throne, I shall seize control of Klyntar… and all the power that comes with it!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240277_Lines: Few mortals are so adept at wielding chaos magic. You have caught my attention, Witch.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240330_Lines: This land's soul must be protected.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240157_Lines: The Punisher hides in his armored turret!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240156_Lines: I see the Punisher needs his armor.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240397_Lines: I don't want to contain it, you insolent child. I want to spread it across all realities until they bow to me!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240292_Lines: I wish it long life, T'Challa. Because someday it will be mine.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240202_Lines: I specialize in grievance and revenge.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240382_Lines: I am death. You are rebirth. Should we not be on opposite sides of this fray?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240251_Lines: We shall defend here, and triumph.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240207_Lines: We do not have the advantage.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240264_Lines: Here is the vehicle we must protect.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240056_Lines: We must attack…may we be cruel.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240324_Lines: We must deliver Knull's essence to the realm below.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240331_Lines: We must venture swiftly into the depths!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240218_Lines: Our progress is too slow! We must save the World-Tree!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240140_Lines: Our defense is strong! Hold a little longer.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240185_Lines: I will grind you into dust!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240112_Lines: I'm taking damage. Get me some healing!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240082_Lines: There is a general that could rule the ranks of the fallen.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240377_Lines: I rip the souls from my foes and send them to my realm for eternal suffering.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240275_Lines: I smell a familiar hint of divinity on you, mortal.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240278_Lines: I wish you no ill. But all souls eventually belong to Hela. I will be counting the days until yours is mine.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240215_Lines: I will protect Spider-Zero on her journey to the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240068_Lines: I am the goddess all the other gods fear.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240384_Lines: I had a feeling we would meet again, Daywalker.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240168_Lines: I have destroyed this absurd yarn contraption.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240214_Lines: I wish to depart this city for more rarefied precincts. Spider-Zero! Show the way.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240210_Lines: I care nothing for the tree, but I would thwart Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240307_Lines: I should be thanking you, Logan…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240228_Lines: I shall have to replace this throne with something more…suitable to my taste.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240061_Lines: I want this land. Get it for me!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240273_Lines: I am no sorcerer. I am a goddess.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240158_Lines: Let me peel the Punisher out of his shell.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240188_Lines: I bring Hel down on their heads.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240143_Lines: Another soul to join my legions.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240363_Lines: With my army of the undead on the rise, this new Hel will surely thrive!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240008_Lines: My powers? Practically infinite. Slightly less so on Midgard. Earth.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240284_Lines: All living things eventually come to me.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240009_Lines: Hel is my realm, but soon it will not be the only one.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240020_Lines: I've met many Supremes before, Strange, what makes YOU so special?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240294_Lines: Perhaps you should come with me and see for yourself, my child. Fresh souls are always welcome in Hela's domain.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240291_Lines: So, we fight for your empire today.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240200_Lines: All souls are mine when I want them.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240327_Lines: Ratatoskr? I did not expect to find you on Midgard…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240223_Lines: At this rate, the world will end before we reach our goal.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240006_Lines: To rule the afterlife is to rule everyone, eventually.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240242_Lines: Destroy it all, and make use of it!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240288_Lines: You are bold, Odinson. You will make a fine lieutenant in my legions…another time.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240034_Lines: No one rules me but myself!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240290_Lines: It matters not. Asgard will be mine in the end.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240139_Lines: Time is against them. Stand firm!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240364_Lines: Some gods are best left to the pages of history. You were one of them, Bast. I am not…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240274_Lines: And you will…one day when you enter my realm.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240144_Lines: Who is more immortal than I?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240079_Lines: What is the soul of a machine?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240334_Lines: We will not fail you, robot. So swears Hela!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240160_Lines: A nest of mechanical spiders. Crush it.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240351_Lines: The mortal souls here are locked in eternal torment.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240219_Lines: The tree withers as we dawdle.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240325_Lines: This soulless machine shall be our salvation? Curious…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240276_Lines: Aye. I remember him well. We were nearly lovers once…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240313_Lines: Indeed! I deeply admire your work. Few have gathered more souls than I!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240007_Lines: What Loki has begun in Asgard, I will complete.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240289_Lines: Loki believes he is saving Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240018_Lines: King Loki,  you're yet to deliver what was promised.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240073_Lines: Lie thy way out of THIS, Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240095_Lines: No, Loki, you still owe me!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240012_Lines: Remember, Loki: No one breaks a bargain with me twice.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240027_Lines: Hela is here for mortal souls.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240212_Lines: Deeper into the web, yes, I would unlock its mystery.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240075_Lines: The father sleeps, the son is fallen. Asgard is mine.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240216_Lines: What is this totem the Wakandan king so adores? I shall watch, and learn…
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240126_Lines: I shall be pleased to rule such beauty.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240217_Lines: Wakanda's gods are truly magnificent, and yet, they cannot compare to me.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240133_Lines: Healing? Why would I need healing?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240306_Lines: The beasts have fallen. So shall their king!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240372_Lines: I see you have an army of minions to do your bidding as well, child.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240341_Lines: Yet a temporary alliance between Limbo and Hel does seem in our favor.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240085_Lines: What a sly god you are, Loki!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240296_Lines: You'll probably end up in Valhalla. Too bad.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240114_Lines: My divine power is full, there souls are mine!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240148_Lines: Shall I be struck by a sniper? No. But you might be.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240311_Lines: I suppose you could call me that, automaton.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240054_Lines: A fine victory. We have earned a little pride.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240014_Lines: Thor has spoken of you as his Truest mortal friend.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240302_Lines: Namor has offered new souls for sacrifice.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240305_Lines: Your minions' souls are mine now, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240304_Lines: Those were your best soldiers, Namor? Ha!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240115_Lines: Even if my powers are weakened, mortals are no match for a goddess.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240282_Lines: When you enter my realm, I will know everything.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240103_Lines: I shall claim my victory… eventually.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240102_Lines: I may return from my own realm!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240346_Lines: And should her light be extinguished?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240123_Lines: The souls of the worthy may find their way to Valhalla…but all are welcome in my realm.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240159_Lines: Usually I love spiders. But destroy this nest!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240176_Lines: The spider nest is in tiny pieces.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240213_Lines: Show me the mysteries, Spider-Zero. I will protect you.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240222_Lines: We are hunted through the streets. Speed up!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240319_Lines: Death and decay. I feel right at home.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240178_Lines: I have disposed of the sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240058_Lines: Let them come and face the Queen of Hel!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240076_Lines: Be careful what you wish for, little king.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240383_Lines: You say that as if it is a bad thing. Everything dies eventually. Even you.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240227_Lines: The Norn Stones. Pity to leave them there unused.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240059_Lines: I yield nothing once I possess it!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240198_Lines: Who can compete with Hela for souls?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240013_Lines: What an exasperating fool you are when you try to make a joke.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240221_Lines: What is the delay? Our enemies hunt us!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240025_Lines: And all who will be dead.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240226_Lines: Soon, all this will be mine.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240145_Lines: I am returned to claim what is mine.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240166_Lines: The Rebirth Beacon is in need of rebirth itself.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240167_Lines: This beacon will signal no more!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240323_Lines: This planet has its own underworld? Lovely!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240353_Lines: Why fight your way to the citadel of these unholy creatures when I would welcome you into my own kingdom with open arms?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240161_Lines: The spiders explode! Destroy the nest!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240088_Lines: The Captain is a soldier worthy of…not Asgard, but Hel.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240326_Lines: Such heroic spirit for one made of metal.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240328_Lines: This beast is under Hela's protection.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240169_Lines: Whatever this machine amplified, it does no longer.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240125_Lines: Where is the god of this place? Does he fear to meet me?
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240343_Lines: There are so many powerful souls here. And I have come to collect.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240250_Lines: Any simpleton could mount a defense here.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240316_Lines: So many souls lost in the darkness. They shall be mine!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240271_Lines: Then you should worry about Loki, not me.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240211_Lines: We will arrest Loki's tapping operation! For Asgard!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240338_Lines: Arakko's soul must not be erased!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240318_Lines: If anyone claims the soul of Arakko, let it be me!
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240249_Lines: Focus the attack here, you fools.
122_HeroVoice_1024_ST.1024001_HeroVoice_10240119_Lines: You need not fear me if you do not oppose me.

122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250264_Lines: When the X-Men call, Cloak and Dagger are glad to answer!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251268_Lines: Says the woman dripped out with more ice than Bobby Drake…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250277_Lines: Let's deliver this core and save Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251151_Lines: I'll take three, until four comes along.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250199_Lines: My light is a little dim.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250165_Lines: Wish I could do that again.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250162_Lines: I just shine a little brighter, don't I?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250248_Lines: No. My daggers are formed from pure Lightforce energy. They purify whatever they touch.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251013_Lines: Nah am good, 'your majesty'. Didn't need ya when we were cleaning the streets, won't need ya now.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250122_Lines: Don't worry about the ankh anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251068_Lines: Not very good…but I'm holding up.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250257_Lines: It has to be. I won't accept any other option.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251145_Lines: You fight me, you fight the Darkforce too.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251178_Lines: That is one hurting tree. We gotta step it up.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251177_Lines: The tree is withering, come on!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250180_Lines: That poor, suffering tree. We have to get it help.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250185_Lines: I know Tokyo traffic is bad, but we have to speed up!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251252_Lines: Central Park at night ain't got nothin' on me!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250274_Lines: Central Park? This should be fun…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251154_Lines: Five? Must be somebody else's turn.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250078_Lines: People are always afraid of Ty, but they just don't know him.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250052_Lines: All the way from Yancy Street!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250253_Lines: But they will. They always do, just because we're young, pretty, and female.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251110_Lines: How does he make himself into a turret?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250186_Lines: This is a critical mission! Move it!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251229_Lines: We got something in common, I think.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251008_Lines: But we're teaming up now, right?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250235_Lines: You're pretty cool yourself. Being able to understand animals…I wish I could do that.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251161_Lines: You thought I'd let you win? Nah.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250237_Lines: You're underestimating my light. That's okay. Happens all the time.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251012_Lines: Under the circumstances, that will do.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251009_Lines: You ever get scared that the bad side of you is going to win?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251227_Lines: Do you think the world is ever gonna be put right?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251238_Lines: Hey man. Keep expectations low and you won't be disappointed.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251054_Lines: Man, it would be sweet to shoot fire.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250079_Lines: Light doesn't dispel darkness. It helps me see the darkness, and face it.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250046_Lines: You can't hide from the light!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251002_Lines: Light and dark need each other to exist.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250077_Lines: Light can heal, and light can harm. Same with me.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250021_Lines: Hold still! I'm trying to help!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251187_Lines: With eight legs, a spider better be able to play some music.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251185_Lines: Public Eye, huh? Watching the public, but who do they serve?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250251_Lines: It's actually a bit more complicated than that… You'll see…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251233_Lines: I'm a walking space between dimensions, more or less.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250181_Lines: Yggdrasil might die if we don't move faster.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251255_Lines: Things are about to get a lot darker if we don't move.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250096_Lines: If we can just hold on a little more…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251248_Lines: Headed into the darkness. Just like always.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251064_Lines: Ready to behold our True power?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250252_Lines: With my light daggers and your Soulsword, we can handle anything they throw our way.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250256_Lines: I'm not interested in hurting them, Blade. I want to heal them.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251237_Lines: It's too bad you have to come back here so soon after escaping.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250285_Lines: Don't stop now! We can't let the Mutants down!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250134_Lines: Don't worry about the spiders! I got em!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251172_Lines: Can't keep the Weaver waiting. Let's go.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250183_Lines: We have to hurry! The Web is in danger.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250144_Lines: Everybody needs a hand sometimes. Or a dagger.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251117_Lines: Dagger would not like these sea creatures one bit…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251254_Lines: Mutants are like family to us. We protect our own.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250119_Lines: Mutant squids? Can we switch places, Ty?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251201_Lines: Lot of stuff you could smash around here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251225_Lines: One wearer to another, Strange: You got serious cloak game.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251266_Lines: Sounds fun. But you're gonna have to run it past Dagger first. We're a package deal.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250174_Lines: We're off to see the Master Weaver…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250245_Lines: Whoa. That sounded a little apocalyptic.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251251_Lines: It's dark out here. But I can guide you through.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250135_Lines: Spider nest is taken care of. Whew.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251175_Lines: Let's get this statue to T'Challa. You with me?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250061_Lines: Let's get into some good trouble.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251183_Lines: I don't think we should keep the king waiting, do you?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251078_Lines: Wow, can you believe a place like this exists?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250129_Lines: Whoa, the Amplifier went out with a bang.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250115_Lines: Uh-uh, no. That spider nest has got to go.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250109_Lines: Uh oh, those portals always mean trouble.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250168_Lines: Uh oh, that's a big step.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250263_Lines: Yikes. I thought I'd already seen the worst of New York…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250239_Lines: Oh. My costume just kinda came with my powers…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250234_Lines: I don't mean it that way. You just mean a lot to a lot of people.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251186_Lines: Well, spider webs are supposed to be pretty strong.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251007_Lines: Spider-Man, hey! I've been meaning to ask you, we should form some kind of group —
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251234_Lines: Shoot, if it was easy anybody could do it.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251228_Lines: You know what? That's exactly what I needed to hear.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251224_Lines: Yo, you need healing, We're right here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251263_Lines: I've got Dagger to keep me in line.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250004_Lines: Before we had powers, we had each other. That bond is unbreakable.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251076_Lines: Before we put all these worlds back together, I want to see some places I'll never see again.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250212_Lines: We can set up our defense here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250015_Lines: Tandy and Tyrone here to help.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251024_Lines: Don't let them do this, Tandy!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251243_Lines: Is it me, Tandy, or are we way outta our league here…?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251250_Lines: Nice to see Avengers Tower is still a beacon of light…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250080_Lines: If ever a place needed some light…jeez.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250247_Lines: Well, if it makes you feel any better, you're a lot hotter than me.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250006_Lines: I don't think I could handle the pressure of the Darkforce.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250003_Lines: Without Ty, I wouldn't know the real power of the Lightforce.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251120_Lines: How do you like that, Khonshu?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251216_Lines: Maintain control of the target area.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251040_Lines: Hell no! They gotta get through me first!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250113_Lines: Watch out for the Punisher's turret!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250103_Lines: Take care, I see a sniper!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251267_Lines: Don't worry 'bout my fit, Frost. We've got more important things to do.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250280_Lines: Almost to Avengers Tower. Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251215_Lines: This is the spot. Let's keep it.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250279_Lines: Time to stop Knull before he extinguishes our light.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250270_Lines: We have to go underneath the surface of this planet? Eww!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250249_Lines: Let's hope they're just as useful here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250088_Lines: Hope I can return the favor sometime!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251240_Lines: It's a good thing I'm not afraid of the dark…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251257_Lines: Gonna have to speed it up, little guy!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251219_Lines: Need to put the brakes on that vehicle.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251261_Lines: We gotta shut Ultron down for good!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251077_Lines: Somebody needs to make the Dooms pay for what they've done.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251130_Lines: News flash: Robot spiders don't like the Darkforce.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251223_Lines: Come to us. Dagger can heal you.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250240_Lines: How could anyone defile such a beautiful place?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250160_Lines: What, were you all too bedazzled to help?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250203_Lines: I feel like I'm being watched.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250136_Lines: At least those gross squids are done for.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251127_Lines: Yeah! Punisher's on the run again.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251167_Lines: I ain't afraid, but I ain't dumb, either. We're outnumbered.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251158_Lines: I didn't mean to do it all myself.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251269_Lines: Yeah, I've guided plenty of folks safely through the dark myself.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250246_Lines: I'm used to being the brightest one in the room.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251258_Lines: We can make it to the Tower! Keep pushin'!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250275_Lines: We'll lead you to the castle. No worries!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250009_Lines: We've been fighting crimes since we were teenagers.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250049_Lines: Did we just take down a GOD?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251260_Lines: Straight to the castle. No more playin' tourist!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250204_Lines: There's a lot we could destroy around here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250242_Lines: We might need some healing snow pretty soon too.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251210_Lines: We can make a stand right here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250177_Lines: Let's get Spider-Zero where she needs to go.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250179_Lines: We've got a statue to deliver. Let's get it there!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250175_Lines: This place, and the Master Weaver, must be protected.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250001_Lines: We are Cloak and Dagger, we are hope and fear.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250034_Lines: Alright, Ty! Now we really have to attack!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250267_Lines: Let's brighten this place up a bit, shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251213_Lines: This is our objective, right here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251182_Lines: We're not getting there fast enough!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250265_Lines: We won't let our Mutant friends down!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250231_Lines: We thought you were a goner after the vampires caught us by the Queensboro Bridge.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251188_Lines: We best get out of here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250190_Lines: I feel like I'm seeing the whole universe, just in this web.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250254_Lines: I wouldn't know. I don't fight to hurt people. I fight to heal them.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251146_Lines: I get a little carried away sometimes.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250120_Lines: The only squid I want is an appetizer!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251074_Lines: It's always been me and Tandy against the world.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250007_Lines: It took us a long time to learn that our powers are related.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251075_Lines: I wonder how chronovium plays with the Darkforce…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251235_Lines: I admired you, Cap. The version of you that I knew, I mean.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251230_Lines: We both know what it's like to be consumed by the same thing that makes us different. Gives us power. I don't always know what to do with that.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251232_Lines: I'm not looking for a new partner, golden boy. Go sparkle somewhere else.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251242_Lines: I've worn the X before. Guess it's time to prove why!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251204_Lines: I pinged an enemy. Get em!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250216_Lines: I've flagged the area to attack!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250127_Lines: The Amplifier did not like my daggers.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250255_Lines: Something tells me I should start with you…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250273_Lines: I know the way to Avengers Tower. Follow me!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250072_Lines: I'm in good spirits, don't worry.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251115_Lines: I've seen scarier things before, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250063_Lines: Still here. Don't you put me out.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251052_Lines: I mean, he might do the job, but he's a broken man.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250221_Lines: Help this vehicle to its destination.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251162_Lines: Big mistake messing with the Darkforce.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251180_Lines: We gotta move it, y'all! Save the web!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251129_Lines: Got out my can opener. Punisher's out.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250184_Lines: We're supposed to be closer to Budokan by now!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250272_Lines: You can count on us, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250042_Lines: Get ready. Here come the bad guys.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250016_Lines: You got both Cloak and Dagger.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251142_Lines: Just your ordinary beatdown, is all.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250094_Lines: There's no time to wait! Hit them with everything!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250095_Lines: We're almost there! Don't give up!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250182_Lines: Time is precious! The Master Weaver needs help!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251160_Lines: You shouldn't have started something with me.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250250_Lines: That hasn't changed. In fact, we're closer than ever… whether we like it or not…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250262_Lines: Time to bring some light back to our city.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250093_Lines: One final push! We can take them!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251051_Lines: Moon sure seems to power him up.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251103_Lines: Moon Knight left an ankh here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250070_Lines: Anyone out there? Needs some healing!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250236_Lines: Does anybody like Doom? He's such an ego maniac. He probably patronizes himself.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251055_Lines: He heard a lot of people. I'm glad he's gone.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251087_Lines: That was the light I needed.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250233_Lines: Every time I see you, I think to myself: As long as Spider-Man is still around, everything will be all right.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250230_Lines: When I see someone with powers like yours, and I think, wow. I mean, how can I compare?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251048_Lines: Venom belongs to the Darkforce now.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250062_Lines: I wasn't sure we'd get this chance again.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250053_Lines: It feels like the spirit of the city just... faded away.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251006_Lines: Yeah, just let a crazy scientist experiment on you…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250005_Lines: Ty and I create equilibrium. When it gets disturbed…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251231_Lines: Go easy on him, Ty. We can use all the light we can get right now.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250048_Lines: Ty, why do we have to do that?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250266_Lines: We sure are a long way from the back alleys of New York, Ty…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250172_Lines: Loki's killing that tree…but we're going to stop him.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251067_Lines: I couldn't be better. I'll show them what I can do.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251093_Lines: Gotta finish em now or never.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250196_Lines: Now I'm the one who needs healing.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250187_Lines: Wakanda needs us to move faster!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251132_Lines: That's it for the spider nest.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251170_Lines: Loki can't get more sap. It's that simple.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251264_Lines: Trust me, lady, you don't want to find out…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251164_Lines: Thought you could walk on air?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250106_Lines: Destroy these ankhs as soon as you see them!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250238_Lines: Look at us! We practically match!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250054_Lines: I thought he was supposed to figure all this out!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251262_Lines: Let's get this core where it's goin'! Now!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250138_Lines: Those squids will haunt my nightmares…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250118_Lines: Eww! What are those things, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251259_Lines: I survived on the streets. Not lettin' the park do me in!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250244_Lines: Do you feel farther from Khonshu now that…all this has happened?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251253_Lines: No way we let the X-Men go down like this!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250278_Lines: Keep going. We can't let the darkness consume us!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250047_Lines: Deceit catches up with you in the end.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251275_Lines: Gotta say, I'm not a big fan of this whole "Eternal Night" thing…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251135_Lines: The coast is clear… of squids, at least…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251256_Lines: I like the dark, but this is too much!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251184_Lines: I love this place, but we need to move through it a little faster.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250133_Lines: The nest is all cleaned out.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251171_Lines: Spider-Zero's got places to go! Come on!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250176_Lines: Spider-Zero, I'll be your guiding light.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251173_Lines: We got you, Spider-Zero. Let's ride.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251073_Lines: If I didn't have Tandy, the Darkforce would have taken me a long time ago.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251020_Lines: Let's pop back up under their noses.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250226_Lines: The Lightforce wants to heal you…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251014_Lines: Yeah, about that, doc, I think I'll hang on to it for now. At least til my hood's vampire-free.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251270_Lines: Thanks for the offer, bro, but Tandy and me, we locked in.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250116_Lines: Get rid of the spider nest before they blow us all up!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251249_Lines: Stick with me. I know every alley in this city.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250281_Lines: Stay close, H.E.R.B.I.E. We can still get you there!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251165_Lines: Damn, what a way to go.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251085_Lines: That took the edge off, thanks.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251080_Lines: They definitely nailed the villain's lair aesthetic.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251109_Lines: I guess a turret is Punisher's final form.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250271_Lines: That essence… so dark… The sooner we deliver it, the better….
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250161_Lines: I mean, you didn't have to let me do it all.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251168_Lines: Can't handle that many bad guys.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250188_Lines: No place this beautiful should have to suffer under Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251105_Lines: Does he ever run out of these ankhs?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251112_Lines: Let's see how all these little spiders like the Darkforce.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250117_Lines: Those little spiders pack a punch. Be careful.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251241_Lines: We got a party goin' on here? Glad I wore my fancy cloak…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251239_Lines: This sure as hell ain't the New York I remember...
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251265_Lines: It's a cloak. And it ain't the source of my powers. It just helps me channel them.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251244_Lines: It's worse than the Darkforce Dimension up in here…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251202_Lines: This whole place looks ready to come down.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251157_Lines: That's the Darkforce. Strong, and greedy too.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250137_Lines: I think that was the last octopus.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250040_Lines: This is one of theirs, shall we take it?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250213_Lines: Great spot to mount a defense.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250283_Lines: This is our city! Dracula doesn't get to win!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251276_Lines: This is black magic blotting out the sun, man. It's not something I can just 'port away.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250178_Lines: One adorable cat statue for King T'Challa…or is that Emperor now?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250241_Lines: What a sad way to see the world.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251181_Lines: Doesn't this buggy have another gear?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250223_Lines: End of the road for this vehicle.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251079_Lines: Nope. Do not like the energy here.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250081_Lines: It's like a fairy tale…complete with an evil usurper.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251092_Lines: Time to put up or shut up.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250114_Lines: That turret is dangerous. Hit it!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250260_Lines: That's because they didn't have the Lightforce to guide their way back safely.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250282_Lines: Forgot how dangerous this place is at night…
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250102_Lines: I'm back to shed some light.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250284_Lines: Arakko needs a serious reboot, ASAP!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250276_Lines: Arakko's in trouble. But I know we can save it.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250189_Lines: How can you look at this and not feel inspired for humanity?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251072_Lines: It's not easy, holding the Darkforce in check.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251004_Lines: Magik, so your portals take you to another dimension too, yeah? Does it, like, hurt or anything like that?
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10250002_Lines: There's always a spark of light in darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251065_Lines: The darkness is eroding my wound. I need a doctor!
122_HeroVoice_1025_ST.1025001_HeroVoice_10251001_Lines: Ain't no darkness can swallow me, I can do this!

122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260134_Lines: This kingdom of spiders… Has this become your domain now?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260090_Lines: The Lion of the mutants…he has fallen.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260022_Lines: If you could, Magneto…would you do what Doom has done?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260362_Lines: Ultron's virus cannot continue to fester.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260079_Lines: Humans, not Ultron, will shape human destiny.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260011_Lines: One must first be afraid. Bravery comes only after fear.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260344_Lines: I have not. Why do you ask?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260154_Lines: They wish to strike us from a safe distance.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260184_Lines: They fought like a coward. And now they have fallen like one.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260130_Lines: They say this is the realm of the gods. The Orisha disagree.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260076_Lines: He was the enemy of his own ideals.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260264_Lines: Seize this land in the name of Wakanda!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260378_Lines: Great Phoenix, I have heard of your disdain for intergalactic empires.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260110_Lines: I'm injured! I need the herb!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260368_Lines: Are you the ruler of an intergalactic civilization as well, my child?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260382_Lines: This was not what I expected when I received my invitation, Ms. Frost.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260194_Lines: Your place is at my feet!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260027_Lines: Greetings, I'm Black Panther of Wakanda.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260088_Lines: You are full of surprises, little rabbit.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260289_Lines: I trust that your new prosthetic is functioning well?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260177_Lines: Your weapon will cause no more harm, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260348_Lines: I fear a sword may not be enough in the conflict to come…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260205_Lines: All have fallen by my hand.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260144_Lines: We must hold on a little longer.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260363_Lines: Arakko cannot resist Ultron's control much longer.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260060_Lines: The enemy will grow desperate. Prepare!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260073_Lines: We each must do our part.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260145_Lines: Do not yield, my friends. Our time is now!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260224_Lines: Make haste. We must reach the World Tree soon!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260025_Lines: The difference being, I have not scrambled space-time.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260258_Lines: One lunar base? Very impressive. The 12,000 orbital telescopes of the Imperial Observatory Network took note of Earth as well.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260176_Lines: You should have invested in Wakandan technology, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260332_Lines: Even amongst the stars, Wakanda's great traditions live on!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260252_Lines: I have located an enemy stronghold.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260336_Lines: Our Empire must have Bast's blessing if we are to prevail.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260217_Lines: Only we can save this nexus between realities.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260012_Lines: Stark. When are you going to let me buy your company?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260013_Lines: Ha! Shuri always wants me to ask.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260354_Lines: Hmm. I was expecting far more pageantry…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260291_Lines: Yes, I am well aware of Doom's meddling in the timestream.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260042_Lines: Do I seem weak to you?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260255_Lines: We shall stage our defense here.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260218_Lines: Destiny awaits us. To the web!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260078_Lines: She is unholy. She will return…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260006_Lines: My father would have loved to see Wakanda reaching across the stars.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260017_Lines: This universe calls on me to protect it, and yet…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260339_Lines: Quite the opposite. Wakanda barely notices you at all.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260018_Lines: One cannot keep an empire when there is chaos at home.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260157_Lines: Careful. Moon Knight has placed an ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260370_Lines: The same way you protect an ancient magical city, Iron Fist.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260290_Lines: Even Wakandan science has its limits, but perhaps one day…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260301_Lines: What in Bast's name are those, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260307_Lines: The fangs of Bast are more than enough for me.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260282_Lines: Empire. And only because of its incredible people.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260284_Lines: I am glad you are here to fight for it.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260232_Lines: This herb is merely one source of the Panther's legendary power…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260334_Lines: This herb is the key to our nation's past… and its future!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260129_Lines: We must strike down Hydra's empire, here and now.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260326_Lines: This robot's directive must be completed.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260305_Lines: Back to Namor's kingdom with you, beasts!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260178_Lines: The Punisher's turret is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260163_Lines: The Punisher's turret must be dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260142_Lines: If we are to prevail, now is the time.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260187_Lines: I am at your service, my friend.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260233_Lines: May the Orisha bless Wakanda… and all those who fight in her name.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260226_Lines: May Bast guide us swiftly to the web.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260037_Lines: Go ahead, it does not matter!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260009_Lines: Bringing Wakanda to the stars was a dream of mine since youth.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260225_Lines: We must delay no longer, young spider.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260266_Lines: It is vital that we protect this locale.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260219_Lines: We must swiftly navigate this urban jungle.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260265_Lines: We must gain control of this place.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260283_Lines: We must defend it with our lives.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260229_Lines: We must keep moving. For Wakanda!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260213_Lines: We may be outnumbered. But not outmatched.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260335_Lines: Do not dare betray us again in our time of need, sister of Bast…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260340_Lines: Our kingdoms have known great conflict in the past. But we must forge an alliance, no matter how uneasy, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260346_Lines: Our empire has advanced far beyond its humble roots, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260254_Lines: Our battle shall take place here.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260064_Lines: We are running out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260268_Lines: Our progress shall not be impeded.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260324_Lines: We cannot let the darkness consume us.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260328_Lines: We will not let the vampires triumph!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260021_Lines: I will pass on your praise.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260168_Lines: I return this ankh to Khonshu… in pieces.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260165_Lines: I have discovered a nest of mechanical arachnids.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260024_Lines: All I have ever wanted is better lives for people.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260379_Lines: I assure, Wakanda shall do no such thing.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260221_Lines: I will lead us to our final destination.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260162_Lines: I must disable this turret before it is too late.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260381_Lines: I do know you, Johnny. But now I wonder if you truly know yourself…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260128_Lines: I would bet my empire on it.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260211_Lines: I had my doubts you would survive long here…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260028_Lines: I am T'Challa, the Black Panther.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260003_Lines: I am king of my people, guard of our gods.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260294_Lines: I fight for it every day.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260015_Lines: My soul is expected by my ancestors in Djalia -- where we will sprint with Bast forever.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260236_Lines: I must reserve my power for now.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260014_Lines: My people look forward to the afterlife…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260010_Lines: My people look forward to the afterlife…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260119_Lines: My claws may be sharp, but my mind is far sharper.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260045_Lines: They will find my claws sharper.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260331_Lines: My sister reaches beyond her station yet again…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260380_Lines: Your brother-in-law is always welcome in my empire. As are you.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260150_Lines: My soul shall not rest yet.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260222_Lines: I know the path we take well. It leads to victory.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260230_Lines: I will not fail my empire. Not today. Not ever.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260029_Lines: Wakanda answers the call to battle!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260204_Lines: No foe has been left standing.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260202_Lines: Many have fallen at my hand.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260251_Lines: I have found their base of operations.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260320_Lines: The lord of the vampires must be dealt with directly.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260065_Lines: They are in the front, prepare yourselves!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260250_Lines: Our enemy shall not elude us.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260152_Lines: Our enemy hunts us from afar.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260212_Lines: There are far too many of them.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260214_Lines: Their numbers are many. Stay strong.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260158_Lines: Strange is up to his tricks again.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260159_Lines: Strange's portals could bring forth countless foes. Beware!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260075_Lines: You are not my kind of king OR god.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260121_Lines: My empire will not fall. Not by Doom's hand or any other.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260292_Lines: If Shuri selected you to aid our Empire, she knew you had what it took to survive. And here you are.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260207_Lines: If only you had knelt to me sooner…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260136_Lines: My sister should not have sent you here, Star-Lord.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260007_Lines: It is a dark jungle out there in the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260061_Lines: What better time to attack than now?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260167_Lines: Moon Knight's ankh has been destroyed.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260347_Lines: I suppose some things never change…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260287_Lines: You reached for the stars long before I did, my friend. I just led my people to a new home among them.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260275_Lines: More than you can count, my friend.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260228_Lines: The future is now. There is no more time to waste.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260319_Lines: A squirrel and a panther. Unlikely allies…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260002_Lines: Welcome to the jungle, you are my prey.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260259_Lines: Welcome to the future, Stark. Glad you are here.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260257_Lines: Heavy is the head that wears the crown.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260058_Lines: We all will need the strength of panthers.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260133_Lines: I agree. Bast has spoken. And I am in her service.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260166_Lines: Watch your step. This place is teeming with spider-bots.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260016_Lines: Tyrone Johnson. I heard about your condition, if…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260173_Lines: The raccoon's amplifier has been disabled.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260132_Lines: You are not fit to sit upon a throne, Trickster.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260175_Lines: Rocket's cosmic machine is no longer a concern.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260151_Lines: I still have some hunt left in me.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260100_Lines: Djalia can wait! The hunt is not over!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260333_Lines: This is no time for souvenirs. Battle awaits!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260234_Lines: A hasty retreat would be wise.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260020_Lines: Dr. Richards, I hope you found our Institute of Science helpful?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260122_Lines: Wakanda has always reached for the stars. Now we have claimed them.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260137_Lines: Wakanda will replace your lost vessel with one even more advanced.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260274_Lines: Wakanda has found its new home amongst the stars.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260337_Lines: How far we have come… yet Wakanda's journey has just begun!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260185_Lines: Wakanda is forever by your side.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260361_Lines: Wakanda shall defend its Mutant allies.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260220_Lines: If we reach our goal, we save this future and countless others.
