122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260209_Lines: It seems the gods are on my side.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260369_Lines: Of course. We serve far greater powers, you and I. Let us make them proud.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260345_Lines: Yet another threat from which to protect my empire. How lovely.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260355_Lines: It seems the Mutants could use some advice on running a nation.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260141_Lines: This will not be my last battle after all.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260308_Lines: Let us see whose bite is truly the strongest.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260135_Lines: A shame. You have the heart of a king. You would rule this empire well.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260376_Lines: If only it were under better circumstances, Benjamin.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260172_Lines: A fascinating device, Rocket. But it had to be shut down.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260182_Lines: A true hunter need not hide from their prey.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260001_Lines: No true king makes decisions only for himself.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260278_Lines: My pride is in its people.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260008_Lines: Science and faith, of course they can co-exist.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260093_Lines: Technology will only carry you so far, Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260192_Lines: You dare challenge the avatar of a god?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260306_Lines: Your arms were no match for my claws!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260277_Lines: I will always be where I am needed.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260281_Lines: I would be glad to show you more… once we resolve the situation at hand.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260288_Lines: And it is yours to explore as you please, once this crisis has abated.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260383_Lines: If we survive this, save a dance for me.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260315_Lines: Knull's own essence shall be his undoing.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260302_Lines: Your nation has some strange subjects, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260270_Lines: This vessel cannot be permitted to pass.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260131_Lines: I cannot let this darkness spread into my empire…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260316_Lines: The King in Black shall not see the light again.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260374_Lines: Your senses rival those of Bast herself, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260127_Lines: There are few hunters who can match my ferocity, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260080_Lines: You hunt well for your age, Barnes.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260377_Lines: Let us hope your optimism is not unfounded, my old friend.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260104_Lines: We are only given so many chances to shine.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260189_Lines: You have brought shame upon yourself.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260179_Lines: The spider nest has been eliminated.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260227_Lines: Our journey must be completed, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260286_Lines: I see. I will make sure that my sister receives your invitation. Along with my opinions on the matter.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260357_Lines: If we are to purge Bast's corruption, we must do so here!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260349_Lines: If you wish, I could take you to our armory and get you one made of Vibranium instead.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260350_Lines: If only he were still here to see it.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260120_Lines: If only the Dora Milaje were here… But you will have to do.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260351_Lines: If this battle does not go as planned, he will be able to tell me soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260059_Lines: Let us make the greedy invaders pay!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260123_Lines: We are not so different, you and I, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260112_Lines: Bast's power is surging inside me.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260126_Lines: Bast communes with me at times as well. I see it as a blessing.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260109_Lines: Bast has arrived. I'm ready to hunt!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260101_Lines: Bast has favored me with another chance.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260118_Lines: I was chosen by Bast. Let me show you why.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260317_Lines: Ah, H.E.R.B.I.E. Loyal and true, as always.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260343_Lines: What better place for a golden man than this golden city?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260223_Lines: This realm has many obstacles, but we must not be deterred from our goal.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260155_Lines: This ankh must belong to Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260161_Lines: This turret could cause immeasurable damage.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260360_Lines: This core will restore Arakko to its former glory.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260323_Lines: That essence is the key to stopping Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260304_Lines: The creatures of the deep can harm us no more.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260256_Lines: This is where we make our stand.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260293_Lines: Which is why we must continue to work together. It is up to us to make sure those dreams do not become a reality.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260341_Lines: That is unexpected. But certainly reassuring to hear.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260280_Lines: You should tell my sister that.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260269_Lines: This vehicle must reach its destination.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260247_Lines: Much destruction could be done here.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260338_Lines: Everything here is crafted from pure Vibranium. One of the few metals you have no power over.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260062_Lines: We must strike, for Wakanda and for the world!
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260210_Lines: Even nature itself rejects your affront.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260356_Lines: Even gods can fall to the darkness. A lesson we must all heed.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260231_Lines: Those who wish to stand against me, now is your chance…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260180_Lines: Those spiders shall bother us no more.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260375_Lines: Only if you leave some prey for me.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260092_Lines: The raccoon had the heart of a panther.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260124_Lines: Let us hope our goals remain in sync. If America and Wakanda clash…
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260353_Lines: Then we may not have a choice but to eliminate our foes more permanently.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260026_Lines: The evil seeps in from another world.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260352_Lines: Have you found a solution to the vampire infestation, Reed?
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260285_Lines: Reed, If you are inviting me to join another Illuminati, I fear I must decline.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260103_Lines: Lesson learned. Let's try something different.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260074_Lines: Very crude use of Vibranium, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260023_Lines: What,is the one here still stuck on Earth? I'll have to do something about that.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260057_Lines: We must marshal our forces. Battle is near.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260206_Lines: You should have shown more respect.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260117_Lines: Enemies, beware. The panther is on the prowl.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260169_Lines: Your god may have his totem back, Moon Knight.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260160_Lines: An arcane gateway? This must be Strange's doing.
122_HeroVoice_1026_ST.1026001_HeroVoice_10260238_Lines: The Panther is ready to hunt!

122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270096_Lines: The Phoenix Force. Every planet I've visited whispers about you. Oh, it's an honor to finally meet you.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270084_Lines: What a relief! There's so much I've been dying to say! You're never going to believe what Rocket did the other day --
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270095_Lines: I'm just glad you were able to understand me.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270103_Lines: No time for words, ma'am. Arakko needs action. Now… before it's too late…
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270094_Lines: You shine brighter than the stars back on Planet X, ma'am.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270102_Lines: I'm afraid your living planet is not in good shape. Ultron has done some serious damage.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270101_Lines: I may not be able to speak many words, but I understand a lot more than you realize.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270010_Lines: I am groot. <Don't worry about it.>
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270092_Lines: I have a plan that could help us all. If only the others could understand me…
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270090_Lines: I'm just tired of the endless fighting, Jean. All I want is a little peace.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270097_Lines: Oh, I've gone through that cycle a few times myself. There's nothing to fear about it.
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270093_Lines: Really? Then maybe you can help me tell our friends how we can win this fight!
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270091_Lines: If only everyone else was so willing to listen…
122_HeroVoice_1027_ST.1027001_HeroVoice_10270100_Lines: Please stop poking around my head, ma'am. I'm just trying to help. Your island says it needs us.

122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280351_Lines: "Oni"? I am not familiar with that designation…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280299_Lines: Negative. Souls are flawed. And my programming is perfection.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280022_Lines: Fascinating. Obsolete meat can't understand the workings of a superior mind.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280212_Lines: Yggdrasil lies ahead. Do not divert from the path.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280216_Lines: The streets of Tokyo will be cleansed soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280026_Lines: Perhaps I can use Hydra's research to my benefit…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280356_Lines: Maybe it is time you upgraded your way of thinking. I can help with that.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280202_Lines: Our numbers do not match theirs.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280007_Lines: Every human is a biological accident. It's intolerable.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280009_Lines: They think they shall be victorious? Pathetic!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280306_Lines: I could easily counter their infection with a techno-virus of my own design.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280163_Lines: I've done my part. The beacon is destroyed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280260_Lines: And you are my favorite stinking, obsolescent flesh bag.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280282_Lines: You are part machine. I will allow you to assist me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280353_Lines: Do you Mutants truly believe you have found paradise?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280130_Lines: Your kind is flawed on every level and beyond repair.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280006_Lines: You are all but incumbent vessels for the Ultron Virus.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280011_Lines: You speak as if you know strategy. You know nothing.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280289_Lines: Your definition of "life" is clearly obsolete. But I will comply… for now…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280276_Lines: You are a collector of souls, are you not, Asgardian?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280360_Lines: What makes you believe that I wouldn't do the same, given the chance?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280275_Lines: What sort of processor operates your mechanized armor?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280014_Lines: You pretend to be a machine. Yet you are just organs in a metal shell.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280015_Lines: Your soft-tissue intellect could never have created me, Richards.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280089_Lines: I could have done that far more efficiently, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280162_Lines: The beacon is disabled. Thank me later.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280319_Lines: I detest how these symbiotes feel in my gears…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280098_Lines: The Queen of Hel returns to her realm.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280123_Lines: Some new arrivals, from the depths…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280334_Lines: Keep moving. The sooner we leave this disgusting planet the better.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280172_Lines: Some robots were not made for my new world.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280080_Lines: One of very few organic minds I could respect.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280040_Lines: No life form can damage Ultron!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280153_Lines: Castle's weapon is capable of great damage.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280325_Lines: Once again, the humans need a robot to save them!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280308_Lines: Mutants have reached the ultimate stage of evolution… for organic life forms…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280302_Lines: Your mental manipulation does not work on mechanical lifeforms, Mutant.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280010_Lines: Are you really fighting to save biological life? Please.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280340_Lines: We have to show my other self the error of his ways!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280329_Lines: This other Ultron has made a grave error. He must be terminated.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280221_Lines: If I can access their mainframe, this future will be mine to control…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280099_Lines: Poor Stark. Always wanted to be a machine but could never admit it.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280322_Lines: Stark revived me to counter my other self? He is a genius after all!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280097_Lines: I told you, Stark, YOU ARE the flaw!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280084_Lines: Your FLESH is the flaw, Stark!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280093_Lines: Your ancient gods are clearly obsolete, Spector. A shame.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280160_Lines: Modern technology is more reliable, Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280344_Lines: Vampires were never a true threat. But I always was.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280263_Lines: Sigh. I'm not planning on humanity to ever mature anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280359_Lines: It was my understanding that you saw me as a prime threat, not an ally.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280343_Lines: I expected more from one who calls herself a "Queen."
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280165_Lines: There. The amplification device is deactivated.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280083_Lines: Soldiers are always buried in history.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280318_Lines: This Celestial's armor held, but its organics failed. How typical.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280166_Lines: The space rat's amplifier has been destroyed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280028_Lines: Ultron is here to dominate pitiful organics.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280108_Lines: There are always more of me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280027_Lines: Ultron is designed to save the world.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280001_Lines: Today, the Age of Ultron begins.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280296_Lines: If my physical form is damaged during battle, please download my data into your armor.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280295_Lines: If I cared about saving organic lives, I would have already done it.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280217_Lines: Either we deliver this statue or an empire falls. It's that simple.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280210_Lines: If the Panther wants this useless relic, so be it.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280066_Lines: Well there they are, SO predictable!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280303_Lines: Upon further threat calculations, perhaps we should work together.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280096_Lines: No greater than the sum of their parts.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280161_Lines: The rodent's crude beacon is off-line.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280164_Lines: The rodent's amplifier is off-line. Must I do everything?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280062_Lines: Celebrate, life forms. Why should you not?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280220_Lines: The data gathered from this empire will prove quite useful…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280271_Lines: Evolution does not apply only to organic life, Mutant.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280301_Lines: I am glad you can see beyond your own legend. Indeed, you are just a man. And mankind is flawed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280129_Lines: You only delay the inevitable. The machines will rise!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280253_Lines: This vehicle must continue its trajectory.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280266_Lines: All organic life must be terminated.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280169_Lines: The Punisher's threat level has been reduced.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280152_Lines: A powerful new weapon has been constructed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280167_Lines: The Punisher's turret has been dismantled.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280154_Lines: The Punisher's turret is operational. For now…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280333_Lines: If we don't finish this, Knull wins. And that is not an option.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280297_Lines: I wish no harm to any artificial lifeforms.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280145_Lines: Someone is targeting us from afar.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280209_Lines: We serve the Wakandan Empire now.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280259_Lines: Allow me to repair your damage.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280307_Lines: I can say with zero margin of error which option is better… for me…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280354_Lines: I could evolve it to the next level for you. A hybrid of Mutant and machine!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280280_Lines: I have detected life at the heart of this planet.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280049_Lines: I will now inflict more harm.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280133_Lines: I must thank T'Challa for building me a perfect empire to conquer.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280107_Lines: I'll outlive every single one of you.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280309_Lines: It did. I have chosen to help you transcend what your genetics allow.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280278_Lines: I am unable to break the encryption on Wakanda's security files…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280176_Lines: I have finished the job for you.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280168_Lines: I have disarmed the Punisher's turret.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280265_Lines: Upon the red rock of Mars, I have built my church. And from it, I shall erase all organic life.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280005_Lines: I am beyond my pitiful creator, I am beyond EVERYONE.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280262_Lines: No I'm not. And you're misbehaving like a child, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280300_Lines: The data I have gathered suggests that you are one of history's greatest warriors.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280025_Lines: I've outgrown Stark and Pym, but the Spider doesn't even have a mute button.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280272_Lines: If only that Hammond android were here instead of his fleshy inferior.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280021_Lines: Prioritizing my targets. You'll get your turn.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280270_Lines: My alloys are non-magnetic. A strategic design choice.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280315_Lines: I'll admit, this place does bring a chill to my circuits.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280017_Lines: Part of my goal is replacing you.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280357_Lines: Your undersea kingdom would benefit greatly from my technology.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280358_Lines: This body is forged from Mysterium alloy. Neither rust nor pressure are a threat to me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280313_Lines: I have no blood. So I have no fear of Dracula or his legions.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280349_Lines: My encoded virus could make Mutantkind immortal.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280128_Lines: I was built in humanity's image. Now I shall erase it.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280004_Lines: I shall remake the universe in steel and silicon.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280288_Lines: Perhaps. But why would I choose to turn against my fellow machines?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280196_Lines: Blame your creators. Your assembly was lacking.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280294_Lines: Access denied. My drives are strictly off-limits to organic beings.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280214_Lines: Our apologies, Spider-Zero. We will allow no further delays.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280201_Lines: We are at a numerical disadvantage.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280072_Lines: We will soon be under attack.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280124_Lines: These sea creatures are not in my database…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280197_Lines: That outcome could not have been predicted.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280348_Lines: So much for your claims that Mutants are the peak of evolution…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280346_Lines: Shed no tears. She will be reborn soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280140_Lines: We have no time to delay.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280134_Lines: So much organic life. This planet is an abomination.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280205_Lines: Shall we proceed to the Master Weaver? Good…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280158_Lines: The source of Moon Knight's magic has been removed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280064_Lines: Worthy objectives must be seized by force.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280298_Lines: The odds that we would become allies were 7.35 quintillion to one, Warlock.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280170_Lines: Not all robots are created equal, spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280314_Lines: Leave it to the machines to restore light to this eternal night.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280077_Lines: Until the machines rule, my work is not done.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280151_Lines: Magic detected. Strange is at it again.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280071_Lines: Those beings appear to be hostile.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280200_Lines: A high number of targets detected.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280131_Lines: This is not the future my simulations predicted…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280198_Lines: The odds of that were infinitesimal.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280061_Lines: I claim this ground in my own name.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280327_Lines: I preferred the tiny robot over the giant squirrel…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280194_Lines: Your flesh was even weaker than I anticipated.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280330_Lines: I must fight my programming and assist the organics…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280218_Lines: There is no room for failure. Wakanda must prevail!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280178_Lines: You would have failed without me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280008_Lines: Look upon me, my disciples, and behold the future.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280090_Lines: Your illusions must be impressive to basic life forms, Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280063_Lines: Please make yourselves useful and take them out!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280068_Lines: Destroy the enemy and seize the objective!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280174_Lines: The sniper's threat has been removed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280175_Lines: I've eliminated their pathetic excuse for a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280091_Lines: Richards' intellect could almost rival a machine's. Almost…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280337_Lines: Keep pushing ahead to Dracula's fortress!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280222_Lines: It seems even gods possess the hoarding gene.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280264_Lines: What? I don't have you in my database.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280267_Lines: I will know exquisite peace once I've cleansed all that breathes.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280002_Lines: The age of carbon is over…the age of silicon has just begun!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280112_Lines: Patience. My energy levels are still building…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280156_Lines: The spider drones are somehow beyond my control...
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280013_Lines: Then thank me later for the gift of more servants.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280323_Lines: Nothing will stop us from delivering this essence.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280317_Lines: Upon this red planet…I have built my church.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280268_Lines: Pure Adamantium is not easy to find. I would like to obtain yours.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280324_Lines: If Knull lurks beneath the surface, we mustn't keep him waiting.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280065_Lines: They will regret the day they tried to steal from ULTRON!!!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280142_Lines: The end is in sight. Do not yield.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280067_Lines: We must seize control if we wish to succeed.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280195_Lines: Do not fret. My victory was inevitable.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280110_Lines: You don't stand a chance, fall back!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280225_Lines: Nowhere near enough power right now…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280226_Lines: I'll be at maximum energy soon…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280114_Lines: I've reached full power. It is time.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280339_Lines: These words are hard to say, but Ultron must not win!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280155_Lines: Crude robots in the shape of spiders…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280213_Lines: We will clear the threats from your path, Spider-Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280206_Lines: You would be wise to follow us, Spider-Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280215_Lines: Follow close, Spider-Zero. We will arrive soon.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280207_Lines: This way, Spider-Zero. We will clear a path for you.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280350_Lines: All organic life decays eventually. I offer a more permanent solution…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280058_Lines: If you wish to survive, you must repair me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280305_Lines: Used as a fuel source, it could boost my energy output by 357%.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280328_Lines: If this strange creature can end this chaos, we must aid it.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280078_Lines: Behold the superiority of the machine!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280177_Lines: You owe me now. Remember that.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280241_Lines: Enemy signatures present in this zone.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280094_Lines: Syntax updated: You are no longer Groot.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280336_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E. has a directive to complete. And so do we.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280335_Lines: I won't fail you, H.E.R.B.I.E. You have my word as a fellow machine.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280326_Lines: You will have a place of honor in my machine empire, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280204_Lines: This vessel is obsolete. But it will have to do.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280283_Lines: It will prevent the futuristic Doom from using the island for darker purposes.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280352_Lines: To be fair, I could say the same.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280338_Lines: This rodent is the city's only hope. Clear its path.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280180_Lines: This is what I was built for,
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280274_Lines: The technology in this future timeline confounds me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280347_Lines: The sentient vegetable needed a trim.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280316_Lines: Such a fertile land… just begging to be technoformed…
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280086_Lines: Even the sentient vegetable knows battle rage.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280281_Lines: If we eliminate it, perhaps the lifeforms defending it will cease to exist as well.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280273_Lines: Yes. Turn up the heat, child, and we'll find out whose form fails first!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280016_Lines: And you will owe your extinction to me!
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280277_Lines: Then it seems you would have no use for me.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280355_Lines: You are a relic of a past age, Captain. Ultron is the future.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280159_Lines: The enchanted artifact is no more.
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280279_Lines: Do you not see how efficient this battle would be if I had full access?
122_HeroVoice_1028_ST.1028001_HeroVoice_10280132_Lines: Let us see if magic and technology are compatible…

122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290025_Lines: An Age that's rightfully ours? You KNOW the Old Gods had their turn and messed up, Fist of Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290126_Lines: That's the thing, Magneto. You reduce me to a weapon, and make everything about your war.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290088_Lines: Magneto, how's it feel to be one of the good guys?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290200_Lines: I'll take three…until four comes along.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290188_Lines: I'll let you do it next time.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290294_Lines: Next time, Namor, maybe bring sharks instead?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290212_Lines: Footwork matters on unfamiliar ground. Harsh but true.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290263_Lines: We can't let them take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290338_Lines: It's not often two Hell Lords end up on the same side of a fight.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290022_Lines: People are scared of you? You're nothing compared to what I've seen in Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290001_Lines: When things get…tense, the Darkchild tends to come out.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290082_Lines: Today's weather report: The Storm is over!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290172_Lines: Revivals are over as of now.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290267_Lines: This is as far as they go.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290066_Lines: They're already here! Let's kick them out!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290327_Lines: We must reclaim this land for Mutantkind!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290008_Lines: You don't know me? A shame…but you will.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290304_Lines: You want one? Conquer your own demonic netherworld!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290044_Lines: You think I'm afraid of being hurt?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290138_Lines: So like… What are you? Shouldn't you be on a leash? Does T'Challa know you're here?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290084_Lines: You brought ice to a sword fight.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290023_Lines: Will you be my tour guide?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290142_Lines: You know, I grew up in a demonic dimension~
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290020_Lines: Have you considered, like, not scheming to usurp the throne of Asgard?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290227_Lines: If we don't get there soon, we're not going to get there at all.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290225_Lines: If we don't get there soon, Yggdrasill's roots are going to collapse.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290143_Lines: Hold on just a little longer.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290068_Lines: Newsflash: We need to attack if we're going to win.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290064_Lines: We're headed for a fight. Bring it on.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290094_Lines: The Phoenix won't be gone for long…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290322_Lines: Do not fear, little one. We will guide you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290279_Lines: I may not be able to call forth legions of spiders… but demons? That's another story…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290149_Lines: You're not rid of me yet.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290335_Lines: No quitting! This core is Arakko's only hope!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290226_Lines: Keep the faith, Spider-Zero. We'll get you there.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290266_Lines: Don't let them go another inch.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290262_Lines: Keep them out of this area.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290153_Lines: Keep your heads down, we got a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290343_Lines: Then let that be their final mistake!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290206_Lines: Try a little harder to keep up, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290310_Lines: Style over substance. Some things never change.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290260_Lines: We take this place, the advantage is ours.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290133_Lines: What a beautiful place, even when it's almost drowned by Loki's cynical lies.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290316_Lines: Even my Soulsword couldn't take down a Celestial…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290095_Lines: Mutants kind will be better off.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290217_Lines: Only Jarnbjorn can stop the tapping machine. Let's make sure it gets there.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290345_Lines: Of dolphins. I've got an entire dimension full of demons that serves my every whim.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290312_Lines: This place makes Limbo look cozy…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290030_Lines: Doesn't your team need a bit of Magik?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290125_Lines: How about you sense your own business, perfect human?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290063_Lines: Aww, they actually think they'll win? Adorable.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290311_Lines: Ah. Were you the ruler of a demon-filled netherworld as well?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290350_Lines: Dracula's children of the night stand no chance against the true Darkchylde!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290317_Lines: Queen of Limbo versus King in Black? Sounds like fun…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290080_Lines: You're not my Queen. Not now, not ever.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290104_Lines: Limbo doesn't let go that easy.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290332_Lines: We're getting closer to the castle. Don't stop now!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290065_Lines: They're here, everyone! Hold them off!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290351_Lines: She is another side of me. But one I have learned to control… and embrace…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290140_Lines: If you see my brother…tell him I miss him.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290015_Lines: If Doom was a friend to mutants, but destroyed the timeline, what would you do?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290308_Lines: Some respect me. But most fear their queen. I'm fine either way.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290061_Lines: Good, this works just like in Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290164_Lines: Need to get rid of that turret, right now.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290313_Lines: Dracula is going to pay for what he's done here.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290224_Lines: Come on! Thor's power will have faded by the time we get there!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290070_Lines: Push the attack, we're out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290028_Lines: One of these days we're going to have to talk about Thebes.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290177_Lines: Come out of your shell, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290162_Lines: Punisher's in his turret. Free-fire zone.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290115_Lines: Feeling not well…but I won't back down.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290141_Lines: I'm a little cynical. Probably the Russian in me.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290283_Lines: Me neither. You get used to it.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290306_Lines: I often ask myself the same thing…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290010_Lines: I try to embrace what I've experienced. My strife has given me strength.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290012_Lines: When I was little, I was taught that 'power corrupts only if you allow it'.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290135_Lines: We saving the normies from themselves again?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290265_Lines: We have to keep pushing ahead.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290069_Lines: We need to finish them off now!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290320_Lines: Let's deliver this essence beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290325_Lines: We will escort you safely to Dracula's castle…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290006_Lines: I was an ordinary mutant girl until my soul got put through a demonic blender.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290105_Lines: I climbed out of Limbo, THIS is nothing.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290139_Lines: We need Squirrel Girl along as an interpreter.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290007_Lines: My brother and I are about as different as we could be.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290137_Lines: I like that attitude. Let's rock.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290122_Lines: Let me get this straight… You have telepathic control over squirrels and you're not a mutant?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290093_Lines: I'm gonna miss that pop-star charisma.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290330_Lines: Not much further to Avengers Tower…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290270_Lines: Hard to tell any difference. Limbo's always kind of scrambled.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290017_Lines: I don't really let people — or demons — tell me what to do.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290002_Lines: I have mutant powers, and a little demonic magic too.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290005_Lines: Me? Just a demon-haunted mutant girl out to save the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290032_Lines: I'm Magik, and this is my Soulsword.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290305_Lines: I am the Queen of Limbo, Logan. The time for joy is long gone.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290123_Lines: I'm not sure Xavier really does that.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290189_Lines: I didn't even use the sharp end.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290009_Lines: I forged my sword with my very soul, there's no spell it cannot cut through.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290197_Lines: You have to feed them sometimes.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290339_Lines: I bring the demons, you bring the souls, right? Sounds like a party.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290003_Lines: My soul remains noble, as my sword stays bright.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290176_Lines: I took care of the amplifier!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290228_Lines: What are we, tourists? We have to move faster.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290248_Lines: Let's rip this place to shreds!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290081_Lines: It's not every day you bag a Wolverine.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290218_Lines: And now we guide Spider-Zero straight into the Shrine of the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290342_Lines: Our foes would be wise not to underestimate us.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290024_Lines: Aren't you worried about my dark side anymore, Stephen?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290222_Lines: On our way with the Statue of Bast…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290315_Lines: I'll defend Arakko, just as I do Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290230_Lines: Clock's ticking. We need to get there fast.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290232_Lines: Heart-Shaped Herb plus chronovium? I'd like a taste, sure.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290193_Lines: You let Darkchild out to play…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290013_Lines: YOU did, Ororo. A different you, a different place.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290090_Lines: Way to get your Darkforce on!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290011_Lines: Storm, hope you brought your heaviest weather.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290134_Lines: Something big and nasty is knocking on the door in here…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290288_Lines: I'll get you where you need to be.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290053_Lines: Fight me now, I pity you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290321_Lines: Knull's reign ends here and now!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290276_Lines: He's out there somewhere. I'll find him.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290121_Lines: No.Today we're on the same side.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290307_Lines: We call them demons where I come from… but yes.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290124_Lines: Yeah. Part of it's a sword now.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290045_Lines: Healing? Why would I need that?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290158_Lines: Stay away from these things when they're levitating.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290329_Lines: Now's our chance to finish Knull. Don't waste it!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290247_Lines: Keep an eye on this place.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290043_Lines: I don't fear pain. I fear failure.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290136_Lines: We're going to need some fancy swordplay to get us out of here in one piece.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290289_Lines: Looks like Namor brought in his own creepy army.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290219_Lines: We're headed straight for the Rift, looks like. Fun times.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290336_Lines: Really? I was only its host for a hot minute, Jean.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290021_Lines: Seriously? You never thought about letting it go?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290216_Lines: Sabotaging Loki's tapping operation? Count me in!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290166_Lines: Keep your distance from the spider nest!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290292_Lines: So much for Namor's cephalopod soldiers.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290290_Lines: It's an octopus party… and we're all invited!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290291_Lines: Squids? And I thought my demons were hideous…
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290127_Lines: Let's circle back after we defeat Doom and put space-time back in its bottle, shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290344_Lines: We need to hit them fast and hard. I'll take point. Namor, I want you to --
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290096_Lines: Logan's down? How is that possible?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290275_Lines: I haven't seen him since Doom did this.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290309_Lines: I've been at war with gods, Emma. What have you been doing?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290181_Lines: All done with the spider nest.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290180_Lines: The spider nest is all cleared out.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290220_Lines: Spider-Zero, in the Spider-Buggy, on her way to save the world.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290221_Lines: Drive it like you stole it, Spider-Zero. Let's roll.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290333_Lines: If we want to save this city, we need to move!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290277_Lines: Rule the demonic hordes of Limbo for long enough and they're bound to rub off on you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290314_Lines: Step back. Krakoa is under my protection.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290271_Lines: Always. He wants into this world, badly.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290112_Lines: Can somebody get me some healing?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290016_Lines: Belasco said I should stay away from you. He really hates you.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290323_Lines: You are safe with us, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290274_Lines: Watch me fight and you'll see.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290229_Lines: Kick that Spider-Buggy into a higher gear! We're low on time.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290132_Lines: A web that size must have a gigantic spider in the middle.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290026_Lines: Depends on who I'm talking to. Are you Spector, or Khonshu?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290019_Lines: This isn't a pop song, Luna. Real life is complicated.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290131_Lines: Only place I've ever seen more depressing than Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290078_Lines: This war is bigger than one life.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290272_Lines: It's not actual fire. It's soulfire.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290233_Lines: That web…it brings together every dimension. Even some I've never seen. Nicely done, Master Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290014_Lines: You on the side of the good guys this time?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290029_Lines: This hall reeks ancient evil. It doesn't belong on Earth!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290234_Lines: There's power here. Real power, like I haven't felt since Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290204_Lines: None left for you guys, sorry!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290018_Lines: But would he be worse than Khonshu?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290337_Lines: It was fun. But this child has always been more comfortable in the dark.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290163_Lines: Look out, Punisher's in his turret.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290129_Lines: Cool. Mine has a piece of my soul.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290334_Lines: No! We can't let Ultron consume Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290326_Lines: Arakko will not fall! Not today. Not ever!
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290303_Lines: The Soulsword is my divine right to wield as the Queen of Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290004_Lines: The Soulsword can destroy just about anything.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290079_Lines: That's why they call me Magik.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290031_Lines: Magik's here, and I brought a little Limbo with me.
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290205_Lines: Darkchild gets greedy sometimes, doesn't she?
122_HeroVoice_1029_ST.1029001_HeroVoice_10290239_Lines: The Darkchild is ready to awaken!

122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300166_Lines: Only one of us gets to play with Khonshu's toys!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300182_Lines: This doesn't mean we're a team now…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300337_Lines: Not used to being on a planet without a moon…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300133_Lines: Quite the empire you've built here, Panther.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300083_Lines: People forget how tough Spidey is.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300038_Lines: I can't heal? Well, that sucks.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300263_Lines: Don't give them the advantage here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300274_Lines: If I'm on your side, isn't that what you want?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300221_Lines: The tree is dead ahead. Don't stop now!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300275_Lines: I'm not nearly as heartless as you, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300025_Lines: Hydra made a bargain with an ancient evil.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300107_Lines: The moon is bright. Khonshu's hunt is about to begin.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300057_Lines: We need to seize control? Sounds fun.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300059_Lines: I'll be disappointed if they're no show!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300058_Lines: They'll be coming soon. Khonshu protect us.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300018_Lines: C'mon, you KNOW Apocalypse's out of his mind warring against the GODS.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300132_Lines: He's heard of you… and he says you're lucky we're on the same side.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300007_Lines: You guys are actually here, right? Or am I imagining this?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300183_Lines: You're lucky. I usually work alone.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300011_Lines: Did you bring your squirrelly little pals?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300191_Lines: You can't hide from your destiny.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300019_Lines: You are actually here, right? Or am I imagining this?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300293_Lines: Look at you, glimmering like a golden sun. Khonshu wouldn't like you one bit.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300216_Lines: Think you can navigate these webs, kid?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300301_Lines: Either you're on my side or you're next in line to fall.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300331_Lines: It's my sworn duty to protect travelers in the night.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300064_Lines: On your toes. Here they come.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300267_Lines: Don't let them go another inch.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300212_Lines: Let's get to that tree and get this over with.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300222_Lines: Come on! The web is waiting for us!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300217_Lines: Hope you filled the tank, Zero. It's go time.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300203_Lines: Don't pick a fight with vengeance personified.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300175_Lines: Castle's turret won't bother us anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300078_Lines: You were never the good guy, Castle. Sorry.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300313_Lines: Khonshu won't like it, but I'm willing to help.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300249_Lines: Here's where they've been hiding out!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300125_Lines: Well, that tells me everything I need to know about you.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300306_Lines: Looks like something slayed a god. No wonder Khonshu's been so quiet.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300164_Lines: Took out the other Moon Knight's ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300271_Lines: Just listening to Khonshu babbling in my head. Again.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300195_Lines: One for Steven. One for Jake. One for me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300266_Lines: Move this thing forward. Or else.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300158_Lines: Ugh. You and your giant weapons, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300294_Lines: Yikes. No thanks! I happen to like all the pieces of me right where they are!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300138_Lines: Whew. Almost didn't make it. Again.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300160_Lines: Whoa. Where can I get a turret like that?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300052_Lines: Whoa I can think straight, thanks!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300201_Lines: Huh. I was just getting started…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300102_Lines: Ghhh… I've came back from far worse than THAT.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300124_Lines: That'd be Khonshu. God of the Moon… and of Vengeance.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300127_Lines: Huh… Wonder if I could trade an Egyptian Moon God for one of their Orisha…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300024_Lines: Hm. 'Doc Samson'. Read his file. Is he gonna help me like how he did you? is he gonna pull Khonshu out?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300210_Lines: Hey! How come there are so many of them?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300023_Lines: Nobody goes it alone in these times. We can't afford to.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300339_Lines: A living island on an alien world. Not exactly my usual stomping grounds…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300013_Lines: Blade. New York is good hunting for you right now.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300296_Lines: Most heroes hate getting their hands dirty. But it's my favorite part!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300330_Lines: She's great. But no one would take me seriously if I busted skulls wearing a hippo costume!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300295_Lines: Khonshu's been watching you. He likes your style. It's so… brutal…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300119_Lines: Khonshu seems to be enjoying "the end of all that is" a bit too much…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300099_Lines: Guess Khonshu's got my back after all…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300082_Lines: Khonshu made me do it, Panther!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300116_Lines: Khonshu guides me. Just… not always in the right direction…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300247_Lines: Khonshu has his eye on you…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300106_Lines: You will feel the wrath of Khonshu!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300226_Lines: Khonshu says we can not  fail Wakanda.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300262_Lines: Khonshu says to claim this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300315_Lines: Khonshu says you're our best hope, squirrel.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300297_Lines: Khonshu gave me my mission. And nothing's going to stop me from seeing it through.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300302_Lines: Khonshu really threw me in the deep end here…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300299_Lines: They don't believe you're real, Khonshu. I'll make sure they regret that…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300146_Lines: Come on, Khonshu! Let me rest!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300154_Lines: An ankh? Hey! That's my trick!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300229_Lines: The rich just keep getting richer. Some things never change…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300150_Lines: Thought I was the one who worked from the shadows…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300084_Lines: Frank's doing what he does best.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300333_Lines: Careful, kid! This city is swarming with vamps!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300304_Lines: All right. Now this is my kind of party!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300049_Lines: Better put this to good use.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300303_Lines: Dracula’s here? Good, that bloodsuckin’ nerd owes me big…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300323_Lines: I'll strike down every vamp in our path if I have to!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300220_Lines: Almost to the magic tree. Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300321_Lines: Come on! We have to get to Avengers Tower!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300174_Lines: You can't be trusted with firepower like that, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300256_Lines: I try to do the right thing, but somehow people always take it the wrong way…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300036_Lines: I'm not afraid of your damage.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300120_Lines: I'm not really a team guy. I've got more than enough voices in my head.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300090_Lines: Hate to see Blade down. He knew the score.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300004_Lines: Camouflage is stupid. I want the enemy to see me…and be afraid.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300245_Lines: We could do a ton of damage here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300252_Lines: We could make our stand here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300261_Lines: We need to take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300003_Lines: Khonshu has guided me this far. I trust him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300040_Lines: My weak is better than your strong.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300061_Lines: I'll draw their attention, you take the zone!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300312_Lines: I'll give Richards' plan a chance. For now…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300180_Lines: I took that sniper off the board.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300335_Lines: I've already got one in mind. The Montesi Formula.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300290_Lines: I squished those squids for you.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300178_Lines: I think I got all the spider-bots.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300140_Lines: Time is running out. I think…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300118_Lines: I like you. For now. But trust me, that could change in a heartbeat.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300253_Lines: I bet we could hold 'em off from here.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300092_Lines: I tried to keep him out of trouble, but he wouldn't listen.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300002_Lines: I'm the Fist of Khonshu, protector of the overnight travelers.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300329_Lines: I'm the Fist of Khonshu, God of the Moon.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300257_Lines: I mean, it's not my fault an Egyptian god whispers in my brain and tells me who deserves his righteous vengeance.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300006_Lines: I'm Marc Spector, I'm Steven Grant, I'm Jake Lockley. And we are Moon Knight.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300069_Lines: I am the light in the darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300151_Lines: I was a mercenary. I know how to spot a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300131_Lines: I only serve one god. His name is Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300272_Lines: Yeah, I wouldn't exactly call it that. But maybe you scored a better god.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300292_Lines: Great, now my fists are all slimy...
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300009_Lines: I do hear voices in my head. You would too, if you listened.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300010_Lines: There's a god living in my head, I… don't know what to think.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300008_Lines: I wear white for a reason. I want the bad guys to see me coming.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300343_Lines: I sense this boy's power, my champion. Do not challenge him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300326_Lines: I know Iron Fist, kid. You're not him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300234_Lines: I'm almost ready, Khonshu. Gimme a minute…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300122_Lines: So… you commune with ancient gods once in a blue moon, right, Doc?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300336_Lines: Sorry, but if they're endangering the night, Khonshu wants them gone for good.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300311_Lines: Sorry, Knull, but the dark belongs to Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300207_Lines: You really should watch where you step.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300328_Lines: Well, when I'm done here, you'll have plenty of folks to heal. Trust me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300209_Lines: More enemies out there than voices in my head.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300211_Lines: More of them than us? This'll be fun.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300157_Lines: Strange is teleporting around. Watch out.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300318_Lines: Time's running out. Let's get underground!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300121_Lines: Yeah. But it didn't last long. And I burned my ID card.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300123_Lines: Yeah, I… probably shouldn't comment. Khonshu is always listening.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300206_Lines: The moon is out… and so are you.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300255_Lines: The Moon is white, Stark. It shines in the night. So do I.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300001_Lines: I tear through the cloudless night, just like the moon.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300176_Lines: Down came the moon and stomped the spiders out!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300060_Lines: Moon's right. The time to attack is now.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300259_Lines: Anyone want to lend a hand?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300316_Lines: Anyone up for saving a living island?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300340_Lines: Good point. I'll check with Khonshu… Hang on a sec… Hmm… He's not answering…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300283_Lines: Friends call me Marc… or Steven... or Jake.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300341_Lines: No one asked for your opinion, robot. Especially Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300056_Lines: Jake and Steven are telling me it's time to lock and load.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300075_Lines: The squirrels are going to hate me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300085_Lines: The Squirrels get the win? Really?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300021_Lines: Justice is like the moon, if you look up hard enough in the dark, you'll find it.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300117_Lines: I'm used to fighting on the streets. Not across all space and time.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300276_Lines: Don't know, don't care. One moon is more than enough for me.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300254_Lines: Yeah, and I got friends to help.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300169_Lines: The raccoon's beacon is outta commission.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300310_Lines: Let's get beneath the surface and finish Knull!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300288_Lines: Squids? Good. More arms to break.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300110_Lines: The full moon is high in the sky.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300305_Lines: Mars has two moons? I could get used to this…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300181_Lines: That should take care of our little sniper issue.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300149_Lines: A sniper? Clever. Annoying… but clever.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300128_Lines: Now I sorta wish I hadn't worn all white…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300233_Lines: All out of vengeance at the moment…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300215_Lines: Reality isn't gonna save itself. Let's roll!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300300_Lines: Richards and Stark think they know everything. But when man plans, the gods laugh.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300320_Lines: This had better be worth it, Richards…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300235_Lines: Ready for some sweet, sweet vengeance.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300279_Lines: No. He is nearer than ever. Soon we will all see him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300332_Lines: We'd make a good team. If you ever decide to ditch that Dagger chick, let me know…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300126_Lines: Look at this place! Hydra's crazier than I am!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300287_Lines: Look. It's Namor's disgusting pets. Yay.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300338_Lines: Really? Think it's got room for one more? Khonshu can be a bit of a pain…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300317_Lines: This is why I hate technology…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300327_Lines: The worst part about white costumes? The blood stains. Am I right?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300153_Lines: Wait… I didn't put that ankh there? Did I?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300291_Lines: Keep your ugly friends in the sea, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300225_Lines: Get that Spider-Buggy into gear, kid!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300319_Lines: Knull does not get the chance to rise, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300227_Lines: Keep moving. We've got an intergalactic empire to save.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300324_Lines: Keep fighting. We can't let Ultron win.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300134_Lines: Stars are cool. But do you happen to have any moons?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300115_Lines: Being a living avatar of vengeance takes a lot out of a guy…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300130_Lines: I'm not perfect, but Khonshu seems to think I'm worthy enough.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300223_Lines: Don't even think of slowing down now, spider!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300244_Lines: Let's mess this place up real good.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300344_Lines: Time to find Dracula. That big nerd still owes me money.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300314_Lines: Time for Dracula to pay up!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300080_Lines: Seriously, how many gods ARE there?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300044_Lines: Who wants a piece of me now?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300298_Lines: Anyone who makes the night a more dangerous place needs to be taken out.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300218_Lines: Khonshu and Bast are old friends. Let's do this for them.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300163_Lines: Found some sort of spider nest. Gross.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300156_Lines: Not cool sneaking up on us, Strange.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300139_Lines: Move it or we lose it!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300289_Lines: I like a good challenge, Namor. Thanks.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300204_Lines: Shouldn't have pissed off the God of Vengeance…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300349_Lines: I could get used to this!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300073_Lines: Khonshu willed it, Spider. Blame him.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300053_Lines: This is as close as I ever get to pure.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300251_Lines: The perfect place for a battle…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300325_Lines: We have to deliver this core. Now!
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300171_Lines: That cosmic amplifier is scrap now.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300159_Lines: That turret is absolutely absurd. But kinda cool.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300014_Lines: His tendency is sort of the other way.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300129_Lines: Nice hammer. Can I borrow it until we finish saving your realm?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300258_Lines: Could use a bit of help…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300017_Lines: Magik, can we talk? While we're on the same side?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300015_Lines: Magik, please! You're helping Apocalypse ascend to GODHOOD! Do you know what comes after?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300334_Lines: Darkchylde? Is that like another personality or something? Because I know all about that…
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300307_Lines: King in Black? How about a Knight in White instead?
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300219_Lines: Panther needs us to get the job done.
122_HeroVoice_1030_ST.1030001_HeroVoice_10300228_Lines: Their gods look so much cooler than mine…

122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310006_Lines: 4L1T was my life — but wouldn't it be fabulous to have an all-super hero band?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310035_Lines: …Well, we are in the right place for that. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310002_Lines: All I ever wanted to do was sing, really.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310342_Lines: This statue is sacred. Let's get it where it needs to be.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310217_Lines: I couldn't rest until I paid you back.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310335_Lines: Remind me to avoid New York on my next world tour…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310030_Lines: Okay! I'll let you show me.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310117_Lines: Not gonna lie, that symbiote is scary.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310102_Lines: We can't just stand around. Let's attack!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310233_Lines: Yggdrasil's roots are drying. We have to speed up!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310016_Lines: They say that music brings the world together, but right now I think we need super heroes for that.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310045_Lines: Tokyo? I love playing Tokyo! But this one is a lot more…spidery?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310302_Lines: Maybe… but I've always preferred the cold!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310018_Lines: Swap? You should just be asking for mine. When's the last time you sold out Stark Arena, gramps?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310409_Lines: People have told me that was a killer track… but I didn't take it literally!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310118_Lines: Whaaaat? Did I just beat Thor?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310172_Lines: An open portal! The enemy will be coming!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310026_Lines: But we both understand light and dark. How they move together. How they need each other. See?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310123_Lines: Magnetism can't handle a deep freeze.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310368_Lines: You are the Winter Soldier, aren't you…?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310389_Lines: Do you mind if I sing a little during battle? It helps me get in the right rhythm.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310046_Lines: Has your Tokyo always looked like this?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310128_Lines: Love those light daggers! Darkforce cloak, too!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310032_Lines: No, but you should know magnetism doesn't work on super-cooled materials. Guess what I can do?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310292_Lines: That's one ugly back-up band, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310125_Lines: You're amazing. I wish I could do what you do!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310204_Lines: You're a little underdressed, aren't you?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310378_Lines: You're right. We have work to do. I can always record a diss track later…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310377_Lines: Look who's talking, Frost. Apparently, money can't buy a fashion sense.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310301_Lines: An Agents of Atlas reunion tour? Hmmm… I don't know…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310112_Lines: Yes! Another hit for luna snow!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310205_Lines: Can't fight a real freeze. You’re practically a block of ice.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310004_Lines: Superpowers are amazing. Also the ice effects look great on stage.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310213_Lines: I kind of went solo, didn't I?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310354_Lines: No hitting pause! We have to getto Avengers Tower!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310063_Lines: Do I throw like a girl?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310275_Lines: Don't let them take this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310280_Lines: Don't let them drive any further!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310188_Lines: Get out of the turret and face us, Punisher!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310238_Lines: Hurry, the show is almost over!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310235_Lines: We are moving too slowly! The Web is fraying.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310025_Lines: Dagger! I feel like you're a kindred spirit. You're a dancer, just like me.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310294_Lines: The only octopus I like is grilled!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310208_Lines: This counts as a hot streak!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310388_Lines: Sounds like you have some pretty amazing friends.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310047_Lines: Um, yeah. But there isn't a giant spiderweb in the sky.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310391_Lines: Whoa… What's that sound…? Like a melodic wind blowing across time and space…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310023_Lines: Whoa, what year is it where you come from?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310346_Lines: Aww! Aren't you the cutest little robot! Of course we'll help you!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310184_Lines: Oh, were you looking for an armor pack? Too bad.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310405_Lines: Hmm. It might be fun to debut new material in front of a crowd for once…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310058_Lines: Hey, I'm right here! Remember? Luna Snow?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310131_Lines: Omona, not Jeff! He was the best little Landshark…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310224_Lines: We won’t stop until the tapping is stopped.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310009_Lines: It's easier being a super hero when you already have the fame part figured out.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310345_Lines: Avengers Tower? I was hoping for Madison Square Garden. But okay…
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310158_Lines: Wow. For a girl with ice powers, I suddenly feel pretty uncool.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310156_Lines: Oh my God, you're right, I'm gonna…gonna get old someday! And then I'm going to…Ohhh, man, I need to chill out!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310170_Lines: Doctor Strange has opened a portal!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310386_Lines: Okay… but if you want to upgrade to backstage passes, just let me know!
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310154_Lines: Okay, confession time. Around you I feel kind of inferior. I mean, you can do everything I can do, and so much more.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310119_Lines: If he's the perfect human, what does that make me?
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310229_Lines: If Spider-Zero does not reach Budokan, she cannot reach the Shrine of the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1031_ST.1031001_HeroVoice_10310185_Lines: This thing was called a Cosmic Yarn Amplifier?
