122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340234_Lines: Nobody can hang with the pulse cannon.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340427_Lines: Nice Gala, Emma. The Hellfire Trading Company must be doing well…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340144_Lines: He's a sociopath, but the man gets results.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340223_Lines: I emptied the spider nest. All clear.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340414_Lines: My armor's already as bleeding edge as it can be, Spidey. I'll be fine!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340268_Lines: Spider-Zero looks worried. We need to get there pronto.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340262_Lines: Spider-Zero needs to get to Budokan…and not to play "Smoke on the Water."
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340091_Lines: Might as well be made of glass.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340245_Lines: Take five! I mean, I already did.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340390_Lines: Either we get underground now, or Knull drags us there later…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340279_Lines: Blame Fujikawa for the bad stuff, kid. The good? That's all me.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340269_Lines: Can't be late to the Shrine, or the whole Web might fall apart. Move it!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340010_Lines: If I could get a look at Doom's machine, I could solve this problem by lunchtime.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340186_Lines: With a few upgrades, that suit of yours could be unstoppable.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340347_Lines: Oddly enough, the Avengers built a base inside the husk of a Celestial once, too…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340416_Lines: Yeah, well, give me a suit of enchanted Uru armor, and I promise I won't change a thing!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340138_Lines: I feel a little sorry for Nat's enemies.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340178_Lines: Well thanks, kid. Good to know my tech lasts the test of time.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340341_Lines: Thanks, kid. Like what you see?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340382_Lines: Let's deliver this essence and get off this slimeball!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340378_Lines: Glad I wore my symbiote-proof armor…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340424_Lines: That depends entirely on whether or not I created any of them…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340043_Lines: It's what we do, Bruce. It’s what we do.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340236_Lines: That's what happens when you pick a fight with protons.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340114_Lines: We have it. And we have to keep it!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340065_Lines: That was definitely not on the tourist map.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340274_Lines: This web…it's like string theory come to life. Reed's gonna love it.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340113_Lines: This is what we're here for. Let's go.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340201_Lines: Portal! We're about to have company.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340395_Lines: This core can erase Ultron from Arakko. But only if we move fast!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340035_Lines: She's coming along. We'll have the space-time continuum patched up before you know it.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340375_Lines: The invite said black tie, but my gut said Vibranium mesh. Glad I chose right!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340029_Lines: Huh…You know you should invest in a way to hide in the dark. Like maybe black clothes?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340031_Lines: Oh so the goal is to keep everyone away?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340175_Lines: How long have I been gone in your timeline?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340189_Lines: And if you want a suit of bleeding edge armor? Who do you go to then?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340376_Lines: Seriously, Ultron?! This is why people don't trust technology…
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340430_Lines: Mister Fantastic, cracking jokes. It really is the end of the world!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340190_Lines: Did you see the building with my name on it, Reed?
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340009_Lines: Rebuild the space-time continuum and defeat two Doctor Dooms? Piece of cake.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340146_Lines: Cap, get up! We need you.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340396_Lines: Arakko's running out of time. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340426_Lines: That's fine by me. Give me ten minutes and I'll have it back in the air, good as new.
122_HeroVoice_1034_ST.1034001_HeroVoice_10340046_Lines: It always comes down to us, doesn't it?

122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350466_Lines: [Eddie] Thanks to Peter, I went from reporting to fighting the god of darkness. Hooray...
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350465_Lines: [Eddie] The other guy's been doing a lot of talking for me. Remember ol' Eddie?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350267_Lines: There is a dire threat on the horizon.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350174_Lines: As always, it is up to us to save the spider…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350377_Lines: New York is nearly as dark as Klyntar. This does not bode well…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350390_Lines: Don't touch our chocolate... That's Venom's chocolate…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350264_Lines: He'll be your god too if you let him. Knull consumes all.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350306_Lines: Protect that essence at all costs!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350151_Lines: Really? We were just getting warmed up.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350356_Lines: It doesn't matter how bright you burn, girl. Knull will still find a way to snuff you out.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350329_Lines: Either way, there's no more time for rest. War is on the horizon.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350141_Lines: We're going to keep this one.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350008_Lines: Unlike other so-called heroes, we are not afraid to get our hands dirty.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350012_Lines: If saving this universe means slaughtering our god, so be it.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350458_Lines: Perhaps… but we have come to learn that we are all connected in mysterious ways…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350254_Lines: You would judge our entire species on a single brief encounter?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350033_Lines: They're able to hurt us now.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350283_Lines: He may have created us, but if we have our way, we will end him.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350169_Lines: The gods are as cruel as we thought.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350238_Lines: Stories only tend to tell half the truth, little one.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350416_Lines: I fear this Timestream Entanglement has left our memories in disarray…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350257_Lines: Then you made sure he's coming after you.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350016_Lines: Let's hope these gods are kinder than ours.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350343_Lines: You want to get your hands on Knull, lady? Get in line.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350237_Lines: We assure you, the feeling is mutual, rodent. But we must work together.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350273_Lines: The darkness in you seems so… familiar.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350280_Lines: What you experienced here was like a vacation compared to what Knull has in store for us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350070_Lines: You're lucky we're a hero now.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350448_Lines: We are sure you will find a way to use it to your advantage… as you always do…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350284_Lines: You want in, goldie? Follow us. But watch your step.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350074_Lines: You knew it would end this way, spider.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350249_Lines: How did you make it off alive?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350447_Lines: You bonded with a symbiote once. The one known as Widow. Its codex is still within you.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350250_Lines: A brain like yours could be of great use to us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350445_Lines: Your little rodent friends are not nearly sufficient to satisfy their appetites.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350325_Lines: You would make an exceptional host…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350457_Lines: The emblem emblazoned on your chest… It vaguely resembles the mark that Knull bares…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350164_Lines: Be grateful. Spiders are not often our allies.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350248_Lines: We can smell the stench of Knull on you. You have been to Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350086_Lines: You are Groot. We are impressed.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350233_Lines: So powerful… You would make a fine host.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350007_Lines: We shall protect the innocent and devour the guilty!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350338_Lines: Be ready. The power that courses through you will attract many of my kind.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350285_Lines: It's rare to find a creature with teeth as sharp as ours. Use them well, and perhaps you will be one of the few to survive this world.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350272_Lines: Not sorry enough, spider. But you will be. Someday.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350318_Lines: The Core of Krakoa must be delivered.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350357_Lines: Klyntar isn’t a planet. It's a cage. For a god.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350231_Lines: It is not a "suit." Symbiotes are living beings.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350003_Lines: The bond between a symbiote and its host is sacred. Do not dare to break it.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350337_Lines: Symbiotes have been known to take the form of dragons on occasion…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350355_Lines: Few have ever traveled to Klyntar's darkest depths and returned.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350453_Lines: Centuries? Millennia? Either way, not nearly long enough.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350263_Lines: Symbiotes are not born. But our origin is here.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350288_Lines: Do not fear. We brought help.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350311_Lines: Don't lose hope. Dracula feeds on our despair!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350224_Lines: Do not let them take this place!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350446_Lines: You should be. We never said that they wouldn't try to devour you, girl…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350176_Lines: Let's pick up the pace. An empire is waiting on us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350088_Lines: It seems your magic has run out, Doctor.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350123_Lines: Stick to weapons you can carry, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350018_Lines: Even an empire as bright as this can be snuffed out by Knull in mere seconds.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350240_Lines: So we are, spider. Is that a problem?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350260_Lines: Previous spawns. What you would call ancestors.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350299_Lines: Only this essence can stop the King in Black's return!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350454_Lines: We don't care if we survive, just as long as we manage to take Knull down with us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350326_Lines: We suppose you could say that.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350385_Lines: Poor Eddie wasn't on the guest list. But we're a package deal, so we made a little adjustment…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350241_Lines: We will do our best. But we make no promises.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350236_Lines: We do not need to say it. We will prove it.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350251_Lines: Yes… For problem solving. Certainly not for devouring.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350083_Lines: Ah, the Widow shows her fangs!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350323_Lines: Hmm… We like the sound of that.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350330_Lines: How do you tell friend from foe in this cursed city?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350119_Lines: The amplification device has been destroyed.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350388_Lines: Extraterrestrials don't understand the joy of a symbiote bond. But they'll find out if they stick around long enough!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350185_Lines: Our hunger will return soon enough…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350384_Lines: Every cell in a Celestial's body holds unfathomable power. If we can tap into that, maybe we can lock Knull up for good.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350090_Lines: Too bad. We liked this god.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350354_Lines: Don't go getting any ideas, lady…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350246_Lines: There is great chaos in you, woman. Chaos… and darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350392_Lines: Okay, fine. We can’t deny it anymore. The King in Black is insanely powerful.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350281_Lines: If you set Knull free, woman, we swear we will devour you whole.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350307_Lines: If we do not succeed, Knull will consume us all!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350277_Lines: If it landed here, it has likely been devoured whole by the native symbiotes.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350274_Lines: If they were, be glad that they were severed from your body before they took control.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350286_Lines: If unleashed, Knull's darkness will consume this entire universe.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350378_Lines: If this is our last dance, so be it!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350235_Lines: Twin? We are better than Spider-Man in every way!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350328_Lines: Were you the one who awakened Knull, Warlock?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350115_Lines: We've destroyed the ankh. Thank us later.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350006_Lines: We are done chasing spiders. We have bigger enemies to conquer.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350075_Lines: Your spider-bot was crunchy, little one.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350107_Lines: Our friend Frank has a new toy.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350106_Lines: Careful. Strange is up to no good.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350309_Lines: We will not fail you, little robot!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350300_Lines: You are an unlikely hero, little robot…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350142_Lines: You thought you could escape? How sweet.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350172_Lines: We will clear the path for you, little spider.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350162_Lines: Let's hope these gods are worthy of our help.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350101_Lines: Some sort of enchanted object. Curious.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350085_Lines: Leave the tentacles to the professionals, Soldier.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350239_Lines: To be fair, we never succeeded. And we've since developed far more noble tastes.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350456_Lines: Correct, Madam… If we choose the right queen to rule by our side! So… will you join us?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350166_Lines: Few spiders earn our trust. Consider yourself lucky.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350259_Lines: Unlikely. We're symbiota non grata on Klyntar, if you get our drift.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350122_Lines: Sorry to break your shiny toy, Frankie.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350298_Lines: Knull's essence must be taken beneath the surface!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350290_Lines: Wear this… if you want to survive…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350097_Lines: You can' t get rid of us so easy.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350156_Lines: An unexpected turn. But a welcome one.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350253_Lines: We are… suddenly considering a plant-based diet…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350376_Lines: We shall protect the innocent of this city, just as we always have!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350163_Lines: We will assist you, little spider. This time.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350205_Lines: We could cause such carnage here…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350449_Lines: We can shift our external appearance into any configuration. This seemed most appropriate.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350353_Lines: We agree. We can't let him retake his throne. Not ever again.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350358_Lines: We can barely keep Knull contained. Let's not push our luck.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350121_Lines: We have shut down the rodent's amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350424_Lines: We have embraced our role as a protector. You should be proud of us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350320_Lines: We must reboot Arakko to its true state!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350159_Lines: Quite a horde we're up against.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350334_Lines: We must act now or the King in Black will rise again!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350297_Lines: We must deliver this statue safely.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350014_Lines: We must protect the bond between space and time as fiercely as we protect our own.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350234_Lines: We understand. Bonding with you would make Eddie sad anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350131_Lines: We could get used to working together.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350420_Lines: We are no mere walking plant! We are Venom! We are more powerful in every way!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350001_Lines: We are Venom. You are insignificant.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350245_Lines: We do not wish to consume you, child. At least for now.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350386_Lines: We Agents of the Cosmos used to protect the universe. Now, we all must finish what the team had started.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350002_Lines: We were once called a villain, but now the universe will see the hero we truly are.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350303_Lines: Shall we venture to Dracula's throne now?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350389_Lines: We've never had so many guests in our personal space. Nice to finally have someone to play with…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350161_Lines: The tree we seek grows ever closer.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350242_Lines: I knew of a world whose inhabitants resembled bipedal squirrels. Like you.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350279_Lines: My brethren do not appreciate uninvited guests. We will not be welcomed kindly.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350148_Lines: Maybe we should leave some for the others…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350078_Lines: No more kings in black. Not even you, Panther.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350061_Lines: We need to finish this now.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350278_Lines: Take solace. At least you gave them severe indigestion.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350160_Lines: A few too many foes for our tastes.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350158_Lines: The morsels outnumber us. A buffet!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350179_Lines: An entire Spider-Verse waiting to be devoured…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350419_Lines: Your unique abilities would make you an excellent host, Daywalker.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350346_Lines: True fashion does not come cheap, little spider.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350076_Lines: A legendary failure, Star-Lord. As usual.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350258_Lines: Oh really? Pop over to Klyntar sometime and then run your mouth.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350379_Lines: Time to consume Ultron before he consumes this entire planet!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350113_Lines: We broke Moon Knight's little toy.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350103_Lines: One of Moon Knight's cursed ankhs.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350287_Lines: Yes… but it will require soldiers. Ones capable of doing the unspeakable…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350124_Lines: The turret has been duly punished.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350108_Lines: A turret? And we thought we were deadly…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350013_Lines: Doom is nothing. Knull is the true threat, to this universe and all others.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350336_Lines: Good. We've worked up quite an appetite…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350155_Lines: Not the way we thought this would end.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350232_Lines: Not as slimy as you, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350084_Lines: That was quite a trick, Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350293_Lines: The king of the seas has delivered us a snack…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350120_Lines: Rocket's amplifier is out of service.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350269_Lines: Like the Red Room was your home. Klyntar made us, but I despise it.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350128_Lines: We'd say we're sorry, little sniper. But we're not.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350225_Lines: We cannot afford to slow down now.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350271_Lines: Now you know how we felt when you abandoned us on a planet full of humans.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350100_Lines: Come out, come out, little sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350319_Lines: It seems Krakoa is Arakko's only hope…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350150_Lines: A shame no one else pitched in.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350087_Lines: A shame, spider. We were finally getting along.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350175_Lines: Tell the King we've hit some unexpected delays.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350292_Lines: Who is stronger? Squid or symbiote?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350011_Lines: Knull brings nothing but darkness. His reign ends now.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350381_Lines: Knull never gets to take this throne again. Do you hear us? Never!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350327_Lines: Knull's numbers are infinite… but eight seems like a good start.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350324_Lines: Knull slumbers deep within the heart of this living planet.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350391_Lines: Knull's dark tendrils have already reached the surface, but we will find a way to sever them again!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350455_Lines: When Knull is erased from existence, someone will have to claim his spot…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350291_Lines: What hideous creatures, Namor. We adore them…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350295_Lines: Our belly is full now, Namor. Thank you.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350004_Lines: Finally, a chance to show them all who you were meant to be, Eddie.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350423_Lines: Will you be able to put aside our past and trust us on the field of battle, Spider?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350082_Lines: You proved useful for once, spider.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350415_Lines: We know we should hate you, Spider… but we are having trouble remembering why…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350017_Lines: So many spiders. A shame we just ate.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350276_Lines: Leave it to spiders to take the credit for our hard work.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350126_Lines: Our spider problem has been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350165_Lines: Believe it or not, we are rooting for you, spider.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350171_Lines: We will not let your precious web unravel, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350173_Lines: We will do our part, spider. The rest is up to you.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350345_Lines: We would have made a glorious garment for you, had you not shunned us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350270_Lines: If you weren't under our protection, anything here would laugh while they killed you, Spider-Meat.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350294_Lines: Our tentacles proved stronger than theirs…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350261_Lines: Keep your lightning away from us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350282_Lines: When it comes to Knull, there is nothing but darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350266_Lines: A story too long to tell here.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350275_Lines: The detritus you've covered this city in is of no concern to us.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350255_Lines: We suppose we can't argue with that.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350005_Lines: This universe needs a different kind of protector. A lethal one.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350019_Lines: This planet has been Knull's prison. Now, let it be his grave!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350387_Lines: This device separates symbiotes from their hosts. Perfect for Knull's victims… but we'd better stay clear, Eddie…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350380_Lines: This god husk still festers with Knull's darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350010_Lines: This fight is our destiny. It is why we were bonded together.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350247_Lines: It was not an insult. We find it… strangely attractive.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350102_Lines: What have we here? An ankh?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350344_Lines: Simple. Because we want to make sure he suffers.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350157_Lines: A small win, but it still counts.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350077_Lines: Filthy little furball had it coming…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350177_Lines: We can feel a darkness here… calling out to us…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350226_Lines: We will force this vehicle ahead, if we must!
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350114_Lines: That ankh is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350109_Lines: That turret looks dangerous. And delicious.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350268_Lines: That pompous fool? Doom is a gnat compared to our true enemy. Knull is coming.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350335_Lines: Then you will help us end his reign before it begins anew?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350331_Lines: That rule would put us at odds as well, Daywalker. Is that what you wish?
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350080_Lines: Time for you to retire from duty, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350450_Lines: You would rather have seen Eddie in a gown? Trust us. The answer is "no"…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350302_Lines: A mythical squirrel? What a strange ally…
122_HeroVoice_1035_ST.1035001_HeroVoice_10350015_Lines: Darkness has tainted this place. Unlike Knull's, but just as evil…

122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360188_Lines: A planet full of Venoms? This is my worst nightmare!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360233_Lines: Once I get you stuck…game over.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360073_Lines: You get a web, and you get a web, and you get a web!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360258_Lines: Next stop, the Shrine of the Weaver. All aboard!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360118_Lines: Fight for the good guys next time!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360201_Lines: Uh oh, that sure looks like a portal.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360427_Lines: Really, Eddie? After all the times you've tried to ruin my life? I'm hurt!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360038_Lines: Haven't plenty people lifted it already? There's Cap, Jane Foster, that alien horse guy…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360222_Lines: No more spiders to worry about. Except me.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360131_Lines: I don't know what to tell you. Spiders beat squirrels!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360332_Lines: Whatever it is, it's pretty fantastic!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360314_Lines: We can't let them go any farther.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360309_Lines: Can't let them take this place from us...
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360128_Lines: You never could see beyond the… Blade.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360185_Lines: Uh, I didn't make this mess! It's some sort of cosmic web of life and destiny. I swear!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360106_Lines: Here they come to kick us out.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360136_Lines: Did he say it? Did he say the clobberin' time thing? I hope he said it.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360042_Lines: Yeah but what if you're in a room? Or there's an eclipse? Or I'm blind?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360423_Lines: Just like you have all the powers of a squirrel and all the powers of a girl. So…?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360123_Lines: You'd have done the same to me. Only with more fangs.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360356_Lines: Are you guys sharing a studio in Hell's Kitchen now? I get it. Rent's been skyrocketing!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360040_Lines: Do you see an unicorn in afro next to me?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360051_Lines: Shouldn't you be off ruling your awesome intergalactic empire?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360060_Lines: You working for the Klyntar Board of Tourism now? You're a natural.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360186_Lines: Did you know that web over there connects us to a whole multiverse full of different Spider-Heros?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360468_Lines: It's not just you. I mean… gods, monsters, robots…. All of this is pretty crazy!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360432_Lines: You've also tried to devour me more times than I can count. So pardon my skepticism…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360043_Lines: Take your own advice, Moonie. I don't need protecting.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360268_Lines: We're running out of time to protect the Web!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360006_Lines: Doing the right thing just makes you feel good, doesn't it?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360390_Lines: As if being on the surface of Klyntar wasn't bad enough…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360056_Lines: Symbiotes. Why did it have to be symbiotes?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360333_Lines: Not so much a god. The Master Weaver. That's the Web of Life and Destiny.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360270_Lines: The Orisha are getting restless, I think…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360279_Lines: Hang on! The cool stuff takes time!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360023_Lines: Come on, you're just kidding me.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360246_Lines: Don't worry. You guys can win some next time.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360209_Lines: Don't worry, I got the ankh!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360400_Lines: Don't blow a gasket, H.E.R.B.I.E.! We'll get you there safely.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360304_Lines: Don't make me do this solo!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360424_Lines: Don't even finish that question. The thought alone is gonna give me nightmares for weeks!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360184_Lines: Come on, Frank. I'm from Queens.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360336_Lines: You're kidding, right? I can barely keep my own life from imploding!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360265_Lines: Hurry! The tree can't take much more tapping!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360139_Lines: Don't mess with Empire State University!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360030_Lines: Doc, I have a question. Squirrel Girl can talk to squirrels, Ant-Man can control ants…how come I can't control spiders?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360382_Lines: Vampires? I thought it was landlords who were bleeding New Yorkers dry!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360182_Lines: Just one time back in high school when my webshooters malfunctioned. That was embarrassing. But this is…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360179_Lines: Not as long as you keep that big, nasty tongue of yours far away from me.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360021_Lines: It's gonna take more than scrambled timelines to cloud my naturally sunny disposition.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360092_Lines: Now's the time to hit em!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360170_Lines: A little, I guess? I can't quite get a grip on the math.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360323_Lines: Spiders love things with eight legs... but this?!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360138_Lines: Look at her go! Doreen Green, everybody!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360031_Lines: I mean…maybe? I bet there are a million spiders in Doomstadt. I could command them all.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360070_Lines: I mean, it's not like Spider-Man could help or anything…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360035_Lines: Yeah, I can't knit, or talk to spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360434_Lines: Oh, I wasn't talking about your suit… but good for you, I guess…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360473_Lines: Huh. I guess a back-up plan wouldn't be a bad idea. You don't happen to give lessons, do you?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360274_Lines: Spiders rock, you know. Seriously. We do.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360061_Lines: Whooooa this place is AMAZING! What… Is that a holo projector?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360153_Lines: Better than Aunt May's chicken soup.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360313_Lines: Time to slam on their brakes.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360177_Lines: Wow. Really? I'd be honored. And I promise I won't get any webs on them… this time…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360175_Lines: Whoa. That's a lot of pressure.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360052_Lines: That's what I always said! Only in a totally different way. So you're…a Friendly Neighborhood Black Panther? Wow.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360058_Lines: Whoa, Wakanda goes galactic. In this timeline, I bet printers never jam.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360147_Lines: OUCH! THAT's gonna take time to regrow.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360132_Lines: Ha! I'm one bug his system couldn't beat.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360183_Lines: I was going to go with "amazing"… but sure. That's "amazing" in Japanese, right?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360466_Lines: Eh. I used to hang with Iceman back in the day. I'm cool.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360135_Lines: Oh, man, I'll never be safe in Central Park again.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360226_Lines: Hey, we make a pretty good team.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360349_Lines: Yikes. I probably should've worn a tie to a fancy shindig like this…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360444_Lines: Aww, thanks, puppers! You really are a Spider-Man's best friend!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360083_Lines: Ohh, if I get hit it's gonna hurt.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360385_Lines: Yeesh! This cosmic stuff is so outta my neighborhood!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360120_Lines: Ohhh, you went down pretty hard.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360134_Lines: Aw, you coulda been a hero, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360338_Lines: Uh huh. Shouldn't you be stuck to the front of a fridge somewhere?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360340_Lines: As an expert on symbiotes? No, wait… You're gonna use me as bait, aren't you? Great.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360475_Lines: Sigh. Throw up in your mask once and they never let you forget it…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360189_Lines: Wow. I… guess I never thought of it that way. Sorry.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360048_Lines: Come on. Were you bitten by a radioactive wizard?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360449_Lines: Whoa! Careful, Peni! You do not want to bring one of these guys home with you!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360069_Lines: C'mon, I'm right here. You know, Spider-Man?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360146_Lines: The tree is down, who heard that?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360022_Lines: Cap. Holy cow, you sure make a guy feel better just by being here.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360065_Lines: Glad you're around, Johnny. With everything so weird, it's good to see a friend.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360339_Lines: Yeah. We have a long, complicated history. Sometimes they want to be my best friend. Sometimes they want to eat me.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360282_Lines: Hey! Need some love over here!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360032_Lines: Say Doc, you never told me where ya learned all those tricks.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360476_Lines: Hey! I was the host for a powerful cosmic entity for a hot minute, too, ya know!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360001_Lines: I'm your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man, only my neighborhood is now, like, multiple realities. Cool, right?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360342_Lines: Hey, Blade! What do symbiotes and vampires have in common?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360355_Lines: Hey, Tandy! Where's Ty? You two are usually inseparable!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360034_Lines: Hey Doreen, so you gave your squirrels little shields and sticks?!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360244_Lines: Hey, sorry, team. There's no bad guys left.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360049_Lines: Hey, Hawkeye! We gonna save the world?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360290_Lines: Ooh! So much stuff to smash!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360036_Lines: Oh, me too. You'll never guess who showed up to save the day: Morbius!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360263_Lines: We've got the king's kitty statue. Let's roll!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360125_Lines: In another timeline, we're still friends.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360202_Lines: Get that turret before Frank gets us!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360346_Lines: Same. Though, if you ask me, the webs are a nice upgrade.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360059_Lines: How could Cosmic Misery Parasites have evolved in a lush, tranquil setting like this?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360015_Lines: That spider could have bitten anyone, but it bit me. Pretty amazing luck.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360402_Lines: Hang tight! We'll clear you a path to Dracula's place.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360275_Lines: Thanks to the Web of Life and Destiny, you've probably seen versions of me in every alternate dimension, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360108_Lines: Hello, mission objective? It's right here!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360054_Lines: Geez, how do you even make that much web fluid?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360470_Lines: All right! Another meeting of the Secret Society of Super-Peters!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360178_Lines: Great. Eddie… I guess we're doing the team-up thing again.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360430_Lines: Bummer. Any chance Odin had a spare set of mystical toenail clippers? No…? Oh, well. I'd to ask.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360199_Lines: Strange is at it again! Portal!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360027_Lines: When the time stream gets sorted out, we arm-wrestle.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360450_Lines: Wow. I wish my partnership with Venom had been half as healthy as yours with your mech suit!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360479_Lines: But those lousy vampires got exactly what they deserved in the end! Oh… Sorry… I…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360281_Lines: All right! Time to get my web on!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360271_Lines: Bast will not be happy if we're late.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360350_Lines: Sure, I'd be dapper if you were still my costume, V. But also, a total psycho!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360198_Lines: Stay away from that ankh if it starts to hover.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360446_Lines: Home? This sure doesn't look like Queens to me, lady!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360044_Lines: Sorry, not really a joiner. I mean, I can't even commit to the Avengers.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360429_Lines: Right… About that… You wouldn't happen to have any spare enchanted weapons, would you?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360047_Lines: Say Doc, you never told me where'cha learned all those tricks.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360345_Lines: Right?! You get it more than anyone, Sue. It's about family.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360197_Lines: Careful, an ankh. There might be others…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360115_Lines: Watch out, they're headed our way!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360107_Lines: They're not just gonna let us stay? Sheesh.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360297_Lines: Here's where we do our thing!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360162_Lines: Almost. It's not easy making that much webbing.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360129_Lines: I hope the next version of me I meet is nicer.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360004_Lines: It's up to us to help the people who can't help themselves.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360026_Lines: There are people who think I'm as strong as you.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360262_Lines: Great! We made the new season of Wakandan Idol!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360478_Lines: Sorry about that whole thing back at Central Park. We kinda blew it the first time…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360142_Lines: Gotta admit, he gets things done.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360403_Lines: We've gotta get this core in place. Arakko's counting on us!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360005_Lines: Someone's got to stop Doom. I mean, Dooms. Hope there's only two?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360256_Lines: Let's go, there's a tree to save!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360269_Lines: Come on, come on…we have to get there!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360088_Lines: That put some pep in my step!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360013_Lines: This feels like an Avengers gig. Does that mean I've made it to the big leagues?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360086_Lines: I feel like a wet noodle.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360157_Lines: I'm not a vengeful person, but today I'll make an exception.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360445_Lines: You and me both. Wait… you didn't ever happen to wear a symbiote, did you?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360126_Lines: I have never felt worse about a win.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360103_Lines: We did it! The area's under control.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360267_Lines: We're close…but we're running out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360067_Lines: Which way do we go, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360109_Lines: We need to take that area, remember?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360259_Lines: We're headed straight for the Shrine of the Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360159_Lines: We need to get back from here, like now.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360277_Lines: We need to go. Like, now!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360254_Lines: We ought to wait for reinforcements?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360257_Lines: We're off to wreck the tapping machine!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360261_Lines: Let's get Spider-Zero where she needs to go.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360308_Lines: We need to take control here!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360230_Lines: I don't want to hit you more than I have to.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360158_Lines: Back in the swing of things!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360341_Lines: One of them, I guess. But there are, like, thousands of other Spider-Folks out there putting in the work, too.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360098_Lines: I can be more reckless now!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360171_Lines: I like your optimism. Yeah. Let's do that.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360028_Lines: I was thinking. All Spider-People are connected to a Spider-Totem.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360325_Lines: I saw one of these on a beach in Jersey once…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360007_Lines: Anybody who has the chance can be a hero. I believe that.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360012_Lines: I don't know the actual mileage, but this feels like a long way from Queens.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360272_Lines: I can just about see how this thing should work…and yeah, it's pretty brilliant.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360223_Lines: I turned out the sniper's lights.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360166_Lines: I feel great. How's everyone else?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360327_Lines: That takes care of Namor's calamari crew!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360114_Lines: Pretty sure those are bad guys…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360474_Lines: I know what’s at stake here, Logan. I'm a big boy. I can handle it.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360348_Lines: I don't know. I should feel totally at home here… but something's off…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360343_Lines: I was gonna say, "they both suck"… but yeah, that works too…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360181_Lines: I guess not. It's just one of those weird things that you have to expect at a dimensional crossroads.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360055_Lines: I'm protecting this Web of Life and Destiny now, and boy that's a huge responsibility!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360386_Lines: I hate symbiote stuff so much. Just…so, so much.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360353_Lines: I know why I'm in this fight… but what made you crawl out from under your rock?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360394_Lines: Not the Squirrel Girl I was expecting… but I'm sure you'll do fine…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360053_Lines: When I was a kid, New York wasn't quite so ominous. Miss that.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360389_Lines: Beneath the Planet of the Symbiotes? I think I saw this sequel…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360241_Lines: Maybe I'm getting good at this hero thing!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360305_Lines: I sure could use some amazing friends!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360161_Lines: I can only do it so often, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360280_Lines: I'll be ready soon. I swear!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360289_Lines: Might wanna take a look over here…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360029_Lines: Yeah. So I wonder if there are, like, Raccoon totems?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360381_Lines: This is why I try not to leave Queens anymore…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360014_Lines: So if the timelines are all entangled, how many MJs are there? This could get complicated.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360433_Lines: Sounds like now would be a perfect time for a quick suit upgrade, Tony!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360195_Lines: Take cover, we got a sniper!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360245_Lines: Aw, jeez, I didn't mean to hog the bad guys.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360127_Lines: Sorry, Johnny. It's just what I had to do.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360213_Lines: Oh sorry, fresh out of armor packs!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360010_Lines: Travel tip: With the right credit card, interdimensional trips get crazy extra miles.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360469_Lines: I guess somebody's gotta do it. Might as well be us!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360428_Lines: Well, in that case, we've always been the best of friends! Definitely no bad blood here!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360110_Lines: We're up against the clock! Hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360187_Lines: Yeah? Are they all this good at making a guy feel less special? Or is that just you?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360039_Lines: We always do! Except don't try to be as funny as me. It just looks pitiful.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360467_Lines: Yeah, I guess I do. But I'm always looking for more. Glad to add you to the list!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360037_Lines: Things got weirder from there. I'll tell you about that sometime.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360384_Lines: Did anyone else realize that "Arakko" is just "Krakoa" jumbled up? Really? Only me…?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360176_Lines: Between you and Tony, I think you've got that part covered.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360009_Lines: Where's the timeline where we all just go down to the bodega for a sandwich?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360140_Lines: And this is why I never worry about Yancy Street.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360008_Lines: Come to New York sometime, I'll do whatever a spider can!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360331_Lines: You and me, together again, Ben! It's a classic Team-Up!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360426_Lines: Hank Pym gets all of his news from insects. Just sayin'… I'm an arachnid.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360173_Lines: Either way, we're together now. Whaddya say we hit the webs?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360019_Lines: Yes! We're gonna save the world a crack dumb jokes while we do it.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360462_Lines: Loki. Ugh. I knew there was a reason my Spidey-Sense was going crazy!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360063_Lines: Peni! When are you going to make me a SP//dr?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360174_Lines: Every time I put on the mask, Peni. But we have a responsibility. SOMEONE has to stand up to all the bullies out there.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360255_Lines: Too many to fight right now.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360085_Lines: Don't heal me! It won't help.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360002_Lines: Life is hard sometimes, but at least maybe I can make it easier for other people.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360337_Lines: I know, right? Wait. What are we talking about here?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360472_Lines: Not much… but in theory, my Spider-Sense should let me dodge any punch you throw!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360105_Lines: There's our target. It's up for grabs!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360156_Lines: Now I've got something to prove.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360465_Lines: I'd say you obviously didn't have an Uncle Ben to teach you right from wrong…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360396_Lines: Looks like we get to be Arakko's IT department!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360347_Lines: I can't believe this actually is the future. Spidey for the win… I guess…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360064_Lines: Seriously? Because I have a radioactive spider right over here, ready to go.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360017_Lines: Brighteyedandbushytailed I'm sorry! I couldn't help it.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360399_Lines: I knew we should've taken the 6 Train…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360477_Lines: See! Power like that stays with you… no matter how often you wash your costume!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360330_Lines: Yeah… I've been told I'm a lot…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360072_Lines: Don't mess with the Amazing Spider-Man!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360273_Lines: Private police. They don't care about people. Just the people writing their checks.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360324_Lines: Is this the part where the crab starts singing?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360172_Lines: Wait… Have we met? You sure you've got the right Spidey?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360253_Lines: I don't think I like these odds.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360149_Lines: Jeez, we needed her and SP//dr.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360018_Lines: Johnny, with your reckless charm and my acrobatic skills, we'll knock'em dead.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360398_Lines: Knull's not taking over the universe if I have anything to say about it!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360096_Lines: Defense, huh? Okay, let's try it.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360463_Lines: And tomorrow, you'll gladly stab me in the back to get what you want.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360334_Lines: I'm sure you had one, pal. It just probably burned down. Immediately.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360145_Lines: That's a problem. But also I feel more comfortable.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360224_Lines: We got ninety-nine problems, but a sniper ain't one.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360232_Lines: Spider-Domain is not for the weak.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360425_Lines: Okay… but I don't think that's a real thing, Tony…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360003_Lines: Please can we discover Aunt May's Cherry Pie dimension?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360397_Lines: If we don't deliver Knull's essence, it's lights out for all of us!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360130_Lines: Try to keep up, Uncle Sam.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360243_Lines: Five? Can't be many of them left!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360207_Lines: Steer clear of the spider nest!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360431_Lines: I couldn't even trust you to write an accurate news story, Eddie. What’s changed?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360344_Lines: Ya know, as cool as Future Spider City is, I'd rather be in Queens.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360011_Lines: The truth is, I can do some amazing stuff. I should enjoy this more.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360033_Lines: So you weren't bitten by a radioactive wizard?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360391_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E.! My favorite robot! Let's do this, buddy!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360401_Lines: It's a long way to that castle, but I think we can swing it.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360235_Lines: Come here so I can hit you!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360393_Lines: I know every tree in this park. Stick with me!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360464_Lines: I've had my share of loss over the years. It's made me who I am.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360211_Lines: This is a beacon-free zone now.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360155_Lines: I gotta do better this time.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360296_Lines: A good place for some action!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360164_Lines: Is there a doctor in the house?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360214_Lines: No more yarn's getting amplified here.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360335_Lines: This place? No no no. My neighborhood is way less futuristic.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360471_Lines: Hyphenated Heroes? Lords and Men? Spidey and Garfun-Quill?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360242_Lines: I think that's five in a row! Crazy!
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360276_Lines: So… Where do I rank on the list of Reality's Best Spideys? Gotta be pretty high, right?
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360020_Lines: I'm thinking of the galactic neighborhood right now.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360354_Lines: Hate to disappoint, your majesty, but on my watch, everybody lives.
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360383_Lines: "Come to the party," Wolverine said. "It'll be fun," he said…
122_HeroVoice_1036_ST.1036001_HeroVoice_10360404_Lines: What a major malfunction! Arakko needs a reboot! Fast!

122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370328_Lines: "Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair…"
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370178_Lines: Should we fail to reach our goal, an empire falls.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370357_Lines: Should they break or bend in battle, come to me. I shall repair them for you in an instant.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370134_Lines: Do be more careful next time.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370125_Lines: Perhaps something with a bit less metal in it next time, Castle?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370225_Lines: Their vessel shall not pass this point.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370238_Lines: I don't care. No Mutant shall EVER end up in your domain again.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370280_Lines: Two primal forces, merged as one…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370400_Lines: Quite the contrary. I simply want to be the one who is wielding the sword.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370295_Lines: Which is exactly why I cannot "ease up," my friend. Not even for a second.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370326_Lines: Perhaps next year, we should consider a more private affair…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370033_Lines: I am no longer in control.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370248_Lines: Do not forget, my dear. We are Mutants. We are change itself. There is nothing we cannot do.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370016_Lines: Humans are so fond of their golden idols. But all of them shall bow to steel!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370110_Lines: Humans and their weapons of war.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370274_Lines: The cruelty that men are capable of… It never fails to astonish me.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370135_Lines: Do not expect me to do that again.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370360_Lines: We fight today not just for our Mutant brothers and sisters, but for all sentient life!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370013_Lines: Today, we fight as allies. Do not give me reason to alter that arrangement.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370082_Lines: Krakoa stands triumphant this day, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370164_Lines: This day we prove ourselves worthy.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370061_Lines: They will not take what is ours.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370224_Lines: Make sure their path ends here.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370058_Lines: They do not stand a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370092_Lines: I doubt any Hell will be able to hold you for long, Illyana.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370261_Lines: Why would I have to be? I've already disabled the internal mechanisms on all of your weapons.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370361_Lines: As have you, my dear. Perhaps further than any of us could ever hope to fathom.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370228_Lines: The monster in you can transform again? Secondary mutations are quite rare.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370229_Lines: It doesn't matter what you think. The genome matters. If only we could get you to Krakoa for analysis.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370277_Lines: You and I have both lived through war. Had you learned anything from the experience, you would not be so quick to start another.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370252_Lines: You may not be a true Mutant, but you will always be welcome on Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370268_Lines: Do you truly see me as such a threat?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370243_Lines: In that we are both despised by the people we strive to protect and lead?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370088_Lines: Your brother would be proud, Magik.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370245_Lines: You truly believe that you're safe inside a metal shell? Hah! How naïve.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370356_Lines: The craftsmanship of your swords is truly exquisite.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370378_Lines: How long has your so-called King in Black been trapped within the core of this world?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370408_Lines: You are still a Mutant, no matter where you dwell. Would you deny your own people?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370093_Lines: Krakoa will not forget your sacrifice, Captain.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370232_Lines: What does Krakoa have to say about Doom and the Timestream Entanglement?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370403_Lines: You will always have a place on Krakoa, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370346_Lines: Push forward! Arakko's fate hangs in the balance!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370120_Lines: That beacon should not vex us any further.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370175_Lines: Pick up the pace, my dear…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370124_Lines: All that bravado for nothing, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370410_Lines: We welcomed you to our paradise. Should we not expect the same hospitality?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370294_Lines: Merely pondering the fate of our people, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370332_Lines: No more tyrants shall rise while I still breathe!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370083_Lines: Be grateful I did not crush you with your own armor, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370260_Lines: A single copper wire is all I need to strangle you, Stark, should I choose to do so.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370117_Lines: Do clean up your toys, Mister Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370159_Lines: It seems the fates have spoken.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370008_Lines: Alas, we can no longer hide from the dangers that lie beyond our shores.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370363_Lines: Ah, the fire of youth. Charming… but dangerous. You would be wise to follow my lead.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370020_Lines: Ah, now this is an empire I can respect.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370286_Lines: Back to the bottom of the ocean with you!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370250_Lines: I am one of the few who can throw the both of you.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370296_Lines: In my timeline, you are one of the greatest warriors our nation has ever known.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370215_Lines: This is where we make our stand.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370210_Lines: This is where to find them.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370123_Lines: The amplifier is no longer in service.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370007_Lines: I am not the man I used to be. I have found a greater cause.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370271_Lines: That the multiverse is so vast, and yet it is protected by something as insignificant as a spider.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370121_Lines: The space rodent's amplifier is disabled.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370263_Lines: I am going to enjoy taking you apart, Ultron. One bolt at a time.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370327_Lines: This is our land, Ultron. You shall not take it from us!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370237_Lines: …You make me sound like a terrible father when you put it like that.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370264_Lines: If you step out of line, Mister Barnes, I will not hesitate to rip that metallic limb from your body.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370344_Lines: If we surrender now, the dawn will never come!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370235_Lines: If I could create a world that would be safe forever for mutants…yes. I would.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370069_Lines: I would turn around if I were you.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370181_Lines: Objects of such power belong in more worthy hands.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370011_Lines: A threat against Krakoa is a threat against all Mutants. We shall not abide.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370080_Lines: Back to whatever netherworld you crawled out of, child.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370091_Lines: Rest now, my child. Your troubled days are over.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370362_Lines: I have been fighting to protect my people since before you were born, boy…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370334_Lines: There is no one better to protect you than I, little one.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370405_Lines: When I was a boy, you were a symbol of hope in a world where none existed.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370165_Lines: Prepare yourself for the road ahead, little spider.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370272_Lines: Far beyond your feeble comprehension, boy.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370359_Lines: Who needs to lift it when I can reshape its Uru metal and release the cosmic storm within?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370222_Lines: We must help this vehicle advance.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370341_Lines: Quickly! We must venture deeper if we wish to stop Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370387_Lines: An evolution even I could not have predicted… but my fellow Mutants deserve no less.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370111_Lines: The Punisher has upgraded his arsenal.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370407_Lines: Have you made your decision yet, Namor? Do you stand with Krakoa?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370173_Lines: We must open the path if we hope to prevail.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370406_Lines: Hard to say. But I suppose we shall find out soon enough…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370004_Lines: For so long, I fought for Mutantkind's future. Our time has finally arrived.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370063_Lines: We must not delay any longer.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370336_Lines: Let us pay Dracula a visit and end his vile schemes.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370257_Lines: This is but a temporary alliance. However, should you choose to join your Mutant brethren on Krakoa…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370276_Lines: We have found a home in this era. Krakoa is all we need.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370206_Lines: We could do untold damage here.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370377_Lines: Arakko transported itself here to offer a safe haven from the threats posed by mankind.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370002_Lines: Our past was mired in loss and grief, but the future belongs to Mutantkind.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370333_Lines: Our true enemy lies beneath the planet's surface.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370220_Lines: We shall not yield this land.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370014_Lines: It is in the interest of all Mutants that we succeed this day. And so we shall.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370101_Lines: Someone has us in their sights.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370259_Lines: Uhh…We both proudly fight to protect our nations, do we not? I simply feel no need to drape myself in the Krakoan flag to prove my allegiance.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370340_Lines: If we wish to halt Knull's ascent, now is our moment!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370096_Lines: I shall not be removed so easily.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370005_Lines: I will do what it takes to protect my people, no matter the price.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370024_Lines: I shall bide my time. But not for long.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370240_Lines: I am too world-weary to engage hypotheticals, Illyana. The battle before us is enough.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370338_Lines: I know better than any where we must go next. Follow me.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370273_Lines: I am the Mutant Master of Magnetism, not some child's toy for finding lost coins on the beach!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370379_Lines: I have been imprisoned against my will before. It did not end well for those who held me captive.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370239_Lines: I am on the side of the mutants, as always.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370018_Lines: The gods themselves will tremble at my might.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370253_Lines: My helmet is shielded from telepathic intrusion. One can never be too safe.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370155_Lines: You should have kneeled when you had the chance.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370009_Lines: I will never allow Krakoa to suffer the same fate as Genosha.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370113_Lines: Tiny metal creatures skittering about… I can feel them…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370335_Lines: I am invited to Avengers Tower? That is a first…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370254_Lines: And like the Psylocke of my timeline, I am certain you will leave none standing in your wake.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370391_Lines: We have beaten death before on our own. It came at a cost.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370402_Lines: And you have been busy carving your place in it, I suppose?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370230_Lines: It has a way of stripping away our assumptions, yes.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370209_Lines: They shall not escape our wrath now.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370211_Lines: Our foes can be found here.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370160_Lines: There are more of them than expected.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370107_Lines: Strange is toying with reality yet again…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370180_Lines: Humans. Always the oppressors, no matter the era.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370006_Lines: Be wary. No timeline exists where Magneto yields.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370119_Lines: Whatever this beacon was, it is no more.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370130_Lines: The sniper is no longer a concern.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370003_Lines: Perhaps we should give these humans good reason to hate and fear us after all.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370251_Lines: Wanda… Tis a pleasure to see you, my dear.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370078_Lines: You always were a petulant child, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370086_Lines: You have made your father proud, Wanda, my dear.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370236_Lines: Here we are, side-by-side once more. Just like the old days.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370158_Lines: Clearly, you were not destined to win.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370104_Lines: Moon Knight has set a trap.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370116_Lines: Moon Knight's ankh is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370386_Lines: Many have sought to disrupt the peace we have built here on Krakoa. We shall not allow it.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370298_Lines: Curious. Your metal shell does not bend to my whim.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370343_Lines: You will finish your mission, my friend. So swears Magneto.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370114_Lines: Robotic spiders? This should be easy.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370012_Lines: These Dooms still hide themselves behind metal masks? The fools…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370241_Lines: Come to Krakoa, Ilyana. A war is coming, and we could use your sword.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370388_Lines: Let us show these so-called heroes what Mutantkind is truly capable of!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370105_Lines: A gift from Khonshu… or perhaps a curse…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370001_Lines: Charles dreamed of a safe haven for all Mutants. At last, I have made it a reality.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370089_Lines: May your Bright Lady carry you home, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370247_Lines: When has that ever stopped us before, Ororo?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370076_Lines: I wish I could say I was shocked, Ororo…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370084_Lines: The weather has shifted is in your favor, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370095_Lines: Exactly what I hoped to find.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370015_Lines: Just as I forged a nation, I shall wield a weapon fit for a king.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370176_Lines: Budokan is close at hand. Do not stop now.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370284_Lines: The denizens of the deep have been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370010_Lines: It seems extinction is on the agenda once again. How predictable.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370199_Lines: I am not at my best.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370131_Lines: I have removed the sniper from play.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370132_Lines: Our sniper problem has been resolved.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370162_Lines: The odds are not in our favor.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370262_Lines: Now, play nice and perhaps I'll put your toys back together for you.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370409_Lines: An alliance between Krakoa and K'un-Lun might be wise at this juncture.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370170_Lines: Krakoa is at your service, my friends.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370169_Lines: Wakanda has given us this sacred duty.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370168_Lines: Life and Destiny must be preserved.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370127_Lines: Your spiders never stood a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370381_Lines: True. At least, for once, we are not the only ones who are hated and feared.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370179_Lines: It seems Hydra has twisted metal in ways I would never dare.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370299_Lines: A step above a Sentinel, that is for certain.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370188_Lines: I am nearly at full capacity.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370279_Lines: A perfect conduit for your chaos…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370172_Lines: This sacred realm is counting on us.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370411_Lines: Step aside, archer. You are out of your league.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370297_Lines: And once we are done here, I will gladly take you to them, my dear. Krakoa would be delighted to have you.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370342_Lines: Stay close. I will guide you through this steel jungle.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370329_Lines: Knull calls himself a King and a God. But like so many others, he is not worthy of such power.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370281_Lines: What vile creatures Namor has summoned!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370283_Lines: Namor's subjects are tenacious. I'll give them that.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370081_Lines: It seems the tides have turned against you, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370285_Lines: A valiant attempt, Namor. But a failed one.
