122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370376_Lines: A world away, yet my people still cannot find the peace they deserve.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370404_Lines: Give them a chance to know the true you and they will see the error of their ways.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370390_Lines: Tell me why I shouldn't reduce you to scrap this very second, Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370249_Lines: Next time you and Colossus perform your… "Fastball Special"… do remember to call me, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370085_Lines: Your savage side is showing, Logan. How delightful.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370077_Lines: Twisting your bones never grows old, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370401_Lines: We have missed you on Krakoa, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370090_Lines: I never believed I would see this day, Logan…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370144_Lines: Nature itself bends to my will!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370244_Lines: For the moment. At least until you decide mutants don't belong with the rest of humanity again.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370171_Lines: Should we fail, the gods will not be kind.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370380_Lines: Isolating ourselves from the human world doesn't make us less a part of it when threats arise.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370019_Lines: So many webs. A good thing that Magneto is the one pulling the strings.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370167_Lines: Our destination is at hand, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370347_Lines: Fools! We cannot stand idle while Arakko suffers!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370177_Lines: Move swiftly. Wakanda is waiting on us.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370246_Lines: If there is even a trace of metal in that machine's frame, I can find it.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370233_Lines: Should I know who you are?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370221_Lines: None shall take this place from us.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370345_Lines: We must reach the castle, before it is too late!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370021_Lines: This entire world is a living mass. Krakoa would be impressed.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370267_Lines: This place is teeming with life. Yet it feels so… sterile…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370017_Lines: What horrors has hydra dabbled in this time?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370282_Lines: These beasts must belong to Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370325_Lines: How this place makes me long for the forests of Krakoa…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370103_Lines: One of Moon Knight's ankhs, I presume?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370109_Lines: Some sort of turret. How crude.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370412_Lines: What good can a mere arrow possibly do in a war of this scale?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370337_Lines: There are many dangers in this place. But none greater than me.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370157_Lines: All forces are working against you.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370324_Lines: Even the Earth's magnetic fields have been weakened by this curse… Curious…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370275_Lines: Regretfully, I can relate to that sentiment.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370122_Lines: I have disabled that meddlesome amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370118_Lines: The rodent's beacon is naught but scrap now.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370399_Lines: I have known many over the years who would wish to control me.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370099_Lines: Rebirth is a Mutant's greatest gift!
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370128_Lines: The spiders have been sufficiently crushed.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370129_Lines: Metal spiders were not the wisest choice.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370079_Lines: I expected better from you, Sai. What a shame.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370258_Lines: We have been at odds before, Captain, but we are more alike than either of us care to admit.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370339_Lines: Arakko's salvation lies in our hands.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370265_Lines: Asgard is not our concern. We should be fighting on Earth.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370389_Lines: I suppose you'd rather just buy a victory, Emma?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370242_Lines: What could matter more than mutant survival?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370174_Lines: Must I clear the way myself?
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370358_Lines: Should you fall, Thunder God, I shall put that hammer of yours to good use.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370223_Lines: Do what it takes to move this craft forward.
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370193_Lines: Some healing would do me well…
122_HeroVoice_1037_ST.1037001_HeroVoice_10370108_Lines: A mystic doorway. It must be Strange's doing.

122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380006_Lines: Magneto raised me to never stop fighting for what I believe is right.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380382_Lines: Magneto was wise to offer you a chance to ally yourself with Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380097_Lines: I won't make the same mistakes again.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380001_Lines: You don't have to be a witch to find the magic in this world. But it does help.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380245_Lines: Somehow you just made me want to save the universe slightly less.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380057_Lines: We can't let them claim victory.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380213_Lines: We can't give them a win here!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380148_Lines: Good. But I can't stop yet.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380282_Lines: My magic is a far cry from the fury of the Phoenix.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380172_Lines: For the sake of the Web, we have to pick up the pace.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380285_Lines: I pray that you're right, Clint. Because, right now, I could use him more than ever.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380146_Lines: Five is good, but not enough.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380128_Lines: Their sniper wasn't as clever as they thought.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380159_Lines: Where did they all come from?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380076_Lines: Leave the magic to the grown-ups, Illyana.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380248_Lines: Something has changed in you, Illyana. You're not the innocent child I once knew.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380162_Lines: The gods themselves are counting on us.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380252_Lines: Glad to see you're still the same Steve Rogers, no matter which millennium you wake up in.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380319_Lines: Let us hope what we have conjured is enough to defeat Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380241_Lines: But after all these years, you'd think we'd have finally put an end to this madness.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380233_Lines: Control chaos? You really don't understand.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380356_Lines: And I suppose that someone is you? You really believe you would do better than him?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380007_Lines: There's no reason to be afraid of my magic… unless you give me one.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380246_Lines: You mean back when you used children as weapons in your crusade against mankind?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380253_Lines: You came here from the year 2099? But you haven't aged a day, Natasha. What's your secret?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380133_Lines: You can always count on me.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380116_Lines: The beacon has been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380240_Lines: It's good to see you, Clint. I just wish it were under better circumstances.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380320_Lines: It will be nice to see Avengers Tower once more…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380224_Lines: We mustn't let them take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380365_Lines: Without the Phoenix, someone will need to stand against the darkness that plagues this planet.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380170_Lines: Don't lose faith. We can still reach the World Tree.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380255_Lines: Don't. Don't compare. You just spread your light.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380332_Lines: Hurry! Before Ultron overwrites all of Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380169_Lines: Keep moving. The gods will not stay patient for long…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380124_Lines: You've done enough damage for today, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380018_Lines: Even in the depths of space, Wakanda still shines brighter than any star.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380021_Lines: I'm ready to cause some chaos.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380237_Lines: Only if you can defeat Doom and put the timeline back together.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380324_Lines: Mutantkind will not be erased again.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380354_Lines: Stephen believes we still have a chance to reverse this curse. I'm not convinced.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380084_Lines: You need to teach me that spell, Stephen.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380132_Lines: The real magic happens when we work together.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380270_Lines: Well… that took a dark turn…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380380_Lines: In mine, it was you who first opened my eyes to the hero I was always meant to be.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380375_Lines: And in my dimension, they are at war with the Gods themselves.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380009_Lines: The multiverse offers endless possibilities, but only if it survives this chaos.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380256_Lines: You don't want to side with Apocalypse. He'd be worse than Dracula.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380314_Lines: A Celestial…? What dark force could have done such a thing…?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380266_Lines: Amazing. It's a relief to know I haven't been doing all the work myself.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380104_Lines: The Doctor has conjured a portal.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380226_Lines: We must push through to our destination.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380333_Lines: Ultron is like a plague. We must be the cure!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380325_Lines: This time, I'm saving the Mutants, Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380249_Lines: I think I'll just take your word on that one…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380257_Lines: Okay, new rule. How about we steer clear of all would-be tyrants?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380166_Lines: If we can do this, we'll save countless realities.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380327_Lines: If we fail, oblivion will swallow us all.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380017_Lines: Such a strange future. Even I could not have foreseen this.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380082_Lines: You've still got it after all these years, Natasha.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380267_Lines: The universe needs magic like ours to hold it together.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380113_Lines: The ankh has been removed from play.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380087_Lines: Rest easy now. You've earned it… father…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380204_Lines: We could wipe this place off the map…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380323_Lines: We will gladly aid you on your journey, creature.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380331_Lines: Do not hesitate, my furry friend. Destiny awaits!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380110_Lines: Be on the lookout for spider swarms.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380105_Lines: Careful. Strange has opened a rift.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380080_Lines: When I said "no more mutants," I meant you, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380330_Lines: We have to get to the castle and end this curse!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380173_Lines: We need to keep Spider-Zero moving!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380222_Lines: We have to gain control of this area.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380269_Lines: I fear my magic could disrupt Klyntar's ecosystem in unpredictable ways.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380108_Lines: It seems the Punisher has big plans… and bigger guns.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380109_Lines: The Punisher has set up a turret. Take cover.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380122_Lines: The Punisher's weapon is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380168_Lines: Let's hope the Orisha are smiling upon us.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380378_Lines: Fair. My history with Mutantkind hasn't exactly been perfect in any timeline…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380376_Lines: As do I. But perhaps it is finally time we stopped holding back…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380088_Lines: We will avenge you, your majesty.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380223_Lines: We need to defend this location.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380011_Lines: We must stop Doom's schemes before reality unravels around us.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380326_Lines: We must get this essence beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380318_Lines: We must enter the depths below to end Knull's reign.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380212_Lines: It's up to us to protect this place.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380167_Lines: This statue is sacred. We must keep it safe.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380232_Lines: Then we should probably make sure a few of them still exist when this all over.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380207_Lines: I've spotted one of our opponents.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380197_Lines: I think I can push through.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380242_Lines: I know exactly how you feel.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380117_Lines: I have shut down Rocket's beacon.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380263_Lines: I suppose you're right. And where there are flaws…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380013_Lines: Of all the possible realities, this is not the one I expected to find myself in.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380341_Lines: The spells I have mastered are not for novices. They are fueled by pure chaos!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380008_Lines: I've watched entire realities consumed by chaos. I won't let that happen again.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380005_Lines: I've made my share of mistakes, but I'm fighting every day to make amends.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380353_Lines: I once decimated an entire species through an act of magic. I understand their hesitation better than any…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380361_Lines: You hate me because your version of me almost decimated the Mutant population.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380381_Lines: I feel a kinship with you, Namor. The seas are full of darkness and chaos.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380002_Lines: I may be powered by chaos, but I'm trying to bring a bit of order to the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380234_Lines: I know that most Mutants aren't exactly fond of me, but I promise you --
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380259_Lines: I think you know quite enough about chaos as it is.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380357_Lines: How could I possibly refuse? Oh, right. Like this: No. Never. Not in any reality.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380250_Lines: Should I take that as a compliment? Or a warning?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380254_Lines: And I thought my magic worked miracles…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380373_Lines: With you, perhaps. But your fellow Mutants may not be as welcoming.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380239_Lines: We would be better off making a deal with Mephisto.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380283_Lines: Then maybe that's how you and I should go into this battle as well.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380209_Lines: I think I found their hiding spot.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380115_Lines: Sorry to ruin your fun, Khonshu.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380089_Lines: I'm sorry I couldn't save you, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380081_Lines: Sorry. You chose the wrong side, Clint.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380171_Lines: I fear we'll never make it to the shrine at this rate.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380321_Lines: We will not fail you, my little friend. You have my word.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380225_Lines: This vehicle must keep moving, at any cost.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380062_Lines: Time is not on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380340_Lines: The time has come to call on ancient forces to aid us in this battle!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380055_Lines: Time to show them what we've got.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380179_Lines: I thought I was holding reality together all on my own. Glad I was wrong.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380114_Lines: Moon Knight's mysticism was no match for mine.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380315_Lines: Some power is best left contained… permanently…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380231_Lines: Some days Tony, I'm not even sure anymore. I've been lost between realities for so long…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380355_Lines: So many innocents have been turned… and there might not be a spell that can cure them…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380210_Lines: Here. This is the place to attack.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380251_Lines: To be fair, it could also rip the timestream to shreds if I'm not careful.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380228_Lines: I'm afraid this is a dead end.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380083_Lines: It's clear you're still worthy, Thor.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380078_Lines: How was that for a trick, Loki?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380268_Lines: That throne of yours means nothing if your kingdom ceases to exist, Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380156_Lines: As always, chaos comes to my aid.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380004_Lines: Chaos surrounds us. But I will gladly show it who is in control.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380079_Lines: Crawl back to your domain, Hela.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380118_Lines: Rocket's beacon shouldn't be a problem anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380374_Lines: If you knew who I have become, Father, you might not be so certain.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380074_Lines: I hope you can forgive me someday, father…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380262_Lines: What T'Challa has achieved here is nothing short of perfection.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380020_Lines: The Scarlet Witch awaits your call.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380151_Lines: Time for me to take a bow.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380175_Lines: Wakanda does not yield. Nor shall we.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380164_Lines: Life and destiny hang in the balance.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380247_Lines: Then at least we can finally agree on something.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380260_Lines: I wish I could say the same… father…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380312_Lines: I'm honored. In most realities, I wouldn't have gotten an invitation...
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380152_Lines: How dare you waste my time?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380279_Lines: Namor's creatures are no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380278_Lines: Namor's plan was cursed from the start.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380012_Lines: The barriers between dimensions are breaking down. It's up to us to protect them.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380377_Lines: I can see the hate in your eyes, Logan. But I am not the enemy here.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380238_Lines: Who better to put them back together than you and me?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380280_Lines: Do you have a problem with me I should know about, Emma?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380360_Lines: I don't need telepathy to know what you're thinking, Emma.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380310_Lines: I may deal in chaos, but for the sake of this city, order must be restored!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380111_Lines: A spider nest? Watch where your step.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380165_Lines: We will clear the way, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380174_Lines: We will not fail you, Zero. You have my vow.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380284_Lines: If only Pietro were here to share in the moment. But in my timeline… he's gone…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380379_Lines: You're a sight for sore eyes, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380345_Lines: Oddly enough, being surrounded by chaos is the most at home I ever feel.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380261_Lines: Thanks for the invite, but I think I'll pass.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380176_Lines: Bast, give us your blessing… and your speed…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380329_Lines: Stay close! I've never felt such darkness in this city!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380208_Lines: This must be where they gathered.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380019_Lines: The evil on this world… unlike anything I've ever felt before…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380264_Lines: The pain resonating in this place… They've done horrible things to people here.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380016_Lines: Ancient magics permeate this realm. I could get used to it here.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380203_Lines: This spot gives me a strange feeling…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380010_Lines: After all this time, it's nice to finally have some help saving the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380014_Lines: When will these madmen learn that reality isn't their plaything?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380177_Lines: The magic in these stones… Just imagine what they could do…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380059_Lines: This battle is ours to win.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380142_Lines: The end has come. But just for you.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380178_Lines: The ancient energies of the Orisha emanate from this altar…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380077_Lines: Khonshu can't save you this time, Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380372_Lines: This eternal darkness must be consumed by chaos and bathed in endless fire.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380015_Lines: The dark energy that flows through this place… It's chilling…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380313_Lines: Mars may already be the red planet… but it's time to turn it scarlet!
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380121_Lines: That amplifier should be useless now.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380130_Lines: That sniper isn't going to bother us again.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380235_Lines: Then let me fight for it by your side, Ororo. If we can heal the universe, perhaps there's hope for us as well.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380123_Lines: That turret is no longer a concern.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380344_Lines: Then I am thankful you are no longer in that reality.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380281_Lines: Whatever your Wanda Maximoff did, that blood is not on my hands.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380100_Lines: It seems we have a sniper in our midst.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380056_Lines: We have only one choice. To win.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380271_Lines: Shall I add some chaos in the mix?
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380227_Lines: Time to cut their journey short.
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380311_Lines: The Darkhold is near... It's calling to me…
122_HeroVoice_1038_ST.1038001_HeroVoice_10380322_Lines: There's a trail of dark magic leading to the castle. Follow me!

122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390033_Lines: Is "Star-Lord" a title of the Intergalactic Empire?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390030_Lines: Like you have never seen before.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390441_Lines: You have changed much since first we met, Magneto. From righteous villain to selfless protector.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390212_Lines: This beacon has produced its last armor.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390211_Lines: There will be no more revivals!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390074_Lines: A web befitting the Spider-God of your clan! Surely no other beast could have woven it.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390264_Lines: The World-Tree is dying. We must hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390002_Lines: It was on Earth that I truly learned what it was to become a hero.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390005_Lines: I will dare the very gates of Hel to save Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390201_Lines: A one-man castle tower? Destroy it!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390152_Lines: A great and generous king struck down. Avenge him!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390060_Lines: You cannot forsake the people of your own kingdom. I understand that struggle all too well.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390145_Lines: I wish you had always been Asgard's ally.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390072_Lines: Still it is my home, and Loki's scheming could destroy it.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390187_Lines: You are wise beyond your years, mortal. A shame you have so few left ahead of you.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390183_Lines: There are squirrels other than Ratatoskr in Yggdrasill's branches.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390078_Lines: You would tap the very roots of Yggdrasill? For what?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390225_Lines: You have need of my strength!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390326_Lines: What terrors have you called forth, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390046_Lines: What manner of creature are you?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390043_Lines: You look…different than the Natasha I knew.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390293_Lines: Come to this place if you wish to find our foes!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390426_Lines: You are Midgard's goddess of squirrels, are you not?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390039_Lines: So you are the perfect human?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390052_Lines: You were a great leader, and an example to all warriors. I would be proud to fight with you.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390186_Lines: You are one of Midgard's most brilliant minds, Reed Richards. Surely, if any knows how to save the Realm Eternal, 'tis you.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390360_Lines: You are the avatar of a divine being, are you not?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390028_Lines: You have held Mjölnir, you control lightning…mayhap you are Odin's long-lost daughter?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390302_Lines: Your assistance would be a blessing…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390044_Lines: You are she? Time is a trickster.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390423_Lines: A terrifying proposition. I pray to Odin that we triumph so it will never comes to pass…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390080_Lines: You have ensorcelled our father, and painted lies in the palace he built.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390021_Lines: Oh like Hel it wasn't. But I never figured out how could he forget? That bird remembers everything!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390358_Lines: How does a creature so small lift a weapon so large?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390177_Lines: Not even in your wildest of dreams, Lord of Stars.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390296_Lines: Defend this place with all your might.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390222_Lines: No more will the sniper strike!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390118_Lines: Our enemy is ready. Are we?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390420_Lines: All who oppose us shall fall before the might of Mjolnir!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390189_Lines: The weapon you wear is one worthy of a true warrior, mortal.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390040_Lines: Typical mortals, to believe that despite their imperfections they could perfect themselves.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390120_Lines: Repel them! Hold what is ours!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390206_Lines: Approach not the next of spiders!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390405_Lines: Fear not, tiny machine. We shall escort you safely.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390218_Lines: Never fear, the turret is ruined.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390221_Lines: Fear not, the spider nest is gone.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390260_Lines: Fear not, Spider-Zero. We will protect you.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390262_Lines: Through the Hall of Bast we go!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390404_Lines: Onward, to the citadel of Midgard's Mightiest Heroes!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390245_Lines: Strike harder, comrades! You're falling behind!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390306_Lines: Claiming this site will ensure our victory.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390065_Lines: No science can mask the stench of monstrous evil.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390025_Lines: Even here, at the end of all times, you persist with the nicknames.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390424_Lines: Yet another new suit of armor, Stark?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390175_Lines: If any of them can yet speak when we have done!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390351_Lines: Mjolnir can only be lifted by those deemed worthy.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390185_Lines: He will learn. One way or another.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390422_Lines: Mjolnir can only be lifted by those who prove worthy. I fear you are not on that list.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390153_Lines: Preserve but a splinter, and he will regrow!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390050_Lines: A little? Haha! I brought a lot!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390010_Lines: As long as I am worthy, I will raise Mjölnir in defense of what is right.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390139_Lines: Stark. Always led by his pride.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390037_Lines: Stephen, old friend, be mindful that the barrier between Realms is most fragile.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390083_Lines: I am Thor, son of Odin! No watcher, but a warrior!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390439_Lines: Tell me, noble beast… Who has been protecting this sacred forest while I was banished far beyond this realm?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390020_Lines: Brother, remember that time you -haha- picked Munin's feathers clean and Father was FURIOUS!?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390181_Lines: Yes! Haha! Put them to good use.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390359_Lines: Ha! Verily you must jest, rocketeer!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390029_Lines: Banner, 'twill be good to smash villains in your company.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390274_Lines: Hoho, Stark. Even your riches are not eternal.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390325_Lines: Alas, it seems Namor has unleashed his pets…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390339_Lines: If Loki must fall to return this Golden Realm to its proper glory, so be it!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390397_Lines: Ah! Avengers Tower beckons me once more!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390075_Lines: Ah, yes. More akin to the Norns than a true god. Spider-Norns!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390361_Lines: Ah, of the Ennead. The Egyptian pantheon. I was never fond of him. Taweret, however…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390428_Lines: Ah, Namor! 'Tis a joy to have a fellow monarch fighting by my side!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390255_Lines: On, Toothgnasher! On, Toothgrinder! We ride with you!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390191_Lines: My brother only sees beauty in control.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390203_Lines: And armed tower. Let us besiege it!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390200_Lines: Let us ambush our enemies as they emerge!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390292_Lines: This is where they can be found.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390243_Lines: Sit back and watch the Odinson at work!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390126_Lines: Stand fast! We have nearly won.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390234_Lines: Awaken, fury, and smite the foe!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390386_Lines: The sun shall rise again on this fair city! So swears Thor!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390067_Lines: By Odin's beard, what spider lives in that sky-spanning web?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390077_Lines: Look well on Asgard's beauty, Queen of Hel, for you will never possess it.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390137_Lines: Now she tastes what she has served to so many others.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390073_Lines: If Mjölnir should fall from my hand, I know someone worthy will pick it up and go on.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390179_Lines: Doom is no threat to Asgard…but Loki is.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390354_Lines: They have slain immortals? Then perhaps they will prove worthy after all…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390209_Lines: We are safe from the ankh once more.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390340_Lines: Rest well, All-Father. I shall deal with your mischievous child while you slumber.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390356_Lines: They say you plunged your fist into the heart of a dragon, child.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390353_Lines: Be wary, friend. Few mortal weapons can wound the gods!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390194_Lines: Beware! We are in the sights of a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390055_Lines: We were inseparable as children, you and I.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390035_Lines: Wizard! I thought you were imprisoned on another plane.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390140_Lines: Sorcery is no match for a good hammer.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390006_Lines: I was exiled from Asgard as a youth. Now I would lay down my life to save it.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390041_Lines: Archer! I hope you don't plan to miss today.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390056_Lines: Did we not always imagine this, brother? Battling side by side with the fate of the realms at stake?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390151_Lines: The mighty oceans' king has fallen!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390031_Lines: I know many lords on many worlds, Peter Quill. None of them mention you. What are you lord of, precisely?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390121_Lines: Our foes will not yield unless we force them!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390261_Lines: This sacred carving of Bast must reach King T'Challa!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390143_Lines: Run away home, little spider. Your neighborhood needs you.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390408_Lines: Hurry! We must purge Ultron's influence from this place!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390406_Lines: Come! We must remove the vampire plague from this blessed realm!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390350_Lines: I fear that role is filled as well, my friend. You gaze upon him now.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390174_Lines: Milady, I could never.Twould crush your spirits.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390150_Lines: No! Though she be my sworn enemy, we have need of her today.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390013_Lines: My heart hurts for my brother, but that will not stop me from defending Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390012_Lines: I was born to battle, but I have learned to love peace as well.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390427_Lines: I too am proud to call a squirrel my ally! Ratatoskr, the rodent who calls the World Tree home!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390438_Lines: I too have a trusty hound. He is called Thori, and he is as ferocious as he is loyal!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390403_Lines: We must move swiftly, before Knull rises once more!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390401_Lines: The damage that Ultron has wrought upon this land must be undone!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390310_Lines: We must forge ahead with haste!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390259_Lines: We must escort Spider Zero to the Budokan.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390309_Lines: We must move this vessel ever forward!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390124_Lines: We must seize our victory now!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390336_Lines: We were family once. Perhaps, one day, we can mend our wounds…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390267_Lines: We have less time than I had hoped. Onward, quickly!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390400_Lines: We shall not stand idly by while Ultron lays claim to this sovereign land.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390399_Lines: We shall have words with the lord of the vampires. Strong words.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390272_Lines: This should be mine. But first, Doom must be broken, and Loki with him.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390059_Lines: I will preserve it…and then you and I will have our reckoning.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390064_Lines: I have heard tales of Wakanda's glory. The storytellers did not lie.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390160_Lines: I am Thor Odinson, god of thunder!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390009_Lines: I am the God of Thunder and the mightiest Avenger!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390231_Lines: I came, I saw, I smote!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390387_Lines: What cruel fate has befallen my beloved Midgard?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390249_Lines: Canst thou fly? I think not!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390007_Lines: My brother Loki imperils not just Asgard, but all the Realms.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390337_Lines: My brother's lies know no bounds. And he himself knows no shame!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390036_Lines: That's what I said in the Tower of Solitude.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390335_Lines: Brother or not, I shall remove the usurper from Yggsgard's throne!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390394_Lines: I shall show Knull that a true god brings light, not darkness!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390352_Lines: I have met Khonshu. Pardon me if I do not take his word.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390034_Lines: I knew numerous princes and marquises from Nordic Midgard…Harald Fairhair, Eric Bloodaxe. Your father must be a great king.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390071_Lines: Perhaps new ownership is called for.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390042_Lines: A little joke before battle. Nevermind.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390180_Lines: If we are to defeat Loki, we must win a battle of minds as well as arms.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390402_Lines: Make way! We journey into mystery!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390258_Lines: Protect Spider-Zero as she journeys toward the Shrine of the Weaver!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390407_Lines: We shall not fail you, Ratatoskr. This, I pledge!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390184_Lines: Asgard is not a place to be taken. It is a people to be led.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390027_Lines: Mjölnir brings the wrath of the Odinforce to our enemies!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390193_Lines: An enemy strikes from great distance!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390192_Lines: We face a deadly enemy from afar.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390022_Lines: Whatever bargain you think you struck with Loki, he will betray you.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390224_Lines: Worry no more! The sniper is gone.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390334_Lines: I should have expected. Loki and Hela do make the perfect pair.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390270_Lines: Time grows very short. T'Challa, we are coming!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390341_Lines: Mighty Gungnir is but a relic collecting dust. Odin would be ashamed.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390347_Lines: Perhaps the only thing heavier than my hammer, old friend.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390357_Lines: Not yet… but if my foolish brother awakens the Midgard Serpent…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390256_Lines: Long has Yggdrasill protected Asgard. Now we must save the World-Tree.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390084_Lines: What group of heroes would not be strengthened by Thor?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390048_Lines: Does anyone wish to find out if they're worthy? Come on, it'd be fun ;D
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390038_Lines: It is always reassuring to have you in Midgard.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390421_Lines: Aye. But alas, both Stormbreaker and Jarnbjorn are currently in other hands, my friend.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390017_Lines: Doom must answer for what he has done to Asgard, and all other worlds.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390015_Lines: Come, dine with me in Valhalla!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390149_Lines: Just like my brother to leave when we need him most.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390146_Lines: A storm of acorns! Well fought!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390190_Lines: Together, perhaps we will be strong enough to knock my accursed brother from the throne he usurped.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390159_Lines: What battle can continue without Thor?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390287_Lines: Be wary of this location, friends…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390188_Lines: Loki lies, even to himself. And if you believe him, you are lying to yourself.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390338_Lines: Loki's deceptions are but a thin veil. Truth always triumphs in the end.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390328_Lines: Back to the depths, spawn of Monstro!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390068_Lines: T'Challa, this is marvelous place. You should be proud.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390289_Lines: Let us do glorious damage to this place!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390220_Lines: I have destroyed the spider nest.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390388_Lines: The time for pageantry has come to an end already? A shame…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390333_Lines: It seems the throne has not humbled my brother in the slightest…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390003_Lines: The true warrior is not defined by strength, but by courage.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390266_Lines: The shrine approaches…but are we too late?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390442_Lines: While the men of science prattle on, we shall take this fight to the streets!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390082_Lines: Verily, Thor Odinson is eager for battle.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390324_Lines: What foul creature has Namor summoned now?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390308_Lines: They shall not take this land from us!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390307_Lines: Do not let them seize control of this place!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390297_Lines: Do not dare to surrender this site.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390176_Lines: Mjölnir does not "shoot lightning." It channels the unfettered power of the great cosmic mother storm!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390069_Lines: And my pride will be fighting on your side this day.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390348_Lines: I will gather my own board and take them over! Hostilely!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390390_Lines: Few beings have the power to best a Celestial in combat. This does not bode well…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390425_Lines: Mjolnir has remained the same since the very day it was forged!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390349_Lines: The flames of Surtur are more than enough to warm this realm.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390196_Lines: Tis best to destroy these ankhs if there is time.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390213_Lines: Whatever this device did, it will do no more.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390076_Lines: Now we fight to save what you would destroy.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390019_Lines: This changes nothing about the reckoning you must face for what you have done to Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390001_Lines: I am Asgardian, but I feel a deep kinship with the mortals of Earth.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390063_Lines: Though battles take me across the stars, my heart is here, and always will be.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390257_Lines: Whatever you must do, Spider-Zero, we will get you there to do it.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390016_Lines: Yggdrasil be praised!  What an epic gathering across Realms it brought!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390045_Lines: Up to his usual betrayals. After this we must smite him.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390303_Lines: I require aid… and perhaps mead…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390004_Lines: Though I be a god, I would rather inspire mortals than be worshiped.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390265_Lines: We are not close! Hurry to the master weaver!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390440_Lines: I was told this was to be a day of revelry! Yet chaos has reared its head once more.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390329_Lines: The oceanic onslaught is over at last!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390047_Lines: Strange allies this war has brought together.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390070_Lines: This is where you were kept?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390178_Lines: It is my home. We must save it.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390066_Lines: Such a hellish place could only give rise to monsters.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390295_Lines: This shall be our field of battle!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390011_Lines: When all seems lost, just listen for the sound of thunder.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390268_Lines: Too little time for the distance that remains. Hurry!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390079_Lines: And when the World-Tree is drained, and perishes? What of your plan then?
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390443_Lines: Then perhaps you can enlighten me as to the meaning behind his perplexing words…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390409_Lines: Make haste, before Ultron's corruption spreads further.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390396_Lines: Little man of metal, you shall be our champion this day!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390230_Lines: My hammer fell…and so did you, ha!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390166_Lines: My power is nearly ready to unleash.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390355_Lines: Captain. You honor Yggsgard with your presence.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390312_Lines: Their chariot must go no further.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390389_Lines: Arakko lies beyond the Ten Realms, but I shall protect it nonetheless!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390081_Lines: Asgardians have ever been warlike, yet only you have ever set against your own kind.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390273_Lines: Much has been lost in Asgard…but much might yet be reclaimed.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390342_Lines: Asgard's most sacred artifacts, endangered by this needless chaos.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390008_Lines: Asgardians NEVER shrink from battles or feasts.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390429_Lines: Yggsgard's warriors currently answer to my brother, Loki… but that is soon to change…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390271_Lines: Asgard's heritage, swept up and hidden away by my brother's greed.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390167_Lines: I wield the power of Asgard!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390058_Lines: If you will curb your cynical tongue.
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390133_Lines: Mjölnir strikes a heavy blow, ha!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390014_Lines: Mjornir, let Heven and Hel hear thy soar!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390198_Lines: A magical gate. Strange is coming…
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390053_Lines: Hawkeye! We go into battle together!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390395_Lines: This world's dark king shall not reign again! We shall make sure of it!
122_HeroVoice_1039_ST.1039001_HeroVoice_10390391_Lines: King of Darkness, you will kneel before the God of Thunder!

122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400245_Lines: … I'm not sure you want me to answer that.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400357_Lines: That's a far more permanent solution than I'm willing to consider.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400264_Lines: The same as always, Adam. A universal truth that can unite us all and bring an end to this madness.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400356_Lines: We need to come up with a formula to reverse the vampiric effects on innocent civilians.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400007_Lines: Everything eventually ends. I'm here to make sure this is not the day that it does.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400157_Lines: Next time, I won't be so kind.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400131_Lines: Our sniper may think twice before trying that again.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400270_Lines: Not just Spider-Men. Each parallel universe contains its own variation on every single one of us. In fact, I've met hundreds of versions of myself.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400238_Lines: Science alone may not be enough to win us this battle, Stephen.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400198_Lines: No need to worry about me.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400061_Lines: They can't be allowed to seize control.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400226_Lines: Do not let them claim this site.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400230_Lines: Bring their progress to a halt.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400099_Lines: I won't rest until this is solved.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400002_Lines: There's a solution for every problem if you just look hard enough.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400167_Lines: We need to reach that nexus point, for the sake of all realities.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400135_Lines: The only way we win this is together.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400077_Lines: I'll never forgive myself for this, Susan.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400015_Lines: What Hydra is doing here is unethical by any standard.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400372_Lines: I haven't. But my elastic skin has prevented any puncture wounds thus far.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400275_Lines: A Timestream Reintegration Device may be our only hope to mend the damage the Dooms have caused.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400083_Lines: Perhaps Hulk could have bested me. But not you, Bruce.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400151_Lines: What I'm doing is clearly working.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400166_Lines: You can count on us, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400011_Lines: A choice between two Dooms isn't much of a choice at all.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400161_Lines: The numbers aren't in our favor.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400122_Lines: That amplifier won't be of much use to them now.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400172_Lines: The gods may not be on our side, but we won't let that stop us.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400276_Lines: By my estimates, five to ten years.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400365_Lines: You said you wanted to go dancing, then get a little action. That's exactly what we're doing.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400250_Lines: You actually posted it on social media right after and TAGGED, like, EVERYONE, remember? And Silver Surfer doesn't have a handle, by the way. Although theoretically Power Cosmic SHOULD give him access to any form of info network in the universe…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400271_Lines: It must be hard to know that Hydra is still a threat, after all you did to stop them during the war.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400306_Lines: You know the program, H.E.R.B.I.E. Let's get you to the Tower.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400073_Lines: The odds weren't in your favor.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400258_Lines: Speak my wife's name and you'll find our alliance will be over far sooner than you anticipated.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400078_Lines: Your sister is not going to be happy about this, Johnny.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400374_Lines: That's quite the complex suit for such a young girl to operate. I'm impressed.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400145_Lines: Not your best effort, I'm afraid.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400354_Lines: Is there any chance you could absorb this darkness into the Darkforce Dimension?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400260_Lines: Have you ever considered using those talents to save the universe instead?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400280_Lines: Keep your tentacles to yourself, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400375_Lines: Well, we could use a voice like yours while we try to solve this Darkhold dilemma.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400094_Lines: You deserved far better than that, Peter. I'm sorry.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400084_Lines: I'm afraid your rule has come to an end, T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400089_Lines: You've made me believe in magic, Stephen.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400239_Lines: You're really going to make me say it out loud aren't you?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400274_Lines: Are you sure? What if Hydra implanted something inside of you?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400112_Lines: Some sort of advanced assault cannon…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400249_Lines: Actually, I was hoping you could offer your opinion on my designs, Peter.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400244_Lines: Actually, I'm formulating hundreds of potential stratagems at the moment, Johnny.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400188_Lines: I'm not quite ready. Keep stretching.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400058_Lines: We have quite a battle ahead of us.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400362_Lines: It won't be that easy. Knull doesn’t have the same weaknesses as his creations.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400190_Lines: My power level is nearly sufficient…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400059_Lines: It's on us to secure the area.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400004_Lines: Even in the face of cosmic cataclysm, every one of us can make a difference.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400016_Lines: Even I have trouble fully grasping the majesty of this place.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400173_Lines: We don't need anyone's blessing to reach the finish line.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400310_Lines: Ultron can be purged from Arakko, if we act fast.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400308_Lines: If we can break this curse, the city still has a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400341_Lines: And Celestial armor is forged from a cosmic equivalent of the same metal.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400107_Lines: Stephen is bending the fabric of space.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400339_Lines: I'm willing to explore any advantages we have available, Stephen.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400242_Lines: Doom would probably say something similar.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400259_Lines: I've heard that you have a background in computer science. Is that correct?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400253_Lines: No… but when you think about it, what could be more romantic than saving the universe side-by-side?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400355_Lines: A shame. We're running out of options… and time…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400252_Lines: Ah, now I see why Susan insisted I bring my sonic wave generator.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400257_Lines: It's a rare occasion when you and I see things the same way, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400227_Lines: We can't risk losing control of this location.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400317_Lines: Stay strong! This curse must be broken!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400282_Lines: A waste of innocent sea life…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400300_Lines: When Celestials fall, what comes next is never pretty…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400287_Lines: A fact I'm certain we all feel grateful for, Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400318_Lines: If we fail, Ultron and Arakko become one!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400285_Lines: Would you still love me if I said "not yet"?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400179_Lines: If we fail T'Challa, we risk failing everyone.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400290_Lines: If anyone can mange that, Adam, it's you.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400235_Lines: If Doom can do it, we certainly can too.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400340_Lines: If Knull has the means to slay a Celestial, we don't stand much of a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400001_Lines: I've seen wonders out there in the cosmos few humans will ever behold.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400116_Lines: The ankh's power has been neutralized.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400305_Lines: Let's deliver this essence beneath the surface and end Knull's reign for good.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400049_Lines: Not even Ben could hurt me.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400334_Lines: I'm glad you're here, Bruce. We could use someone with your special skills.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400272_Lines: Let's just hope two more don't grow back in their place.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400132_Lines: The sniper has been removed from play.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400288_Lines: Yes. But I also see how quickly you would turn those resources against us.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400081_Lines: I assure you, I took no pleasure in that, Peter.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400087_Lines: Glad I wasn't late for clobbering time, Ben.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400289_Lines: Dracula used the Darkhold to bend the laws of nature themselves.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400171_Lines: This sacred carving of Bast must reach its destination.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400314_Lines: We need to get H.E.R.B.I.E. to Avengers Tower at once!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400231_Lines: We need to reduce their momentum.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400358_Lines: I'm afraid there's still no evident scientific solution to our vampire problem…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400126_Lines: The Punisher's turret is no longer in service.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400111_Lines: The Punisher has assembled quite the weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400228_Lines: We must push forward if we hope to prevail.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400006_Lines: Winning isn't always about hitting harder. Sometimes, it's about thinking harder.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400092_Lines: I'll find a way to bring you back, Ben. I promise…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400291_Lines: I've been working on a cure… but nothing viable yet, I'm afraid.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400091_Lines: Your sacrifice won't be in vain, Johnny.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400286_Lines: As would I, my dear… As would I…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400018_Lines: I thought the Wakanda on Earth was ahead of its time. But this…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400062_Lines: We have what it takes to succeed.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400168_Lines: Count on us to clear a safe path, Spider-Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400208_Lines: We can cause significant damage here.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400215_Lines: This is where we fight back.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400225_Lines: We need to secure this location.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400067_Lines: We have to see this through to the end.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400136_Lines: We've got to look out for one another.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400178_Lines: The longer we take, the more the odds shift against Wakanda.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400347_Lines: We are on the same team here, aren't we? That data could save billions of lives.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400316_Lines: We're this city's only hope. Don't give up now!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400174_Lines: Some additional acceleration would be ideal.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400236_Lines: We could really use a mind like Dr. Banner's right about now…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400211_Lines: Our opponents are at this location.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400176_Lines: We're moving too slowly. But we won't fail you, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400097_Lines: I'm not ready to give up yet.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400298_Lines: I've never been one for high society events… but this could be interesting…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400348_Lines: I've heard that said before. But you’re welcome to disagree if you wish.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400346_Lines: I would be curious to see the data you've gathered on the Timestream Entanglement.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400247_Lines: I expected as much. Which is why I was hoping to talk to Shuri.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400292_Lines: I was hoping it wouldn't come to that, T'Challa. But you may be right.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400261_Lines: I never tried. But another set of axons and dendrites did. You owe your existence to us.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400005_Lines: My inventions have saved worlds, but the best thing I ever built was my family.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400098_Lines: There's still more work to be done.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400008_Lines: My ultimate goal is simple. Solve everything. So... let's get started.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400267_Lines: I have some ideas… but as a man of science, I've learned to admit that some forces are beyond my comprehension or control.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400100_Lines: I'm more resilient than you think.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400307_Lines: I have complete faith in your ability to complete this mission, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400376_Lines: I believe Ben has that covered. But thank you anyway.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400115_Lines: I've located a nest of synthetic spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400363_Lines: I know how bright you can burn, Johnny… and I'm afraid even that might not be enough…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400269_Lines: I knew Intergalactic Empire Of Wakandan technologically was advanced, but what you've built here is astounding.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400169_Lines: I've done the math, Zero. There's no room for failure.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400093_Lines: I'll carry on our work, Tony. You have my word.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400283_Lines: Perhaps we can still convince these Victors of the error of their ways…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400014_Lines: In a situation as unpredictable as this, it's important to remain flexible.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400343_Lines: All signs point to a being on par with Galactus… yet not quite the same…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400124_Lines: Sorry, Rocket. I couldn't let that amplifier stay on-line.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400337_Lines: Sorry, but I'll put my faith in science over sorcery any day, Loki.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400119_Lines: Rocket's beacon has been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400214_Lines: This is the best place to strike.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400163_Lines: There are more of them than I anticipated.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400268_Lines: An entire galactic empire of your own? I'm impressed, T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400064_Lines: Time isn't working in our favor.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400106_Lines: An ankh. It must belong to Moon Knight.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400297_Lines: Time to end this curse and take back our home!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400125_Lines: I prefer less violent solutions, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400206_Lines: I would advise using caution here.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400103_Lines: They have tactical advantage. A sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400342_Lines: My scanners have picked up on a cosmic being watching us from afar, Ben…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400012_Lines: Victor's meddling in the timestream never ends well for anyone. Especially him.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400312_Lines: No time to waste. We have to deliver this underground!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400359_Lines: I suppose it's never a bad thing to give some other muscles a stretch.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400086_Lines: You really turned up the heat, Johnny.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400121_Lines: Rocket's beacon won't be a concern anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400170_Lines: T'Challa has put his faith in us.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400246_Lines: T'Challa. Tony and I are working on something big, but we can't do it alone.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400241_Lines: T'Challa. Is the empire everything you ever wanted?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400141_Lines: My hypothesis was correct. You failed.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400265_Lines: Yes. It seems your legacy survives well into the future, Tony.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400013_Lines: This may be one problem I can't solve through brainpower alone.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400088_Lines: I suppose this version of you does have its benefits, Bruce.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400130_Lines: A shame to destroy such advanced spider-tech…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400263_Lines: It's good to know our goals are aligned. Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400377_Lines: Indeed. Which is exactly why I think your… skills… are of better use to us elsewhere.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400009_Lines: When scientific resolutions prove insufficient, giant fists do come in handy.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400237_Lines: By the time you decide to give Bruce control again, it may be too late.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400301_Lines: Knull could very well bring about the end of all that is. We can't allow that.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400304_Lines: Knull is the end of everything. We can't let him win.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400313_Lines: Knull's return is imminent… unless we act now!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400336_Lines: If I had a quantum converter, I could build us a device capable of --
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400182_Lines: With full access to the information here, I could solve everything… in time...
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400255_Lines: Victor has always had a way of bringing chaos to our doorstep.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400281_Lines: Perhaps you should do your own fighting, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400349_Lines: Reading a quantum equation and understanding it are two totally different things, Emma.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400090_Lines: Susan… I don't know if I can go on without you…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400364_Lines: You look disappointed, Sue. Have I done something wrong?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400370_Lines: I can handle this, Sue. You should head back to the Baxter Building at once. It's safer there.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400338_Lines: I hate to admit it, but science alone might not get us through this one.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400256_Lines: Not the most eloquent of solutions, Ben. But I'll certainly allow it.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400248_Lines: If we want to end this, we're going to need our most brilliant minds on the case.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400262_Lines: If we want to solve this crisis, we'll need to put our differences aside.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400273_Lines: I'd like to run a few tests on you when this is all over, James.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400309_Lines: Time to take this fight to the source: Dracula himself.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400082_Lines: To be honest, Namor, that was a long time coming.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400315_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E. must complete his program. No more delays!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400251_Lines: I hope so. But solving a problem this big will push me to my mental limits.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400373_Lines: Next time, you might not be as lucky. Better be careful out there…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400140_Lines: My friend Ben taught me that one.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400079_Lines: I really didn't want it to end this way, Ben.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400224_Lines: This site is essential to our efforts.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400017_Lines: This future is even more fascinating than I could have imagined.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400311_Lines: This core should remove all traces of Ultron from Arakko.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400085_Lines: After all these years, you still find ways to impress me, Susan.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400181_Lines: Let's hope they're still using Tony's name for good after all these years.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400113_Lines: These spiders… What a fascinating design…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400118_Lines: That should limit Moon Knight's power.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400010_Lines: This crisis is stretching me to my limits. And that's saying something.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400279_Lines: These creatures may be the spawn of Monstro!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400175_Lines: Is this vehicle capable of moving any faster?
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400212_Lines: You're likely to find our enemies here.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400019_Lines: This entire biome is writhing with life. I can't wait to take some samples.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400299_Lines: What a fascinating ecosphere. I hope it survives long enough for me to study it further.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400240_Lines: Oh, it's FANTASTIC, King T'Challa! Your sister's data on astronomy is… unparalleled!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400165_Lines: The fate of this realm depends on our success.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400154_Lines: Certainly not the outcome I expected.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400149_Lines: I seem to be on a roll.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400177_Lines: The nexus is close. We mustn't give up now.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400296_Lines: It's hard to solve a problem when the laws of nature and physics no longer apply…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400104_Lines: This ankh is radiating supernatural energy…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400127_Lines: The turret can't harm us any longer.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400133_Lines: That sniper shouldn't be bothering us again.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400371_Lines: Fair enough. Then we'll face this crisis the same way we always have. Together.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400284_Lines: We'll just have to win this the way we always do. Together.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400110_Lines: That turret is unusually large. Even for you, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400319_Lines: Arakko doesn't have much longer. We need to move!
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400114_Lines: Hmm. An army of artificial arachnids…
122_HeroVoice_1040_ST.1040001_HeroVoice_10400080_Lines: Your ego got in your way, Tony. As always.

122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410255_Lines: You know, "God Puncher" does have a nice ring to it…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410338_Lines: The worst monsters of all. Hydra.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410013_Lines: I'll do what's needed to win this, even if it does mean taking out former allies.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410175_Lines: We have to finish the mission. For Wakanda.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410260_Lines: Hydra did give me weird arm tentacles when they experimented on me here. Maybe they were cousins of yours.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410266_Lines: Hydra isn't exactly known for their ethical treatment of test subjects.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410095_Lines: Been knocked down before. Doesn't last.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410090_Lines: If they can take out Logan, any one of us could be next.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410097_Lines: You thought I was gone for good?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410237_Lines: Steve, buddy, we have to save the world.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410290_Lines: This nonsense better not have spread to the other boroughs…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410263_Lines: You'll get the full VIP tour for sure. 100% satisfaction or your money back.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410337_Lines: Assassins like us belong to a pretty exclusive club.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410245_Lines: Guys who look surprisingly good for how old they actually are?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410273_Lines: Do you have a plan to stop him?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410374_Lines: Live with bionic body parts as long as I have, and you learn that anything can be hacked.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410327_Lines: First Krakoa, now this? Ultron's outdone himself.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410328_Lines: Krakoa is in serious need of a system reboot!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410088_Lines: Wish I could have saved you like you saved me, Clint.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410228_Lines: I owe you one for rescuing me from Hydra, Clint.
