122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410219_Lines: This is our turf. Protect it.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410331_Lines: A planet of symbiotes? Wasn't Venom enough?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410161_Lines: We've got our orders. Let's get to that tree.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410353_Lines: Ice powers? What the heck are you talking about, kid?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410231_Lines: Keep your cool, Frank. We're the good guys.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410298_Lines: Ready? Let's get this to the planet's core!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410269_Lines: Easy, fella. I didn't mean any harm. Don't bite, okay? I've already lost one limb too many.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410174_Lines: Hold tight, Zero. We'll get you back on course.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410265_Lines: Not gonna happen, kid. If Hydra made it, it's nothing but trouble. Trust me.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410217_Lines: Don't back down until this site is ours.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410258_Lines: It's got all the bells and whistles, T'Challa. But I still kinda miss the arm I was born with.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410172_Lines: Never gonna make to the shrine if we don't speed up…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410169_Lines: Pick up the pace. I don't want to make the gods angry.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410108_Lines: Wish I had a gun like that, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410078_Lines: Compared to me, you're an amateur, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410244_Lines: Wouldn't be the first time. I beat it before, I'll do it again. On my own terms.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410155_Lines: I'll take the win either way.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410312_Lines: Just thinking about what they did to me here…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410351_Lines: The only way to stop Hydra is to get to Maveth.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410275_Lines: Long as they don't replace any more parts of me.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410007_Lines: As long as there's still something worth fighting for, I'll be on the front lines.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410122_Lines: A shame to trash such a beautiful weapon, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410357_Lines: Steve and T'Challa gave it to me. Why?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410226_Lines: Steve got it for me. It's from the future.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410271_Lines: This is some future you woke up in, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410087_Lines: War's not over, Steve. You can't stand down yet.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410249_Lines: We're not the same as we used to be, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410248_Lines: Wow. When you put it like that, it really kills the nostalgia.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410268_Lines: Wow. I thought Hydra did some weird experiments on me… but look at you…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410362_Lines: Well, they've got a lot more arms than I do. But hopefully, one will be enough!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410227_Lines: Well, suddenly, I'm feeling pretty darn good.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410250_Lines: Huh…I hope it goes better than that.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410259_Lines: Until then, I guess a Vibranium super-weapon will have to do!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410308_Lines: Hang on, H.E.R.B.I.E. We'll help you finish your program.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410222_Lines: We need to block their path.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410360_Lines: I appreciate the offer, but I'm not looking to add anyone else to the guest list.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410301_Lines: Been a while since I've visited Avengers Tower.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410170_Lines: If we stop now, Asgard doesn't have a prayer.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410089_Lines: Natasha! You can't go out this way…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410241_Lines: You don't look a day older than the last time I saw you, Nat.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410113_Lines: I took the ankh off the board.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410373_Lines: Stay on guard, kid. You don't want Ultron to worm his way into your suit.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410299_Lines: Careful. This is Knull's essence we're moving here.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410100_Lines: Heads up. They got a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410165_Lines: We'll clear ya a path, Spider. Don't worry.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410179_Lines: Guys like this make it hard for me to get my job done.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410075_Lines: This is where we part ways, Clint.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410012_Lines: Time has claimed a lot of good soldiers. I won't let it take any more.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410334_Lines: I guess. Just a few more heads.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410300_Lines: I hope this little robot has what it takes.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410310_Lines: This mythical squirrel better know what it's doing…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410341_Lines: In taking over a living island with a techno-virus? I'll pass. Thanks.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410348_Lines: Glad I'm not stuck in one of those tubes anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410364_Lines: I'm no one's puppet, Frost. Let go of my strings, unless you want to get strangled by them.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410178_Lines: Only the strongest survive? I think I'm up for the challenge…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410367_Lines: Never imagined this when we were playing in the Brooklyn schoolyard, huh, old timer?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410368_Lines: 'Til the end of the line, Steve. Some things always stay the same…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410235_Lines: It was a long time ago. We're both here now.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410311_Lines: Drac expects us to give up. Let's prove him wrong.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410109_Lines: The Punisher has some serious ordinance.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410306_Lines: If we want to stop Knull, the time is now!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410008_Lines: I'm not a symbol like Steve. I'm just a soldier trying to do his job.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410001_Lines: I'm not anyone's sidekick. What I do is best done alone.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410076_Lines: Sorry. Can't let feelings get in the way, Nat.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410152_Lines: I don't hold grudges. I end them.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410153_Lines: You made my list. But now you're off it.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410056_Lines: Nothing's gonna stand in our way.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410216_Lines: We need to capture this location.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410307_Lines: We finish what we started and take Knull off the board.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410309_Lines: We're not gonna let New York down. Understood?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410060_Lines: We can win this. Who's with me?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410185_Lines: I'll be back in action soon.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410253_Lines: I'm kind of hoping the volcano erupts.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410016_Lines: I'm a soldier. All this stuff with celestial beings is way above my rank.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410229_Lines: I said I owe you one.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410084_Lines: I love watching you work, Widow.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410054_Lines: I knew we could do it.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410267_Lines: I lived through it once. I'd rather not do it again…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410372_Lines: I hear you. A vamp just tried to bite my metal arm. Broke both fangs clean off!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410079_Lines: Told you to keep your paws off, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410014_Lines: My past may be pretty cloudy, but if we don't win this, the future is pretty clear.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410005_Lines: I've done unspeakable things. I hope it's not too late to set them right.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410354_Lines: I… think something may have gotten lost in translation…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410242_Lines: I know what you mean. All too well. So, let's just enjoy this moment… before it's gone…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410339_Lines: It's what I was built for, Ben. Whether I want it or not.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410206_Lines: I've got eyes on an enemy.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410176_Lines: I'm not about to let T'Challa down. Keep fighting!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410234_Lines: I seem to recall that you used to be on our side. Or did your days as an Invader mean nothing to you?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410361_Lines: I'm still getting used to it, but it seems to be doing the trick so far.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410230_Lines: My performance record as an assassin shouldn't make me anyone's role model.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410091_Lines: War is no place for a kid, Spidey. I would know…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410002_Lines: The battlefield may change, but the war never ends.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410352_Lines: The battle doesn't end here. Hydra's plans go way deeper…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410148_Lines: So… Ah, am I doing all the work here?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410059_Lines: This is our chance. Let's move!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410115_Lines: Sorry about your little ankh, Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410262_Lines: Wow. And I thought Hydra was insufferable…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410221_Lines: Keep pushing ahead. No matter what.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410124_Lines: Time to put your toys away, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410164_Lines: I'll get you to your web, kid. You have my word.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410209_Lines: You can find our enemies here.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410106_Lines: Fancy trick you conjured up, Strange.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410105_Lines: Strange made some kind of magic door.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410314_Lines: Hydra's been a thorn in my side for way too long…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410061_Lines: If we're gonna do this, it needs to be now.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410335_Lines: Yeah. By the looks of it, they called the wrong one of us Iron Fist, kid.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410355_Lines: Yeah…jumping timelines feels just like those stints in cryostasis.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410342_Lines: I hate it when the evil machine's logic actually makes sense.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410103_Lines: Moon Knight dropped one of his toys.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410003_Lines: Sometimes I wish I could go back into the deep freeze for a few more decades.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410319_Lines: Kinda makes me wish I hadn't given Steve his shield back.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410204_Lines: We can bring out the big guns here.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410187_Lines: My arm's itching for a fight.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410123_Lines: Bigger guns don't always mean better ones.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410009_Lines: Weapons keep getting better, but it's still the person behind them that matters most.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410291_Lines: Okay, this night is getting a bit too long for my tastes.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410270_Lines: Forget about it. We'll be on our way soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410074_Lines: A shame it had to end this way, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410015_Lines: Didn't think I'd be back here so soon. But here we go…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410010_Lines: And here I thought the second world war was a nightmare…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410386_Lines: Guess I didn't need to buff it after all.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410019_Lines: A whole world of alien tentacles? Somehow I feel right at home…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410116_Lines: Whatever this beacon is, it's done.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410232_Lines: You can't have my new arm, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410048_Lines: About time I got a shield.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410168_Lines: Wakanda gave us a mission. Let's see it through.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410363_Lines: Trust me, you don't want to find out, lady. So I'd keep them to myself if I were you.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410274_Lines: Then, for once, it looks like I'm in the right place at the right time.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410315_Lines: This is one group of fascists I'd be happy never to see again.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410320_Lines: Quite the shindig. Glad I wore my fancy arm.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410284_Lines: Go back to whatever sea cave you crawled out of!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410336_Lines: After what Hydra did to me, I wouldn't be so sure.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410280_Lines: Namor's got evil squids now? Seriously?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410285_Lines: That takes care of Namor's squids.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410247_Lines: This'll be just like the old days, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410223_Lines: Don't you dare let that thing through!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410261_Lines: It's certainly a step up from the tentacles I was fitted with on my last mission here.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410171_Lines: Keep it moving. We're almost to the shrine.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410238_Lines: We've sure come a long way from Brooklyn, Steve.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410011_Lines: After what Hydra did to me, this fight got a lot more personal.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410318_Lines: What the hell happened to the city, Sue?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410254_Lines: It's not an enchanted hammer with a fancy name, but it'll get the job done.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410350_Lines: That Hive energy makes for a whole new breed of Super-Soldier.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410173_Lines: Spider-Zero is counting on us. Let's get this done.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410166_Lines: Don't stop for anything, Zero. Got it?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410162_Lines: Operation: World Tree, ready to commence.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410302_Lines: Off to fight Dracula, huh? That's a new one.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410177_Lines: If I have it my way, I'm never going back in one of those again.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410358_Lines: When it comes to reliable, there's no one that tops those two. I'm all good.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410081_Lines: I never really liked you anyway, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410154_Lines: No one stands between me and my mission.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410303_Lines: Who wants to help me clear a path through some vamps?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410205_Lines: Here's a spot to do some real damage.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410006_Lines: I was rebuilt to be a weapon, but now I'm the one who pulls the trigger.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410236_Lines: Then I guess it's a good thing I only need one arm to take you out.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410077_Lines: Glad to knock that grin off your shiny face, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410282_Lines: And I thought Hydra had too many tentacles…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410218_Lines: We can't afford to lose this site.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410326_Lines: This core should undo Ultron's damage.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410317_Lines: Now we're talking! Right this way, mam.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410359_Lines: That's one way of putting it. More people have poked around in my brain than I care to admit.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410281_Lines: These things are more heavily armed than I am!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410018_Lines: This is nothing like the Wakanda I remember…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410321_Lines: Not exactly my idea of an island getaway…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410055_Lines: This battle is ours to win.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410257_Lines: Just another day in the life of the Winter Soldier. You get used to it.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410101_Lines: What's this? Some sort of ankh?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410208_Lines: This must be where they set up camp.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410098_Lines: What have we here? A sniper?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410330_Lines: This is some real Man on the Wall stuff right here…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410349_Lines: This sure isn't the same Super-Soldier process Steve went through!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410049_Lines: This should help me last longer.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410017_Lines: Places like this make me miss the 1940s more than ever.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410147_Lines: If this were a contest, I'd be winning.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410210_Lines: This is the spot to hit.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410125_Lines: Those spiders won't bother us anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410251_Lines: Then let's save the timelines, or whatever.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410313_Lines: Better get started then. Because Hydra cost me more than I care to admit.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410371_Lines: How have you managed to survive this long without getting bitten, Reed?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410080_Lines: You think fast, Reed. But I act faster.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410243_Lines: I've been poked and prodded enough for ten lifetimes, Reed. I'll pass.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410085_Lines: I could learn a few things from you, Sai.
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410329_Lines: Arakko is in even worse shape than Krakoa. Let's move!
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410347_Lines: Can’t believe I was almost one of their soldiers for sale…
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410183_Lines: What can I do for you?
122_HeroVoice_1041_ST.1041001_HeroVoice_10410082_Lines: You've still got what it takes, old timer.

122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420361_Lines: An alien world teeming with hungry protoplasmic life forms? Sounds like fun!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420194_Lines: We're better when we work together.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420051_Lines: やった! ええと, I mean… That would be an honor… your majesty…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420071_Lines: Or he's your reality's version of me!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420148_Lines: No! Spideys don't go down this easy!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420341_Lines: Picking up some major activity across the park. Follow me!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420387_Lines: So… did you get your powers when you were bitten by a vampire?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420014_Lines: なに, You were expecting Peter Parker? Please!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420041_Lines: Check the logo! ほら, Parker Industries!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420223_Lines: The gods must be on our side!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420031_Lines: Not before SP//dr finds you, old man.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420025_Lines: If you came out of the shadows, that must mean…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420026_Lines: You have a fully-weaponized spider robot as well?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420193_Lines: You've got my back, I've got yours.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420028_Lines: Venom? I've heard stories about you. And the chaos you caused for countless spider-heroes.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420357_Lines: And let you overwrite SP//dr's programming? Not a chance!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420066_Lines: You're Storm! of the X-Men! I would be honored. I bet the Weaver can't wait to meet you!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420040_Lines: You were my お婆ちゃん's favorite singer!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420052_Lines: How many of Hydra's secrets are hidden away in your brain?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420113_Lines: We'll need to put up a good fight.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420049_Lines: A planet of symbiotes is no place for a SP//dr. Or a teenager for that matter!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420363_Lines: It's not so tough when you get used to it. You just need to speak SP//dr's language.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420006_Lines: What I do may seem dangerous, but I've never felt safer than when I'm with SP//dr.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420121_Lines: Hold the line. We've got this!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420023_Lines: Not yet. But I'd be careful if I were you.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420022_Lines: C'mon, Rocket. You know SP//dr isn't for sale.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420137_Lines: No hard feelings, your royal cat-ness!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420117_Lines: If we fight hard, we can win this!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420349_Lines: Almost to the castle… I hope…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420314_Lines: But those threads are literally holding the entire universe together!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420358_Lines: Maybe not… but when it comes the two organic ones inside of him, I'm not convinced…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420020_Lines: I've always admired your work, Mr. Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420016_Lines: Huh. Maybe not. It is a big multiverse, after all.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420019_Lines: ええと…I think I'll just stick to math class…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420233_Lines: ねえ... Did they name you Zero for your speed?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420134_Lines: Shoulda kept your hands off my tech, fuzzball!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420120_Lines: Just keep fighting a little longer!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420333_Lines: Wow… I thought I had a big suit of armor…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420050_Lines: Your empire's technology is unlike anything I've ever seen before!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420013_Lines: Whoa. These chronal energy readings are gonna blow out your sensors, SP//dr!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420142_Lines: Wow! Not bad for an old guy, Cap!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420331_Lines: Wow! Krakoa has a style all its own! So different than Tokyo!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420340_Lines: Aww! Look at the little bot, SP//dr! How cute!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420033_Lines: Luna Snow! I know all of your songs!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420295_Lines: Whoa. Those are some angry octopi!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420211_Lines: Wah? Was that really all of them?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420038_Lines: Ha! No, there's already one of those.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420012_Lines: まあ, how can I focus in class when there's a HUMONGOUS CRACK in the sky?!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420139_Lines: Goth is so out of style, Magik. Just like you.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420309_Lines: In a big crunchy shell. Try to take a bite out of SP//dr and you'll chip a fang!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420235_Lines: まあ... We should've just webbed our way there…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420151_Lines: Hey! I think the doctor needs a doctor!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420054_Lines: If you want a fancy toaster, いいんじゃない(iinjanai)?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420048_Lines: Wooooowww. Forget Tokyo, spider. We should totally move here.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420064_Lines: Ohh, right, you're from the past. Is there, like electricity in your Tokyo?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420037_Lines: Oh, all I have to do is interface with the spider in the suit's command cortex! She does all the hard work. Here, I’ll show you!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420327_Lines: At the center of the Web of Life and Destiny sits the Master Weaver…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420348_Lines: Avengers Tower can't be much further!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420381_Lines: Whoa. These atmospheric readings don't make any sense…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420351_Lines: Ultron's trying to hack us, too. But we won't give in!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420344_Lines: Ultron isn’t going to make this easy for us…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420378_Lines: Well, now that we've all been properly introduced, let's get back to the action!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420324_Lines: Well, as long as you're visiting this timeline, you're welcome to help us fight to change that!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420366_Lines: Okay, fair. I guess we'll have to keep an extra eye on Ultron… and on you…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420320_Lines: Okay… Don't get too nostalgic, old man!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420385_Lines: Someone has to do it. Might as well be me.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420036_Lines: If I end up a super-cool cyborg assassin, I promise I won't blame you. Deal?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420010_Lines: The Master Weaver is not going to be thrilled with me for jumping around realities…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420073_Lines: It reminds me of my duty. Plus it's awesome!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420021_Lines: Actually, we've made some pretty serious advancements since that.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420332_Lines: Heads up, SP//dr! Something here is trying to scramble our systems!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420084_Lines: You know what to do, spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420176_Lines: One less ankh to worry about.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420382_Lines: You're the one causing all of SP//dr's sensors to go haywire?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420272_Lines: This is the place. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420203_Lines: よくできた、くも!(Yoku dekita, kumo!)
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420061_Lines: Kidding! All we have to worry about is inter-dimensional attacks that will end reality!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420063_Lines: When we save the world, I'll let you take a ride.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420325_Lines: Yeah, I'm sure it's pretty advanced for an outdated A.I. like yours.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420017_Lines: Peter, have you… ever wondered if you're doing the right thing? You know, going out every night, putting your loved ones in danger?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420015_Lines: Peter? ねえ… Is it really you? I haven't seen you in ages!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420263_Lines: This is the place to watch.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420345_Lines: Come on! Time is of the essence! Literally!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420350_Lines: Let's go! Are we gonna end this curse or not?!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420149_Lines: You've gotta reboot, Tony. We need you!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420118_Lines: Hurry! We're running out of time!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420297_Lines: Look what just crawled out of the ocean!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420221_Lines: How are there so many of them!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420009_Lines: This isn't my first trip through the multiverse, you know.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420168_Lines: The Punisher set up a turret.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420170_Lines: A turret? Careful not to get punished!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420322_Lines: Not in this timeline or any other, Thing-san.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420044_Lines: I don't want to talk about revenge. I just want to carry on his work.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420334_Lines: I don't like this place either, SP//dr. It gives me the creeps…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420232_Lines: We can still do this, Spider-Zero!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420114_Lines: We can't let them take control.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420339_Lines: We get a tour of New York City? Fun!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420230_Lines: Guess we aren't as blessed as I thought…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420287_Lines: We have to keep things moving.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420346_Lines: We'd better move it, or Knull wins!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420337_Lines: It's up to us to get this essence underground!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420274_Lines: This area must be kept safe!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420227_Lines: We need to finish this. For the Web.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420352_Lines: We need to shut Ultron down! Now!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420160_Lines: We're being targeted by a sniper!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420268_Lines: We've got a lock on them.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420234_Lines: We need to move faster, Zero!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420282_Lines: We need to secure the area.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420224_Lines: I've got your back, Zero. Always.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420001_Lines: I'm here to finish the fight that my father began. I hope I make him proud.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420072_Lines: I really only know asians here… ごめんなさい!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420299_Lines: SP//dr and I have neutralized Namor's nasties.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420140_Lines: I love robots, Ultron. Just not evil ones.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420356_Lines: I've gotten used to them. They don't bother me anymore… except at feeding time. Yuck!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420174_Lines: Whatever that ankh was, it's gone now.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420045_Lines: It takes a lot to give me the creepy crawlies, but this place does it.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420008_Lines: Pretty sure I'm still the coolest spider-hero in any reality.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420239_Lines: I see this bridge every day, and I'm still in awe!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420353_Lines: My dad invented this suit. I want to carry on what he started.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420053_Lines: I saw this giant robot that they built. If I had access to its schematics --
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420150_Lines: Never thought I'd be sad to see Death get defeated.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420042_Lines: I thought only college dropouts could be famous tech founders! But no. It's not the Parker you're thinking of.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420136_Lines: How's that for a greatest hit, Luna?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420217_Lines: Sorry about that! But not really.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420029_Lines: So, you never tried to eat Spider-Man's brains then?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420046_Lines: So, this is where the viking gods live? Glad I brought my armor.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420138_Lines: ごめんね, adorable sharky thing!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420133_Lines: Sorry, Mr. Stark, but you're obsolete.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420186_Lines: Sorry, little spiders. I didn't have a choice.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420179_Lines: Sorry, Rocket. No more reviving here.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420228_Lines: One lucky cat, on its way!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420283_Lines: Taking control of this place is key.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420004_Lines: The spider controlling my suit is small, but fierce. Just like me.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420175_Lines: Destroyed that ankh. Hope I'm not cursed now.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420362_Lines: Don't worry. Symbiotes only bond with organic hosts, and I'm fully protected inside SP//dr.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420119_Lines: The clock is ticking! Let's move!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420315_Lines: Yeah. We call it the Web of Life and Destiny. Pretty cool, right?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420034_Lines: そうなの, お婆さん loved to play them on the oldies station for me.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420364_Lines: You've already got all the brains you need. We're better off taking the battle to the streets!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420069_Lines: Do I? Maybe it's just that if I screw up the world might end!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420032_Lines: Try to smash this bug, big guy, and I promise you'll regret it!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420183_Lines: The turret is toast!どういたしまして!(Dou itashimashite!)
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420011_Lines: I can't let Doom do any more damage to the Web of Life and Destiny.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420123_Lines: Whoever they are, they don't look friendly.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420127_Lines: And that's how we do it in Tokyo.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420191_Lines: That sniper wasn't the only one with good aim!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420300_Lines: This is officially a squid-free zone!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420354_Lines: The right choices never are. But that doesn't mean we stop making them.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420035_Lines: Cap, 大丈夫. SP//dr will protect me.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420060_Lines: Sure! Shouldn't bother you, though, right…Black Widow?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420355_Lines: Yeah. I'm connected to the spider that helps me pilot this armor.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420264_Lines: Keep your eyes on this spot!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420161_Lines: Heads up! They've got a sniper!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420067_Lines: Loki! Are you a good guy today or not?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420076_Lines: Your girl Peni is ready to go!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420177_Lines: Rocket's beacon is out of service.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420189_Lines: The sniper is no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420288_Lines: If we don't stop them now, we lose.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420330_Lines: Just call me Vampire Hunter P!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420005_Lines: The Web of Life and Destiny is fragile. Someone has to protect it.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420225_Lines: The Web of Life is counting on us!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420172_Lines: Spider-bots? Just like mine! Uh oh…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420386_Lines: So far, so good. And, to be fair, I could ask the same of you…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420313_Lines: See those webs? We have to protect them at all costs.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420135_Lines: Looks like I'm the one doing the punishing today!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420132_Lines: Guess it takes a spider to beat one!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420169_Lines: Looks like the Punisher is upping his game.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420312_Lines: Then I guess it's up to us to be the change.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420182_Lines: Let's see how they do without this amplifier…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420388_Lines: Really? My father passed the SP//dr armor down to me when he died.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420279_Lines: We could really use a hand.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420062_Lines: When you teach me how to shoot webs and hang from the ceiling!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420368_Lines: Wait… the same Knull we're supposed to be fighting against? You're kidding me…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420310_Lines: Yeah, well, let me know if there's a change to the menu, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420296_Lines: Namor's brought in some freaky reinforcements…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420298_Lines: Thanks, Namor. Now I can never eat sushi again!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420240_Lines: We will preserve the Web, Master Weaver. I promise.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420144_Lines: Two points for the talking tree!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420018_Lines: あの, ローガンsensei, what is it that you teach, exactly?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420007_Lines: My dad built SP//dr for himself, but I feel like I was born to pilot it.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420316_Lines: We spiders may not get a lot of credit, but we're always here to help.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420003_Lines: Most spiders just climb walls. I'm psionically linked to a giant robot. I win!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420377_Lines: It's more than just a suit of armor. SP//dr's my partner. Kinda like your tree.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420180_Lines: I found their power amplifier. SP//dr shut it down.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420115_Lines: SP//dr's ready for them. Are you?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420002_Lines: SP//dr is more than just a mechanized suit of armor. It's my best friend.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420365_Lines: SP//dr has got so many levels of protection, he's virtually hack-proof.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420030_Lines: Spider's plating is made from carbon nano fibers and ceramics. It's magneto proof.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420343_Lines: Make sure your firewalls are up for this mission, SP//dr!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420311_Lines: Anything new around here since I got sucked into all this reality-hopping nonsense, Zero?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420342_Lines: Off to a vampire's castle… What could go wrong?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420237_Lines: Could use some panther-like speed here…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420326_Lines: Believe it or not, a psychic spider. Good luck hacking that!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420323_Lines: To be fair, we've done our best to keep Alchemax at bay.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420098_Lines: ありがとう!(Arigato!)I needed that boost!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420236_Lines: There might be a slight delay on the panther totem…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420347_Lines: We've got you covered, H.E.R.B.I.E.! Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420185_Lines: Back to regular-sized weapons for you, Punisher!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420187_Lines: A shame to ruin such amazing spider-tech.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420173_Lines: These spiders are cute, but deadly.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420171_Lines: Those spiders look way too familiar.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420329_Lines: Is this for real? I've only seen scenes like this in anime!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420147_Lines: This is just one of your tricks, right, Loki?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420321_Lines: SP//dr is not a robot, Mr. Grimm. It is a highly advanced mech suit.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420266_Lines: The perfect place to do some damage.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420208_Lines: I call this a winning streak!
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420367_Lines: What is this thing? Some sort of giant space god?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420338_Lines: This is our best hope to take down Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420043_Lines: It was my dad's. He died piloting it and then I took over.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420317_Lines: Isn't the Web amazing? Strands that span the space between dimensions…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420058_Lines: あの(Ano), are you really the goddess of death?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420238_Lines: That robot looks awesome! No offense, SP//dr…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420384_Lines: Then you aren't one of the most dangerous and elusive spies they've ever faced?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420380_Lines: That's cool… but could you hit one in a totally different timeline?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420059_Lines: My father… Is he in your realm…?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420027_Lines: I suppose we'll find out soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420056_Lines: The Web of Life and Destiny. Ever seen so many strands before?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420379_Lines: Is your aim really as good as they say it is, Hawkeye-san?
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420145_Lines: And that's why you're a legend, Widow.
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420383_Lines: I've read all the reports about what you've been doing in Tokyo, Widow…
122_HeroVoice_1042_ST.1042001_HeroVoice_10420024_Lines: The Black Widow? It's really you! I thought you were just a legend.

122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430103_Lines: An ankh. Wonder what it's worth…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430012_Lines: Personally, I think one Doom is way more than enough. Am I right?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430269_Lines: A pair of fully-charged element guns… and a whole lot of luck!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430082_Lines: You really went rabid on 'em, Rocket!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430114_Lines: Don't need to worry about that ankh anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430237_Lines: No chance they're driving another foot.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430163_Lines: Ho ho! you were out of your league.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430379_Lines: Not gonna lie. It's pretty amazing.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430399_Lines: Technically, that's me. My father was kind of a big deal. And also kind of a big jerk…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430147_Lines: Five! Ho ho! That has to be a record!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430375_Lines: Wait… What?! No, you're Captain America, man! Aren't you, like, automatically in charge? Of everything?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430248_Lines: Oh, for sure, yeah, Rocket said that we could sell signed pics of you for like, a fortune, on Lotiara. How about it, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430270_Lines: Saving the multiverse, ooh! That's new territory for us, huh, bud.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430263_Lines: But we're supposed to save the world!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430353_Lines: You're not still trying to conquer the surface world back home, are you, dude?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430301_Lines: You've got elemental powers, too? Awesome! You should try out my guns!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430366_Lines: Yeah, I'll give you two minutes before Rocket claws your eyes out for touching his baby!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430216_Lines: No hiding from us now, buddy!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430283_Lines: Well, who are you gonna believe? THE Star Lord, or a talking raccoon with anger issues?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430292_Lines: You haven't seen my ship anywhere, have you?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430245_Lines: You know, my element guns shoot lightning, just like that hammer of yours!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430314_Lines: Any chance you've got a spare? Cuz, black is not my color…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430076_Lines: That's what you get for reading my mind, Mantis!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430194_Lines: Gotta power back up first, cool?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430126_Lines: No more spiders to worry about.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430405_Lines: What you did back on Klyntar was pretty impressive, Blade.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430087_Lines: Don't quit on me now, little buddy!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430180_Lines: Don't worry, spider. Not gonna let anybody stop us.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430233_Lines: Don't give up this location. Or else!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430337_Lines: The Tower can’t be much further… can it?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430185_Lines: Come on! The Panther is counting on us!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430231_Lines: We take this place, maybe we win!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430256_Lines: You ever see Gamora or Drax out there in your empire?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430130_Lines: That's one less sniper to worry about.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430332_Lines: Great. Another talking rodent. Like one wasn't enough.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430112_Lines: Found a spider nest. Watch your step!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430334_Lines: We've just gotta deliver this core, and we save Arakko? Easy.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430091_Lines: Ah poor Namor. Guess he's swimming with the fishes… I can't help myself…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430330_Lines: An adorable robot that saves the day? Aw, that is like every movie from my childhood!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430261_Lines: Well, you're missing a huge opportunity, dude. Have you ever thought about franchising?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430349_Lines: Rumor has it, you're a pop star. Any songs I might know?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430382_Lines: Yeah… how about we workshop that one after we save reality? Sound good? Good.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430253_Lines: Call me Star-Lord when we're…you know, out! I'm trying to build my brand.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430351_Lines: I bet you're wishing you'd just stayed in that cocoon of yours, eh, Adam?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430275_Lines: Uh, no. You know, just wondering if there's any chance you could convince Rocket to clean up his bunk.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430019_Lines: Man, this place makes my skin crawl every time.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430242_Lines: Ugh. Nah. I mean, you can keep Asgard.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430240_Lines: Same! I mean what minds its full fury. I mean it's a tiny bit of fury. And I don't really command it. I just pull the trigger and hope for the best for it's close enough, right?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430276_Lines: Whoa! Look at you little guy! You're even cuter than Rocket!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430109_Lines: Whoa! Where'd Frank get a gun that big?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430176_Lines: Whoa! This is one sweet statue T'Challa's got us moving!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430247_Lines: Whoa, you're Seol Hee. Oh my God, you are such a huge star of the Badoon.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430376_Lines: Wow. I am honored, Cap. So, ugh, I guess this means I actually have to come up with a plan now… Okay!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430324_Lines: Wow, Knull is really going through a goth phase…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430255_Lines: Please tell me you didn't need your powers to see that one…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430249_Lines: You're a famous pop star, right? Ah, that is so cool.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430084_Lines: Yikes! We all know they felt that, Mantis!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430098_Lines: Uh oh. Someone's sniping at us.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430090_Lines: No! Not the weirdly hot death goddess!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430320_Lines: Yikes! Ugh, I thought space was dark and foreboding!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430280_Lines: You missed a lot while you were wrapped up in that cocoon, old buddy.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430295_Lines: That's some pretty futuristic tech you're wearing, bro.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430281_Lines: Oh, yeah, okay, but uh… but is it cool If I do it anyway? It's kinda my thing.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430316_Lines: Oh, not the military kind. I pilot a ship… which I may have crashed on this slimeball of a world…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430291_Lines: Uh huh, yeah, sure it is. Bud, sure it is.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430250_Lines: Well, I'm really more of a classic rock kind of guy you know… But hey, you know, um, you don't happen to know Dazzler, do you?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430352_Lines: Ah. Well, if you're not planning to use it, could I grab a quick nap? Saving the universe is exhausting!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430384_Lines: Okay, fine. Maybe it was too loud… or maybe you're just too old…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430321_Lines: Ugh. It's like Grootfall all over again!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430244_Lines: Nah, nah, he was J'son the jerkface, haha. Yeah, I hate that guy.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430293_Lines: Aw, man! I just filled the tank with hyperfuel!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430016_Lines: Ho ho! That is one heck of a tree. Oh, Groot is gonna love this place.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430161_Lines: I enjoyed that more than I should have.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430350_Lines: Yeah, me too. But we're stuck here. So why not fill me in on those songs of yours…?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430274_Lines: So, rumor has it you're pretty good at communicating with rodents.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430102_Lines: Hey, Moon Knight! You dropped an ankh!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430227_Lines: Anyone wanna lend me a hand?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430381_Lines: It's good to see you too, Spidey. But we've really gotta change that name…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430254_Lines: Oh, just the fact that two Doctor Dooms are battling across all space and time, and we're stuck in the middle. Nothing big.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430319_Lines: Always nice to be back on Earth… even when it's cursed…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430122_Lines: Back to the armory for you, Punisher!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430273_Lines: One where they all tried to eat me? Yeah! Yeah! I absolutely would!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430004_Lines: I found a family out here in space. I'll do whatever it takes to keep them safe.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430222_Lines: Here's a good place to fight back.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430296_Lines: Times like these, I guess it does pay to be…uh…heavily armed. You see what I did there?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430064_Lines: Hang tight. We can do this!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430086_Lines: Your moves are almost as good as mine, Luna!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430171_Lines: Trees make good friends. Let's save this one.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430300_Lines: Great! Great! That's great. Hey, any chance you can find my ship's ion converter? It's gotta be somewhere beneath all this writhing muck.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430104_Lines: Strange conjured up a fancy portal.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430341_Lines: Ultron's really messing Arakko up! We have to do something!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430278_Lines: Warlock, old buddy! You look good. Did you get some work done?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430266_Lines: Groot, old buddy! No tree I'd rather see.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430348_Lines: Bummer, was just wondering if she remembered me…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430298_Lines: Good to know. Any chance I could sit this one out? No? Cool. Cool cool cool.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430213_Lines: Ho ho! So much stuff to blow up.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430317_Lines: Just curious… Ugh, how did you end up here on Klyntar, Adam?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430373_Lines: If you need anyone else to run missions, you know, I happen be an ace pilot.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430179_Lines: If we don't save that tree, Groot is never gonna forgive me!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430342_Lines: If we stop now, Ultron wins and Arakko's done!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430354_Lines: There are millions of planets covered in water. I could just drop you off on one of those.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430006_Lines: It's an endless universe, but somehow I keep finding the worst parts.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430168_Lines: How many of them are there?!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430309_Lines: Was that all you've got, Namor? Come on!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430077_Lines: Never bring earth guns to a space gun fight, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430312_Lines: It's a good thing he's got friends like us. Just, ugh, hope he doesn't forget it…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430124_Lines: Stick to normal size weapons, okay, Frank?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430099_Lines: Watch out. They've got a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430368_Lines: Oh, not even slightly. Kinda makes you rethink this whole hero thing for a hot minute, doesn't it?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430311_Lines: Long enough to build a pretty powerful intergalactic empire.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430221_Lines: Gonna have to defend this spot…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430092_Lines: Was looking for one of these.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430212_Lines: Might wanna watch out over here.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430234_Lines: We gotta keep this vehicle moving!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430014_Lines: Oh, Drax is gonna be so mad he missed this!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430184_Lines: Gotta get this statue to T'Challa… or else.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430119_Lines: Had to turn down your amp, Rocket. Sorry not sorry!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430162_Lines: That was a long time coming.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430175_Lines: Almost there. You've got this, Spider-Lady!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430055_Lines: Let's kick some super powered butt!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430183_Lines: The Web is waiting on us. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430062_Lines: Well? Are we doing this or not?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430108_Lines: The Punisher's got some sorta nasty turret.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430107_Lines: The Punisher got an even bigger gun somehow.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430257_Lines: I gotta find them. They're the closest thing I have to family.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430297_Lines: Yeah, well, it can't get any worse than my last visit to Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430284_Lines: Yeah, you know, I've been thinking the same thing… ever since this planet ate my ship!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430318_Lines: Same. Yeah, except, I mean, we were in our ship. And then we, you know, sorta crashed here.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430406_Lines: I mean we took down Knull. That was a major win! And there are always gonna be loose ends. You know.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430335_Lines: Time to get beneath the surface! Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430340_Lines: We need to get to that castle if we wanna break the curse!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430178_Lines: We gotta get to that tree, fast!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430230_Lines: We gotta get control of this spot!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430133_Lines: We did it! Well, I mean it was mostly me… But we did it!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430336_Lines: The longer we take, the stronger Knull gets. Move it!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430329_Lines: We're going to Avengers Tower? Awesome!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430235_Lines: Do we have to push this thing or what?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430173_Lines: Gotta get you to the Master Weaver.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430088_Lines: I'll turn them into splinters for that, Groot.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430260_Lines: I've visited hundreds of moons. How come they don't all have their own personal knights?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430333_Lines: I've taken down Ultron before. No sweat.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430265_Lines: I just hope we can get this wrapped up soon. You know, I have plans.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430011_Lines: Space, I can protect. But add time to the mix, and things get tricky.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430315_Lines: We've got something in common, you and me. I am a Captain, too!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430127_Lines: I took care of that spider nest. You owe me.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430141_Lines: Haha! I knew that would work! I did…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430380_Lines: Ah yeah, I already have one space raccoon. That's more than enough rodents for me. Sorry!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430267_Lines: What do you mean, dad joke?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430289_Lines: I'm pretty sure this is a universe where you crashed it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430371_Lines: Yeah, you think I'm gonna miss the concert of the year? So, who's playing? Dazzler? Lila Cheney?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430218_Lines: Bet you can find some bad guys here!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430287_Lines: I may be alive, but I'm gonna have nightmares for the rest of my life!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430323_Lines: I have seen fallen Celestials before… but you never get used to it…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430003_Lines: I may be from Earth, but every planet's under my protection now.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430008_Lines: Right from one cosmic disaster to the next. Story of my life.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430343_Lines: My baby! Can you believe that my beautiful ship is just lying here on this messed-up planet? Ugh, it breaks my heart!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430401_Lines: I know a nice little karaoke bar on Knowhere. Maybe you could try it out there.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430271_Lines: I know right. Guess you could say we're… branching out. Haha. Ah, yeah, No, I know…please, you don't have to say anything.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430010_Lines: I've seen some weird stuff in my day. But this time hullabaloo takes the cake.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430258_Lines: Wait, someone who appreciates the classics? Now that is what I call a hero!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430095_Lines: Can't keep me down for long!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430187_Lines: I didn't know there was gonna be a concert. Whoo! Sweet!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430299_Lines: So…just how strong are those powers of yours? Big M. I could call you that, right？
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430079_Lines: Woo! I stomped those squirrels. And I did not feel great about it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430085_Lines: Tony! You gotta get me one of those suits!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430220_Lines: Found the next place to attack!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430310_Lines: Sayonara, suckers! 'cause they got suction cups.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430115_Lines: One priceless Egyptian artifact, broken beyond repair.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430367_Lines: Yeah! Or at least it was… until Knull had his way with it…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430377_Lines: Yeah, it keeps me from freaking out. We all have our thing. What's yours?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430005_Lines: Time to do the right thing. Just gotta figure out what that is…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430089_Lines: Mantis?! They won't get away with this…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430279_Lines: You gotta hook me up with one of those, bro! I could use a serious tune up.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430374_Lines: Ben Grimm? Oh, you know he ran with the Guardians for a bit, right? Did he tell you all about me?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430123_Lines: Things should calm down now ya know without that turret.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430268_Lines: Yeah, lovely planet you've got there. Regular tourist hotspot.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430294_Lines: I'm all for seizing an opportunity, Loki, but I can't imagine how much of your soul you had to sell to end up on that throne.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430181_Lines: Oh! Back off, jerks! Spider coming through!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430118_Lines: So much for your beacon, Rocket!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430286_Lines: Hey, T'Challa, did you know your sister sent me and my crew on an impossible mission, huh?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430128_Lines: Took out the sniper. You're welcome.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430306_Lines: We've got an octopus problem here!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430013_Lines: Looks like you're my new Guardians. Huh. Guess you'll have to do…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430177_Lines: Guess we're Wakanda's official delivery service now.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430372_Lines: Ah, bummer. Never been a fan of heavy metal.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430188_Lines: It's a nice place to land a ship. Just too bad mine crashed on Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430148_Lines: And the hits just keep coming!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430113_Lines: Busted up Moon Knight's ankh. Ah ha!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430009_Lines: There's only one genuine, certified Star-Lord… and you're lookin' at him!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430105_Lines: Uh oh. One of the Doc's portals.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430145_Lines: He shoots for three… and it's good!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430214_Lines: Finally! Somewhere we can cut loose!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430057_Lines: No way are we letting them win.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430074_Lines: Honestly, I've wanted to do that for ages, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430196_Lines: I'll be ready in a minute! Yeesh!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430400_Lines: Daddy issues. Bringing unlikely friends together since… well, whenever you were born…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430304_Lines: Yeah, can I have my body back now? Please?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430277_Lines: And apparently just as feisty, too! Yikes!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430018_Lines: Now where is Shuri? She still owes me for that mission to Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430290_Lines: Spidey, I think maybe you need to get your web-shooters looked at, man.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430182_Lines: Once we're all clear, hit that throttle, Zero!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430370_Lines: Fair. Sure, but if things get weird, I've got you covered. I'm a man of two worlds, after all.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430285_Lines: Cool. Thanks. Just make sure it has a tape deck on it, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430056_Lines: Here we go. Who's with me?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430327_Lines: We get to go underground? Aw, that's my scene, man!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430007_Lines: Got something that needs to be blasted? You called the right guy.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430402_Lines: And if you happen to need a backup dancer, I got you covered!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430385_Lines: It's an honor, your Phoenix-ness. I've always had the utmost respect for cosmic forces.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430365_Lines: Long story. I don't wanna talk about it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430272_Lines: Gonna be honest, not so crazy about symbiotes now that I've visited Klyntar.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430386_Lines: I'm willing to do whatever it takes to protect this universe. And any other.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430338_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E. isn't giving up. So neither are we!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430328_Lines: Let's get moving before Knull figures out our plan…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430369_Lines: Stick with me, Blade. I know this space stuff isn't really in your wheelhouse.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430383_Lines: It's not a racket! It's classic rock! And it's only playing in my headphones! Geez!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430322_Lines: Eh, not my first time saving a planet from Ultron…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430110_Lines: All these spiders can't be good.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430378_Lines: Oh, yeah, I guess that works, too. But you should really try a nice jazz square you know… sometime… No?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430313_Lines: Do these weird symbiotes keep trying to bond with you, too?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430282_Lines: Talk to Rocket. He did it.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430186_Lines: I'm sure no one would notice if one tiny artifact went missing…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430331_Lines: The faster we move through this creepy park, the better.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430017_Lines: This sure isn't the Earth I remember! Oh, man!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430015_Lines: This place is nastier than the Milano's kitchen. Ugh.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430139_Lines: Add that to my greatest hits!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430060_Lines: We have what it takes to win this.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430166_Lines: I did not see that coming, either did they.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430344_Lines: This thing is way harder to read than the scanners on the Milano! What species is this Knull guy anyway?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430347_Lines: So… any chance you've talked to Kitty Pryde recently, Jean?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430246_Lines: So… I'm guessing you don't want to trade then?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430356_Lines: Yeah, they were my grandpa's. He thought you were the bee's knees!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430339_Lines: Keep moving! God, this place is freaking me out!
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430001_Lines: Someone's gotta guard the galaxy. Might as well be me.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430305_Lines: Looks like an alien… but smells like a fish…
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430355_Lines: Did I ever tell you that I read all of your comics when I was a kid, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430264_Lines: This is not how I was expecting the day to play out.
122_HeroVoice_1043_ST.1043001_HeroVoice_10430241_Lines: I mean, you know. the stars. it's like, everything.

122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440439_Lines: X-Tron's done some serious damage. But we can still turn it around.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440417_Lines: X-Tron sucked the life outta the whole damn planet. He's as bad as a vamp!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440428_Lines: X-Tron doesn't even know what's comin' for him!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440386_Lines: What if your Lightforce ain't enough to bring 'em back to our side?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440446_Lines: I missed the final battle with Dracula. No way I'm sittin' this one out!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440399_Lines: Missed the fun with Dracula the first time around. Gotta make up for it.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440436_Lines: Didn't get to finish Drac the first time. Not missin' my chance again!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440081_Lines: Next time, put up a fight.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440117_Lines: No good. We've got a sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440292_Lines: Immortal, huh? Anything I should know about…?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440259_Lines: Finally took you out, you undead hag.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440203_Lines: Wonder if he has any fancy swords… or is it just hammers…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440389_Lines: Not quite. My mother was bitten. She passed the powers to me when I was born.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440019_Lines: Whatever Hydra's been up to here, it sure as hell ain't pretty…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440454_Lines: That's how I've felt about every blade I've ever held…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440183_Lines: They've got the numbers on us.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440295_Lines: They're toxic parasites who deserve to be wiped from existence?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440004_Lines: Spilling blood to save the world. I love my job.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440453_Lines: Almost as legendary as the Sword of Fu Xi. Wanna trade, kid?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440293_Lines: Hey brotha, you ever run into any vampires out here in space?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440121_Lines: A portal. Must be Strange's doing.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440452_Lines: Let's just hope we get a chance to cut those ends… before they cut us…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440396_Lines: Still, I can smell a hint of Dracula on you. His scent never truly washes away.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440014_Lines: Anyone else feeling this is gonna suck?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440265_Lines: You better ask Khonshu to help us bring back the light.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440405_Lines: You and the Torch tried your best. Dracula was just too strong.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440087_Lines: You almost had me, Sai. Almost.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440262_Lines: I'll fight your demons if you fight my vampires.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440175_Lines: You ticked off the wrong slayer.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440086_Lines: Shoulda learned to use that sword better, old man.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440447_Lines: You had something better than the Sword of Dracula? Really?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440106_Lines: Your sword can rest now, Magik. Mine still have work to do.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440260_Lines: Coulda done it faster with a sword, Lin.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440382_Lines: You think your blood could pass your healing factor along to the fangers?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440124_Lines: Nice turret you got there, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440288_Lines: What's a shining beacon like you know about the creatures of the night?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440084_Lines: Don't need six claws. One sword is more than enough.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440296_Lines: No. But I'm sure you'll enlighten me.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440408_Lines: Keep draggin' me, and you're bound to need 'em soon enough.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440434_Lines: Don't blow a circuit board, H.E.R.B.I.E. We can still do this.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440186_Lines: Ready for a road trip, Zero?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440404_Lines: No worries, girl. Your tree rats are safe with me. Unless I get real thirsty…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440196_Lines: Don't worry, Zero. We'll pick up the pace.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440425_Lines: Don't let them scare you, H.E.R.B.I.E. I've got your back.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440066_Lines: Don't let them take this place from us.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440021_Lines: Stupid webs… Always getting my swords all sticky…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440192_Lines: Keep pushing ahead. Yggsgard is counting on us.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440276_Lines: When did the whole blasted universe turn upside down, Doc?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440291_Lines: Even in the future, somehow it's all about you, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440387_Lines: Eternal night or not, there are still gonna be vamps lurkin' in the dark when this is over.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440429_Lines: If we can deliver the big tree, Arakko still has a chance.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440299_Lines: Brutal… but effective. Let's put your theory to the test!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440003_Lines: Vamps gave me my powers. I make them regret it.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440275_Lines: Well, if you happen to have another to spare… your majesty…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440289_Lines: You know, I'm kinda sorry I asked…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440286_Lines: We got a lot in common, you and me.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440442_Lines: Huh. And I thought a sword enchanted with the Phoenix Force was impressive…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440271_Lines: Huh. And I thought I was the bloodthirsty one…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440388_Lines: Only one cure has ever worked for me… and it's right here in my hand!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440094_Lines: Huh. Guess the spider has some bite in him after all…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440393_Lines: Stick with your bow, Barton. The Sword of Dracula ain't a toy.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440397_Lines: Had some time to think when Dracula had me chained up as his prisoner.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440268_Lines: They're just as powerful as any weapon in your arsenal, in the right hands.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440433_Lines: If we don't deliver this codex, there'll be no stoppin' Knull.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440023_Lines: If I can't hunt vamps, symbiotes are a close second.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440379_Lines: Hmmm… What happens if a vampire sucks on that irradiated blood of yours?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440102_Lines: Rest easy, Castle. Your war is finally over.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440095_Lines: Guess the uncs still got it, Cap.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440002_Lines: Staying in the light is a constant struggle…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440278_Lines: What are you gonna do, little fella? Kill 'em with cuteness?
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440355_Lines: I think you're looking for Venom, Goldie. I fight vampires, not aliens.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440064_Lines: We take the fight to them!
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440435_Lines: Almost to Avengers Tower. Keep movin' and keep cool…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440450_Lines: The playlist I put on when I'm out slaying vamps. Really gets my blood pumping.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440240_Lines: This is the spot. Let's take it.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440091_Lines: Somebody's always trying to ice skate uphill.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440054_Lines: Take your shot. I dare you.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440105_Lines: Hope you've got another comeback in you, Bucky…
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440062_Lines: Good work. But it ain't over yet.
122_HeroVoice_1044_ST.1044001_HeroVoice_10440130_Lines: Glad I sharpened my sword, Namor.
