122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480384_Lines: And I look forward to hunting them all some day. Especially you.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480164_Lines: I am curious to see this Budokan.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480368_Lines: You intrigue me. I have never encountered an Oni forged from metal.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480134_Lines: Back to the ocean's depths, demons!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480341_Lines: When this battle is won, grant me the honor of besting you in combat.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480318_Lines: Knull shall be undone by his own essence? How poetic.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480083_Lines: Our spirits shall meet again some day, little one.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480212_Lines: We cannot let them take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480307_Lines: Patience. I will be able to strike soon.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480170_Lines: Patience, Spider-Zero. We'll clear this path for you.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480084_Lines: At least you are truly free now, Mantis.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480091_Lines: You fought well, Man of Spiders.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480131_Lines: The spider nest has been cleared.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480313_Lines: We either save this island... or we put it out of its misery...
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480236_Lines: And if it doesn't, I will cleave these Dooms in two for what they've done.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480231_Lines: If only all Yokai were so agreeable…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480051_Lines: Let's show them who we are.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480013_Lines: Clear a path. Unless you wish me to clear your mind… permanently.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480329_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E. is counting on us. We cannot fail him.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480016_Lines: This… is not the Japan I remember…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480325_Lines: This land spirit deserves our protection.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480155_Lines: This world isn't so bad after all.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480275_Lines: This Hydra. It is a monster of legend, is it not?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480198_Lines: This place could be easily damaged.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480105_Lines: This item seems ancient… and powerful…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480357_Lines: Those would be quite useful against some of the Demons in my homeland.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480320_Lines: This tiny metal man will save us all.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480322_Lines: This Yokai is unlike any I have met before…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480070_Lines: It didn't have to come to this, great forest Oni…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480052_Lines: There is a prize to be claimed.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480141_Lines: This is not a battle we can face alone.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480046_Lines: This battle is ours to win.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480312_Lines: I have been welcomed to this land… and it is suffering. I must do something!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480352_Lines: What a strange island. It breathes, as if alive…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480274_Lines: I fear we will have to disagree on that.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480314_Lines: The largest Yokai I have ever seen. Who could slay such a creature?
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480261_Lines: Then it is right we should fight together.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480323_Lines: Danger lurks in this forest. We must tread carefully.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480269_Lines: This must be the nest of the Great Snake.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480380_Lines: It isn't home… but it will certainly do for now…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480004_Lines: Everything in this place feels so familiar, and yet so strange.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480176_Lines: The Oni here are even more hideous than the ones on my world.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480101_Lines: A long distance attack? Watch out!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480125_Lines: The rodent's amplifier has been shut down.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480276_Lines: Then we shall slay them all, man and beast alike!
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480240_Lines: Then until my last breath, you will know true repulsion.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480264_Lines: Your fancy metal may be strong, but I assure you, my will is stronger.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480379_Lines: Sai. Or Psylocke. But never "darling." They know better.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480383_Lines: I am well versed in the Oni that dwell on the land. But the seas are a mystery to me…
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480311_Lines: The forests of my homeland were far more dangerous.
122_HeroVoice_1048_ST.1048001_HeroVoice_10480077_Lines: Your demons chose their queen wisely, Magik.

122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490183_Lines: And I thought one Spider was too loud!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490389_Lines: That's what Magneto says. But I ain't convinced.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490081_Lines: Try Adamantium bullets next time, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490358_Lines: Ain't sure. But I don't think we wanna risk findin' out.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490226_Lines: I'll admit, ya made that look good, Emma.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490016_Lines: Don't need enhanced senses to smell that somethin' is off here…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490272_Lines: This is your Weapon X, eh? Well, now's your chance to get some payback.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490337_Lines: You're back now. That's all that matters, darlin'.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490273_Lines: My claws can cut through almost anything, darlin'. Wanna put some money on it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490162_Lines: More of them than of us.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490092_Lines: Save me a spot in Hell, would ya, Illyana?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490075_Lines: No wonder your brother called ya snowflake, Illyana.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490270_Lines: Don't even think about it, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490340_Lines: Can't break an Adamantium skeleton, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490264_Lines: Seems the same to me, deep down. We're still on the prowl, ain't we?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490127_Lines: Hope you didn't need that beacon, Rocket.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490354_Lines: You're a surgeon, ain't ya? Can't you just cut out the infection?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490355_Lines: You get used to it. Make yourself at home, darlin'. On Krakoa, you're one of us.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490390_Lines: You almost erased us from existence, darlin'. It don't get less perfect than that.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490102_Lines: You can put me down, but I always get back up.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490347_Lines: What the hell are you lookin' at, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490158_Lines: You had to know that was comin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490396_Lines: You'd better not be talkin' about me, bub, or I'll carve ya to bits!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490252_Lines: So… you're tellin' me there's a whole multiverse full of Spider-Folk?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490087_Lines: Ninja moves better than mine? I'm impressed, Sai.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490239_Lines: You know I'm the real deal when it comes to slicing and dicing.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490372_Lines: You want me out there findin' lost Mutants, I need the right gear to do the job.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490114_Lines: That's a mighty big gun, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490244_Lines: I don't like that look, Erik. What's goin' on under that helmet of yours?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490413_Lines: Nah. Every now and then, it feels good to get in a jab that don't require my claws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490400_Lines: You do you, kid. Just try to keep the volume down so the rest of us can focus.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490341_Lines: You can shoot fast, bub, but I can heal even faster.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490366_Lines: What kinda tricks you got in that quiver of yours, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490006_Lines: Got a problem, bub? Talk to the claws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490373_Lines: And Krakoa doesn't need another fancy party. But do ya hear us whinin'?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490374_Lines: Krakoa may not be perfect, but it's as close as we're gonna get.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490168_Lines: Time to get it in gear, kid.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490179_Lines: Kick up the pace. Wakanda needs us.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490121_Lines: Eight legs versus six claws? I'll take those odds.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490328_Lines: The King in Black is about to rise if we don't get movin'!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490219_Lines: If we don't move it, we're gonna lose it!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490043_Lines: No damage I can't take now!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490169_Lines: Ready to move those webs, darlin'?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490027_Lines: I'm ready, bub. Put me in.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490178_Lines: Ain't stoppin' 'til you get to that fancy Web.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490170_Lines: Don't worry, Zero. We ain't gonna let you down.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490399_Lines: Hands off, lady. When it's my time to go, I sure as hell ain't goin' with you.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490266_Lines: You know, Ninjas. Samurai. Met a nice girl there once…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490173_Lines: C'mon! Let's move that blasted hammer!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490353_Lines: You got some fancy spell to clean up Ultron's mess, Doc?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490133_Lines: Your turret's gonna need repairs, Castle.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490391_Lines: Paradise can be a bit quiet for my tastes, but I'm gettin' used to it.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490233_Lines: Big talk. Think you can back it up?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490333_Lines: Arakko ain't goin' down while I'm still breathin'. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490367_Lines: As long as you ain't got any with Adamantium tips, we're good.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490259_Lines: We've both seen tomorrow, bub. Wouldn't exactly call it bright.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490344_Lines: Huh… Suddenly, I don't feel quite as invulnerable as usual…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490083_Lines: Yikes. Remind me to keep my distance, Erik…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490236_Lines: Folks like these, they might have powers, but they ain't like you and me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490388_Lines: Heh. I like your style. Glad you found your way to Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490392_Lines: Heh. Those were the days, weren't they, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490240_Lines: Well, well. Fancy seein' you here, jade jaws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490003_Lines: You picked the wrong day to drag me into this mess, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490161_Lines: Huh. The world really was against ya!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490251_Lines: Turn 'em to diamond, darlin'. They'll make it through without breakin'.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490404_Lines: In a fight like this, I can't risk pullin' any punches… or claws. Got it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490129_Lines: Fried your amp, trash panda. Deal with it.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490385_Lines: There's a bigger world out there beyond our tranquil shores, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490402_Lines: Doreen… I… didn't expect to see you here. You look good…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490163_Lines: Geez! How many of 'em are there?!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490352_Lines: A cryin' shame. I was plannin' to save a dance for ya, 'Ro.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490325_Lines: Ultron's gonna pay for what he did here!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490334_Lines: Ultron's takin' over. We can't let that happen!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490322_Lines: All right. Let's get this bolt brain to Avengers Tower.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490369_Lines: Well, at least we know it makes you twice as crazy…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490089_Lines: Always a pleasure watchin' you work, Nat.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490176_Lines: We'll have this clear for ya in a minute, darlin'.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490350_Lines: Ain't the size of the Mutant that matters. It's how sharp his claws are…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490387_Lines: What do they call ya back where you come from, darlin'?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490265_Lines: I remember the Japan from before your grandpa was born, darlin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490408_Lines: You should prob'ly let me take point on this one, kid.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490331_Lines: We'll clear the path, rodent. You do your thing.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490116_Lines: Watch out. Castle upgraded his weapon.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490324_Lines: You'd better know what you're doin', rat girl…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490097_Lines: You put up a good fight, Bucky. Rest easy now.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490362_Lines: Hopefully there's less time travel this go around. Always makes my head hurt.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490146_Lines: This don't mean we're a team, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490088_Lines: Glad it wasn't me you were smashin' this time, Bruce.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490368_Lines: On the plus side, maybe the fact that Mars has two moons will make ya twice as strong.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490202_Lines: Gotta keep an eye on this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490327_Lines: Let's get this thing underground. Knull's waitin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490241_Lines: What's wrong? Scared your rage ain't what it used to be?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490115_Lines: The Punisher set up some kinda turret.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490067_Lines: Can't sneak up on us, bub!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490326_Lines: Gotta get this core into place if we wanna save Arakko.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490357_Lines: Not worried about me. Worried about what side effects it'll have on them.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490235_Lines: Why would I do that, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490225_Lines: Never really trusted ya in the first place, Frost…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490356_Lines: Used to be just like you are. But havin' someone else to fight for ain't so bad.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490218_Lines: We don't budge from this spot, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490215_Lines: We gotta focus on this spot.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490394_Lines: Unless we're countin' all the times we've been on opposite sides of the fight…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490258_Lines: Shouldn't we both be retired by now, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490052_Lines: Up to us to take 'em down.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490180_Lines: We ain't gonna fail Wakanda. Ya got my word.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490228_Lines: Been there? I'm the diplomatic envoy.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490268_Lines: I didn't do it for you, lady. Just gave 'em what they deserved.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490012_Lines: I came all the way from Krakoa for this?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490315_Lines: I've taken down some big bads in my day… but nothin' like this…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490017_Lines: Don't matter how old I am. I can still take out any of you chumps.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490156_Lines: Didn't think I'd let ya get away, did ya?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490033_Lines: Why the hell ain't I healin'?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490255_Lines: Sorry to hear it, darlin'. But I ain't no one's pet. Not in any reality.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490002_Lines: I've carried this rage since I was born…centuries ago…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490231_Lines: I remember when they patented chewing gum…ugh I'm getting too old for this.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490070_Lines: I'd stay down if I were you.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490393_Lines: Lost track of how many times we've done this over the decades, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490013_Lines: This fight's gonna be over before it even gets started.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490403_Lines: So… umm… Let's try not to make this awkward, eh?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490015_Lines: So, this is the end of all that is, eh? Not on my watch, darlin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490332_Lines: We give up now, this nightmare never ends. Come on!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490406_Lines: Turn off that racket, would ya, bub?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490203_Lines: Let's rip this place to pieces!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490132_Lines: Sorry, Frank. Big guns don't mean big wins.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490212_Lines: Defend this place with your lives.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490342_Lines: Maybe later. Right now, it looks like we're on the same side.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490091_Lines: Don't worry, Mags. We won't let the dream die.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490245_Lines: Ease up, bub. Mutants finally have a chance thanks to what we're doin' on Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490175_Lines: A whole Multiverse is countin' on us to finish this run!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490316_Lines: Whole damn planet's squirmin' under my boots. This is gonna suck.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490112_Lines: What're you up to now, Strange?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490005_Lines: I make this look good in any timeline.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490019_Lines: Hydra, Weapon X. It's all the same. And it ends now.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490010_Lines: Past, present, future. Don't matter. We gotta save 'em all.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490080_Lines: Claws beat swords every time, Daywalker.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490300_Lines: Told ya I was the best.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490279_Lines: I dunno, Cap. I remember you cuttin' up the floor with Peggy back in the day.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490411_Lines: Yeah, well, the universe seems to be disagreein' with that notion.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490349_Lines: Yeah. I'd hate to have to lay you out again in front of all our friends.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490090_Lines: See you on the other side, Stormy.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490234_Lines: Mostly just take the kids on field trips these days. Mountains, rooftops, the moon. My students get a 30-second head start before I go HUNTIN'. Last one standin' gets an A. Extra credit if they manage to hurt me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490181_Lines: Just like Weapon X… Maybe worse…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490018_Lines: Point me towards Dooms. I owe him some extra scars.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490021_Lines: Let's see how the Web of Life and Destiny holds up against a little Adamantium.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490323_Lines: Squirrel god? *sniff* Smells like a wet Thor…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490230_Lines: Can't focus with the all the mess back home on my mind, 'Ro.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490206_Lines: Just who I was lookin' for.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490398_Lines: Death don't scare me. It's come for me plenty of times, and it ain't never stuck.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490036_Lines: Even better than my Mutant power!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490104_Lines: I've healed from a hundred times worse.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490311_Lines: Ain't got no silver bullets. But Adamantium claws should do just fine.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490409_Lines: Damn right. Some of us have actually earned the title "Immortal Weapon."
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490364_Lines: After we get this mess cleaned up, bub, you've got yourself a partner!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490023_Lines: Livin' islands I can handle. But this place is out of control.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490128_Lines: The raccoon's beacon is done for.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490142_Lines: Sniper's down. We're in the clear.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490094_Lines: I can't lose ya, Jeannie… Not yet…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490410_Lines: Always knew it would be you and me at the end of the world, Jeannie.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490338_Lines: We've all done bad things, Jeannie. Now's our chance to make up for 'em.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490263_Lines: This sure is a long way from the Intergalactic Empire Of Wakanda…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490171_Lines: Logan, reportin' for royal messenger duty.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490014_Lines: Somethin' tells me this is good day to have a healin' factor…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490348_Lines: Take my word, Goldie: You don't wanna see that side of me. It ain't pretty.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490412_Lines: Nice of you to join the fight, bub. Sure you don't need another nap?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490278_Lines: Looks like the Hellfire Gala got crashed. Again.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490257_Lines: Not before I slice you open like the talkin' tin can you are!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490184_Lines: Reckon it's time for a regime change…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490120_Lines: Looks like Namor ordered our next course.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490247_Lines: Can't figure out which is heavier… that sword or your crown…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490160_Lines: Not the way I expected that to go down…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490397_Lines: Same here. And I'll hunt ya 'til the end of time if that's what it takes to shut yer yap!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490096_Lines: Never thought I'd miss hearin' you yap, Spidey…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490253_Lines: You gotta be kiddin' me. I can barely tolerate one of 'em!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490339_Lines: Too bad. Was hopin' you'd be on the other side…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490100_Lines: Like a bad penny. I just keep comin' back.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490140_Lines: Those creeps earned a burial at sea.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490319_Lines: Knull's about to get a taste of his own medicine.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490139_Lines: Got any other fish for me to fillet, Namor?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490122_Lines: Don't send squids to do your dirty work, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490320_Lines: Time to make sure this king never takes the throne!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490330_Lines: Keep pushin' ahead. The Tower ain't far!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490026_Lines: Your boy Logan is ready for action.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490074_Lines: This Mutant carves his own path, old man!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490313_Lines: You bring the fight to our house, you're gonna regret it, punk!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490250_Lines: Always a pleasure to see you out here gettin' your hands dirty, Emma.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490227_Lines: Never liked ya, Emma. But we sure coulda used ya…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490361_Lines: You and me have saved the world from this scrap heap together before, Suzie.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490119_Lines: Spiders! We've got some exterminatin' to do!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490177_Lines: Hang tight, Zero. We'll clear the way.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490407_Lines: Well, my enhanced senses are pickin' it up and it's distractin' the hell outta me!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490099_Lines: A health boost? Fine by me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490174_Lines: Could really use a Rainbow Bridge about now…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490243_Lines: All this cosmic crap just don't compare to a good ol' Madripoor street fight.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490182_Lines: Anyone lookin' to make a name for themselves?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490008_Lines: Anyone stands in my way, they won't be standin' much longer.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490375_Lines: Thanks, bub. But that's gonna be a hard pass.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490329_Lines: Keep your circuits cool, H.E.R.B.I.E. We'll get ya there.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490321_Lines: H.E.R.B.I.E.? Really? That's the best we've got? Okay…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490084_Lines: And I thought I was ruthless, Magik…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490157_Lines: Had a claw here with your name on it…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490007_Lines: This ain't my first rodeo. Sure as hell won't be my last.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490246_Lines: That's a mighty grim look for such a pretty little face, darlin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490232_Lines: No need to get your fancy claws dirty, your highness. I got this.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490024_Lines: These vamps want blood? I'll be glad to spill theirs.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490216_Lines: This place is ours for the takin'.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490217_Lines: No chance we let 'em take this place.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490351_Lines: Well, this little soiree sure went downhill fast…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490314_Lines: This is about more than just Mutants. We're fightin' to save every livin' thing!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490020_Lines: This World Tree is in need of some serious trimmin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490009_Lines: I can finish this without even poppin' my claws.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490345_Lines: I can handle the heat, kid. Question is, can you?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490363_Lines: You ain't the type for a highfalutin' shindig like this anyway, Grimm.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490276_Lines: Perfect for doin' some huntin'. You with me, T'Challa?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490004_Lines: Been doin' this a long time. Ain't about to stop now.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490001_Lines: I'm the best there is at what I do, but what I do isn't very nice.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490242_Lines: This sure ain't like the old days, fightin' in the sewers and the alleys.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490204_Lines: Looks like we can do some damage here!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490260_Lines: There's some bad stuff in here,ro.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490312_Lines: The perfect place to go huntin'…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490166_Lines: Ain't even seen trees like this on Krakoa. We gotta protect it.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490011_Lines: Let's end this quick. Got better places to be.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490130_Lines: That stupid amplifier is finally offline.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490137_Lines: Those robo-spiders won't be botherin' us any more.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490346_Lines: Then turn off the yappin' and turn up the flames. We got work to do.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490269_Lines: Then let's start carvin' our way through this goop. We've got us a king to kill!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490248_Lines: Depends. Does that Logan owe ya $200 bucks?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490405_Lines: Just sayin'… you might wanna look the other way if things get ugly, kid...
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490229_Lines: It was Magneto's idea. For some reason he thinks people are scared of me.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490343_Lines: Speak for yourself, bub. My bones are pure Adamantium!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490165_Lines: That big magic tree seems worth a visit…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490249_Lines: Then I must be one from an alternate reality. Sorry, bub!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490172_Lines: Who needs Panthers when ya got a Wolverine?
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490103_Lines: The Wolverine don't go down that easy!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490079_Lines: Iron's got nothin' on Adamantium, Stark!
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490256_Lines: You'll have to strip it from my bones first, bub.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490401_Lines: Whatever works. I'm sure it can’t be any worse than Dazzler's disco era…
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490262_Lines: Wondered why it felt so much like home.
122_HeroVoice_1049_ST.1049001_HeroVoice_10490152_Lines: Am I the only one doin' this?

122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500167_Lines: We push all the way to Yggdrasill.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500291_Lines: This may be the longest night of my life… at least since the kids were babies…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500265_Lines: No. But I'm keeping a thin force field around my entire body at all times.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500171_Lines: Just keep focused, Spider-Zero. We've got you.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500054_Lines: Be proud of what you did here.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500177_Lines: Stand clear so Zero can get through!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500329_Lines: You've certainly come a long way since the Enclave created you, Adam.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500341_Lines: I appreciate you looking out for me, dear, but I'm not about to miss the final battle.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500250_Lines: People think they can see right through me. I bet you've heard that before, too, Emma.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500165_Lines: I count a few too many of them.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500183_Lines: What they're doing here… It's unspeakable!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500103_Lines: Thought you wouldn't see me again?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500256_Lines: I've been told that before. But that kind of violence isn't really my style.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500260_Lines: It's getting you to stop talking about yourself that's the real trick.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500160_Lines: You know you never stood a chance, right?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500079_Lines: You have no clue how long I've wanted to do that, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500114_Lines: You left the door open, Stephen…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500319_Lines: What do you think, Ororo? Do we go in full force or stay under the radar?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500084_Lines: You never fail to impress me, Reed.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500096_Lines: I promise we'll finish this, Ororo. From one Storm to another.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500330_Lines: Power like yours can change worlds. I'm glad you decided that it should change them for the better.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500124_Lines: These squids reek of desperation, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500118_Lines: Do you have a license for that thing, Frank?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500078_Lines: You pulled your punches, Ben. Big mistake.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500170_Lines: You're on our team now, Zero. Let's do this.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500123_Lines: And this is why I chose Reed, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500081_Lines: Your reign just came to an end, T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500245_Lines: Right… Saving the world from cosmic annihilation can be such a bore…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500004_Lines: It feels good to step outside my bubble every now and then.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500186_Lines: I could be in and out of here with no one ever noticing…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500314_Lines: Arakko is in big trouble if we don't start moving!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500063_Lines: Hang on for just a while…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500220_Lines: We aren't giving up this area.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500343_Lines: Where were you when vampires were taking over New York, Blade?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500112_Lines: Pick up your toys, Moon Knight…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500146_Lines: No worries. I've got your back.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500267_Lines: Don't worry. I've got you covered in that department.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500348_Lines: Don't kid yourself, Namor. The darker the depths, the more they'll thrive.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500227_Lines: Over here! I can heal you!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500308_Lines: Come on! If Knull rises, it's all over.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500136_Lines: Castle's turret is out of service.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500005_Lines: Even when you can't see me, I'll still make you believe.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500008_Lines: Even when the Multiverse is in danger, family still comes first.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500185_Lines: They can't monitor what they can't see…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500301_Lines: If anyone can do this, it's you, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500182_Lines: It's up to us to end this. For Wakanda's sake!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500311_Lines: It's up to us to finally end this night! Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500304_Lines: If we get to the castle, we can break this curse!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500141_Lines: Poor creatures. Namor should be ashamed!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500176_Lines: We have to keep pushing. This realm needs us!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500296_Lines: Why couldn't Galactus have consumed THIS planet…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500003_Lines: After all these years, saving the world still hasn't gotten old.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500251_Lines: Well, from one mother to another, let me say, you are a true gem.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500236_Lines: Reed saves the world countless times each week. Almost as often as you fail to conquer it.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500331_Lines: You may have just been unthawed in your timeline, but to us, you were a trusted friend for ages.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500205_Lines: Get ready to do some damage.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500064_Lines: Hold strong! We can do this!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500310_Lines: We're almost to Avenger Tower. Stay close, H.E.R.B.I.E.!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500076_Lines: Consider this an irreconcilable difference, Reed.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500293_Lines: It's been so long since I've had a night out. This will have to do…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500239_Lines: Well, in that case… we'll just have to wait and see…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500344_Lines: Well, I'm not sure wooden stakes and holy water are going to cut it against symbiotes.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500139_Lines: Good news. I got the bots!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500312_Lines: If we don't get to the castle, the vampires win. That's not an option!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500135_Lines: I took apart that turret, for all of our safety.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500094_Lines: Rest easy, Ben. You've earned it.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500016_Lines: Franklin and Val are going to be so sad that they missed this!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500115_Lines: Careful. Strange is at it again…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500125_Lines: One less ankh, one less problem.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500295_Lines: Whoever did this isn't going to stop after a single Celestial…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500168_Lines: Let's hope those goats are ready to go…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500087_Lines: Nice work, Namor. But don't let it go to your head.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500252_Lines: I thought we were supposed to be on the same side, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500241_Lines: Of course… but I would also be extremely concerned…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500262_Lines: Well, you'll always be part of ours, Peter. Wherever… and whenever… we may be.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500024_Lines: On the plus side, they can't bite what they can't see…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500228_Lines: Come on. Let me heal you.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500044_Lines: I've always been a heavy hitter.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500255_Lines: I'll be sure to tell him exactly what you said…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500105_Lines: I don't give up so easily.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500292_Lines: I used to love this park. But a vampire curse sure can change things…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500299_Lines: We need to get Knull's essence beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500309_Lines: I won't let you down, H.E.R.B.I.E. I promise.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500181_Lines: We're not going to let T'Challa down, are we?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500018_Lines: We'll do this the same way we always do. Together.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500214_Lines: We need to keep it safe here.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500294_Lines: We were planning to retire on Mars!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500222_Lines: We can't afford to slow down.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500002_Lines: We didn't ask to be heroes, but we always answer the call.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500332_Lines: Our Steve was the glue that held together countless teams of heroes. Trust me, you were born for this.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500229_Lines: We really could've used a mind like yours, Bruce…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500106_Lines: I'll fight for my family until the end.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500092_Lines: I'll do my best to carry on, Reed… but it won't be easy…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500178_Lines: We'll make it to Budokan, Zero. I promise.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500258_Lines: I could help with that… but not in the way I think you mean…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500322_Lines: You'll have to let this mom stretch first, but then you're on!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500020_Lines: I've visited countless dimensions… but this place never fails to impress…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500001_Lines: I'm not the type who fades quietly into the background.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500015_Lines: I'll take a cosmic clash over fighting vampires any day.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500088_Lines: We can always count on you, Spidey.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500132_Lines: I turned Rocket's amp down to zero.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500085_Lines: That's what happens when you threaten my brother!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500337_Lines: You know, there happen to be men AND women of science in this fight.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500158_Lines: I may have been out of sight, but were you out of your mind?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500122_Lines: Let me guess. You're Namor's friends?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500257_Lines: I understand, Bucky. Some villains just don't know when to quit.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500104_Lines: It's clear I'm still needed here.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500198_Lines: I'm not as well as I hoped.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500090_Lines: I'd compliment you, Hulk, but Ben would get jealous.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500082_Lines: How's that for a vanishing act, Stephen?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500253_Lines: I'll be sure to remember that… and when it does, I'll be ready.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500335_Lines: Back when he tried to start his own Age of Ultron. I remember.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500134_Lines: I warned you not to play with guns, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500215_Lines: I need a hand over here.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500017_Lines: Should I give them until the count of four to walk away?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500347_Lines: There might not be vampires underwater yet, but there will be soon if we don't stop this.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500254_Lines: Reed is glad to have another genius around to help him solve this, Tony.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500048_Lines: I have a shield, but no complaints.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500126_Lines: Sorry. You made this mess, Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500206_Lines: Hitting here could cause massive destruction.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500164_Lines: There's more of them than us.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500338_Lines: Yeah I WISH my four doctorates in bio-chem helped me understand Reed…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500006_Lines: Cosmic rays didn't make me who I am today. My family did.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500246_Lines: It's Richards, Namor. As you are well aware.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500302_Lines: You know you're always safe with me, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500238_Lines: Benjamin J. Grimm. You should know by now that I'm far from helpless!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500138_Lines: The bug bots have been stomped.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500066_Lines: They look like they mean business.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500243_Lines: Not at all. But in most realities, these are some of our closest allies.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500098_Lines: Not sure how we'll solve this without you, Tony…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500266_Lines: Not much. It's just been thrust into darkness and overrun by vampires.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500339_Lines: No. This just isn't exactly the date night I'd been hoping for…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500022_Lines: Leave it to T'Challa to rise above his fellow man… literally…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500091_Lines: As graceful and lethal as always, T'Challa.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500143_Lines: Hope we won't be seeing that sniper again…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500313_Lines: This isn't the time for a slow dance. Pick up the pace!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500142_Lines: Namor's alone again. That's for the best…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500300_Lines: Guess it's time for us to head underground.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500247_Lines: Wow. Are your motivations always as transparent as I am?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500042_Lines: Needed that more than you know.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500248_Lines: Really? Me? But you're one of the best spies in the world, Natasha.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500321_Lines: Currently, I'm more interested in fighting against our common foes.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500009_Lines: You think this is a challenge? Try raising two super-powered kids.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500093_Lines: Johnny! No! I'll make them pay for this!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500230_Lines: You know me, Johnny. When I'm needed, I'm there.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500242_Lines: I need you to promise me you'll show some restraint out there, Johnny.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500307_Lines: Knull could return any moment. We need to move!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500140_Lines: As usual, Namor only grossed me out.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500159_Lines: That outcome was crystal clear from the beginning.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500012_Lines: What has Victor gotten us into this time…?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500089_Lines: Still the best at what you do, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500175_Lines: Clear the path. We're headed to the World Tree!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500053_Lines: Even small victories are worth celebrating.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500179_Lines: Victory may be hard to see, Zero, but it's getting closer.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500097_Lines: It was an honor to serve alongside you, Cap.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500285_Lines: I need a bit more power…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500095_Lines: I hate to admit it, Namor… but I'm going to miss you…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500013_Lines: I prefer teams of four… but I can make this work.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500261_Lines: Home isn't always where the webs are…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500021_Lines: Well, this is a different kind of friendly neighborhood…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500172_Lines: One way we get to the finish line, Zero: Together.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500180_Lines: The coast is almost clear, Spider!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500011_Lines: How about I switch things up and make our opponents disappear?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500184_Lines: If Reed sees this place, he's never going to leave!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500083_Lines: Think you're tough, Logan? I can see straight through you.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500224_Lines: No one gets past this point!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500007_Lines: Who wants to see something fantastic…?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500249_Lines: Thanks. Now, would you mind telling my brother that?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500336_Lines: Hang out with my husband often enough and you'll get used to it…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500233_Lines: Can we just focus on what we're doing here?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500173_Lines: Anyone else up for saving an empire?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500127_Lines: Khonshu's going to be very angry…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500211_Lines: This place is begging to be attacked.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500204_Lines: This place is worth a good look.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500305_Lines: This core is the only thing that can stop Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500086_Lines: Is it really Clobberin' Time already, Ben?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500010_Lines: I hope this is important. Reed and I had a date night planned…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500014_Lines: This is just a normal Tuesday in our family.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500120_Lines: These little robots may be a problem…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500019_Lines: Some things you just can't unsee…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500303_Lines: Not exactly a carriage ride through the park, but it'll have to do…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500023_Lines: This place makes me want to stay inside a force field forever…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500116_Lines: I don't like the look of that turret…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500237_Lines: not yet. but keep talking, and that could change.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500259_Lines: Was that supposed to be a compliment?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500059_Lines: It's time to go on the offensive.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500174_Lines: Our path to victory is clear. Let's go… For Wakanda!
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500137_Lines: Those spider-bots won't be bothering us now.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500320_Lines: Then we play to our strengths. I'll strike when they least expect it…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500240_Lines: Reed? You do have a plan to stop Victor, don't you darling?
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500340_Lines: You know, Reed, for someone so brilliant, it's amazing how oblivious you can be…
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500342_Lines: We are who we are, Reed. The Fantastic Four. That will never change.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500234_Lines: Please tell me this isn't the date night you've been planning for us, Reed.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500117_Lines: Guns aren't toys, Frank. Especially ones that big.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500306_Lines: Arakko is a living thing. It deserves to be free from Ultron's influence.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500077_Lines: If anyone could snuff out your flame, Johnny, it'd be me.
122_HeroVoice_1050_ST.1050001_HeroVoice_10500101_Lines: I'll put this to good use.

122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510306_Lines: A Celestial? Yikes! Think I might be a bit outta my weight class here!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510012_Lines: Gotta admit, it's always nice teamin' up with old friends.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510084_Lines: And that's why you're the king, T'Challa!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510203_Lines: No need to hold back here!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510221_Lines: They don't move another inch, got it?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510219_Lines: We can't let 'em stop us now!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510017_Lines: Fair warnin'… Unlike my wrestlin' days, I won't be pullin' any punches!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510238_Lines: Two Dooms rippin' time and space apart? What a nightmare!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510328_Lines: Does Danny know you borrowed his pajamas, kid?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510314_Lines: This should be a walk in the park! Ha!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510224_Lines: Your ever-lovin', blue-eyed Thing is here!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510041_Lines: Thought I was strong enough already!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510086_Lines: Not bad for a mangy little space rodent!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510003_Lines: It ain't easy bein' this strong or this handsome!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510009_Lines: You guys call for the cavalry? 'Cause Benjy's here, baby!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510093_Lines: You did your best, Spidey. Let us take it from here.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510143_Lines: You can always count on me!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510259_Lines: That's a fancy robot ya got there, little lady.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510131_Lines: No turret can stop me, Frankie Boy.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510239_Lines: That plan's a bit of a stretch… even for you! Any other big ideas?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510024_Lines: Hey, ya lousy vamps! Try to sink your fangs into this!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510241_Lines: You know, kid, sometimes you really scorch my stones…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510083_Lines: You actually did it, flame brain. I'm impressed!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510008_Lines: There's a reason I'm Aunt Petunia's favorite nephew!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510315_Lines: Oddly, this ain't the largest rat I've seen in New York…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510325_Lines: Unless we move it, Arakko's done for!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510319_Lines: If we don't start to move it, Knull wins!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510168_Lines: Ready to get it in gear, little lady?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510004_Lines: I promise ya, somewhere under all this rock is a heart of gold!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510323_Lines: Outta the way, ya bums! Giant squirrel comin' thru!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510321_Lines: Don't blow a gasket, H.E.R.B.I.E. We'll get ya there.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510077_Lines: Rock beats scissors every time, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510112_Lines: The Doc made a fancy magic door.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510110_Lines: Ya left the door open, Doc!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510326_Lines: Wasn't expectin' you, Doc. Where's the big green guy?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510114_Lines: You got a license for that turret, Castle?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510206_Lines: This is where they've been hidin'…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510265_Lines: Hydra again? Don't you ever get sick of these guys, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510209_Lines: This is the place to hit!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510255_Lines: Yeesh. When ya put it like that…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510010_Lines: Ugh. What'd Doomsy do to the universe this time?!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510064_Lines: Well, well. Who have we here?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510292_Lines: They made one mistake… Fightin' me!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510263_Lines: Aww, man. This symbiote slime ain't never gonna wash offa my tootsies!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510087_Lines: OK Gill-Face, take it down a notch.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510072_Lines: Woo, that looks like it hurt.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510245_Lines: Ha! I was gonna say amazing!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510269_Lines: Eh. It's just the end of the world again. We'll have this solved before supper!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510333_Lines: Yeesh! And I thought two Dooms were a big enough pain in my rocky behind!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510307_Lines: Ugh! I'm gonna be washin' symbiote outta my cracks for weeks!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510133_Lines: Aw. Broke the Punisher's big, nasty gun.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510116_Lines: Aww. Ain't those little spiders the cutest?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510249_Lines: I've got thick skin, kid. Words bounce right offa me. Luckily, so do bullets!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510261_Lines: Don't gotta be a giant to make a big difference on the battlefield, lady!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510236_Lines: The Multiverse is confusin'! I mean, are you even the same Logan I know?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510088_Lines: You gotta teach me that move, big guy!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510089_Lines: We can't do this without ya, Big Brain!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510020_Lines: Great. More cosmic weirdos pretendin' to be gods…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510257_Lines: How long has T'Challa been playin' spaceman out here, Quill?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510305_Lines: Ultron's infected a livin' island? What a revoltin' development!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510324_Lines: That tech stuff is spreadin' too fast! We gotta roll!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510320_Lines: Hang in there, pal. Benjy's on the case.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510329_Lines: Eh. Don't really care who's got the power as long as they put it to good use.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510235_Lines: There ain't many others, so I'll take what I can get!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510234_Lines: A few of 'em have tried, but their fangs keep chippin' off!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510076_Lines: Gotta admit, you had it comin', matchstick!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510005_Lines: Family always comes first. Even when it's Johnny…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510267_Lines: It ain't about what your fist is made of, kid. It's how you use it.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510167_Lines: This'll be a joyride with me around, Spider.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510302_Lines: We may be trapped in the dark, but I'm an ever-lovin' ray of sunshine!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510163_Lines: The odds sure ain't in our favor…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510271_Lines: No time for complainin', Buck. Just for clobberin'.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510311_Lines: Let's hope this is the stuff that does Knull in!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510014_Lines: Do me a favor. Don't tell Alicia I was here. She thinks I'm grocery shoppin'.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510252_Lines: Franklin and Val told me about you. Some kinda super pop star, right?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510132_Lines: Frank's turret won't be punishin' no one.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510074_Lines: Too bad it had to end like this, Stretcho!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510317_Lines: Gotta purge all of Ultron's tech from Arakko.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510173_Lines: Gotta clear the way to the World Tree.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510069_Lines: Not so tough now, are ya?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510334_Lines: Nah! I'm glad you showed up, Hulkie. I was worried I'd be the ugliest one here!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510231_Lines: What, maybe I shoulda said trash panda?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510115_Lines: The Punisher's aimin' for all of us!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510079_Lines: Whaddya know! Spidey can stop blabbin' after all!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510248_Lines: Not sure what ya mean, sweetheart…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510256_Lines: Not sure what that is, lady. But most folks consider me an "Oh no!"
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510227_Lines: Back atcha, Match Stick. Let's get busy.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510164_Lines: We're counitn' on goats here? Great…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510318_Lines: We gotta get this thing underground now!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510310_Lines: Time to take Knull out at the source!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510179_Lines: Promised the Panther we'd pull through!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510130_Lines: What? Did I blew out Rocket's amp?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510166_Lines: Gassed up and ready to go, Zero!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510038_Lines: I'll take all the healin' I can get.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510006_Lines: I'm actually the strongest one there is! Don't tell Hulk…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510243_Lines: Oh, I ain't worried about you. I meant you should take it easy on them!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510247_Lines: I ain't worried about me! Just keep those slimy fins of yours off Suzie!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510244_Lines: I prefer to call it a "Two-In-One"… but I catch your drift, kid.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510327_Lines: Got a bad feelin' that's about to change real quick-like.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510176_Lines: Lemme clear out the traffic, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510062_Lines: Just the idiots I was lookin' for.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510094_Lines: Aww! Come on! Not the adorable baby shark!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510246_Lines: I've got my eyes on you, fish face. Don't step outta line.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510181_Lines: I wanna pilot every one of these fancy ships!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510044_Lines: Does this make me an Agent of Shield?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510230_Lines: So, uh, are you actually a raccoon?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510013_Lines: Anyone up for a few hands of cards after this?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510078_Lines: Who needs metal when ya got solid stone, Tony?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510019_Lines: Nothin' more satisfyin' than bustin' up Hydra's toys!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510316_Lines: Sorry, Ultron. Yer tropical getaway's over.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510075_Lines: Sorry, Suzie. You know I never wanted to hurt ya.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510251_Lines: Sorry! No offense! But if Johnny's around, you might wanna take cover. Just sayin'…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510157_Lines: Sorry, pal, but you were askin' for it.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510142_Lines: Got the sniper. We're in the clear.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510156_Lines: You push the boulder, you get crushed.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510262_Lines: Don't worry, doll. I ain't stayin' in any of these kooky realms for long!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510111_Lines: Strange is playin' with portals again!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510304_Lines: The postcard made Krakoa look like paradise! How's that for false advertisin'?!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510332_Lines: We talkin' Uatu here? Or somethin' more sinister, Stretcho?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510340_Lines: Got any programs that can figure out how to deal with these fanged freaks?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510095_Lines: Seriously? Ain't you got no respect for nature?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510344_Lines: Came for a party, ended up at a fight. Story of my life.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510026_Lines: Benjamin J. Grimm, reportin' for duty!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510228_Lines: Another fine mess Doom's gotten us into this time, eh, Stretcho?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510351_Lines: Ready as I'll ever be, kid…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510141_Lines: Kicked that Shooter in the Tooter.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510018_Lines: Well, ain't this a fantastic mess we've gotten ourselves into?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510237_Lines: Yeah! He sure does! With interest!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510126_Lines: Rocket's beacon ain't a problem no more.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510129_Lines: Pulled the plug on Rocket's amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510022_Lines: When the heck did T'Challa go galactic?!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510303_Lines: Central Park is lookin' more dangerous than Yancy Street!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510171_Lines: Wakanda and the FF go way back!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510169_Lines: The Web's waitin' for us. Shall we?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510225_Lines: Keep your Iron Fist, kid. Rock works just fine.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510001_Lines: Checked my watch. It's almost Clobberin' Time!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510096_Lines: Guess even your healin' factor has its limits, pal…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510159_Lines: Guess luck's on my side today!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510021_Lines: Looks like we got ourselves a sticky situation here!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510266_Lines: Lookin' at this place, I get the feelin' they're gonna outlast us both.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510341_Lines: Not sure which is worse. A horde of vamps or an army of Ultron drones.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510135_Lines: Yuck! Got spider-bits all over my tootsies!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510002_Lines: Who needs Four when you've got one like me?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510027_Lines: No thing like the real Thing, baby!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510119_Lines: Wait! I didn't order the seafood!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510091_Lines: Johnny?! Don't you quit on me, kid…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510120_Lines: Your friends are uglier than me, Namor!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510138_Lines: Too easy, Namor… and too squishy!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510322_Lines: No way we're lettin' the vamps take over our city!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510178_Lines: Keep it rollin'! Wakanda needs us!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510250_Lines: Lookin' a little dried out there, old pal. You feelin' okay?
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510258_Lines: Bet he's drawn a lot of attention. The Kree, the Skrulls, the Badoon…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510016_Lines: Okay, already! Less talkin', more fightin'!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510260_Lines: Think I could take it for a spin around Tokyo? I happen to be a decent pilot…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510090_Lines: They'll pay for this, Suzie. I swear they will.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510082_Lines: Still wowin' us after all these years, Suze.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510242_Lines: Promise me you'll take it easy out there, Suzie.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510182_Lines: It ain't the Brooklyn Bridge, but it'll do.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510174_Lines: Get ready to hit the throttle, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510007_Lines: Life was easier before all this galactic gobbledygook!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510202_Lines: Let's smash this place up good!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510345_Lines: True. I'd rather just kick my feet up and play a friendly game of cards.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510264_Lines: Ya know, for the first time ever, bein' bald as a stone don't seem so bad!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510253_Lines: Thanks… but I'm really more of a classic rock guy…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510350_Lines: You know, if it wasn't for you watchin' the kiddos H.E.R.B.I.E., I don't know how the FF would ever go off on missions!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510104_Lines: Just what we needed. A sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510023_Lines: Lousy symbiotes… Always gettin' their goop stuck in my cracks…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510183_Lines: Fancy rocks… but I'm happy with the ones I've got!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510015_Lines: This sure is a long way from Yancy Street…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510068_Lines: That's how we do it on Yancy Street!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510085_Lines: That's how ya do it old school, Cap!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510180_Lines: Now that looks like a real challenge!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510254_Lines: We've just done this dance so many times, Suzie. It's gettin' kinda old.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510160_Lines: Not exactly the endin' I expected…
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510011_Lines: Been fightin' cosmic menaces all my life. Just another day on the job.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510352_Lines: You're darn right I do, Matchstick!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510240_Lines: Stand back, hot stuff. Your ol' pal Benjy's got this covered!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510140_Lines: That sniper won't be botherin' us again.
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510335_Lines: Better than watchin' your big green mug any day, gruesome!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510229_Lines: Yeah, well, I plan to make a delivery of my own. A rocky fist to his metal face!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510081_Lines: Now that's what I call hittin' a stretch goal, Reed!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510268_Lines: Been way too long since we hung out, yer majesty!
122_HeroVoice_1051_ST.1051001_HeroVoice_10510175_Lines: Gettin' closer to the Web, kid. Keep it up!

122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520215_Lines: We need to claim this spot!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520103_Lines: You'll fall long before I do.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520074_Lines: Sorry, Moon Knight. You were getting on my nerves.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520210_Lines: Defend this place at all costs!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520255_Lines: Step aside. The immortal Iron Fist has arrived.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520004_Lines: Immortality comes with a price, but I was glad to pay it!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520242_Lines: Say no more, Thor. I'll make sure my fist is charged up, just in case.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520179_Lines: We can't delay any longer. Wakanda needs us.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520055_Lines: We can't let them take over.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520233_Lines: I don't think Captain K'un-Lun has the same ring to it, though…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520155_Lines: That was for the glory of K'un-Lun!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520239_Lines: Hydra, huh? That's kind of like a dragon, isn't it?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520236_Lines: I've never seen a chi so perfectly aligned, Adam…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520183_Lines: How could they defile such a sacred place?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520126_Lines: Their beacon is headed for the trash.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520243_Lines: Is he a giant mystical spider that I can punch in the heart?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520124_Lines: My apologies to your moon god, bro…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520014_Lines: Even though it shattered, the Sword of Fu Xi is always with me.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520319_Lines: You're underestimating me, buddy. My chi is fully focused!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520085_Lines: You totally rocked that out, Star-Lord!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520241_Lines: That's the story. Why? You got one that needs slaying?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520326_Lines: Hard to focus the full power of my mind on anything the way you're swinging that thing…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520069_Lines: This fight was never yours to win.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520122_Lines: Your little ankh crumbled in my fist.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520253_Lines: That's an impressive piece of equipment you've got there.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520328_Lines: You really think they'll be able to help if we go up against Doctor Doom?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520327_Lines: Any chance you could tell your little friends to stop skittering around? I'm trying to focus here!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520375_Lines: How many arrows do you have left in that quiver of yours?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520072_Lines: You fought with honor. Eh, kinda.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520278_Lines: Fully focused and ready to go!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520381_Lines: You don't have any formal martial arts training, do you, Spider-Man?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520299_Lines: If we don't get to that castle soon, it's over!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520295_Lines: If we don't get underground soon, Knull wins.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520174_Lines: Keep following the webs to victory!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520073_Lines: You call yourself a Sword Master, Blade? Please.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520177_Lines: Don't lose faith, Spider. We we'll win this race.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520175_Lines: Don't worry. Our destination hangs on the horizon…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520163_Lines: Don't let their numbers intimidate you.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520016_Lines: Even Immortal Weapons need a little help now and then.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520248_Lines: A shame I'm not the type of Iron Fist who needs a partner.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520226_Lines: That's some serious armor you've got there, Stark.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520383_Lines: Go for it, Logan. You've got a lot more experience on the battlefield than I do.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520019_Lines: Yuck…Shou-Lao would love to see this place burn…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520380_Lines: I never really thought of it before. But based on your expression, I clearly should have…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520374_Lines: Oh, you can come if you want. I'd just be ready to throw hands if I were you…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520228_Lines: Oh, wow. I used to have an enchanted sword, too!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520282_Lines: Whoa. Strong chi in this place… like the whole planet's alive!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520170_Lines: Wow, compared to Shou Lao, Bast's spiritual essence is so tiny!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520009_Lines: Wow. The Multiverse really needs its chi balanced!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520245_Lines: Wow. How do you even begin to protect an empire this vast, T'Challa?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520083_Lines: Whoa, wanna teach me how to fight "spider style" after this?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520082_Lines: Whoa, Thor! You brought more thunder than Lei Kung!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520279_Lines: Wow. This city has got some serious negative chi!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520010_Lines: What? You were expecting Danny Rand?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520089_Lines: Oof! That was some bad mojo, Wanda.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520005_Lines: There were lots of Iron Fists before me, but I'll be the best.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520013_Lines: It's every hero for themselves where I'm from.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520080_Lines: In the Battle of Iron, Fist beats Man!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520054_Lines: Stand strong and defend this place.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520297_Lines: Avengers Tower can’t be much further. Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520373_Lines: The Seven Capital Cities of Heaven kinda have their own thing going right now…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520247_Lines: Good. Then I'll know right where to hit them!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520224_Lines: Been too long since we did this together, Luna. Ready for an encore?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520231_Lines: Okay, showoff. You win this round.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520368_Lines: Well, at the moment, I'm more concerned about your connection to Knull than mine!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520182_Lines: Such unusual magic. Reminds me of K'un-Lun…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520008_Lines: You know my legacy, but this is a whole new chapter!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520173_Lines: If we turn back now, Yggsgard falls!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520235_Lines: Right, right… but a mystical enchantment sure doesn't hurt…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520407_Lines: Couldn't even if I wanted to. That sword is a part of me now.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520254_Lines: When my chi is fully-focused, my hand is ten times as strong as yours.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520406_Lines: The Sword of Dracula. That's a pretty impressive weapon you've got there.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520178_Lines: Hurry! Wakanda's salvation is in our hands!
