122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520115_Lines: The Punisher built some sort of turret.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520114_Lines: Punisher's got a cannon now? Great.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520113_Lines: Looks like a powerful turret, Punisher…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520131_Lines: Guns are no match for fists, Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520302_Lines: Ultron won't stop, so we can't either!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520376_Lines: Because if Ultron can take control of technology, that includes advanced weaponry…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520281_Lines: They wanna dance? Wait 'til they see my moves!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520171_Lines: May the Dragon and the Panther guide us!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520180_Lines: I could shatter this thing with a single punch!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520256_Lines: I am now. And if you need solid proof, my fists are glad to deliver.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520293_Lines: We can’t stand by while Arakko falls.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520202_Lines: We could do some real damage here!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520288_Lines: We need to get this beneath the surface.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520211_Lines: We need to protect this location!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520292_Lines: A squirrel's going to save us? Didn't expect that.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520140_Lines: Took down that coward shooting at us…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520238_Lines: I'd be glad to show you up close… but you'd be out cold before you could ever tell!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520088_Lines: Remind me not to make the tiny shark angry, okay?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520078_Lines: Punched that talking tree into splinters!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520133_Lines: I busted up the Punisher's turret.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520165_Lines: I'm used to fabled realms counting on me…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520001_Lines: I'm the sworn protector of K'un-Lun! Who are you?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520003_Lines: I used to be a Sword Master, but now I'm so much more.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520230_Lines: I used to have a blade like that: The Sword of Fu Xi.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520139_Lines: I've tamed dragons! Squids are nothing!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520291_Lines: This won't be an easy road. I can feel it…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520307_Lines: Where I’m from, K’Un-Lun needed a new protector, so Shou-Lao blessed me with power.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520325_Lines: My predecessors could infuse their chi into weapons, just like you.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520002_Lines: My power is a gift from Shou-Lao the Undying!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520024_Lines: My fist's ready to knock a few fangs out!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520273_Lines: My chi is all tapped out.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520308_Lines: With our fists together, iron and stone, the other side doesn't stand a chance!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520018_Lines: The Dooms are begging for an Iron Fist to their iron faces!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520127_Lines: I shattered the space rat's beacon.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520021_Lines: And I already thought Tokyo was weird enough…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520367_Lines: Mine's just a dragon, bro. I'm sure any similarities are just a coincidence.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520385_Lines: So, you're the almighty Phoenix Force I've read so much about…? Huh.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520206_Lines: I think I've found their hiding spot.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520218_Lines: We have to keep it moving.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520056_Lines: We'll have to earn this win.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520167_Lines: You can put your faith in us, Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520161_Lines: There are more of them than us…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520101_Lines: I rise in the name of K'un-Lun!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520012_Lines: K'un-Lun is one of the last standing sanctuaries in my world.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520280_Lines: Central Park doesn't look anything like this on the postcards…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520094_Lines: You're a beautiful soul, Mantis. May you find peace.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520015_Lines: I'm not sure my training is at the "save the Multiverse" stage yet…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520203_Lines: Let's bring this place to the ground!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520011_Lines: And I thought the Agents of Atlas were a strange crew…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520294_Lines: We need to deliver this core to stop Ultron.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520240_Lines: Then it's a good thing we've both got iron fists.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520157_Lines: You kinda brought this on yourself.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520379_Lines: No. But we have these adorable tiny foxes that leave a trail of fire behind them.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520091_Lines: You weren't invisible to me, Mrs Richards.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520134_Lines: The spider-bots are no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520201_Lines: Watching this spot might be smart.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520159_Lines: You can't escape your fate. Trust me.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520172_Lines: We'll make it to the enchanted tree. I swear.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520084_Lines: Guess the name "Fantastic" isn't just boasting after all!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520158_Lines: Guess this realm has chosen its champion.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520244_Lines: Too bad. That's kinda my signature move.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520092_Lines: Sorry the winds turned against you, Storm.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520234_Lines: You hit almost as hard as I do, Thing! And I have the Iron Fist!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520320_Lines: You know what? I'm just gonna let you have this one…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520300_Lines: Keep going! Letting Dracula win isn't an option!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520298_Lines: Keep clearing the path. H.E.R.B.I.E. needs us.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520077_Lines: Guess Adamantium isn't stronger than iron, Logan!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520324_Lines: My fist may be iron, but that doesn't mean you can bend me to your will.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520090_Lines: Your flame may be out, Torch. But my fist burns eternal!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520283_Lines: I could take down a dragon… but this guy is a whole different level…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520166_Lines: The Web beckons. Let's answer the call.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520176_Lines: We'll guide you through, Zero. You have my word.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520086_Lines: If you can't have an Iron Fist, stone's the next best thing!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520382_Lines: And what happens when your Spider-Sense inevitably fails you?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520386_Lines: I don't know… You sounded a lot more majestic in those old scrolls about Fongji Wu…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520289_Lines: Who's up for a trip to Avengers Tower?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520296_Lines: Come on! The sooner we deliver this essence, the better.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520075_Lines: Sweet ninja moves, Psylocke. But not sweet enough.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520227_Lines: Not really. I mean, why wear an iron suit when one fist works just as well?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520225_Lines: You can't deny, that would be a hot ticket.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520057_Lines: This place is our key to victory.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520290_Lines: This little robot's the key to saving this city.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520119_Lines: The creatures of the deep are so weird…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520121_Lines: These squids look fun to punch!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520137_Lines: The sound those squids made when I hit them… Ugggh…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520117_Lines: These robotic spiders look like trouble.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520022_Lines: We are a long, long way from home…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520087_Lines: The power of a balanced chi, right, Adam?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520287_Lines: So, this is like Knull's chi? Talk about dark…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520214_Lines: This area has got to be ours!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520109_Lines: This must belong to Moon Knight…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520384_Lines: That's low. But you want proof I can hang? Then you'd better keep your eye on my fist!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520284_Lines: Anyone else picking up on some really bad vibes down here?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520023_Lines: A living alien planet that wants to devour me whole? Good times.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520323_Lines: Good for you, old man. But age doesn't always mean wisdom.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520237_Lines: When you start to lose focus, what do you do to recalibrate.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520229_Lines: No… I was just a guy with a cool sword… but now I'm kinda glad I'm not…
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520160_Lines: Cool! The world itself is on my side!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520025_Lines: The Iron Fist awaits your command.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520026_Lines: Call, and the Iron Fist will answer!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520232_Lines: You're a huge inspiration to my generation of heroes, Cap.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520081_Lines: You sure you don't have enchanted fists, Cap?
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520301_Lines: Arakko's survival depends on this core!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520093_Lines: We'll keep Wakanda safe, your highness. You have our word.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520169_Lines: I'm not one to keep Life and Destiny waiting.
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520076_Lines: I'll take that fancy sword now, Magik. Thanks!
122_HeroVoice_1052_ST.1052001_HeroVoice_10520096_Lines: Your sacrifice won't be forgotten, Widow.

122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530043_Lines: "Longing"… "Rusted"… "Furnace"… What are these random words repeating in your mind?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530118_Lines: Of course, the X-Men leave New York and everything goes to hell!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530086_Lines: Follow my lead. Or don't. I really don't care.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530276_Lines: Next time, just leave it to me.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530369_Lines: Ugh. We've done this dance so many times. It's exhausting.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530196_Lines: I needed that more than I'll admit.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530172_Lines: The mighty Magneto, savior of Mutantkind, strikes again. Huzzah.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530179_Lines: No, my baby! They will pay for this!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530143_Lines: The World Tree lies ahead. We can't stop now!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530169_Lines: This is for Arakko, Ultron. And every other land you've corrupted.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530376_Lines: If I wanted a glow up, dear, I'd would have just paid for it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530072_Lines: I'm as flawless as they come, darling.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530007_Lines: This is haute couture, darling. Designed by Jumbo Carnation himself.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530293_Lines: You really should be more careful, dear.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530132_Lines: The streets of Tokyo belong to us now.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530233_Lines: All they did was make me angrier.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530080_Lines: I swear, if this outfit gets ruined, there will be hell to pay!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530013_Lines: How nice of you to join us, Illyana. Done playing Demon Queen?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530027_Lines: And yet here you are, covered in gold from head to toe.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530158_Lines: In the name of Mutantkind, we must not fail Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530065_Lines: You're not a Mutant, yet you can commune directly with Krakoa? How unexpected…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530351_Lines: So am I. That whole "skull on the chest" motif is so two decades ago…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530277_Lines: You did your part. I suppose.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530271_Lines: Is that the best the oceans had to offer?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530063_Lines: I don't recall you or your band of space misfits making it onto the guest list…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530242_Lines: Did you drop something, Moon Knight?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530270_Lines: For a king, your army is lacking, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530019_Lines: Your… rodent…is a fan…? How… unexpected…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530253_Lines: These beasts of yours disgust me, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530288_Lines: I will make you suffer for what you've done.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530272_Lines: Your friends can’t help you now, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530226_Lines: Did you even train for this?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530361_Lines: How nice of you to dress for the occasion…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530006_Lines: You should have stopped while you were ahead, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530371_Lines: Your ceremonial garb is truly stunning. A perfect look for this year's Hellfire Gala!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530358_Lines: *Gasp* And your grating "music" belongs in the bargain bin. But we must find common ground.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530145_Lines: Why have you stopped, Zero? Keep pushing forward!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530062_Lines: Poor boy. It must be hard to realize you're not nearly as hot as you think you are…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530134_Lines: Krakoa stands with Wakanda until the end of the road!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530195_Lines: I was fine. But thank you.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530018_Lines: Take another look. Do you really need to ask that, Tony?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530174_Lines: Keep that up, Namor, and you may earn yourself a Queen!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530184_Lines: If the Phoenix can fall, what hope do we have?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530067_Lines: You! Tree! I can read your thoughts. Tell me, how much longer can Arakko hold on?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530130_Lines: Pay those fools no mind, Spider-Zero. They cannot stop us.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530326_Lines: Are you going to help me or not?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530009_Lines: I haven't found anything that's been able to damage it yet.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530111_Lines: So much power. Time to use it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530321_Lines: The perfect site for an attack.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530069_Lines: The higher the pressure, the more dazzling the diamond.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530319_Lines: So this is where they've been hiding…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530345_Lines: You must change out of that tattered rag before the Gala, dear.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530084_Lines: The harder they resist, the more this will hurt.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530238_Lines: There's a shooter on the scene!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530047_Lines: I believe the verdict is still out as to whether we Mutants will offer aid to your undersea kingdom.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530070_Lines: When Mutants are in danger, the White Queen answers. Usually.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530001_Lines: Such poor timing, though. I just had my nails done.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530050_Lines: Not with the right amount of makeup, dear.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530133_Lines: If King T'Challa wants this statue, we will deliver.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530015_Lines: And yet, somehow, when I enter a room, all eyes are on me.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530082_Lines: A shame my students aren't here to witness this lesson.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530256_Lines: Now your ankh is as broken as your mind, Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530117_Lines: Ugh! I've stepped on something dreadful. And this time, I don't mean our foes…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530068_Lines: Tell Arakko that we will do everything in our power to purge this threat.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530211_Lines: Destiny calls. And we will answer.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530075_Lines: Unlike some X-Men, I don't care who hates and fears me.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530344_Lines: Oh, how precious. But we absolutely must get you a better agent, dear…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530378_Lines: And there are more to learn at the bottom of my boot should you try again.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530120_Lines: Ugh. I'd rather be lost in the Morlock Tunnels than here…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530045_Lines: Hmm… Is that a low level psychic bond I'm picking up on?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530379_Lines: Mmm. I do love a man in uniform…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530245_Lines: Hmm. That isn't a Krakoan portal…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530217_Lines: Well? What are you waiting for?!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530014_Lines: Helping to run a sovereign Mutant nation… Oh, and I just had a manicure…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530180_Lines: Your battle raged on longer than any of us expected, Erik.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530364_Lines: Look around, Erik. I don't think this world belongs to the humans anymore.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530128_Lines: Is this what I've been reduced to? Escorting goats?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530154_Lines: Avenger Tower is so close. Don't give up now, H.E.R.B.I.E.!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530199_Lines: A little extra power never hurt.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530203_Lines: I won't turn down extra protection.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530243_Lines: The Doctor has opened a portal…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530085_Lines: Queen. Mother. Perfection. I answer to all three.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530151_Lines: If we fail here, we fail all of existence. Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530342_Lines: If it is, at least we'll both go out looking fabulous, darling.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530140_Lines: If this beast can save New York, we must protect it on its journey.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530109_Lines: Power like this is worth waiting for…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530136_Lines: It's up to us to safely deliver this essence and prevent Knull's rise.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530295_Lines: There are more of them than there are of us.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530163_Lines: Silly little girl. You call yourself a Queen? Ha!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530247_Lines: Careful. The Punisher brought out his big gun.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530168_Lines: You were a better husband than fighter, Tony.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530268_Lines: Are all of those little robots gone now? Good.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530263_Lines: Your amplifier failed, rodent. And so shall you.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530323_Lines: We'll need to go on the defensive here.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530121_Lines: All I ask is that my gala go as planned for just one year!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530139_Lines: Not even Dracula himself could stop us now!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530362_Lines: For the high society event of the year? Really?!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530150_Lines: We need to cleanse Bast now or all is lost!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530052_Lines: Of course I could, darling. After all… I am Emma Frost.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530348_Lines: Always. But I'm sure they'll take credit for our hard work anyway… They always do…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530024_Lines: Without a doubt. It's past time a White Queen took the throne.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530016_Lines: Every mission is secret. I take what I want and erase any memory of it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530352_Lines: The best looks are, darling. I suppose yours does make a point. A sharp one.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530147_Lines: If we don't clear these streets for Spider-Zero, we lose!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530161_Lines: Where's the skyscraper with my name on it?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530278_Lines: Now's the part where you thank me.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530265_Lines: The Punisher's turret has been disabled. You're welcome.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530232_Lines: You can’t be rid of me so easily, I'm afraid.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530155_Lines: If we want to end this night, we can’t afford to slow down now!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530028_Lines: You and I both, darling. We have more in common than you'd like to believe.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530360_Lines: I know you, Tony, darling. And I can guarantee you'd find the benefits irresistible.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530073_Lines: I proudly wear the "X"… even when it clashes with my ensemble.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530148_Lines: We'll clear a path, Spider-Zero. The rest is up to you.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530297_Lines: We have no choice. Fall back!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530330_Lines: We do not surrender what is ours!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530153_Lines: We will not be stopped short. Do you hear me, robot?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530296_Lines: Our side is lacking in numbers…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530327_Lines: We need to capture this spot!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530152_Lines: I've had enough darkness for a lifetime. We have to stop Knull!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530077_Lines: I'm Hellfire Club royalty! This… is beneath me…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530234_Lines: I'm back. And now there's Hellfire to pay!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530023_Lines: I had my fill of Black Kings back when I was in the Hellfire Club…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530357_Lines: My daughters convinced me to invite you to the Gala. I just expected a better outfit.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530284_Lines: I took out five of them.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530083_Lines: I left the beaches of Krakoa for this…? >Sigh<
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530042_Lines: I'm scanning your thoughts right now, and not one of them makes the slightest bit of sense!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530380_Lines: Welcome to every day of my life. You'll get used to it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530137_Lines: I have faith in you, H.E.R.B.I.E. Don't make me regret it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530290_Lines: I've been waiting to give you what you deserve.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530332_Lines: I will not tolerate more delays.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530021_Lines: And I can read your thoughts. No need to keep our conversation so basic.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530354_Lines: I may be known as the White Queen, but I have little interest in being yours.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530291_Lines: Barely had to lift a finger.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530123_Lines: I can still hear the echoes of this Celestial's consciousness…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530114_Lines: This is the realm of Gods? Color me unimpressed…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530127_Lines: We need to get these beasts to Yggdrasill.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530138_Lines: Getting this robot to Avengers Tower should be simple enough.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530266_Lines: Sorry, Frank. But I'm sure you have plenty of other weapons.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530381_Lines: Remember, it is a formal affair, Namor. Should I assume you'll be wearing a shirt?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530372_Lines: Don't worry. The Gala always has plenty of chances for both.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530017_Lines: Wealth, good looks, business acumen. We'd make quite the power couple.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530244_Lines: Strange is up to his old tricks again.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530044_Lines: Someone implanted a code in your brain, didn't they? A way to control you. Fascinating…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530229_Lines: I could go for a pick me up.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530124_Lines: Time for the White Queen to put this Black King in check.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530255_Lines: Moon Knight's ankh has been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530349_Lines: Well, it was going to be until Ultron showed up…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530030_Lines: Do you know how jealous that would make Ororo? Sounds delightful!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530341_Lines: We've managed to fend it off more times than I care to count, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530181_Lines: I will keep the thunder raging in your honor, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530020_Lines: We all find our own ways to shine. Even those we least expect.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530071_Lines: The only thing stronger than my skin is my mind.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530113_Lines: And I thought the Hellfire Club's dungeons were dreary…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530346_Lines: Tyrone, real heroes know how to save the world and look good doing it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530353_Lines: Why are you leering at me, Loki? Did you have too much punch at the gala?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530207_Lines: Like a day at the spa!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530261_Lines: Rocket's amplifier has been turned down.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530175_Lines: Ruthless, Psylocke. Just the way I like it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530267_Lines: Finally. No more Spider-Bots to worry about.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530116_Lines: T'Challa built an empire? We can barely rule a single island!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530149_Lines: T'Challa is counting on us. We can’t let Wakanda down!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530273_Lines: I took out the sniper. For now.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530275_Lines: The sniper is defeated. You can come out now.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530237_Lines: We've been targeted by a sniper…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530337_Lines: Life alone in the cosmos can have quite an effect on one's mental state, I imagine…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530041_Lines: I thought you were supposed to be one of the smartest men on the planet, Richards…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530176_Lines: Hmm. I thought I was the dangerous one, Jean…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530005_Lines: Flattery will get you everywhere, my dear.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530269_Lines: I've crushed those Spider-Bots under my high heels.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530347_Lines: The White Queen and the Black Widow. Quite the lethal pair.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530076_Lines: The White Queen always gets what she wants. At any cost.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530003_Lines: Men have said as much. I prove them wrong consistently, just as any diva would.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530078_Lines: Please. I've faced greater challenges in the Danger Room.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530308_Lines: I'm not at my best, clearly.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530343_Lines: I suppose you've made quite a name for yourself. And a pretty penny as well.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530171_Lines: I see you've been taking my lessons to heart, Magik. Brava!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530049_Lines: Obviously, you've been speaking to my therapist. But I'm not sure that's relevant right now…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530165_Lines: And so the Goddess comes crashing down to Earth!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530164_Lines: Looks like I'll be leading our people now, Magneto.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530167_Lines: Won't be seeing you around, Susan.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530012_Lines: And yet there you are, bathed in red from head to toe. How fitting…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530173_Lines: I can’t say I'm shocked, Ororo. But clearly, they were.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530046_Lines: How curious. An arachnid's thoughts must be quite jarring to a human.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530061_Lines: Really? Do tell me when he arrives…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530131_Lines: We will get you to Budokan before you know it.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530359_Lines: Indeed. Though we are always seeking new partners. Particularly wealthy, handsome ones.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530146_Lines: The Shrine can't be much further. Let's finish this!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530370_Lines: Wait… Is that an option? I'll go get my checkbook!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530119_Lines: I'm off to the boutiques on Fifth Avenue after this. That's not an invitation.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530254_Lines: Keep your tentacles to yourself, Namor!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530182_Lines: Some king you turned out to be, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530166_Lines: You turned against your people, Namor. And you paid the price.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530198_Lines: As if I wasn't strong enough!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530170_Lines: I do love your particular brand of violence, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530373_Lines: I saw your most recent invoice for supplies, Logan. I have concerns…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530178_Lines: Logan?! How long will it take you to regenerate this time…?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530122_Lines: Mutantkind will protect its sovereign territory from any threat.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530141_Lines: Ultron will pay for what he has done to Arakko!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530002_Lines: It's not quite Adamantium, but I suppose it will do.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530129_Lines: Stay close to us, Spider-Zero, and you'll be fine.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530289_Lines: Revenge is best served cold. And nothing is colder than Frost.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530209_Lines: Shall I throw a gala in our honor?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530135_Lines: We'll be headed beneath the planet's surface? Delightful.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530156_Lines: We get this rodent to Dracula's Castle… or we all end up vampires…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530048_Lines: Let me guess. Sue Storm rejected you again? You certainly do have a type, Namor…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530162_Lines: I'll admit, I truly enjoyed putting you down, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530251_Lines: Can someone exterminate these robotic pests?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530333_Lines: They do not get past us. Understand?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530004_Lines: Tsk thank you, Susan. You're definitely a mom, but I don't know about being "mother".
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530051_Lines: That… may very well be the kindest thing anyone has ever said about me…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530328_Lines: This area is ours for the taking!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530313_Lines: You might want to look over here.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530241_Lines: This ankh looks priceless… I must have it…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530159_Lines: A Queen like me could get used to a throne like this…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530338_Lines: Let's just say I've been keeping him warm amidst this chaos.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530011_Lines: Only the years of unnecessary pain and strife you caused my people.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530316_Lines: This place is aching to be destroyed!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530374_Lines: You do not need yet another motorcycle to crash.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530102_Lines: Now that's White Queen Mind Control.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530177_Lines: Maximoff, the Mutant Threat, shows her true colors.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530144_Lines: Delivering this weapon may be Yggsgard's only hope. Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530115_Lines: I'm beginning to doubt this future was worth fighting for.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530022_Lines: Then again… Perhaps simple is the way to go…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530081_Lines: Could I please just pay to win this one? I have the funds…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530363_Lines: These are the days when I'm glad we left New York for Krakoa.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530235_Lines: I will have my revenge for that.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530250_Lines: These robotic spiders could be an issue…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530292_Lines: I'll gladly claim the victory as my own.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530066_Lines: If living here has taught me anything, it's that the trees are always listening… Like it or not…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530079_Lines: Stand back and let the White Queen show you how it's done.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530008_Lines: And I'm practically seething inside about how good it looks on you.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530274_Lines: That annoying sniper has been dealt with.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530010_Lines: Whatever it is, I'd prefer if you aimed it at our opponents, darling.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530350_Lines: And you'll likely cost me millions in the process…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530074_Lines: Money can't buy happiness… but I can afford everything else!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530157_Lines: Arakko is in grave danger! We have to push harder!
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530029_Lines: Our galas are known for their unexpected twists, your highness.
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530160_Lines: I dare not imagine what Hydra would do to my people…
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530375_Lines: Shouldn't that have earned us your respect instead of your ire?
122_HeroVoice_1053_ST.1053001_HeroVoice_10530142_Lines: Mutantkind will not stand idly by while our nation is defiled!

122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540008_Lines: [Phoenix Force] "Host" is an outdated term. Jean Grey and I are one now.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540055_Lines: [Phoenix Force] A cosmic warrior, struck down too soon. You shall be avenged.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540371_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You cannot hide your emotions from me. I can feel the unease in both of your halves.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540288_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Why waste your time fighting when I can burn his darkness from existence?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540233_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Their numbers are greater… but not their power…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540224_Lines: [Phoenix Force] They have all tasted my flames.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540257_Lines: [Phoenix Force] They can hide from us no longer!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540142_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Their attacks do little harm.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540097_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I hope you slumber well, my love…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540338_Lines: [Phoenix Force] It could burn far more than that if I'm not careful…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540391_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Yet you and your Guardians have tampered with so many of them over the years.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540215_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You finished the job well.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540306_Lines: [Phoenix Force] How can one walk away from an eternity of cosmic splendor?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540165_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You have been judged unworthy.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540318_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You would have used my cosmic flames to burn entire worlds to the ground.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540285_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You have the power to reshape this reality to your whims.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540373_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I can see the hatred in your eyes, King of the Secret Seas.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540194_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You have no influence here now, Khonshu!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540105_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Your magic's no match for a force of creation, Strange.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540347_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Your life, while artificial, feels familiar. Of what are you forged?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540287_Lines: [Phoenix Force] It was your dark god that brought me back from my cosmic sojourn.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540091_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Push forth, noble rodent, or this realm of mortals is doomed.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540259_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Prepare to unleash your fury here!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540172_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The Phoenix burns once more!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540276_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The Phoenix's cosmic flames were meant to burn the skies, not to be hidden away in the cold depths.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540364_Lines: [Phoenix Force] No. It's your chaos magic. It is the perfect balance to my own power…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540150_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Do not forfeit what we have claimed!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540098_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Where are these so-called gods in this desperate time?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540013_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Even if this world dies, we shall be reborn anew.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540319_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I have witnessed how you fight on, even in the face of insurmountable odds. I am impressed.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540300_Lines: [Phoenix Force] That is what they all say at the beginning…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540001_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I am the Phoenix. Behold my cosmic might!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540049_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Upon my wings, this world shall burn. May fire be the last thing Knull feels.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540263_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Who is brave enough to aid me?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540354_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Ah… You were communing with a Celestial. That takes great power.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540348_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Ah. It was mined from within my sanctuary, the White Hot Room.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540261_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Here, we make our stand!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540384_Lines: [Phoenix Force] How short sighted. You can have your kingdom of ash. I will always rise from it.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540302_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Most beings are not eager to face judgment on a cosmic scale…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540323_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Most beings tremble in my presence. But you can see that I am more than just death. I am rebirth.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540394_Lines: [Phoenix Force] She witnessed my full glory. And you only had a taste. Soon, you will change your mind.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540144_Lines: [Phoenix Force] As pure as creation itself!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540274_Lines: [Phoenix Force] If they’re on Klyntar, better find them fast. I’m going to destroy the whole planet.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540382_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Odin's wrath had to be earned. Keep talking and I will gladly give you mine for free.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540179_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Khonshu has made his presence known.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540393_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You do not seem impressed, child. Do I not live up to the legends?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540325_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You have devoted yourself to protecting the Web of Life and Destiny, child?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540200_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The cosmic amplifier is no more.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540018_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The fate of all existence lies in the hands of such tiny creatures? Hmm…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540230_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The universe is on our side.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540363_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I feel… strangely drawn to you, child…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540301_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Be wary, Frank Castle. The Phoenix is watching you.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540067_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The power of Bast herself lies within this totem… Interesting…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540146_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Rejoice! We have prevailed… for now…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540330_Lines: [Phoenix Force] When the final hour comes, you will be judged on far more than your abilities.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540235_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The odds are against us. Regroup!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540253_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Raze this place to the ground!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540372_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Victory for the greater good often comes at an even greater cost.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540185_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The Punisher has enhanced his arsenal…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540203_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The Punisher's weapon has been disabled.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540227_Lines: [Phoenix Force] May you suffer for all of eternity!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540337_Lines: [Phoenix Force] And I sensed you, Warlock. It was you who led me here.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540383_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I embody the full cycle of creation. You are simply the end. Nothing more.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540152_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Shall we take control of this spot?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540313_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You and I burn with a cosmic fury few mortals could ever hope to contain.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540173_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I am fire and life incarnate!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540307_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I am no mere spirit, child. I am a force of creation.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540316_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I could erase all the damage that they have done to you in an instant.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540309_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I sense in you a being pure of heart. One worthy enough to be my next host.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540336_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My concern is not with your deeds. But rather the lies you've told yourself to permit them.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540335_Lines: [Phoenix Force] No, I am not. Not yet. But if I were, I would have grave concerns.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540126_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I fear I can be harmed now…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540128_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I cannot recover my strength.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540136_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I am stronger than ever!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540130_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My cosmic fire burns low…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540044_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My cosmic fury is beyond limit!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540314_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My flames have reduced entire worlds to ash.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540040_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My flame is still too dim…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540245_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My flames are growing dim.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540134_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My flames burn bright once more!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540046_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I can feel Odin's presence here. Perhaps it is time we were reunited…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540305_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I know you, mortal. You were once the Celestial Madonna.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540345_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I remember you, Anthony Stark of Earth.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540310_Lines: [Phoenix Force] I was speaking to the miniscule mammal that you call Tippy-Toe.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540299_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Only those who seek to crush innocent worlds under their heel.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540156_Lines: [Phoenix Force] We fight to the last second!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540374_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You don't wish to finish what you started and wash them from existence?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540328_Lines: [Phoenix Force] All worlds shall face my judgement... in due time…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540265_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Come and claim what is rightfully ours!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540148_Lines: [Phoenix Force] We must seize this territory!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540271_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Our foes seek to halt our progress.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540158_Lines: [Phoenix Force] A foe has revealed themselves.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540154_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Our time grows short. Attack!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540308_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Demon or angel. That is for others to decide, once the flames have cleared.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540251_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Curious. This is worth your notice.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540206_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The spider mechanoids are no longer a threat.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540069_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Come! Let us venture below and burn away Knull's darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540329_Lines: [Phoenix Force] You have found yourself in the presence of the Phoenix, Clint Barton of Earth.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540331_Lines: [Phoenix Force] We know you, Ororo Munroe. And we trust you to fight by our side.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540065_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Budokan awaits… Follow us, little spider.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540286_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Chaos and creation have always gone hand-in-hand.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540292_Lines: [Phoenix Force] One should not take such pleasure in bringing death. Only rebirth.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540381_Lines: [Phoenix Force] True. Odin cared for me. But not as deeply as he would come to care for his sons.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540255_Lines: [Phoenix Force] There! One of our foes!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540379_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Hela will be judged for her actions. And it will not be kindly.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540291_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Mortals fear us, Hela. They do not see that we are essential forces of cosmic balance.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540191_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The creatures of the deep have surfaced!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540209_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Back to the depths with you, monsters!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540332_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Jean Grey is listening. But at this moment, it is the Phoenix with whom you speak.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540016_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Jean thinks fondly of so many of you. I hope to learn why…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540324_Lines: [Phoenix Force] If only the others we fight alongside could hear the wisdom of your words…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540087_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Knull's darkness must not spread beyond this world! Onward!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540317_Lines: [Phoenix Force] We remember you, Namor. All too well…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540083_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The Master Weaver is waiting. We must not disappoint…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540267_Lines: [Phoenix Force] They shall not take this land from us!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540344_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Knull's darkness cannot be allowed to envelop the universe.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540085_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Forge ahead. We must not let Bast fall further into darkness!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540042_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Patience. My power is still building.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540182_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The Sorcerer Supreme is bending reality…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540079_Lines: [Phoenix Force] If we cannot reach the World Tree, more than Yggsgard will burn…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540346_Lines: [Phoenix Force] One does not easily forget having their essence fractured into pieces.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540093_Lines: [Phoenix Force] If Arakko is to live, we must burn away this disease!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540021_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Behold the fury of the Phoenix!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540017_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Please, show me why you deserve my mercy instead of my flames.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540357_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Do you remember me, Phoenix-Son?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540109_Lines: [Phoenix Force] My former vessel, as rageful as ever…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540320_Lines: [Phoenix Force] A fact that makes you one of the few humans truly worthy of harnessing my vast cosmic might.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540327_Lines: [Phoenix Force] This is merely one of my forms. My flames can span the heavens themselves.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540073_Lines: [Phoenix Force] This ancient creature will be this world's salvation!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540326_Lines: [Phoenix Force] That is a job of great cosmic importance. Are you certain you are up to the task?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540343_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The time has come to pass judgement on this planet.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540176_Lines: [Phoenix Force] A distant attacker. They must be stopped.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540212_Lines: [Phoenix Force] That coward will not be shooting at us any longer.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540358_Lines: [Phoenix Force] And what of your rebirth? Or of Firehair and your father?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540197_Lines: [Phoenix Force] The rodent's beacon is no longer a concern.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540392_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Then let us hope your actions live up to that promise this day, Peter Quill.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540353_Lines: [Phoenix Force] Your mind seems familiar to me, golden one. Have we met?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540061_Lines: [Phoenix Force] These noble beasts must be escorted to the World Tree.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540002_Lines: Once an X-Man, always an X-Man.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540108_Lines: You haven't lost your touch, Eric.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540151_Lines: Come on! Let's take this place!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540295_Lines: Maybe not. But my telekinesis can shift matter down to a single molecule.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540169_Lines: You thought you could kill Jean Grey? Please!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540283_Lines: The Phoenix remembers you well, Illyana.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540395_Lines: A connection as deep as ours can't be limited by space or time, Logan.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540284_Lines: Yet for that short time, you burned brighter than any flames in Limbo.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540053_Lines: I was born a Mutant. And I will always answer the call of my people.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540361_Lines: You look like you're desperate to prove something, Blade.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540163_Lines: I could feel your pain. Sorry.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540207_Lines: Sorry, Namor. Your soldiers are sushi now.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540102_Lines: Next time, stick to punching dragons, Iron Fist.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540005_Lines: It's nice to take a break from cosmic judgement every now and then…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540362_Lines: I have a feeling the only one who's judging you is yourself.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540208_Lines: You'll have to call in heavier hitters, Namor.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540260_Lines: Get ready to play some defense.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540039_Lines: A little low on Phoenix Force…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540043_Lines: The Phoenix is at full force!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540009_Lines: The Phoenix chose me for a reason. This battle may very well be it.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540359_Lines: The Phoenix chooses hosts for a reason. To temper its flames.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540377_Lines: The Phoenix left shards of its Force behind. I hope they're enough to turn the tide of this battle…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540385_Lines: The Phoenix's song echoes through the cosmos. I'm impressed you can hear it.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540119_Lines: At least you finally get to rest now, Blade.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540266_Lines: Don't let them take control here!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540298_Lines: It doesn't take telepathy for me to understand that.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540304_Lines: Even with all this unfathomable power, I'm still me, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540092_Lines: No way I'm letting Arakko fall. Not on my watch.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540074_Lines: Poor Arakko. We have to undo X-Tron's damage.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540193_Lines: I sent your toys back to Khonshu, Spector.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540003_Lines: Happy thoughts, everyone. If we stay focused, we've got this!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540051_Lines: Vampires don't really sync with the whole cycle of death and rebirth.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540321_Lines: Your words might not make sense to them, but I can hear your every thought.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540311_Lines: Charles would be proud, Erik. You've come so far…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540089_Lines: We're almost to the tower. We can’t stop now!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540107_Lines: I missed seeing you in action, Logan…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540386_Lines: Well… the Phoenix is all about creation... Just be sure to give us a credit on the track!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540071_Lines: All right! Let's get to Avengers Tower!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540056_Lines: If we have to burn this world to save every timeline, so be it!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540270_Lines: We can’t let them push us back!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540334_Lines: I'm sorry I've been gone so long. I can’t begin to imagine what you've been through.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540293_Lines: Logan… I'm sorry… I should never have left…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540070_Lines: Little heroes can make big differences, H.E.R.B.I.E.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540205_Lines: Those bots were cute, Peni, but they had to go.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540350_Lines: As X-Men always do. I just wish I could do more to help.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540015_Lines: Even the Phoenix acknowledges how important this battle is.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540177_Lines: Look out for Moon Knight's ankhs…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540183_Lines: Look out! The Punisher's packing heat!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540181_Lines: Careful. This portal is Strange's doing.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540279_Lines: I've been traveling the spaceways alone for some time…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540264_Lines: We need to capture this area!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540155_Lines: We need to stop them now!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540252_Lines: Finally, somewhere I can cut loose.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540184_Lines: Castle just upgraded to a turret!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540201_Lines: I sent the Punisher's turret to the scrap heap.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540141_Lines: Gotta do better to hurt me.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540234_Lines: Want to survive? Then fall back!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540226_Lines: I don't do revenge… but the Phoenix does…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540064_Lines: We'll clear you a path to Budokan, Zero. No worries.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540062_Lines: We'll get you where you need to go, Spider-Zero.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540380_Lines: We've done everything we can to prepare. It's time to make our stand.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540145_Lines: We got it. Great work, team!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540080_Lines: We're making progress, Zero. Don't stop now.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540054_Lines: We sure are a long way from Westchester…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540082_Lines: We can make it to Budokan. Don't turn back now!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540006_Lines: I'm still the same old Jean Grey… but I'm also so much more…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540278_Lines: I hear you haven't been lonely with a certain Gala attendee?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540004_Lines: Did everyone miss me while I was off soaring through the stars?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540256_Lines: I think I found the other team…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540322_Lines: I have an even better idea. Let's show them. Together.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540222_Lines: I took them all out? Nice.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540254_Lines: Just who I was looking for…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540333_Lines: I forgot how beautiful the stars looked from a distance…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540011_Lines: I've touched the infinite. All of this seems so small now…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540360_Lines: You nearly sunk a city. I've consummed worlds. I can empathize.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540349_Lines: How have things been on Krakoa while I was away, Emma?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540007_Lines: This is what the Professor trained me for since I was just a child.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540014_Lines: I'd almost forgotten what it was like to have friends by my side.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540388_Lines: I understand far too well. Cherish your friends... while they're still here…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540258_Lines: This is where it's all going down!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540153_Lines: Step it up! There's no time left!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540198_Lines: Sorry, Rocket. But I had to trash your amplifier.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540225_Lines: You mess with the Phoenix, you get burned.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540088_Lines: Come on, H.E.R.B.I.E. I know we can finish this together!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540211_Lines: Good news. I took down the sniper.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540231_Lines: There are too many of them.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540387_Lines: It is lovely… but it can also be very lonely.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540068_Lines: Time to find out what's lurking beneath Klyntar's surface…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540192_Lines: So much for Moon Knight's ankh.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540312_Lines: Sometimes, I can barely comprehend it myself. All I know is that I still have a long way to go…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540116_Lines: You fought as long as you could, Ben. Be proud…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540072_Lines: Okay, Ratatoskr… Next stop, Dracula's castle!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540262_Lines: A little help would be nice.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540122_Lines: Oh, Jeff… You poor, sweet creature…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540096_Lines: Charles… We won't let you down… I swear…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540120_Lines: You were Groot. We won't forget that…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540121_Lines: Ororo! No! You deserved so much better…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540289_Lines: I witnessed many wonderful things as I soared the spaceways, Ororo.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540052_Lines: This place makes the Morlock tunnels feel welcoming…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540168_Lines: I've come back from way worse.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540060_Lines: Didn't expect goat herding to be part of saving the universe…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540390_Lines: Yes. The Enigma Force. I can still feel the faintest of traces on you…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540187_Lines: Be on the lookout for robot spiders!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540199_Lines: Rocket built it. I broke it.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540111_Lines: Another bounty claimed, Rocket? Nice work.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540110_Lines: As graceful and deadly as ever, Psylocke.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540210_Lines: That was the sniper's last shot.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540084_Lines: Wakanda put its faith in us. We have to keep going!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540378_Lines: Wakanda's weaponized the Phoenix Force? A terrifying notion… but it may be necessary…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540112_Lines: You did that with an acorn? Impressive…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540296_Lines: See? I didn't even need telepathy to change your mind!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540050_Lines: I suppose it's up to me to shed some light on this long night.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540115_Lines: Too bad, Emma. I was just starting to tolerate you.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540189_Lines: Namor's summoned his deep sea army!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540010_Lines: Even if my powers can't repair the timestream, I can still protect it!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540277_Lines: It's so strange to be back… after all I've seen out there…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540075_Lines: The techno-organic virus can't be left to spread any further!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540078_Lines: Keep pushing. The World Tree is dead ahead.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540280_Lines: Take a deep breath, Peter. Amongst all life in the universe, you're really quite unforgettable.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540099_Lines: Emma, you have no idea how long I've wanted to do that.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540389_Lines: I'm afraid this battle may be far beyond the scope of your abilities, Spider-Man.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540081_Lines: We'll hold the other team back, Zero. Just keep driving!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540090_Lines: This city deserves a new day. It's up to us to make that happen!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540106_Lines: I'm sorry it came to this, Illyana. Truly.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540086_Lines: Follow me! My flames will guide you through the dark!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540063_Lines: Stick with us and we'll be at the Web in no time.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540019_Lines: Time for Jean Grey to shine!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540149_Lines: Control is ours. Hold onto it!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540048_Lines: This empire has grown so fast, even the Phoenix has noticed…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540190_Lines: These creeps must be Namor's friends…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540012_Lines: This isn't exactly the homecoming I was hoping for… but it'll do!
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540303_Lines: This is a battle for reality itself. Can I count on you to stand with me?
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540397_Lines: This weapon is pure evil. Only the Phoenix's flames can burn away this level of darkness.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540047_Lines: This is nothing like the Japan in Logan's old stories…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540045_Lines: Never been in a place more deserving of the Phoenix's flames…
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540396_Lines: Then let's show it just how wrong it is, old friend. Together.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540202_Lines: Bigger guns are never the solution, Frank.
122_HeroVoice_1054_ST.1054001_HeroVoice_10540066_Lines: The Black Panther needs us to move this totem. Let's do it.

122_HeroVoice_4019_ST.4019000_HeroVoice_40190002_Lines: This game is far beyond human comprehension.
122_HeroVoice_4019_ST.4019000_HeroVoice_40190001_Lines: Ultron is the future. And the future is now.
122_HeroVoice_4019_ST.4019000_HeroVoice_40190006_Lines: This simulation is already over. Ultron wins.
122_HeroVoice_4019_ST.4019000_HeroVoice_40190004_Lines: These powers fascinate me. I must learn more…
122_HeroVoice_4019_ST.4019000_HeroVoice_40190005_Lines: The data I am gathering here will be invaluable…
122_HeroVoice_4019_ST.4019000_HeroVoice_40190003_Lines: This will assist me in analyzing all possible outcomes.

122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170447_Lines: Careful! The Rumble Speed has maxed out!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170442_Lines: Not good! They're getting closer to victory!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310035_Lines: Oh, boy. The rift is getting bigger… and, from the looks of it, a lot more unstable!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170015_Lines: Don't back down. There's another mission area to defend.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170017_Lines: Don't let them take the mission area. Or else…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170301_Lines: Get up close and personal, then put those Vibranium Claws to good use!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170399_Lines: If you form a telepathic bond with Emma Frost, she'll help you unlock a new ability!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310034_Lines: Home, sweet home. Once this is all over, Remind me to give you the grand tour!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210008_Lines: Perhaps we two would be better off making mischief together, no?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80630006_Lines: Possibly… I've chased my fair share of ghost squirrels…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170427_Lines: Adam Warlock's gonna share his mastery of quantum energy with you to unlock a sweet new ability!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170331_Lines: Adam Warlock is on the scene! Now you can activate your Team-Up Ability: Nature's Soul.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170197_Lines: Which hero do you think you wanna be today?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170107_Lines: They've made it halfway! Stop them!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170025_Lines: They're almost to the finish line. Last chance to hold them back…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80722001_Lines: My creations will bring chaos to this world in Hydra's name!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170016_Lines: The mission area is the key. Capture it!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170290_Lines: Gamma time! Unleash your Ultimate Ability to transform into Monster Hulk and wipe out all your enemies!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170082_Lines: I'll guide you through a test run. Come on! Let's get started!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170374_Lines: I'm sure you'll win next time…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310005_Lines: You must not proceed any further,Spider-Zero. I will not warn you again.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520006_Lines: You may pose a threat now… but once Knull awakens, even your cosmic flames will be snuffed!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530005_Lines: You think yourself a force of creation? I spawned the great void! You are nothing compared to me!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210011_Lines: You cannot save Yggdrasil. Nor can you save yourselves! (Chuckle)
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170013_Lines: You have to stop them from securing the mission area.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170422_Lines: You're getting Rumbled! The enemy has taken control of Hijack Area C and is stealing your Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170077_Lines: You're in the lead now. Try it make it last!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170263_Lines: Your team's task is simple: Escort the objective all the way to the endpoint to win the match.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170009_Lines: All you need to do is capture the mission area. Got it?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170035_Lines: You won this round. Nice work!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170019_Lines: You need to stop that vehicle in its tracks.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170280_Lines: Hey there! I'll be helping you breeze through the hero tutorial. Ready to get started?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80620002_Lines: You are the one with the eyes of the hawk that Thor speaks of? I am friends with the eagle who sits atop the World Tree!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310021_Lines: You're the real Tony Stark? I always kinda figured you were just a legend.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530007_Lines: You have already tasted my power. Why resist when you could instead be my greatest champion…?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170067_Lines: You've got the most points. Keep up the stellar work!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170081_Lines: You're currently playing as the Punisher, a powerful Duelist.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411006_Lines: You really should not be in here! A princess deserves her privacy!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170103_Lines: You stopped them in their tracks!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520005_Lines: You cannot resist much longer. All my offspring shall bow to Knull in time……
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170122_Lines: You're doing better than they are!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520010_Lines: You seek control of Hel and Yggsgard… but together, we could conquer all that is!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170059_Lines: You've got one job: Take down as many enemies as you can.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170337_Lines: Idol Aura is gonna be a big hit with your teammates!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310022_Lines: Your company has done a lot of good for this world. But a whole lot of not-so-good, too.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520009_Lines: Your sword burns bright, but it cannot cleave through my darkness.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310031_Lines: Do you think your rodent friends can safely navigate the strands of the Web?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170231_Lines: Your Ultimate Ability draws in enemy bullets and sends them hurtling back like a meteorite. Sweet!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170138_Lines: Now you're playing as Bruce Banner. Try transforming into Hero Hulk. You know you want to!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170326_Lines: If your teammates are hurting bad, a Healing Flower should patch them up!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310014_Lines: Now you're talking, girl. Welcome home.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170380_Lines: You need to eliminate 1 more player.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170379_Lines: You need to eliminate 2 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170378_Lines: You need to eliminate 3 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170377_Lines: You need to eliminate 4 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170360_Lines: You need to eliminate 5 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170359_Lines: You need to eliminate 6 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530001_Lines: You overestimate your power. No mortal hero, nor any of my children, can imprison me forever. Knull will rise!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170428_Lines: Use Light & Shadow Karma to link up with nearby foes.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170311_Lines: Target your enemies with a Repulsor Blast.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170325_Lines: Release a Life Energy Blast to take out your enemies.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170151_Lines: Time to power up your allies with your ultimate ability, so you can take down your enemies together!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170299_Lines: Now blast your enemies using Deliverance.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170304_Lines: Strike your marked enemies using SPIRIT Rend to reset your ability cooldowns.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170327_Lines: Boost the damage your team delivers with Allied Inspiration.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170240_Lines: The B.R.B.'s range is limited, so make sure to place it close to a fallen teammate.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170412_Lines: Keep moving! You don't wanna fall behind! Enter the Area and seize control!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170401_Lines: Now, defeat your enemies with the illusion's support! This should be fun!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170003_Lines: Pick your hero… or villain. I'm not judging.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170425_Lines: Way to go, champ! You've aced this training session!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170417_Lines: Reserve exhausted. Head to Area B!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170420_Lines: Reserve exhausted! The final showdown awaits. Head on over to Hijack Area C for the Rumble Phase!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170297_Lines: Start off with Adjudication to wipe out your foes.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310010_Lines: The Public Eye isn't exactly fond of us Spider-Folks. Well, or anyone who doesn't follow their orders.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170196_Lines: Six in a row?! Way to go!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210003_Lines: The Queen of Hel betrays me?... How utterly predictable.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170333_Lines: Luna Snow has taken the stage! This master Strategist backs up her team with her incredible talents!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170211_Lines: Go on! Get up close to the enemy and use your melee attacks!
