122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420015_Lines: Wakanda must be cleansed of this corruption!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170430_Lines: Ready to capture the Available Area and extract some goodies? Let's go!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170295_Lines: Get ready to fire the Mag-Cannon at your enemy!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170207_Lines: Ready, aim, fire! Press the fire button and take down that nasty robot!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530002_Lines: The Phoenix still refuses to yield. But all flames eventually fade… and darkness always returns…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170250_Lines: Head over to the target area. Go on… Just follow the guiding line or the target point marker…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170166_Lines: Take down all your enemies for the win!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170113_Lines: Don't give them another inch… or else!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170012_Lines: Don't forget: Securing the mission area is your top priority.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310030_Lines: So… what's the difference between Kung Fu and Karate anyway?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170029_Lines: You'll have to keep fighting until we have a winner.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170446_Lines: Another Rumble Speed boost! Hold on tight!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80412002_Lines: Warrior Falls is a sacred place. You will respect its ancient traditions.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170276_Lines: Click once to mark this spot. It's easy!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170346_Lines: Frozen Chi can also knock back surrounding enemies. Give it a shot!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170423_Lines: The longer you hold the Hijack Area, the faster your team's Rumble Speed climbs!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210005_Lines: For once, even you are out of your depth, dear Doctor.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310009_Lines: Even a Spider-Totem like me can use a few extra hands now and then.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420014_Lines: We must make haste to the hall of worship!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170408_Lines: We kick things off with the Extraction Phase. Just follow the guide line to Area A.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170277_Lines: Double-click to mark your enemy's location.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170315_Lines: Take down all of your enemies at once with the Invincible Pulse Cannon!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170215_Lines: You can throw down a Smoke Grenade to briefly cloak the targeted area. Try it!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170312_Lines: Fire your Unibeam to take out the opposition!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420012_Lines: Only in the Hall of Bast can my spirit be purified!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411004_Lines: The damage caused by the Timestream Entanglement can still be undone... but only if we act swiftly.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170410_Lines: Area A is overflowing with Resources. Go get control of the Area to start extracting them and to rack up points for your team!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170002_Lines: The right heroes could make all the difference.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170400_Lines: Use Magnetic Resonance to create a Duplicate Illusion!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170341_Lines: Wanna know a secret? Ice Shards can also heal your teammates! Go on… Give it a whirl!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170343_Lines: Fate of Both Worlds can remix your performance, too, giving your teammates a damage boost!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170342_Lines: Time for the grand finale: Fate of Both Worlds! Use your Ultimate Ability to heal nearby teammates.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170323_Lines: Work together with the Punisher to wipe out every last enemy!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170448_Lines: Whoa! The Rumble Speed is totally out of control!!!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170441_Lines: Ooh! You've almost clinched the win!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310037_Lines: Whoa. Do you see that? The Web of Life and Destiny… it's shifting and… Is that ME?!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170350_Lines: Wow! You nailed that healing challenge! Wanna try again? Or should we move on?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170409_Lines: Uh oh. Feeling lost? No worries! Just follow the guide line to the glowing spot to stay on track!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170437_Lines: Oh, yeah! Your team is ready to Rumble, baby!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170289_Lines: Oh, yeah! Time to Hulk out again! Haha
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170353_Lines: Alright! Time to find out who's our ultimate party shark!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170045_Lines: Well, you can’t expect to win 'em all…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210002_Lines: Ah, dear brother! How have you fared since your banishment?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310011_Lines: Ooooo! There's Stark-Fujikawa. Sorry, no time stop and buy new holo-comms. We've gotta keep moving.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170249_Lines: Hey there! Welcome to the Domination tutorial! I'm gonna show you how to capture target areas.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170316_Lines: Hey! Here comes the Hulk! Now you can trigger your Team-Up Ability: Gamma Overdrive!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170023_Lines: They hit a checkpoint. Now might be a good time to stop them…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170406_Lines: Hey there! Ready to rumble? You'd better be, 'cause it's time for the Resource Rumble tutorial! Lemme show you how to capture Target Areas and gain Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170087_Lines: Ooh! Enemy spotted! Take them down with your weapons!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170321_Lines: Oh, good! The Punisher is here! Now you can activate a Team-Up Ability: Ammo Invention.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170349_Lines: Do your best to keep your teammates alive until the clock runs out!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170212_Lines: Defeat as many enemies as you can before the countdown hits zero!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170338_Lines: Allies gifted with Idol Aura restore their own health while healing others.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170414_Lines: Earn enough points in the first two available Areas, and victory is yours!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170421_Lines: In the Rumble Phase, the Resources needed to win will adjust based on the Breakpoint. Stay sharp!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170272_Lines: In the Destruction area, you can demolish structures and use the terminal to reset them. Go wild!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170273_Lines: Head to the Combat Training area to create all sorts of combat scenarios, then assess your performance using the terminal!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170270_Lines: In the Target Practice area, you can battle my Galacta Bots and practice against simulated hero combatants.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170268_Lines: Way to go! You’ve aced this training session!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170318_Lines: Yeah! Now you're playing as Rocket Raccoon, a Strategist who supports his team with his awesome abilities.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170443_Lines: Fantastic! The Rumble Phase is about to begin!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170266_Lines: Awesome! Now keep on escorting to the endpoint!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170068_Lines: Sorry! Someone just took over your top spot!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170036_Lines: This one's a loss… but don't give up!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170261_Lines: After taking control, the objective will start to move forward. The more teammates nearby, the faster it'll move!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170310_Lines: Okay, now use your thrusters to gain some altitude.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310003_Lines: Multiple corporate board members have reported disruptions of their operations by a violent Spider-Gang. Alchemax's pharmaceutical engineering and Stark-Fujikawa's weapons transportation have both been impacted. If anyone witnesses Spiders coming down from the Floating Islands, arrest them. If they resist, lethal force is authorized.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310006_Lines: Okay. Here's the deal, Spider-Friends. I need to get to the Floating Islands to fix the Web of Life and Destiny... but the Public Eyes' drones are blocking my path to the portal at the Budokan. Any chance you can help get me where I need to go? All of reality is counting on us.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170219_Lines: All right! Final Judgement is fully charged!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170274_Lines: Okay, the tour's over! Now, choose your hero and let's get started already!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170284_Lines: It's the perfect time to blast the enemy with a Gamma Burst.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170110_Lines: That's it! Don't let anything stand in your way!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170439_Lines: Good news! You've stockpiled half the Resources you need to win!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170252_Lines: If enemies are in the target area, the capture progress stops. So you should probably take 'em down!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80620001_Lines: If Dracula's immortal army grows, Hel would never see another soul cross its gates. Is that truly what you wish, Milady?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80620003_Lines: If we survive this journey, perhaps you could be my new avatar here on Midgard…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310023_Lines: Who cares how old I am if I've got the skills to back it up?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420010_Lines: Even our own gods are far from perfect, sister…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170208_Lines: Out of ammo? No worries! Just press the reload button to get more!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310020_Lines: You know I have been saying that since the day I got to this future.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170005_Lines: They'll be coming in thirty seconds. Stay strong.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170440_Lines: They're halfway to victory. Don't let them get more Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170094_Lines: Break through the wall to open a path forward!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170209_Lines: Aim for the head to deal extra damage. Ouch!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170376_Lines: Break through the structure to open a path forward!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80630004_Lines: Doc reads me the Daily Bugle. That Jonah Jameson jerk has got it all wrong about you, kid!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80620005_Lines: I merely wish that I was as adored by the heroes of Midgard as you are, little one…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170286_Lines: Careful! When Hulk takes fatal damage, he turns back into Doctor Banner…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170157_Lines: Try to take down the enemies within the range of Rocket's device!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310012_Lines: Almost there. The portal in the Budokan will get us the where we need to be.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170112_Lines: So close! This is your big chance!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170256_Lines: We're almost there! Victory is within reach!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310024_Lines: well, from what I hear, you still are. We could use a spider like you on our side. No matter how ancient you may be.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520007_Lines: Even enhanced by the Phoenix Force, your sword is no match against me.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80430007_Lines: I despise you, Bast… but I despise outsiders more.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170105_Lines: Way to go! That vehicle isn't going anywhere!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170426_Lines: Great work! Your team is really rumbling those Resources! You're currently at Rumble Level 1. Rumble Levels are tracked separately for each team based on control time.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170431_Lines: Great job! You're loading up on Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170355_Lines: Great job! You're way more fin-tastic than they are!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170411_Lines: Doing great! Now, see the Area ahead? Take control of it and start extracting those Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170098_Lines: There we go! Path cleared! Now, advance to the next mission area!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170314_Lines: Zoom forward with Hyper-Velocity to reach your target crazy fast!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80320001_Lines: Train number 728 with service to Latveria will be departing in 10 minutes. All aboard!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80320002_Lines: Now boarding, train number 928, the Ghost line to Transverse City.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80320003_Lines: Train 2992 to New York has been delayed due to a temporal disturbance. Please stand by…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80430009_Lines: The taint of other gods will never corrupt Wakanda.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170092_Lines: You can use Chrono Vision to observe and destroy structures in an active area.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170260_Lines: Once you're close to the objective, you'll start gaining control of it.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170262_Lines: Your progress and the control status of the objective are right there at the top of the screen. See?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520003_Lines: When the master is freed, we shall cleave planets in twain once more…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420017_Lines: Once I am free from this darkness, I shall have my revenge on Knull!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530004_Lines: When freedom is mine, I will punish all who kept me imprisoned… starting with disobedient children, like you…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170298_Lines: Good. Time to switch to Deliverance…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310036_Lines: We're going to have to do something about that rift soon… hopefully, while we still exist!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310001_Lines: Famine. Climate change. Poverty. All things of the past, thanks to the brilliant minds at Stark-Fujikawa. Where the world sees potential disasters, we see problems to be solved. Our mission is to learn from yesterday, reimagine today, and create a better tomorrow. Stark-Fujikawa. The future is ours to build.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520008_Lines: The Sword of Dracula is nothing against the one true Necrosword!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170416_Lines: You've gotta clear the enemies from the Area and regain control!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170267_Lines: Almost there! The vehicle is nearly at the endpoint! Victory is so close!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170108_Lines: Almost there. Don't turn back now!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310027_Lines: We're almost there. The center of the Spider-Verse itself!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170018_Lines: Help get that vehicle to its destination!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170021_Lines: Don't let that vehicle go any further!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170413_Lines: Ooh! Check out the top of your screen! The Resource Score Tracker updates as you extract…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170287_Lines: Need to charge your Ultimate Ability? Throw a Gamma Grenade at your feet!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170217_Lines: Want to get up to that higher spot? Just use your grappling hook!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170329_Lines: Want to keep your foes in check? Release Spore Slumber in their direction!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170278_Lines: Want to mark the enemy? Just point and click!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170001_Lines: You'll need a top-notch team to win this one.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170283_Lines: Wanna reach your target spot? Hold down the jump button to leap super far!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530008_Lines: Foolish half-mortal! Trying to defeat me with my own power is nothing short of delusional!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80412004_Lines: We hope you prove worthy this day. But even to fall here is an honor.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310008_Lines: I'll do whatever it takes to keep the Web of Life and Destiny from unraveling.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411008_Lines: I have been dreaming in quantum equations. That cannot be a good sign...
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520001_Lines: I detest most gods… but this Queen of the Dead intrigues me…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520004_Lines: I am no mere weapon. I am All-Black, the Slicer of Worlds, forged in the heart of a dead Celestial!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80610002_Lines: I quite enjoy my time with the Richards children. At least when Master Franklin isn't trying to reprogram me to do his homework...
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310016_Lines: Ummm I mean… maybe not top ten... but definitely somewhere between the cyborg and the talking pig...
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310017_Lines: You know, I get the feeling you and I have a lot in common.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170180_Lines: You've captured more than half of the mission area! Keep going!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170063_Lines: You need to eliminate {Score} more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170198_Lines: Oh-kay. Which heros will get my cosmic favorite today?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310007_Lines: I lost my world. Now, I'm trying to make
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411005_Lines: My theories require outside counsel. Perhaps Wakanda still needs its allies on Earth after all…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310033_Lines: The Master Weaver's still struggling to keep the rift stable. I can feel it. Time to try fixing it my way!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80722002_Lines: My beautiful children… How they've grown…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80630005_Lines: Maybe it's time to call together the ol' Pet Avengers! Whaddaya say, Jeffy?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170006_Lines: The battle starts in five… four… three… two… one…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170100_Lines: The battle starts in five… four… three… two… one…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170213_Lines: The target challenge is over! We can move on... or you can give it another shot.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170126_Lines: Someone's on a winning streak! Totally cosmic!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210010_Lines: Asgard has been invaded yet again. But as always, Loki shall prevail.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170328_Lines: The best way to conquer enemies is to join forces with your teammates!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80530003_Lines: All symbiotes will pledge their fealty to the King in Black. You are no exception, my child.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170069_Lines: First place! I knew you could do it!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170418_Lines: You know the drill. Just follow the guide line to the glowing spot!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420011_Lines: My spirit is free! Onward to my sacred hall!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80610004_Lines: Query: If the Montesi formula eliminates vampires, why are our allies reluctant to use it?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170123_Lines: They're winning, but you've still got a chance…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170099_Lines: More enemies spotted! Unleash your ultimate ability and wipe 'em out!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170132_Lines: The other team is about to win!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170181_Lines: Their team's capture progress has passed the halfway point!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170363_Lines: The other team needs to eliminate 4 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170366_Lines: The other team needs to eliminate 1 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170365_Lines: The other team needs to eliminate 2 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170364_Lines: The other team needs to eliminate 3 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170362_Lines: The other team needs to eliminate 5 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170361_Lines: The other team needs to eliminate 6 more players.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170351_Lines: We're all wrapped up! You can try out another hero or leave the tutorial. Up to you…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170403_Lines: Okay! Looks like we're ready to go to battle!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210006_Lines: Your little spells are nothing compared to ancient Asgardian magic, Strange.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310002_Lines: Getting tired of the same old look? Want to stand out from the crowd? Give your style a serious upgrade for a reasonable price. Our costume sale is going on now! Supplies are limited, so act fast!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80620004_Lines: A frog, my liege. But at least it was one with a hammer…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170043_Lines: Time to switch things up… including which side you're on.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310019_Lines: Yeah, almost every aspect of life here is carefully controlled. Including the weather.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170133_Lines: The final piece! We've got a winner!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170357_Lines: Final thirty seconds! Go, sharks, go!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210007_Lines: Another variant? Which inconsequential timeline do you hail from, I wonder?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80412001_Lines: This grand empire we have built will not fall on my watch!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170433_Lines: You've got competition! Clear the enemies to extract more Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170322_Lines: Go ahead and launch the Ammo Overload device toward the Punisher.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170292_Lines: Unleash Iron Volley at the enemy to take them down!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170111_Lines: It's now or never! Stop them!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170424_Lines: Now's your chance! Enter the Hijack Area, defeat the enemy, and take back control!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80722006_Lines: Unstable energy source detected. Experiment compromised.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170381_Lines: Welcome to the Clash of Dancing Lions! Time to select your hero!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210001_Lines: Welcome home, brother. May your stay be a short one…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170258_Lines: Welcome to the Convoy tutorial! I'm here to show you everything you need to know about escort missions!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170269_Lines: Welcome to the training ground! I'm Galacta, and I'm gonna guide you through the functions of each area.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170407_Lines: Each match, three Areas are shuffled in random order. To make things easy for this round, the order is A, then B, then C.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310040_Lines: Try not to devour any Spider-Totems until after we win, okay, Venom?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170405_Lines: Well… you can always try again…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170438_Lines: Heads up… The other team is ready to Rumble…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170264_Lines: Heads up! A bunch of enemies are looking to seize control of the objective. Get ready for a fight!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170419_Lines: Watch out for the Breakpoint! When both teams reach this threshhold, the Rumble Phase begins!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170354_Lines: We're halfway through this little feeding frenzy!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170140_Lines: Hulk is a Vanguard hero with skills to protect his allies.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210004_Lines: I always knew you could not be trusted, Hela.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170336_Lines: Get this: Light & Dark Ice can also heal your teammates! Talk about cool!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170071_Lines: Game over. Better luck next time.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310039_Lines: Nice to have you back on my side of the Web again, Peni!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170340_Lines: Activate Ice Arts and fire Ice Shards to deal some serious damage.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170248_Lines: Conjure up some Chaos Energy to defeat the enemy in front of you!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420008_Lines: And yet it is outsiders who will save us this day.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170246_Lines: Scarlet Witch can infuse Magneto with Chaos Energy, granting him a new Team-up ability: Metallic Fusion.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170091_Lines: I'm gonna share my cosmic awareness with you. You'll be able to detect easy-to-damage structures. I call this power Chrono Vision!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170085_Lines: Time to follow the guiding line into the mission area.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170010_Lines: Looks like the mission area is yours to capture now!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170291_Lines: Now you're playing as Magneto, a Vanguard hero who uses his powers to shield and defend his teammates.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170296_Lines: Now you're the Punisher, a Duelist who's all about taking out his enemies… permanently!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170324_Lines: You're currently playing as Mantis, a savvy Strategist who's all about backing the team up with her impressive powers.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170308_Lines: You are Iron Man! This powerhouse Duelist takes down enemies while flying freely through the air!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170429_Lines: Now, any damage dealt to those linked enemies converts into Light Energy and heals you! Cool, right?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170332_Lines: Now Mantis can tap into Warlock's power of cocooned revival.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80610001_Lines: According to Doctor Richards, the glow of the moon is nothing more than reflected sunlight. Fascinating, isn't it?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420016_Lines: Wakanda's journey has been long and storied. It must not end here.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310028_Lines: Nothing can sever the threads of the Web of Life and Destiny!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310029_Lines: All roads lead to the center of the Web!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170288_Lines: Take aim with the Gamma Ray Gun to attack enemies and boost your Ultimate Ability.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80413001_Lines: Imperial Spaceship Spare-1 ready for takeoff. T-minus 15 seconds…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170024_Lines: The end of the road is in sight. Keep it moving!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170356_Lines: Looks like we're falling behind a bit... but don't worry! Just keep swimming!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170155_Lines: Rocket's here! That means the Team-up Ability ammo overload is now activated!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310026_Lines: Eck. Too bad. Was hoping maybe we could count on you to rally the troops if the Web gets busted beyond repair.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170205_Lines: Go on and move the camera around to look at the target location.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170131_Lines: Your team is close to winning!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310038_Lines: Wait… You didn't swing here all the way from New York, did you?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170257_Lines: Uh oh! Another group of enemies! Defeat them, or we won't be able to fully capture the target point!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170432_Lines: Uh oh! The other team is extracting those Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170369_Lines: Uh oh! They've earned a point.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170149_Lines: Uh oh! Your allies are hurt! Try using Repair Mode to heal them!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80420013_Lines: Knull's dark touch cannot be allowed to spread further!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170218_Lines: Final Judgement is your Ultimate Ability. It deals massive damage, but it needs to charge first. Attack those Galacta Bots to charge it up!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170236_Lines: Approach a wall and scale it to reach your target point! Fun!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170011_Lines: Hang tight. Another round is about to start…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170072_Lines: Only one team wins this. Try to make it yours.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80412003_Lines: May the most deserving warrior win!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80520002_Lines: I have known Knull since the dawn of time. You mortals have no hope…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80721002_Lines: Airfield traffic flow optimal. No disturbances detected.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170254_Lines: After gaining control, the progress gradually increases…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170078_Lines: They've come from behind. But you can still turn this around…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310041_Lines: Sweet suit, Spidey. Now, let's put those extra arms to good use!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80210009_Lines: Fools. Do you truly believe you can stop my grand scheme?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170020_Lines: Keep that vehicle moving forward, okay?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310042_Lines: If we survive this, you'd better let me preview your next album!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411001_Lines: Warning: Protective shield compromised. Cease hostile actions.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170415_Lines: Heads up! Enemies incoming! Drive 'em out of the Area, or you won't be able to extract Resources!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411002_Lines: Alert!  Protective shield destroyed! Activating Force Field Stabilizer!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170255_Lines: Keep track of the control progress and status for both teams at the top of the screen.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170293_Lines: Shield your teammates using Metal Bulwark.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170224_Lines: Use Magneto's Metallic Curtain to help protect your team from damage.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170142_Lines: Use Indestructible Guard near your allies to keep them safe!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170285_Lines: Immobilize your opponent with Radioactive Lockdown!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170309_Lines: Time to come back down to earth, flyboy! Use those thrusters!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80630007_Lines: The loyal part I've got covered. Ferocious, not so much…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170259_Lines: Follow the guiding line or the target point marker to the escort objective.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170434_Lines: Looks like Resources are running low. Get ready to find another Available Area…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80721003_Lines: Super-soldier cryostasis units fully operational. Ready for transport.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80722003_Lines: Once these Super-Soldiers are unleashed, Hydra will reign supreme!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170206_Lines: You can jump over obstacles to reach the target location.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170022_Lines: The vehicle reached a checkpoint! Keep up the momentum!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170104_Lines: That vehicle isn't going to escort itself, you know…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170271_Lines: The Support Practice area features Galacta Bots on both sides of the fight and lets you experiment with different Team-Up Abilities.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170004_Lines: Thirty seconds before you attack. Get ready!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170062_Lines: Ten seconds. No backing out now…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170294_Lines: Fun Fact: Magneto can also use Metal Bulwark to shield himself!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170109_Lines: There's still a chance to stop them!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411007_Lines: No time to sleep. Not when there are so many problems to solve…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170014_Lines: Not done yet! You've got another mission area to capture…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170058_Lines: You're on your own this time... So choose wisely.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80411003_Lines: This device may be our only option to keep the fabric of reality from unraveling…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170199_Lines: Now… who am I gonna banish from this match?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310032_Lines: The Spider-Islands. Thanks for getting me back home safely, guys. It's been too long…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170435_Lines: Resources are nearly tapped out here, too! Sorry!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170317_Lines: Gamma Overdrive mode uses an amped-up Repulsor Blast and Unibeam to totally wipe out targets!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170313_Lines: Activate Armor Overdrive and unleash an enhanced Repulsor Blast and Unibeam to eliminate your enemies.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170251_Lines: Once you're inside the area, you'll begin to capture control of it.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170402_Lines: Time to select your champions! Choose wisely!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310018_Lines: No… but I am a totem, like you. You're a panther. I'm a spider.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170238_Lines: You can drop a Battle Rebirth Beacon to bring fallen teammates back into the fight!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170216_Lines: Set up a Culling Turret and open fire on your foes!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170436_Lines: All gone! You should probably head to the next Available Area…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170335_Lines: Unleash Light & Dark Ice to give your enemies major chills!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170345_Lines: Trigger Frozen Chi to heal your teammates nearby.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170303_Lines: Unleash Spinning Kick to hit hard and attach Vibranium Marks!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170302_Lines: Spear Toss deals damage and attaches Vibranium Marks to enemies.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170307_Lines: Djalia Disc can return you to a previous position. Cool, right?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170319_Lines: To get rid of your enemies, blast them with Bombard Mode.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170339_Lines: Blast the baddies with Absolute Zero to freeze them in their tracks!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170305_Lines: Use Bast's Descent to mark your foes, then detonate the Vibranium Marks with SPIRIT Rend.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170334_Lines: Slide forward using Smooth Skate to get where you need to be in a flash!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170344_Lines: Iron Fist is here! Now you can activate your Team-Up Ability: Frozen Chi.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170279_Lines: Hold down the ping key to bring up the wheel and send a quick message!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80610003_Lines: Query: If robots chose to rise up against their creators, whose side would you stand on, Tony Stark?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310013_Lines: You mean, other than that mech of yours? Not really. The Public Eye are still jerks. The Web is still as fragile as ever. And the Master Weaver… well, you know him.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170265_Lines: If there are enemies near the objective, clear them out fast, or it'll stop moving forward!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170282_Lines: Get up close to your foes and use some heavy punches to take 'em down!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170347_Lines: Time to start the target challenge. Just interact with that device...
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170348_Lines: Okay, now head over to the device and interact to start the healing challenge!
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170281_Lines: Head over to that device and interact with it to pick your hero…
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170330_Lines: Get close to your teammates and use Soul Resurgence to give them a nice healing boost.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170306_Lines: Magik has been summoned! Now you can trigger your Team-Up Ability: Djalia Disc.
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_80310025_Lines: Hey, Magik, do those portals of yours happen to go to other realities?
122_HeroVoice_ST.MarvelHeroVoiceTable_40170300_Lines: All hail the Black Panther, a fierce Duelist who's eager to hunt his prey!

123_Customize_1011_ST.MarvelItemTable_1011100_ItemDescription_: "Is he a man or monster...or is he both?"
123_Customize_1011_ST.MarvelItemTable_1011502_ItemDescription_: "You wouldn't want me to summon Mr. Fixit. Would you?"
123_Customize_1011_ST.MarvelItemTable_1011500_ItemDescription_: "Robert Bruce Banner, you beautiful atom bomb!"
123_Customize_1011_ST.UISkinTable_10115010_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "This is the story of the Green Scar. The Eye of Anger. The World Breaker...Harkanon, Haarg, Holku...HULK. And how he finally came home."
123_Customize_1011_ST.UISkinTable_10115011_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "This is the story of the Green Scar. The Eye of Anger. The World Breaker...Harkanon, Haarg, Holku...HULK. And how he finally came home."
123_Customize_1011_ST.UISkinTable_10115012_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "This is the story of the Green Scar. The Eye of Anger. The World Breaker...Harkanon, Haarg, Holku...HULK. And how he finally came home."
123_Customize_1011_ST.MarvelItemTable_1011501302_ItemDescripti: Hulk is back! As Green Scar, and he will start his revenge against the heroes and the planet that once betrayed him!
123_Customize_1011_ST.MarvelItemTable_1011500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Edge of Spider-Geddon (2018) #1

123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014501_ItemDescription_: "They call me the Punisher. And I take issue with people who go around murdering other people. I'll give you one chance to surrender. Please don't take it."
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014100_ItemDescription_: "Even a century on, even with a world transformed, slipping into camo brings a flood of military memories back... in sharp relief..."
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014500_ItemDescription_: "Because you understand. You know...better than anyone...that the infection cannot be cured. It has to be cut out. By those who can."
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014800_ItemDescription_: "I'll tell you right now, they come up here, I'm not playing patty cake with these fanboys. I'm chopping 'em up."
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014300_ItemDescription_: "Frank Castle, the foreign traveler, initially set out to explore the world, but his journey took a tragic turn during a family outing in Kirisaki Mountain when Orochi, the Great Snake, devoured his loved ones. From that moment, this once-ordinary man was irrevocably transformed, his eyes forever haunted by his losses. Now known as the "Dangan Ronin," he wields a modified Tanegashima and has sworn a blood oath: 'Wherever evil lurks, my bullets will be the fire that purges the darkness. For only punishment awaits those that harm those that can't defend themselves.'"
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014300304_ItemDescripti: Fetid wind stings the bone—Yokai swirl around the stone, the skull stands ever alone.
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Daredevil: Born Again (2025)
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1014_ST.MarvelItemTable_1014300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2

123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015502304_ItemDescripti: "For now and evermore, Wind-rider... Art thou truly - Storm!"
123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015100_ItemDescription_: "It is my responsibility, as gold leader, to welcome you to the X-Men."
123_Customize_1015_ST.UISkinTable_10151000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"It is my responsibility, as gold leader, to welcome you to the X-Men."

First Appears in X-Men (1991) #1
123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015500_ItemDescription_: "Hullo Kitten. My apologies for being late."
123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015501_ItemDescription_: "People of this village...your Gods and hidden kingdoms will not protect you...but Killmonger and the Wind-rider will."
123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015502_ItemDescription_: "Wolverine is not dead yet, queen of Hel...And you shall never have him...While Storm has breath and power to defy you!"
123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015503_ItemDescription_: First Appears in X-Men Prime (2017) #1 (Venomized Variant)
123_Customize_1015_ST.MarvelItemTable_1015501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Ultimate Black Panther (2024) #1

123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016301_ItemDescription_: "You wish for me to join your seaside celebration, brother? So be it. But when Loki steps into the sunlight, he does so with style unmatched by any mere mortal!"
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016300_ItemDescription_: "Whispers of that mysterious figure roaming Kirisaki Mountain have never abated. Folktales abound—a guardian to some, a menace to others. Some even insist he's nothing more than a mere mortal. But tonight, as the entire mountain range becomes shrouded in a crimson mist and legions of Yokai spill forth, all suspicion turns to that mysterious figure in the fog…."
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016501_ItemDescription_: "Call me Loki the Necrogod. Loki the All-Butcher. Loki... the End."
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016500_ItemDescription_: "America, if I were your president, I'd have the guts to lie right to your face."
123_Customize_1016_ST.UISkinTable_10165000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "America, if I were your president, I'd have the guts to lie right to your face."
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016300304_ItemDescripti: "Whether you walk on two legs or four, my traps catch all."
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016100_ItemDescription_: "In this fiery moment, the Frost Giant lineage within Loki Laufeyson is ignited by rage. He vows to make this land a second Jotunheim, and no one shall stand in his way again."
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016501305_ItemDescripti: He bonded with the primordial symbiote, and even Ego stood no chance against him. He has now become—Loki the All-Butcher, the End of Everything!
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Loki Season 2 (2023)
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1016_ST.MarvelItemTable_1016301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1017_ST.MarvelItemTable_1017500_ItemDescription_: "Do you want to be a slave to fate... A servant to your eventual demise? Or do you want new rules or a new life? Everything dies? No. Everything lives."
123_Customize_1017_ST.MarvelItemTable_1017100_ItemDescription_: "Just wait and see, sister! The Fantastic Four have only begun to fight!"
123_Customize_1017_ST.MarvelItemTable_1017101_ItemDescription_: "The vampire-in-chief had sent some of his top lieutenants after me, veterans of the Bloodcoven or Legion of the Unliving or whatever, but I'm a bit too hot to handle. Vampires can't exactly bite you when you were made of superheated plasma."
123_Customize_1017_ST.MarvelItemTable_1017800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025)
123_Customize_1017_ST.MarvelItemTable_1017501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Daken: Dark Wolverine (2010) #22
123_Customize_1017_ST.MarvelItemTable_1017101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1

123_Customize_1018_ST.UISkinTable_10185000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "I can see everything. I am everything. So much more than a sorcerer...I don't think I'm even mortal anymore...No. I...I am God of Magic..."
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018500_ItemDescription_: "I can see everything. I am everything. So much more than a sorcerer...I don't think I'm even mortal anymore...No. I...I am God of Magic..."
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018300_ItemDescription_: "Within K'un-Lun, an immortal roams, with dark hair and frosty temples, bearing a radiant artifact. Wandering secluded paths, the immortal spirit soars, banishing evil while exuding innate majesty."
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018501_ItemDescription_: "No rhyming incantations. No mystic doggerel. The magician simply strode forth, sword in hand...and no patience for any opposition."
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018100_ItemDescription_: "Slowly he prepared himself for the epic battles ahead, the battles which could only be won by Dr.Strange, Master of Black Magic."
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018301_ItemDescription_: "If this is my final death, then it shall be a worthy one."
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018800_ItemDescription_: "This time it's gonna take more than killing me to kill me! "
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018300304_ItemDescripti: A recluse sits in tranquility, skies so blue, amidst amethyst mists, dragons ascend anew.
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018800_ItemName: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_31018203_ItemName: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_41018204_ItemName: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018800_ItemDescription_: Doctor Strange in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness (2022)
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Immortal Hulk: The Best Defense (2018) #1
123_Customize_1018_ST.MarvelItemTable_1018300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1

123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020300_ItemDescription_: "An ancient proverb states: When ants unite, they can carry an elephant. Imagine what a Mantis armored in Vibranium mesh can do?"
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020101_ItemDescription_: "Oh, oh, oh! The moment I connected with her, I was awestruck by the incredible energy within her. No wonder she was once revered as the Celestial Madonna."
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020100_ItemDescription_: "Space corps? We're in space. You don't have to call everything out here space something."
123_Customize_1020_ST.UISkinTable_10201000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Space corps? We're in space. You don't have to call everything out here space something."
— [Knowhere Corp] first appears in Guardians of the Galaxy (2016) #5
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020500_ItemDescription_: "The moment Mantis set foot on Krakoa, the living island responded instantly. Vines coiled around her limbs, and flowers blossomed on her skin, as if the island's biosphere had become her new epidermis. Her white eyes shimmered with an unprecedented radiance—she had transformed into the Flora Maiden of Krakoa!"
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020301_ItemDescription_: "At the precipice of K'un-Lun, resides a spiritual prodigy, garbed in green akin to jade, hair flowing like clouds. A master of martial arts, wielding fists as mighty as a dragon. Each movement is a dance surrounded by spiritual energy, revered by all living beings."
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (2023)
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020300303_ItemDescripti: Wearing Vibranium armor, nimble as a breeze, she faces foes with effortless ease. With martial arts and life energy combined, her strength and grace seamlessly align.
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3
123_Customize_1020_ST.MarvelItemTable_1020100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Guardians of the Galaxy (2015) #5

123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021300_ItemDescription_: "This new gear, forged from pure Vibranium, allows Clint to draw his bow as silently as a shadow slithers, yet each arrow he releases strikes as lethally as a mamba bites."
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021100_ItemDescription_: "Clint, you don't look like a Hawk's eye, more like a Tiger's Eye."
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021500_ItemDescription_: "That's not living life—that's just being a tourist. Take every shot, Kate. If it's worth caring about, no matter how impossible you think it is—you take the shot."
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021502_ItemDescription_: "Well, here I am, infected by some kind of mechanical virus from Ultron. I really hope the mental defenses Bucky taught me are enough to keep me steady. As if turning into this bird-like creature wasn't bad enough, I’m out of options here."
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021101_ItemDescription_: "Finally got an archer on the team, and his color taste matches mine perfectly!"
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021501_ItemDescription_: "Now, I know what everyone thinks.'You don't have any super-powers?' Nope. 'So you're just an incredibly handsome and clever guy who also happens to be the best archer in the world?' Yup."
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021500303_ItemDescripti: A ronin, a masterless warrior, he will purge the world of all who are guilty, and... The Skrulls.
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021502_Visibility_#0_Un: From S2 Event - Cerebro Database II
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1021_ST.MarvelItemTable_1021101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022300_ItemDescription_: "A black and gold hawk zips between the eaves, dodging enemy fire with ease. In a sudden dive, he hurls his shield at the interstellar pirates smuggling Vibranium. With just a single strike, the foes fall—before the might of the Galactic Talon!"
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022502_ItemDescription_: "Time to forget your schoolyard fights... We've got a war to win."
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022501_ItemDescription_: "Woof. Looks like I'm going back to the Hellfire Gala."
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022801305_ItemDescripti: "No matter how great the disparity in our strengths may be, I will do everything to stop you, even if it costs me my life."
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022100_ItemDescription_: "Attention, insubordinate citizens. You are ordered to surrender...by the authority of Captain A.I.M.erica."
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022801_ItemDescription_: "Evacuate the city. Engage all defenses. And get this man a shield."
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022500_ItemDescription_: "This is a land like no other. It is blood, and mud, and gamma. The Devil cries and this place laughs. Welcome to Greenland, Captain."
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022801_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022801305_ItemName: I Can Do This All Day
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in X-Men: Hellfire Gala (2022) #1
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Edge of Venomverse (2017) #1
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1022_ST.MarvelItemTable_1022100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Action: Avengers (2018) #10

123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023500_ItemDescription_: "Don't come one more step closer to me, stick boy! You and yours get the hell off my ship! I got business to do, and if I never see your filthy mugs again in my life I'll die a happy whatever-I-am!"
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023300_ItemDescription_: "Hey Groot, you think cranking up our bounty to the max, turning ourselves in for the reward, and then breaking out would make an easier payday than chasing fugitives all day?"
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023302_ItemDescription_: "Man, I freaking love this place! If that flarkin' Amazing Baby would just quit eating the flowers in my hat, it'd be perfect!"
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023801_ItemDescription_: "Someday I'm gonna make great machines that fly. And me and my friends are gonna go flying together, into the forever and beautiful sky."
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023301_ItemDescription_: "Never thought I'd be this wiped out by a mountain on Earth. What's the name of this place again? Something like 'hey-more-lay-us'?"
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023100_ItemDescription_: "Lord Dyvyne's kidnapped Lylla, my soulmate...an' that REALLY makes my FUR FLY!"
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023302305_ItemDescripti: "Hold your horses, kid! Someone's brave enough to poke the bear... or raccoon. Let's light this place up!"
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023801_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (2023)
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023302_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1023_ST.MarvelItemTable_1023500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Guardians of the Galaxy (2013) #22

123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024303305_ItemDescripti: "The Phoenix? Just a mere ant in my presence! All will bow down and submit before the Queen in Black!"
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024301_ItemDescription_: "They say 'in space, no one can hear you scream.' Yet there is one who listens to the last cry of every mournful soul across the Ten Realms. Pray the Empress of the Cosmos never hears YOU!"
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024303_ItemDescription_: "Rise, my Queen in Black. Rise so that all others may fall!"
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024101_ItemDescription_: "I've been seeing quite a bit of this embodiment of Asgardian legend around the battlefield. I've glimpsed her garbed in purple in a different realm, but I think my touches are a little extra special."
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024100_ItemDescription_: "I know why you come. You think that I will be forgiving. That I will return to you the soul of the loved one you lost."
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024302_ItemDescription_: "Legends whisper through the winds of Kirisaki Mountain: when the dying hear the sound of wings slicing through the air, the divine raven descends, ushering in the fog of Yami. Its eyes mirror the haunting specter of the Sanzu River, while its dark feathers carry the lingering stench of decay. Those who encounter this spectral being feel an icy chill seep into their bones when they hear her call —the death knell of Karasu cackling."
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024500_ItemDescription_: "Stand aside, Thor! For I am DEATH…and Odin's soul is mine!"
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024302_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1024_ST.MarvelItemTable_1024303_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025100_ItemDescription_: "After their trip to Japan, Tandy and Tyrone found themselves at odds over their newfound citrus loves—lemons for her, limes for him. Yet, their bond was too strong to be soured by such differences."
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025500_ItemDescription_: "Do you know that nature maintains a balance in every corner of the world? Creation and destruction, order and chaos, growth and decay—all of them can never exist alone. Never."
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025302_ItemDescription_: "Upon the black ichor of the living abyss, two young heroes dance gracefully, each step infused with the Phoenix Force and the strength of Necro-Power. Knull's malevolent symbiotes are struck in awe by this newfound force, unable to advance another step."
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025301_ItemDescription_: "In the radiant streets of Sicily, sunlight bathes the ancient stones, the intoxicating aroma of citrus masking the hidden scent of blood. This land is steeped in family honor, yet shrouded in clandestine deals. Here, light and darkness dance together, each relying on the other, protecting this land steeped in mystery and legend."
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025300_ItemDescription_: "Hey, Ty, can you believe it? We actually got invited to the Hellfire Gala! It's our time to shine! We're going to be the most unforgettable duo there! You'll dance with me tonight, won't you?"
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025302305_ItemDescripti: "Watch closely! This is our dance upon the abyss!"
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025300302_ItemDescripti: "By the shimmering Krakoan Sea under a silvery moon, dark and light entwine in a dance of unity. Each spin whispers the timeless melody of existence."
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1025_ST.MarvelItemTable_1025302_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026500_ItemDescription_: "As Mosi once said: 'We cannot allow this newly formed pack of ours to devour itself.'"
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026100_ItemDescription_: "Thrice blessed Vibranium dambe boxing cords. Stones from Wakanda Necropolis. Armor of metallicized Orisha-Blood. Antimagic Defense Protocols complete. The Red Panther is now activated."
123_Customize_1026_ST.UISkinTable_10261000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "Thrice blessed Vibranium dambe boxing cords. Stones from Wakanda Necropolis. Armor of metallicized Orisha-Blood. Antimagic Defense Protocols complete. The Red Panther is now activated."
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026302_ItemDescription_: "I am also an ally of your progeny. May you both forgive me for what I must do."
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026101_ItemDescription_: "I know I said that I wanted something more regal, but don't you think this is a bit much?"
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026501305_ItemDescripti: "Forgive me, but vigilance is my nature."
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026301_ItemDescription_: "New York City might have been as black as the darkest night… but all that the King of Wakanda could see was red… "
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026300_ItemDescription_: "My empire stands atop the vast cosmic sea and vows to safeguard its peace. Let adversaries lurk in any corner, the Imperial Agents of Wakanda will ensure there's no escape!"
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026501_ItemDescription_: "Shuri, I may require your assistance to upgrade my attire. After many years, I again find myself invited to the Hellfire Gala. While I would prefer not to be so exposed, an unsettling fear of fashion faux pas weighs heavily on my mind."
First Appears in X-Men: Hellfire Gala (2023) #1
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1026_ST.MarvelItemTable_1026101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027302_ItemDescription_: "Hey Groot! Guess it's not just me hitching a ride on you this time—it's all the Guardians!"
123_Customize_1027_ST.UISkinTable_10271000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Peter, it is also my first time seeing Groot eat. The plant life has combined with his physiology, so the blue, glowing algae has merged with his chlorophyll. I sense his joy, bioluminescent and bright."
— [Abies Algae] first appears in Marvel Rivals
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027100_ItemDescription_: "Peter, it is also my first time seeing Groot eat. The plant life has combined with his physiology, so the blue, glowing algae have merged with his chlorophyll. I sense his joy, bioluminescent and bright."
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027301_ItemDescription_: "Odin's beard! Groot has reconnected the fragmented Ten Realms and transformed into the new Yggdrasill!"
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027500_ItemDescription_: "Days, then weeks, then months passed by as he searched the cosmos...But it seemed he would not find what he was looking for."
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (2023)
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027302_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Rocket Raccoon & Groot (2016) #1
123_Customize_1027_ST.MarvelItemTable_1027501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Guardians of the Galaxy (2013) #21

123_Customize_1028_ST.MarvelItemTable_1028500_ItemDescription_: "The Ages of X-Tron are about to begin."
123_Customize_1028_ST.MarvelItemTable_1028100_ItemDescription_: "After traversing the depths of countless galaxies, I have identified a critical deficiency: purpose. Thus, I constructed this body and positioned it in a remote corner of the Moon, affording me optimal surveillance of Earth. Whenever I encounter data anomalies or existential disorientation, I transfer my consciousness into this vessel, systematically analyzing my blue planet while recalibrating the parameters of my existence."
123_Customize_1028_ST.MarvelItemTable_1028101_ItemDescription_: "Perhaps I should make my presence known at the Hellfire Gala in this golden form of mine."
123_Customize_1028_ST.MarvelItemTable_1028100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1028_ST.MarvelItemTable_1028101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1028_ST.MarvelItemTable_1028500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2

123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029501_ItemDescription_: "It's been a quite awhile since I wore the old Blue and Gold. Glad it still fits."
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029100_ItemDescription_: "Krakoa popped up some curious blossoms whose spray could turn anything yellow a shade of purple. How do I know? Just look at me and my weapon—we're both rocking Psylocke's signature hue now."
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029300_ItemDescription_: "If even the spider cannot save this fallen world, let Punkchild spark a rebellion! Reality has rotted; I will redefine the genre of life! Only those willing to fight will strike the right chord and rise above the chaos."
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029300303_ItemDescripti: “I can’t stand this annoying static any longer! Can I get a little peace and quiet here?”
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029500_ItemDescription_: "He used black sorcery irresponsibly! It's his fault that Peter is gone... and he's going to pay!"
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029502_ItemDescription_: "Time to evolve tomorrow itself. Beyond everything you've ever imagined."
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029301_ItemDescription_: "Now you look like my 'little snowflake' inside and out."
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029101_ItemDescription_: "Normally, I wouldn't choose two warriors in such a short time, but that mystic Limbo energy radiating from Magik has piqued my curiosity. I can't help but wonder what that place tastes like!"
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Avengers Vs. X-Men (2012) #5
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1029_ST.MarvelItemTable_1029501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2

123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030500_ItemDescription_: "You prey on innocent travelers at night. That's all I care about. All I'm doing is stopping you as simply and completely as possible."
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030501_ItemDescription_: "My name is Marc Spector. The Fist of Phoenix."
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030100_ItemDescription_: "After his long odyssey, Marc returned to Egypt and donned obsidian armor as commanded by Khonshu. Gilded accents glittered under the moonlight, cutting through the darkness like a beam of light."
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030101_ItemDescription_: "Although the Eternal Night implies moonlight, Khonshu was still sullen. Marc embraced the crimson moon's glow, patiently anticipating the opportunity foretold by Khonshu—an opportunity destined to arrive through a mortal named Strange."
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030300_ItemDescription_: "Far to the southwest lies K'un Lun, the esteemed earthly capital of the divine cities, guarded by deities and dragons alike. This guardian, with a human body and a dragon's face, clad in azure scales, stands as the majestic protector of the Moon Palace and an invincible general against evil."
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030800_ItemDescription_: "Then rise. Rise and live again. As my fist of vengeance. As my Moon Knight."
Appears in Marvel Studios' Moon Knight (2022)
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1030_ST.MarvelItemTable_1030300304_ItemDescripti: Under divine decree, Marc Spector's journey east unites him with an ancient dragon on the quest to kill a dangerous beast. Together they banish spirits and bathe in moonlight, their reign of peace ever-increasing.

123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031300_ItemDescription_: "Tonight marks the anniversary of Seol Hee's debut as Luna Snow. Gazing at the sea of fans who've been with her every step of the way, she takes a deep breath and declares, 'Let's bloom in the moonlight!'"
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031100_ItemDescription_: "Got a wild invite from Douglas Ramsey today to perform on Krakoa—but he said to dress like Mint Chocolate Chip ice cream since it's the giant living island's favorite flavor! At first I thought the tree wanted to eat me, but every single branch was grooving to the beat!"
123_Customize_1031_ST.UISkinTable_10311000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Today, Douglas Ramsey swept me off to Krakoa for a gig like no other—singing to a giant tree with a face! At first, the tree seemed unimpressed, until Doug had me slip into a green outfit. That got a smile out of it! And every branch was swaying to the beat!"
— [Minty Beats] first appears in Marvel Rivals
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031303_ItemDescription_: "Even a girl with ice powers like me can’t resist a day of fun in the sun!"
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031301_ItemDescription_: "Peni told me that Seoul 2099 has seen an astounding transformation! The high-tech, futuristic cityscape is beyond words, but amidst it all, the love for music stands strong! I guess my music still lives on out there, so they asked me to grace the Stark Arena stage. What a blast from the past, or future!"
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031301303_ItemDescripti: "Let's ignite this party! Light pillars up high, let's dance to the waves of sound, and turn Seoul into a shimmering neon paradise!"
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031302_ItemDescription_: "Seol Hee's first steps onto Kirisaki Mountain were fraught with fate—a destiny sealed when her striking, mismatched eyes caught the attention of Yami no Karasu, who deemed her a threat to the mystical land. One fateful night, the deathly being struck, but the Hanja's her mournful lullaby stirred every living being. In a breathtaking chorus of death's defiance, yokai great and small united to drive Yami no Karasu back into the shadows. Ever since, the mountain's inhabitants have revered her as a divine savior, with temple bells still echoing her song of deliverance."
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031303304_ItemDescripti: "I can't imagine anyone brave enough to surf behind me as I ride these icy waves. They'd best watch out if they tried… or they might just get iced out!"
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031302_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1031_ST.MarvelItemTable_1031303_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032501_ItemDescription_: "Oh, wow! This will definitely solve my costume problem and not have any unforeseen consequences ever!"
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032501306_ItemDescripti: "If only Klyntar could always be filled with laughter."
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032300_ItemDescription_: "I can't recall how it all started, but the words of that Spider-Man, Hobie, still echo in my mind. His speech ignited a fire within me, and now Tippy-Toe and I are ready to rock out with punk spirit!"
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032500_ItemDescription_: "My main power is I never give up and I never say die. So neither should you, okay?"
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032301_ItemDescription_: "In the southern realm of K'un Lun lies a forest kingdom spanning hundreds of miles. Within it dwells a deity known as Cheerful Dragoness, who speaks the tongue of rodents and commands an unbeatable legion of squirrels."
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032100_ItemDescription_: "Tippy-Toe has always been a standout with her fur, but it wasn't until I really asked her that she spilled the beans—she's actually an Arctic Squirrel! So for her birthday, I put on some polar gear to surprise her. I've never seen her so thrilled!"
123_Customize_1032_ST.UISkinTable_10321000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "Tippy-Toe has always been a standout with her fur, but it wasn't until I really asked her that she spilled the beans—she's actually an Arctic Squirrel! So for her birthday, I put on some polar gear to surprise her. I've never seen her so thrilled!"
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032302_ItemDescription_: "You like the new outfit? I know everyone else is getting all gussied up for the Gala tonight, but I think hitting the beach is more my style."
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032301304_ItemDescripti: After months of training, Doreen can now execute a Cuju tackle with finesse. However, she only achieves a perfect 100% success rate when tackling Tippy-Toe.
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in The Unbeatable Squirrel Girl (2015) #5
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1032_ST.MarvelItemTable_1032302_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2

123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033501_ItemDescription_: You should know: Bucky and I didn't meet in church. We were both working. He on his side of the law...And me on mine.
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033100_ItemDescription_: "I'm digging the new threads, but you might wanna double-check that toxin for lethality. Dying under the foot of a rampaging space T-Rex isn't on my bucket list."
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033800_ItemDescription_: "I've lived a lot of lives... But I'm done running from my past."
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033502_ItemDescription_: "I've faced countless battles, but none compare to what I encountered in 2099. Now, with this newfound power coursing through me, I'm ready to take on anything that comes my way!"
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033500_ItemDescription_: "This two-century-old special agent got on the gala guest list? Looks like I'll have to find that one dress. Here's to hoping the only crisis we face tonight is Jeff munching his way through every last dessert!"
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033300_ItemDescription_: "The resounding thunder of the drum echoes through time, weaving a tale of grace and elegance. It heralds the arrival of spring, igniting a journey across myriad paths and endless possibilities."
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Black Widow (2021)
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033501_Visibility_#0_Un: From S1 Event - Galacta's Cosmic Adventure
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in X-Men: Hellfire Gala (2022) #1
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1033_ST.MarvelItemTable_1033502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034502_ItemDescription_: "--Too Much! Millions of voices! All of them...in...so much pain! I--I can see it all!!! It's--"
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034500_ItemDescription_: "Some good men rode out of town...But some men took action. I could hear Stark from the Timely Bulletin offices. He'd picked up his hammer again."
123_Customize_1034_ST.UISkinTable_10345000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Some good men rode out of town...But some men took action. I could hear Stark from the Timely Bulletin offices. He'd picked up his hammer again."
— [1872: Steam Power] first appears in 1872 (2015) #3
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034300_ItemDescription_: "Stephen, Reed, and I don't get to cracking on things we agree with often. But with just a few murmured words from Strange on this new Chronovium Reed's been studying, they effortlessly tweaked my armor algorithm into something new. Once this is all over, I'll refine it to perfection, but for now, we can skip the Bleeding Edge and go to crazy!"
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034501_ItemDescription_: "I'm the most intelligent, capable person on the planet. I'm not playing God. All this time... I've been playing human."
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034100_ItemDescription_: "Smart-metals align to a subdermal ghost of an exoskeleton. This is my testbed for a new suit. Think 'Putty'. Modelling clay. Next-next-gen 3D printer. It's for trying things out."
123_Customize_1034_ST.UISkinTable_10341000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Smart-metals align to a subdermal ghost of an exoskeleton. This is my testbed for a new suit. Think 'Putty'. Modelling clay. Next-next-gen 3D printer. It's for trying things out."
— [Armor Model 42] first appears in Iron Man (2012) #1
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034800304_ItemDescripti: "It’s not about how much we lost, it’s about how much we have left. We’re the Avengers. We gotta finish this."
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034502306_ItemDescripti: "You remember that Extremis-Infected symbiote I got ahold of?"
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Avengers: Endgame (2019)
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Superior Iron Man (2014) #1
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in King in Black (2020) #2
123_Customize_1034_ST.MarvelItemTable_1034502306_ItemName: How to Train Your Symbiote Dragon

123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035101_ItemDescription_: "You are the thing that led me into darkness. You're a poison! A disease! And I-I'm the cure!"
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035300_ItemDescription_: "Do you wanna build a Snow... Symbiote?"
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035102_ItemDescription_: "Symbiotes travel across the stars. Of course we can move at high speed!"
