123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035500_ItemDescription_:
"Hey, Brock, you mind if I drive?"
"Be my guest, Thompson."
123_Customize_1035_ST.UISkinTable_10351010_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "You're a blight, Venom! A plague on humanity! And I swear...I'll rid the world of you once and for all!"
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035100_ItemDescription_: "Surrender now, or I'll be feasting on your brain!"
123_Customize_1035_ST.UISkinTable_10351000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "Surrender now, or I'll be feasting on your brain!"
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035301305_ItemDescripti: "Born of liquid void and ever-burning life, bonded together by chaos, wielding the sword of the lord of vampires to destroy an elder god. Not bad for a loser journalist and his best buddy from church."
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035301_ItemDescription_: "Together, Eddie and his symbiote had always been Venom… but now, bonded with the Phoenix Force as well, they were something entirely new and different. They were the perfect balance of dark and light. They were two primal forces, at odds since the dawn of time, yet now joined together in perfect unison."
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035103_ItemDescription_: "Eddie, we can't just eat whatever we want anymore! Look at what we've become!"
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035501_ItemDescription_: "Maybe this whole Agent of the Cosmos thing, whatever it is, is going to work out just fine..."
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035300304_ItemDescripti: Catching snowflakes with your tongue isn’t just for kids—it's for Symbiotes too!
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035102_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035103_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3
123_Customize_1035_ST.MarvelItemTable_1035501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Guardians of the Galaxy (2013) #23

123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036101_ItemDescription_: "No. Ben is gone. And where you were...there is only a Chasm."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036504_ItemDescription_: "Pete? If you’re hearing this, I’m sorry, pal. Sorry that I’m gone. ‘Cause... well... I know how you feel when it comes to losing family. And that’s what you are to me. Family. So... if you’re thinking of this as my last will and all... I’m not leaving you my sports cars or stuff like that... I’m leaving you the best thing I ever had... My spot on this team. A place in this family. The best sister, two brothers, niece, and nephew a guy could ask for. They— We all love you, Pete. So? You up for it, bro? We’re all here for you."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036503_ItemDescription_: "Balance is a process. Not a destination."
123_Customize_1036_ST.UISkinTable_10361000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: "My name is Kaine...Now I have a second chance. And I'm not going to waste it. I'm not Spider-Man. I'm not a hero. But maybe I don't have to be a monster."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036100_ItemDescription_: "My name is Kaine...Now I have a second chance. And I'm not going to waste it. I'm not Spider-Man. I'm not a hero. But maybe I don't have to be a monster."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036800_ItemDescription_: "I have been in a team, okay? I don't wanna brag, but I will. I was in the Avengers."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036501304_ItemDescripti: "I've misplaced clothes before, but losing my Spider-Suit? That's just embarrassing! But you know what they say, crime doesn't wait for you to put your shoes on!"
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036501_ItemDescription_: "I'm not ready. But I have to be, if I want to be Spider-Man."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036300_ItemDescription_: "One dark night, the Great Snake claimed a mother and father, the cries of a newborn piercing the silence of Kirisaki Mountain. Jorogumo rescued the abandoned infant and raised him in her hidden lair. Growing up among creatures of the night, he embraced the belief that all lives—human and Yokai—could coexist in harmony. He dedicated himself to patrolling the rugged terrain, protecting all in need. When his adoptive mother was slain by a 'Yokai hunter', instead of giving in to rage, he only found his resolve steeled—a testament to his unyielding creed."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036500_ItemDescription_: "The biggest leap we've made in decades? Putting synths back in punk music. And hey, punk was born from the raw strum of a guitar even the future can't take that away. Wish Hobie could see this..."
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036502_ItemDescription_: "That glob just -- just spread out and became a costume -- and dissolved away the tatters of my old one in the process! Not bad! Different -- but not bad!"
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036500302_ItemDescripti: Tap into the punk spirit of the spider, tuning-up and rocking out with a performance the neighborhood will never forget!
123_Customize_1036_ST.UIHeroMVPTable_1036500302_Description: Spider-Man taps into his punk spirit, tuning-up and rocking out with a performance the neighborhood will never forget!

123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036800303_ItemDescripti: Our friendly neighborhood protectors will save the day again! Here come the Spider-Men!
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021)
123_Customize_1036_ST.MarvelItemTable_1036300305_ItemDescripti: The child dances through the snow, blissfully unaware that they have already woven themselves into the web of life and destiny.

123_Customize_1037_ST.MarvelItemTable_1037501_ItemDescription_: "Gathered royals and honored guests...The House of Magnus!!!"
123_Customize_1037_ST.MarvelItemTable_1037500_ItemDescription_: "All I demand is fear, and blind obedience! For I am Magneto...mightiest of all the Mutants!"
123_Customize_1037_ST.MarvelItemTable_1037100_ItemDescription_: "I have been known by many names. Max Eisenhardt. Erik Lehnsherr. Magnus. Magneto. Each name marks its own sin. And one day I'll answer for those offenses. But not today. Only my actions...what I do in the name of all mutants...hold any real meaning."
123_Customize_1037_ST.UISkinTable_10371000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"I have been known by many names. Max Eisenhardt. Erik Lehnsherr. Magnus. Magneto. Each name marks its own sin. And one day I'll answer for those offenses. But not today. Only my actions...what I do in the name of all mutants...hold any real meaning."
— Uncanny Blacksteel's first appearance in Magneto (2014) #1
123_Customize_1037_ST.MarvelItemTable_1037101_ItemDescription_: "One of the mightiest Mutants with the X-Gene, I'm digging his purple vibe, but I think it needs a Galacta-touch."
123_Customize_1037_ST.MarvelItemTable_1037300_ItemDescription_:
"Charles…is this...how the dream dies…?"
No.  Not like this. Not today.

"Don't be scared, young one. We are different stops on the same path...Oh, we live so, so long, little one. We live so much. Don't lose hope. Spin the wheel..."

First Appears in X-Men: The Trial of Magneto (2021) #4
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038100_ItemDescription_: "Don't be scared, young one. We are different stops on the same path...Oh, we live so, so long, little one. We live so much. Don't lose hope. Spin the wheel..."
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038500_ItemDescription_: "The Hellfire Gala is never just a party—it's a beacon ignited by Mutants in the abyss of a world against them. When Mutantkind from across time gather in one place, the sight sends shivers down the spines of demons and gods alike that seek to devour this world."
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038101_ItemDescription_: "Olympus once harbored a mysterious goddess, who embodied the starless, moonless night. She vanished into the embrace of Chaos, leaving nothing but her dark cloak behind. I bet that's why it took me five whole pages of the Darkhold to barter it from Khonshu's grip."
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038301_ItemDescription_: "As she lay helpless on Klyntar's symbiotic soil, watching as the King in Black swung his blade to strike down yet another noble champion, Wanda Maximoff managed to utter one last spell of protection. Not for herself, but for the only hero left who might yet stand a chance against his creator…"
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038501_ItemDescription_: "So, I built a spiritual mercantile. Here at Emporium, people can get help with the small things. And for those in greatest need...There's the Last Door. Part seeking spell. Part portal. It finds those at their lowest, those with nowhere to turn, and brings them here."
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038300_ItemDescription_: "High atop K'un-Lun, the celestial goddess awaits. Her crimson cloak, aglow with golden radiance, dazzles like the dawn. Harnessing primordial chaos to mold the fabric of existence, she casts her protective spells, standing as a guardian against the encroaching darkness."
123_Customize_1038_ST.UISkinTable_10381010_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Olympus once harbored a mysterious goddess, who embodied the starless, moonless night. She vanished into the embrace of Chaos, leaving nothing but her dark cloak behind. I bet that's why it took me five whole pages of the Darkhold to barter it from Khonshu's grip."

First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1038_ST.MarvelItemTable_1038301305_ItemDescripti: "In that moment, Klyntar was bathed in the glorious glow of chaos and creation, and an overwhelmed Knull was brought to his knees at last. It was truly a wonder to behold."

123_Customize_1039_ST.UISkinTable_10395000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"...There is Thor. The God-King of Asgard and thunder. The burning Herald of Galactus. And to all of this, the Herald King says...Nay."
— [Herald of Thunder] first appears in Thor (2020) #1
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039501_ItemDescription_: "Where there is Thor, there is Asgard."
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039100_ItemDescription_: "Ha! I often find myself lost in memories of those long, frosty nights of the last Fimbulwinter, fighting shoulder-to-shoulder with the warriors of Midgard! We sailed the longships, battling far and wide, my proudest golden locks and armor drenched in the muddy waters of England."
123_Customize_1039_ST.UISkinTable_10391000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Ha! I often find myself lost in memories of those long, frosty nights of the last Fimbulwinter, fighting shoulder to shoulder with the warriors of Midgard! We sailed the longships, battling far and wide, my proudest golden locks and armor drenched in the muddy waters of England. But what of it! We even snatched a lad named Arthur from the jaws of Broodlings!"
— [Midgard Umber] first appears in Marvel Rivals
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039503_ItemDescription_: "I thank you for the hearty invitation! Even in the darkest of hours, the noble folk of Midgard find mirth amidst their trials. Your indomitable spirit fills my heart with great admiration!"
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039800_ItemDescription_: "I need to figure out exactly who I am."
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039300_ItemDescription_: "At last! Our epic battle against Ultron has come to its end, and we have emerged victorious! Now, my friends, follow me to the shore and let the revelry begin!"
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039502_ItemDescription_: "But to dream beyond the horizon of self-imposed limitations—that I might become so much more than I am. That the kingdom of Asgard and the kingdom of Earth might become so much more than they ever thought possible!"
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039500_ItemDescription_: "...There is Thor. The God-King of Asgard and thunder. The burning Herald of Galactus. And to all of this, the Herald King says...Nay."
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039800304_ItemDescripti: I have something worth fighting for, and nothing will hinder Love and Thunder!
123_Customize_1039_ST.MarvelItemTable_1039503305_ItemDescripti: Introducing...the Mighty Thor! He brings the thunder to the Hellfire Gala grand finale!!

123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040501_ItemDescription_: "All right, Johnny...all right. So this is tomorrow."
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040800_ItemDescription_: "Today, we are your defenders. The four of us will face the danger, and we will protect you."
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040100_ItemDescription_: "It'll take more than ropes to keep Mister Fantastic out of action!"
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040300303_ItemDescripti: "No mere words of ours can truly describe the tenderness of this moment...So we won't even try."
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040500_ItemDescription_: "Me? I'm Reed Richards. The ultimate Reed Richards. The one who's finally going to solve everything. I'm the Maker."
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040300_ItemDescription_: "Susan Storm...Will you marry me? Will you be my wife?"
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025)
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Fantastic Four: The Wedding Special (2005) #1
123_Customize_1040_ST.MarvelItemTable_1040500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Ultimate Comics Ultimates (2011) #2

123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041301305_ItemDescripti: "Hydra may have had their way with you, Buck, but nothing can stop your heart from shining through. The Phoenix knows that, the symbiotes know that, I know that. We're not at the end of the line yet."
123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041100_ItemDescription_: "Back in the day, I only wore blue and red to match Steve. But I'll admit, the blue grew on me over time."
123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041301_ItemDescription_: "Steve and I took down a bastard like you once before. Went by Red Skull. I don't care how old you are, but you'll go down just the same. Evil never wins in the end and the long arm of justice always gets its due."
123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041300_ItemDescription_: "Feels weird to finally look my age with this grey hair, but not the first time I've taken a risk to get the job done. Ugly things have been going bump in the night, time for someone who knows war to bump back."
123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041500_ItemDescription_: "Those men were Bucky Barnes. And Bucky Barnes is gone. Now...I'm the man who's gonna upend your world."
123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1

123_Customize_1041_ST.MarvelItemTable_1041500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Captain America: Sentinel of Liberty (2022) #6

123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042101_ItemDescription_: "SP//DR's latest aesthetic takes cues from the fabled Blue Baboon Tarantula, a secret obsession of Peni's father. This arachnid, indigenous to the enigmatic Socotra Island radiated a captivating, enigmatic blue luminescence across its form before going extinct in the 2070s. This remarkable spider captivated Peni in her youth, leaving an enduring impression that will remain with her always."
123_Customize_1042_ST.UISkinTable_10421000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"If you're a sci-fi movie buff, you'd know data streams in neon green. As a Super Hero from the future, diving into cyberspace to nab some no-good data thieves is all in a day's work. Cloaked in a web of dense data, my SP//DR suit can turn into a stealthy cyber agent! Let's face Pixel Corp head-on, shall we?"
— [Olive Skimmer] first appears in Marvel Rivals
123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042100_ItemDescription_: "Any sci-fi flick will tell you, data glows green. To catch those cyber cowboys with dirty tricks up their sleeves, I've woven a cloak of dense data over my SP//DR suit and become a stealthy cyber agent! Let's face Pixel Corp head-on, shall we?"
123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042500_ItemDescription_: "Addy is no longer. May is no longer. We are one. WE ARE VEN#m."
123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042301_ItemDescription_: "So, my dad left me this old car, right? Well, out in the wasteland, it totally got hit by this virus called U17R0N and went nuts! It kept flipping and rebuilding itself, turning into a super scary mech monster. But guess what? My dad's SP//dr totally shut down that techno-virus, and now it's all chill and reliable. Honestly, it's more than just a machine; it's my closest friend out here now. Chotto busukawa, ne?"
123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042300_ItemDescription_: "In the yokai-infested Kirisaki Mountain, Peni Parker has repurposed her late father's "Lion Dance" costume into a wooden puppet creature with the mystically infused mud of the mountain. Many of the peaceful tsuchigumo gathered to her and helped her build her clever spider-chamber, concealing them as they patiently await the onset of the Hyakki Yagyō."
123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1

123_Customize_1042_ST.MarvelItemTable_1042500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Edge of Spider-Geddon (2018) #2

123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043500303_ItemDescripti: "You say you are master of the dark? The Void? I'm Master of the Sun."
123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043800_ItemDescription_: "The trap isn't a trap if you know the trap is trying to trap you, it's a face off."
123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043100_ItemDescription_: "Face it. I rule. I love space. Down on earth, my life was a nightmare. Down there, you wouldn't look at me twice. Up there, I'm living the dream. I'm the legendary Star-Lord."
123_Customize_1043_ST.UISkinTable_10431000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Face it. I rule. I love space. Down on earth, my life was a nightmare. Down there, you wouldn't look at me twice. Up there, I'm living the dream. I'm the legendary Star-Lord."
— [Jovial Star] first appears in Legendary Star-Lord (2014) #1
123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043500_ItemDescription_: "Every sun is a circle moving in a circle. Master the circle—the orbit of the self—And you become the Master of the Sun."
123_Customize_1043_ST.UISkinTable_10435000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Every sun is a circle moving in a circle. Master the circle—the orbit of the self—And you become the Master of the Sun."
— [Master of the Sun] first appears in Guardians of the Galaxy (2020) #9
123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043300_ItemDescription_: "The majestic Lion soars with auspicious energy, reigning over the mountains, as a thousand stars illuminate the universe, casting a celestial glow upon the land, heralding the arrival of spring."
123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043501_ItemDescription_: "Congratulations to the newly elected President of the Spartax Empire...Peter Quill!"
123_Customize_1043_ST.MarvelItemTable_1043102_ItemDescription_: Bore witness to the Marvel Rivals IGNITE 2025: Mid-Season Finals!

123_Customize_1044_ST.MarvelItemTable_1044300_ItemDescription_: "The Sword of Dracula took it all in: Phoenix fire & the living abyss. Life and void. It made somethin' that shouldn't exist, like me. I feel it...raw power supercharging my blood. Hela, Knull, are y'all ready for your last dance? Because I was born ready!"
123_Customize_1044_ST.MarvelItemTable_1044100_ItemDescription_: "The hunt is on. All night long."
123_Customize_1044_ST.MarvelItemTable_1044102_ItemDescription_: "I'm feeling this look; like it was crafted just for me."

123_Customize_1045_ST.MarvelItemTable_1045500_ItemDescription_: "This day—for once and for always—I declare war on human race—war, to the death!"
123_Customize_1045_ST.MarvelItemTable_1045800_ItemDescription_: "Only the most broken people can be great leaders."
123_Customize_1045_ST.UISkinTable_10451000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Oh, clueless humans, utterly unaware that the purple-glowing denizens of the deep are the true pioneers of this planet, as only the ocean's embrace shielded life from the ravages of ultraviolet rays eons before the ozone even existed. We are the rightful heirs of the Earth!"

First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1045_ST.MarvelItemTable_1045100_ItemDescription_: "Oh, clueless humans, utterly unaware that the purple-glowing denizens of the deep are the true pioneers of this planet, as only the ocean's embrace shielded life from the ravages of ultraviolet rays eons before the ozone even existed. We are the rightful heirs of the Earth!"
123_Customize_1045_ST.MarvelItemTable_1045501_ItemDescription_: "I am not used to having so much of my body covered. Is this the cost of camaraderie?"
123_Customize_1045_ST.MarvelItemTable_1045502_ItemDescription_: "We shall do its work while she is prepared for what comes next."
123_Customize_1045_ST.MarvelItemTable_1045101_ItemDescription_: "Usually, I don't have a lot interest in the ocean. However, this one's tenacity and bravery have caught my attention. I shall overlook his annoying ego and elevate him as one of my champions."

123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046102_ItemDescription_: "Wrapped in an enigmatic energy, I sense a profound transformation within and around me..."
123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046301_ItemDescription_: "With undeath threatening all life, I sought out Doctor Strange, seeking to empower my incantations to vanquish these nocturnal fiends. Though not convenient, virtue must be upheld, as avoidance would never suffice."
123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046100_ItemDescription_: "In the far reaches of our galaxy, where life remains pristine, people commune with souls in a uniquely profound way—through cosmic jade. This gentle stone holds a warmth akin to human touch even in the cold of deep space, as if infused with a soul of sheer virtue."
123_Customize_1046_ST.UISkinTable_10461000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"In the far reaches of our galaxy, where life remains pristine, people commune with souls in a uniquely profound way—through cosmic jade. This gentle stone holds a warmth akin to human touch even in the cold of deep space and emits a faint glow in the deepest darkness, as if within the jade resides a soul of sheer virtue."
— [Cosmic Jade] first appears in Marvel Rivals
123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046101_ItemDescription_: "God Slayer, Avatar of Life, Master of all Souls, Him... Adam Warlock's titles are etched with countless legends, and now, the Will of Galacta will be forever entwined with them."
123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046800_ItemDescription_: "I am the Warlock, Mom, and I am done with being ordered around!"
123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046300_ItemDescription_: "Within the depths of K'un-Lun's northern gorge lay a sacred stone, a vessel of celestial energies. As it fractured, a magnificent figure emerged—golden-haired, with eyes that capture the essence of dawn. When the arcane forces awakened, vitality surged forth, and the shadows retreated before the light of creation."
123_Customize_1046_ST.MarvelItemTable_1046800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 (2023)

123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047500_ItemDescription_: "Jeff spotted the pink dolphin at the costume shop instantly, its hue a perfect match to that of his best buddy Gwen's outfit. Now no one would be afraid of him when swimming with his friends!"
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047100_ItemDescription_: "Hey guys...so I need you to not freak out...because this is Jeff and I love him and he's coming home with us--"
123_Customize_1047_ST.UISkinTable_10471000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc:
"Hey guys...so I need you to not freak out...because this is Jeff and I love him and he's coming home with us--"
— [Adopted Avenger] first appears in West Coast Avengers (2018) #7
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047300_ItemDescription_: "Fine, Jeff, you can eat all the snow you want. Just not the yellow stuff!"
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047301_ItemDescription_: "Ben, I've explicitly stated not to send random messages in our emergency chat, particularly during our vacation. What did you send? What do 'nijjxliperhwlevomwxlifiwx' and 'mpszioveose' signify? Is this some form of Caesar cipher?"
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047301304_ItemDescripti: "Jeff is an astonishing little specimen! He's rolling and frolicking through the floral expanse, exhibiting sheer delight! I must document this moment and display it on the wall of the Baxter Building as a keepsake."
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047501_ItemDescription_: "Jeff! It's okay, I got you. We're gonna fix you up, and it's gonna be fine!"
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047001206_ItemDescripti: During this action, Emma Frost can join you in executing this move together!
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047300_Visibility_#0_Un: From the S0 Winter Celebration Event
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_2104712_ItemName: Jeff the Land Shark Deluxe KO Prompt 1
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_2104713_ItemName: Jeff the Land Shark Deluxe KO Prompt 2
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_2104702_ItemName: Jeff the Land Shark Deluxe Avatar
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_2104711_ItemName: Jeff the Land Shark Default KO Prompt
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_2104701_ItemName: Jeff the Land Shark Default Avatar
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in It's Jeff Infinity Comic (2021) #3
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1047_ST.MarvelItemTable_1047100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in West Coast Avengers (2018) #7

123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048501_ItemDescription_: "Calm yourself, Gladiator. Quite remarkable for you to be so shaken. But you must hold fast to your true loyalties. As must I!"
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048502305_ItemDescripti: "Rocket tells me that this tiny square box can capture unforgettable moments. But how do I wield its power...?"
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048300_ItemDescription_: "Vampires and Yokai are essentially two sides of the same coin, each posing a perilous threat to humanity. But this time, the stakes are different; these beings exist as both Yokai and people. I must seek a gentler solution with the help of this crystal."
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048100_ItemDescription_: "April is the season of sakura, and now Kirisaki Mountain has a brief moment of calm. Sai and Logan bathed in the light of the moon and stars, allowing the spring breeze to brush against their faces."
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048500_ItemDescription_: "I'm not just a telepath. I've got real power."
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048502_ItemDescription_: "I have spent so long fighting monsters and demons, I cannot remember the last time I allowed myself to have fun. Today, that changes."
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1048_ST.MarvelItemTable_1048502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049800_ItemDescription_: "You know what? You're the best Wolverine."
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049501_ItemDescription_: "I AM -- LOGAN! LOGAN! I AM A MAN! And you—are the animal!"
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049502_ItemDescription_: "Name's Logan. Weapon X. The Wolverine. And now I'm the damn Phoenix."
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049300_ItemDescription_: "I know a thing or two about living a long time, you tend to forget what fear is. Dracula's messed with the people I care about for far too long, so let's remind him why he should stay in his coffin."
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049501303_ItemDescripti: "The time has come, Cornelius... The weapon is primed and perfect."
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049100_ItemDescription_: "Quitting the X-Men? Logan's been there, done that – multiple times. He effortlessly grabs his leather jacket and takes off into the wilderness. But they know he just needs to cool off, run with the wolves, and remember that he's not an animal, but a man."
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049500_ItemDescription_: "Answer should be obvious. An' in Madripoor, Darlin'…The name's Patch."
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049300305_ItemDescripti: The rage of the Wolverine is a force no one can challenge, not even the most menacing blood moon. Newborn monsters cower before the apex predator.
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' Deadpool & Wolverine (2024)
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Comics Presents (1988) #79
123_Customize_1049_ST.MarvelItemTable_1049500_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Comics Presents (1988) #10

123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050500_ItemDescription_: "If you go any further, after your ultimate defeat at the hands of Malice, mistress of hate."
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050800_ItemDescription_: "Family is about connecting to something bigger than yourself. Whatever life throws at us. We'll face it together—as a family."
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050300303_ItemDescripti: "No mere words of ours can truly describe the tenderness of this moment...So we won't even try."
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050501_ItemDescription_: "I was in the mood for something different. The other...seemed wrong."
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050100_ItemDescription_: "I—I can't turn invisible fast enough!! How can we stop this creature?"
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050101_ItemDescription_: "Reed will understand. He knows that I’m not the type to sit around in the Baxter Building while the boys handle everything. I'm just as capable, if not more so. Vampires can't get through my shields, much less anything else. They won't see me coming."
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025)
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1050_ST.MarvelItemTable_1050300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Fantastic Four: The Wedding Special (2005) #1

123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051100_ItemDescription_: "The three of you can't do it alone! It's time for The Thing to take a hand!"
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051502_ItemDescription_: "Huh, looks like you can take a punch... Good. It's been a while since I laid a clobberin' on someone. Bein' head guard doesn't get me as much action as I'd hoped."
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051501_ItemDescription_: "I don't much feel like jokin', Web-Head... Right now, I just wanna break somethin'."
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051301_ItemDescription_: "Well, lemme tell ya, I didn't figure my vacation buddies would be a bunch o' little critters. Raccoon, squirrels, and some kinda land shark... Hold up, where's my Fantasti-Phone at?"
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051500_ItemDescription_: "I'm sorry Mister, I just don't carry anything big enough to fit a man your size!"
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051101_ItemDescription_: "These shorts bring back a ton of memories, especially that one time with Dunphy…"
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051800_ItemDescription_: Appears in Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four: First Steps (2025)
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Peter Parker: The Spectacular Spider-Man (2017) #304
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1051_ST.MarvelItemTable_1051301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052301_ItemDescription_: "The 'Neijing' teaches us: 'Those who are pure, hold true Chi within; evil cannot touch them. Avoid toxic Chi, and harmony will return. When the spirit flows freely, it cannot be corrupted.'"
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052500_ItemDescription_: "This is the sword of Fu Xi... and I'm its master!!!"
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052100_ItemDescription_: "Lin Lie has become the youngest master of martial arts our city has seen. With outstanding skills and extraordinary talent, even bigger challenges now await him..."
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052502_ItemDescription_: "There's a legend in K'un-Lun: hundreds of years ago, a red-haired girl passed Shou-Lao's trial and used the dragon's power to tame the celestial bird of fire before vanishing without a trace. Now, that same immortal fire blazes within my fists."
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052300_ItemDescription_: "The lion's leap echoes through the expansive courtyard, reaching the farthest reaches of the boundless sky. The dragon coils, capturing the luminance of both sun and moon, sparkling with unmatched grandeur."
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052501_ItemDescription_: "This mess we're in today, the one you created by stealing this eye from its rightful owner...So I'm going to ask you again, Stephen...Whose is this, really?!"
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052300303_ItemDescripti: Auspicious lions leap to welcome spring's embrace, Good fortune arrives, bringing joy and grace!
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 0
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 1
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052301_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1052_ST.MarvelItemTable_1052502_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053500_ItemDescription_: "Well, don't worry, darling. Emma's here to save the day."
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053100_ItemDescription_: "Yes, white has always been my signature, but I never anticipated how stunning blue would look on me."
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053101_ItemDescription_: "The moment I laid eyes on her, I was utterly captivated. I simply must bring her into the ranks of my Galacta army, and she will take the lead."
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053102_ItemDescription_: "With the sun illuminating her, Emma radiates a dazzling golden light. 'Sweetheart, start the countdown—three minutes from now, and even the sun will have to concede that I reign as the true beacon of brilliance.'"
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053501_ItemDescription_: "This world can still be saved. Be healed."
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053001206_ItemDescripti: During this action, Jeff the Land Shark can join you in executing this move together!
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053501_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Avengers Vs. X-Men (2012) #5
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053100_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2
123_Customize_1053_ST.MarvelItemTable_1053102_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 2

123_Customize_1054_ST.MarvelItemTable_1054300_ItemDescription_: "The perfect fusion of Phoenix Force and Chaos Magic gives rise to an unprecedented harmonious cycle, reminiscent of the endless interplay of yin and yang in the cosmos."
123_Customize_1054_ST.MarvelItemTable_1054100_ItemDescription_: "My name is Jean Grey. These are X-Men. I'm sorry for what you had to go through. It's not what it appears. I promise you."
123_Customize_1054_ST.MarvelItemTable_1054101_ItemDescription_: "This is my calling, my destiny, an inescapable truth. And you will meet your end."
123_Customize_1054_ST.MarvelItemTable_1054300302_ItemDescripti: As two powers merge into one, darkness is shattered, and light emerges.
123_Customize_1054_ST.MarvelItemTable_1054101_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3
123_Customize_1054_ST.MarvelItemTable_1054300_ItemDescription_: First Appears in Marvel Rivals Season 3

This item enables you to change your name, but only once every 7 days.
Names already taken by other players are not available.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180008_ItemDescription_: The flowers of Krakoa are the primary economic source of the Mutant nation. Its pharmaceutical effects are capable of extending life and curing diseases. These precious gifts were once used by Krakoa as diplomatic bargaining chips, only given to countries that were willing to recognize Krakoa's sovereignty. After Krakoa arrived at year 2099, they were taken by Emma Frost as a weapon to break the Mega-Corps' monopolies. These syndicates that had damaged the environment never realized that the Earth would strike back quite like this.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0230043_ItemName: What's It Got To Do With Me?
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000011_ItemDescription: Includes: I Got Nothing, No Words Needed, Take a Break
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000002_ItemDescription: Includes: Hello, Nice, Shocked, Angry, Shy, Cry, Mad, and Laugh
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000001_ItemDescription: Includes: Yeah, Cool, Doze, OMG, Sinister, and Cry
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000005_ItemDescription: Includes: We Are Venom!, Actually…, and Symbiote Shock
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000003_ItemDescription: Includes: Jeff's Love, Sleep Tight, Lovin' It, Waaah!, Jesty!
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000004_ItemDescription: Includes: Eternal Boogie, Get Hyped, and Pink Pop
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000006_ItemDescription: Includes: Eternal Boogie, Get Hyped, Pink Pop, We Are Venom!, Actually…, and Symbiote Shock
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000016_ItemDescription: Includes: Little Insects, Death's Smile, What's It Got To Do With Me?
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000017_ItemDescription: Includes: Seeing Red, Cackling, I Got Nothing
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_26000015_ItemDescription: Includes: Disdain, Scheming, Just a Flesh Wound
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_01020003_ItemDescription: Everything here is so new… and so amazing!
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180003_ItemDescription_: In Tokyo 2099, the Timestream Entanglement has brought the Web of Life and Destiny to the city's skyline. This web, which binds the Multiverse together, shares the same intricate topological structure as the tangled Timestream itself. Their resonance tears open a rift within the web, disturbing one of the ancient mystical items collected by the Master Weaver—the Spider-Totem.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180006_ItemDescription_: Among the many legacies left by Chthon, Wanda Maximoff may well be the most extraordinary, while the Darkhold is undoubtedly the most sinister. Every time a reckless and power-hungry sorcerer misuses the spells within its pages, the resulting devastation to the world is immense. But Doom is no mere amateur. His aim is to align with Dracula and pull the "Vampiric Verses" from inside the book. But another spell written within—"Montesi Formula"—can also eliminate all of them. Perhaps this is yet another of Chthon's cruel jokes, a testament to his eternal mockery of humankind.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180002_ItemDescription_: In Yggsgard, Chronovium has merged with the World Tree, flowing within its sap. Loki is carving into Yggdrasill, seeking to harness the power of the Norns. He plans to weave the time-soaked sap into new threads of fate, reweaving the destiny of the Ten Realms as his own will.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180005_ItemDescription_: Just like the Codex left in one's body after a Symbiote bonds with its host, the gods corrupted by Knull also possess this remnant. One of these Divine Codices, the Celestial Codex, is one of the more special in existence, as it has absorbed the same chronal energies that have stirred Knull from his imprisoned slumber. Now, his trapped essence seeks to rejoin its progenitor.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_903_ItemDescription_Norm:
Lucky charms to trade for exclusive rewards in the "Galacta's Gift" event.
Acquired through a random drop when winning a game.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810270001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
As the best friends of the galaxy, Groot always wants Rocket by his side. Even though he can only express himself by saying, "I am Groot." But I understand him, so I've got just what he needs!
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810360001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
As long as Peter comes home safe, Mary Jane doesn't mind how late he is. And no matter which universe he's in, he'll always think of her. He really did hit the jackpot, huh? 
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810470001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
Little Jeffie will never forget that guy in the red tights, he's one of Jeff's best buddies in any timeline. He's not my favorite, but as long as it makes Jeff happy! Who can say no to that toothy smile?
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810410001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
Every time Bucky goes off to battle, he can't help but worry about the little one back home: Is it doing okay? Can it eat enough on its own? Don't worry, Alpine, Daddy will be home after this mission. He doesn't need this gift to remember you, but I know he'll like it.
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810230001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
Whenever Rocket sees this little guy, he'll be reminded of the good old days. Back when the Guardians of the Galaxy were just getting started, he took special care of Groot, and thanks to that, Groot became the hero he is today! Some roots run deep across the stars!
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810530001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
Emma's been getting her manicured hands a bit messy lately, so I know she's been in need of a shopping spree. I just know she's going to adore this Jeff handbag! Diamonds may be forever, but so is our love of this little guy.
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810500001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
Susan has been missing H.E.R.B.I.E. after saving New York, and I guess Reed has been a bit busy, so I cooked up a little something to keep her from feeling homesick! I hope she likes it.
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_Slot_03810480001_ItemDes:
I know how hard everyone has been working, so I, Galacta, wanted to start giving out little gifts that remind everyone of home while they're out fighting to save the timestream!
Sai has been fighting for so long, I thought she might like something to remind her of one of her greatest victories. Rivalry is something to be celebrated, you know?
[Defeat enemies or secure assists during a match to trigger the accessory popup effect.]
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_901_ItemDescription_Norm:
Mysterious tokens infused with cosmic energy by the dynamic father-daughter devourer of worlds duo.
With each new season, these tokens can be collected anew, unlocking incredible BattlePass rewards.

Note: At the end of each season, a reset will take place. Chrono Tokens carried over cannot exceed the current season's Redemption Account balance.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180009_ItemDescription_: After the Timestream Entanglement, Krakoa went through a temporal storm and found itself in the year 2099. This journey infused every cell of this living island with chronal energy, plunging it into huge pain and torment. In an attempt to execute a self-cleaning process, its life merged with a small amount of expelled Chronovium, giving birth to a new form of life. These living Chronovium Seedlings were named Ak, Ra, and Ko, unaware of the suffering spawned their adorable existence nor their incredible power.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180001_ItemDescription_: As mysterious chronal energies flow from the Timestream Entanglement, Chronovium ore reawakens Hydra's Antarctic fortress: Hell's Heaven. Hydra now ignites an evil plot that would bring them to the pinnacle of power.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_102_ItemDescription_Norm: The universal currency across the cosmos.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_101_ItemDescription_Norm: Cosmic shards of Chronovium brimming with raw, potent energy. Can be exchanged for all manner of valuable items from across the galaxy.

123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_30000023_ItemDescription: The name plate of a cosmic quandary from MARVEL Puzzle Quest
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_904_ItemDescription_Norm: Jeff's legendary trophy! What kind of decoration can we get in return? Acquired through Challenges and Jeff's Winter Splash Festival Missions
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_905_ItemDescription_Norm: Jeff's legendary trophy! What kind of decoration can we get in return? Acquired through Challenges and Jeff's Winter Splash Festival Missions
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180012_ItemDescription_: Every time the Phoenix Force — or her host — suffers critical trauma or even death, she retreats into a cosmic egg to await rebirth. However, the Phoenix's reincubation demands time. Should the egg be fractured prematurely, it unleashes the Phoenix Force in a fragmented, unstable state. Furthermore, Tony Stark and Adam Warlock's research reveals the egg's interior functions as a conduit to the White Hot Room — the above place where the Phoenix Force was born. For Knull, the primordial darkness once defeated by light, this vulnerability transforms the Phoenix's death itself into a weapon of poetic devastation.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0170015_ItemName: Eternity & One Above All Crest of Honor (S2.5)
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0170019_ItemName: Eternity & One Above All Crest of Honor (S3.0)
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0170023_ItemName: Eternity & One Above All Crest of Honor (S3.5)
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180007_ItemDescription_: Of course, Doom deceived Dracula. The so-called "gift" of the Chronovium was far from an act of generosity—it was a debt of blood that Dracula would one day repay tenfold. The naive Vampire Lord had unwittingly retrieved the Vampiric Verses for him. Now, all Doom needed to do was activate the power of that Chronovium, reversing the effects of the Vampiric Verses. The spell that granted Varnae's brood their immortality would be stripped away and condensed into this single crystal.

123_Customize_ST.UISkinTable_10451000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: Beneath the waves, secret dangers skulk in the ocean's abyss, cloaking the future in a veil of the unknown.
123_Customize_ST.UISkinTable_10381000_SkinBasic_SkinDesc: Chaos magic is the ancestral wellspring from which all magic flows, an ancient and distinct strain of enchantment, a primal beam of arcane energy that shimmered into being at the crossroads of nascent awareness and cosmic serendipity.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_902_ItemDescription_Norm:
Earn XP to boost your level in the "Galacta's Quest" event.
Acquired through daily missions and challenges.
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180004_ItemDescription_: After thousands of experiments, the scientists of the Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda have finally succeeded in calculating the unit cell parameters of Chrono-Vibranium. Remarkably, Vibranium's electrons are perfectly positioned at the triangular vertices of a two-dimensional Kagome lattice. Thus begins their journey to "untangle the flow of time."
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_202_ItemDescription_Norm:
Can activate a Chrono Shield to prevent point loss from a defeat in Competitive. If one is active, using this item won’t consume it.

<Red>Chrono Shield Cards will be automatically cleared at the end of each season.</>
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180010_ItemDescription_: Since the inception of Krakoa, Cerebro has been the cornerstone of the Resurrection Protocols. Within it lies the genetic data and consciousness backups of mutants, allowing them to transcend death and become an immortal race. This is why Magneto, seeing Charles Xavier's invaluable legacy being desecrated by X-Tron, was driven by immense rage to dismantle the device from his grasp, forging it into the sharp blade known as the Sword of X. In the aftermath, Forge and Scarlet Witch crafted a brand-new Cerebro for Krakoa—a testament to resilience: "Cerebro was broken, but forged anew and refined, like Xavier's dream."
123_Customize_ST.MarvelItemTable_0180011_ItemDescription_: All-Black the Necrosword was the first symbiote created by Knull. After beheading a Celestial, the dark god continued forging the blade inside the decapitated skull—which would later become Knowhere. The primordial flames and thunderous hammer-blows imprinted upon her deepest memory, birthing the inherent fear of fire and sound wave that would plague all symbiotes for eons.

Best regards,  
The Marvel Rivals Team

Hey there, {player_name}!

Looks like it's been {day} days since you've dived into the Competitive mode. Just a heads-up: if you hit a 7-day streak without joining the fray, your competitive points will start to vanish!
124_Mail_ST.MarvelMailTable_rank_101_MailInfo_Conten:
Hey there, {player_name}!

Your rank has been adjusted due to {day} days of inactivity in the Competitive mode. You were previously at {_old_level} with {old_star} points and are now at {_new_level} with {new_star} points. No sweat though, jump back into the Competitive mode and you'll be climbing back up in no time!
124_Mail_ST.MarvelSystemMailTable_global_12_MailInfo:
Dear Rivals,
As we embark on a new chapter, the flames of battle ignite once more! We are thrilled to announce that since our epic debut on December 6th, Marvel Rivals has welcomed a staggering 20 million passionate heroes into our ranks!

The entire team extends our heartfelt gratitude to each and every one of you—our faithful companions on this incredible journey. Your unwavering support, invaluable feedback, and boundless enthusiasm are the true superpowers driving our relentless quest for greatness.

To commemorate this monumental milestone, we’re excited to gift each of you the exclusive spray "20,000,000 Rivals" as a symbol of our appreciation for your steadfast support and passion.

Together, let us continue to ignite the battle and unleash infinite possibilities in the ever-expanding universes that bind us all.

Stay heroic,
The Marvel Rivals Team

124_Mail_ST.MarvelMailTable_29_MailInfo_Content:
Hi there! 

It's your girl, Galacta, daughter of the devourer! You're probably here because you've seen some crazy stuff going down in the Multiverse and wanna know what's up. The Timestream Entanglement—a chronal anomaly created by two rival Dooms—is ripping every reality to shreds. My power cosmic is keeping a few key timelines intact until the heroes of those dimensions can figure out a solution, but they'll need your help to save the day. I got you something to say thanks for joining the team. You might want to use it soon... before the end of all that is...
124_Mail_ST.MarvelMailTable_33_MailInfo_Content:
Way to go, players!

That was an absolutely epic victory!
Congrats on defeating the dev team in the Creator Clash! Your name shall forever echo across the infinite expanse of the Multiverse! Probably. 
At the very least, you've snagged a spray reward exclusive to the closed beta! It'll drop into the account you played with once we hit the official launch!

Hey, players!

Time sure flies when you're having fun... or when the timestream is collapsing around you...
The [Overture] event will wrap up on May 20th, 2024, at 23:59 (PDT), so make sure to claim your rewards and enter your prize details before the clock runs out!

Catch you on the flip side... As long as the Multiverse hasn't completely unraveled by then...

124_Mail_ST.MarvelMailTable_20001_MailInfo_Content:
Behold, a triumph of cosmic proportions! Hail, champion! As a valiant member of {club_team_name}, you have ascended to the illustrious <O>{final_ranking}</> in the Championship during the {season_name} season. Your name shall resound across the boundless realms for eternity!

Reap the spoils of your valor within the tournament system. Should your spoils include bounty bonuses, ensure your contact details are registered in the settings, so that the administration may bestow their rewards upon you. A word of caution: we shall never demand your password or verification code!

The radiance of heroes endures, and so too shall the rewards of our Marvel Rivals Championship. Lay claim to your historical rewards at any juncture within the Hall of Honor.

124_Mail_ST.MarvelActivityMailTable_ban_rank_MailInf:
Following a thorough system detection and manual review, we have confirmed that your account has recently engaged in violations related to <O>{reason}</>. As a result, we will be implementing the following penalties:

1. Season Ban: Your account will be suspended from participating in Competitive mode until the end of the current season.
2. Rank Reset: Your Competitive rank and score for this season will be reset.

130_Credit_ST.Unable_quickandarcade: <Orange>Matchmaking for Quick Match and other modes Suspended</>: {effect_time}
130_Credit_ST.PlayerLaunchSurrender: {PlayerName} has initiated a surrender vote. Please use "{AgreeSurrender}", "{RejectSurrender}", or "/YES", "/NO" to vote.
130_Credit_ST.PlayerLaunchSurrenderOnConsole: {PlayerName} initiated a surrender. Press and hold the menu button/key to access the voting screen and submit your vote.
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Sys_Punish_End: The following penalty has been lifted: {punish_text}.
130_Credit_ST.Unable_quickandarcade2: Matchmaking for Quick Match and Conquest Suspended {effect_time}
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Warning_Escaped: You left the last match early. This may lead to penalties if this behavior persists. Subsequent violations will result in a penalty, requiring you to wait before engaging in Quick Match and Rivalry matchmaking.
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Punish_Escaped2:
You left the last match early, resulting in a penalty:
Cannot join Quick Match and Conquest matchmaking for <R>{punish_time}</> (currently <R>{left_time}</> remaining)
Further violations will result in more severe penalties
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Punish_Escaped1:
You left the last match early, resulting in a penalty:
Cannot join Competitive matchmaking for <R>{punish_time}</> (currently <R>{left_time}</> remaining)
Further violations will result in more severe penalties
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Warning_Not_Online: You disconnected during the last match and failed to reconnect. This may lead to penalties if this behavior persists. Subsequent violations will result in a penalty, requiring you to wait before engaging in Quick Match and Rivalry matchmaking.
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Punish_Not_Online2:
You disconnected from the network in the last match and did not reconnect, resulting in a penalty:
Cannot join Quick Match and Conquest matchmaking for <R>{punish_time}</> (currently <R>{left_time}</> remaining)
Further violations will result in more severe penalties
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Punish_Not_Online1:
You disconnected from the network in the last match and did not reconnect, resulting in a penalty:
Cannot join Competitive matchmaking for <R>{punish_time}</> (currently <R>{left_time}</> remaining)
Further violations will result in more severe penalties
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Warning_Inactive: You were inactive for a long time in the last match and were tagged as AFK. This may lead to penalties if this behavior persists. Subsequent violations will result in a penalty, requiring you to wait before engaging in Quick Match and Rivalry matchmaking.
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Punish_Inactive2:
In your recent RIVALRY, you were inactive for an extended period and have been tagged as AFK, resulting in a PENALTY:
Matchmaking for QUICK MODE and CONQUEST Suspended for <R>{punish_time}</> (Currently <R>{left_time}</> remaining)
Continued violations will result in more severe PENALTIES.
130_Credit_ST.TXT_Content_Punish_Inactive1:
In your recent RIVALRY, you were inactive for an extended period and have been tagged as AFK, resulting in a PENALTY:
Matchmaking for COMPETITIVE Matches Suspended for <R>{punish_time}</> (Currently <R>{left_time}</> remaining)
Continued violations will result in more severe PENALTIES.
130_Credit_ST.Credit_Reward_Description: Your Honor has reached a new height this season!
130_Credit_ST.Get_Reward_Title: You've leveled up your Honor this season! Here's a reward:
130_Credit_ST.Punish_Reason_Tips2: Due to misconduct, you are suspended from Quick Match and Conquest for {punish_time}. {punish_reason}.
130_Credit_ST.Punish_Reason_Tips: Due to misconduct, you are suspended from Competitive for {punish_time}. {punish_reason}.
130_Credit_ST.Credit_Desc:
Complete battles and shine on the field to boost your Honor!
Heads up! Breaking the rules will drag down your Honor, and hitting rock bottom could lead to penalties.
With each new season, your Honor resets to Reliable — unless you're flagged for low Honor.
130_Credit_ST.CannotSurrenderWhenSurrendering: Another player has already initiated a surrender, you cannot initiate again.
130_Credit_ST.EarlyEnableSurrender: A teammate is currently disconnected. Surrender is now available.
130_Credit_ST.Congratulation_Up: Congratulations! Your Honor has been raised to {credit_name}!

132_BattlePass_ST.TXT_PropVIew_Page_Exclusive_Guide_Conten:
· Exclusive to Luxury BattlePass holders.
· Redeem all rewards for this season to access this page.
· This page can be exchanged multiple times.

<Orange>* Please note the reward on this page will not automatically exchange after the season ends.</>
132_BattlePass_ST.S0_Rule:
◆ The BattlePass offers a wealth of valuable rewards. Earn Chrono Tokens by completing missions or participating in certain events to redeem these rewards. Alternatively, Chrono Tokens can also be purchased with Lattice. 

◆ The power of each Luxury BattlePass is eternal. Once acquired, its rewards can be unlocked through all seasons, past and future. Your purchased Luxury BattlePasses can be accessed via the Reality Link Point. Please note that free BattlePasses vanish with each season's end, fading into obscurity. 

◆ Each page of the BattlePass must be unlocked before you can redeem its rewards. Accumulate Chrono Tokens throughout the season to sequentially unlock each page. Spending Chrono Tokens does not affect your accumulated total. 

◆ Once a page is unlocked, you can spend Chrono Tokens to redeem its rewards. Some rewards may require you to redeem all other rewards on the page first. 

◆ Purchasing the Luxury BattlePass grants access to all rewards. If you do not purchase the Luxury BattlePass, you can still redeem some rewards. 

◆ Players can also purchase the upgraded Luxury BattlePass to receive an additional 2800 Chrono Tokens and a 20% increase in Chrono Tokens earned for the rest of the current season. 

◆ Automatic Reward Redemption: At the end of the season, for players who have purchased the Luxury BattlePass, the system will automatically redeem rewards in order until there are insufficient Chrono Tokens or all rewards have been redeemed. The rewards will be sent via the BattlePass settlement page.

◆ At the end of each season, if there are remaining Chrono Tokens after automatic reward redemption, a portion will be carried over to the next season according to the settlement rules. The number of Chrono Tokens carried over cannot exceed the current season's Redemption Account balance. 

◆ [Redemption Account] includes the retained Chrono Tokens from the previous season and any Chrono Tokens exchanged through Lattice in the current season. This information is displayed below the Chrono Tokens currency tips.

◆ The last page of each current season's BattlePass is the "Season-Exclusive Redemption Page." You must first obtain the Luxury BattlePass and redeem all rewards from the current season before you redeem rewards from the last page.

133_MatchActivity_10120_ST.Marvelbattlechess_rule:
<White>Overall Process Rules:</>
<NWhite>1. After entering the match, each player selects six heroes from a randomly assigned hero pool based on certain rules to form their match lineup. Players will go through multiple rounds of battles.</>
<NWhite>2. Battle rounds are divided into two categories: PvP and PvE (Player VS. Galacta Bot).</> 
<NWhite>3. In a PvP round, players are paired evenly to engage in a battle. Players who lose the match will have their health points deducted, and if there is a tie, players on both sides will lose health points.</>
<NWhite>4. If the number of players at the start of a round is odd and pairing cannot be evenly matched, the unpaired player will face a mirrored lineup of a randomly selected opponent. If the unpaired player loses or ties, they lose health; if the player wins, the mirrored opponent does not lose health.</>
<NWhite>5. When a player's health reaches 0, they are eliminated and can no longer participate in subsequent battle rounds. Their rank is determined by the number of players remaining.</>
<NWhite>6. The match ends when only one player remains.</>

<White>Round Process Instructions</>
<NWhite>1. Each round consists of a Module draw phase, a deploy phase, and a battle phase.</> 
<NWhite>2. During the Module draw phase, players can spend Tokens to purchase Modules to enhance their lineup, which takes effect at the start of the battle phase. In the battle phase, players can also purchase Modules, but their effects will be delayed until the next battle phase.</>
<NWhite>3. During the deployment phase, players can arrange the positions where heroes will be generated.</>

<White>Player VS. Galacta Bot Battle Rounds</>
<NWhite>In these rounds, players fight against Galacta Bots and earn Modules according to the result of the battle.</>

<White>Ultron Robot</>
<NWhite>During the battle phase, players can control their Ultron robot to move freely and unleash its abilities to influence the battle.</>

<White>Module Instructions</>
<NWhite>The modules are divided into three types: Base, Replacement, and Strengthen Modules.</> 
<NWhite>Base Modules: Base Module includes four different types of protocols. Acquiring a certain number of Base Modules for a specific Protocol will upgrade the Protocol level and provide bonuses for the related lineup, while also increasing the probability of obtaining rarer Base Modules for that Protocol.</>
<NWhite>Replacement Module: Select and replace a hero in the lineup.</>
<NWhite>Strengthen Module: Exclusive Modules that enhance specific heroes obtained by defeating Galacta bots. When you switch heroes, if the hero being replaced has any Strengthen Modules equipped, the modules will be randomly swapped for ones of your other heroes.</>

<White>Hero Targeting Logic Instructions</>
<NWhite>We establish different targeting logic rules for our heroes, which are specifically divided into the following three categories:</>
<NWhite>1. Prioritize targeting the nearest enemy</>
<NWhite>The following heroes are subject to this logic:</>
<NWhite>Vanguard: Hulk, Doctor Strange, Groot, Magneto, Thor, Peni Parker, The Thing, Emma Frost</> 
<NWhite>Duelist: The Punisher, Storm, Human Torch, Hawkeye, Hela, Moon Knight, Squirrel Girl, Iron Man, Mister Fantastic, Winter Soldier, Star-Lord, Namor, Iron Fist</>
<NWhite>Strategist: Loki, Mantis, Rocket Raccoon, Cloak & Dagger, Luna Snow, Adam Warlock, Jeff the Land Shark, Invisible Woman, Ultron</>
<NWhite>2. Prioritize targeting the enemy with the lowest maximum Health</> 
<NWhite>The following heroes are subject to this logic:</>
<NWhite>Vanguard: Venom, Captain America</> 
<NWhite>Duelist: Black Panther, Magik, Black Widow, Spider-Man, Psylocke, Scarlet Witch</>
<NWhite>3. Prioritize targeting the enemy with the highest maximum Health</> 
<NWhite>The following heroes are subject to this logic:</> 
<NWhite>Duelist: Wolverine</>

<White>Strengthen Modules</>

<White>Vanguard</>

Captain America
Captain Shield Throw: Increase Sentinel Strike attack frequency by 80%, and transform it into a fully throwable shield ability.
Lawbreaker of Physics: Sentinel Strike throwable shield gains deflection, and can release the next Sentinel Strike without requiring the shield to return.

Doctor Strange
Mercy of Denak: Increase Daggers of Denak fire rate and magazine capacity by 80%, and fire 2 additional projectiles.
Turbulent Maelstrom of Madness: Reduce Maelstrom of Madness cooldown by 6s; each use adds damage instances to subsequent Maelstroms.

Groot
Great Ironwood Wall: Reduce Ironwood Wall cooldown by 10s and passive trigger interval by 0.5s; Increase Ironwood Wall Health by 400 and max count by 1.
Ghost Thornlash Wall: Reduce Thornlash Wall cooldown by 4s and passive trigger interval by 0.2s; Increase Thornlash Wall max count by 1.

Hulk
Gamma Shield Bomb: Each Indestructible Guard shield triggers an area explosion upon ending.
Gamma Shield Generator: Accelerate Indestructible Guard casting speed, and refresh Indestructible Guard cooldown after dealing 200 damage.

Magneto

Meteor Gravitation: Before the meteor lands and explodes, pull nearby enemies to the center.
Peni Parker
Field of Spider-Nests: Reduce Bionic Spider-Nest cooldown by 12s, increase max nest limit by 3, and boost Spider-Drones production speed by 100%.
Web Hunting: Enemies within the webs for 2s will be ensnared.

The Thing
Yancy Street Rampage: Increase Yancy Street Charge maximum duration by 5s, and stun targets for 1s upon collision.
Invincible Haymaker: Stone Haymaker has a 50% chance to trigger a Super Punch, knocking enemies back. If pushed to the edge of the map, it deals additional damage.

Thor

Odin's Blessing: Increase Ultimate Ability range by 3m and reduce the interval of aerial damage over time by 0.3s.

Venom
Guaranteed Survival: Reduce Symbiotic Resilience cooldown by 7s, increase the extra health coefficient by 0.3, and restore 30% of lost health upon activation.
King in Black: Devour permanently grants 10% of damage dealt as maximum health, up to 1,200, and enlarges the character.


<White>Duelist</>

Black Panther
Endless Rend: Increase Sprint Rend base damage by 40 and each Sprint Rend hit reduces the remaining cooldown of Spear Toss and Spinning Kick by 3s.
Bast Avatar: Increase Ultimate Ability base damage by 100 and Bast avatars summoned by 3.

Sniper Elite: Straight Shooter deals 10 additional damage per hit, each Final Hit permanently increases this damage by 5, up to 260.

Amaterasu: Flame Field deals additional damage per second equal to 6% of maximum health.

Iron Fist

Iron Man

Magik

Mister Fantastic

New Reflexive Rubber: Reduce Reflexive Rubber cooldown by 8s, increase max damage absorption to 1,000, and gain Bonus Health based on absorbed damage when it ends.

Moon Knight

Namor

Scarlet Witch

Spider-Man

Wolverine

<White>Strategist</>

Adam Warlock
Forge to Revive: Increase Ultimate Ability post-revival health by 100 and Invincible duration by 2s.
Fighting Nation Descent: Increase damage of allies revived by the Ultimate Ability by 80% for 5s.

Cloak & Dagger
Veil of Sky: Reduce Light Explosion and Terror Cape cooldown by 9s, and increase the width of Light Curtain and Dark Curtain by 4m.
Entangled Light and Darkness: When releasing Light Curtain, simultaneously launch Dark Curtain; when releasing Dark Curtain, simultaneously launch Light Curtain.

Invisible Woman
Best Guardian: Increase Guardian Shield radius by 2m, maximum health by 750, and recovery speed by 100 per second, while enhancing the slowdown effect on enemies passing through the Guardian Shield.
Greater Psionic Vortex: Reduce Psionic Vortex cooldown by 8s, increase its range by 2m, and enhance its pulling effect.

Jeff the Land Shark
Split Water Columns: Joyful Splash fires two additional water columns.
Looting Leviathan: Gain a random base module each time Jeff devours more than 3 enemies with his Ultimate Ability. The more enemies Jeff consumes, the higher the chance of receiving a rarer module.
Devour 4: Common 90%, Rare 8%, Epic 2%
Devour 5: Common 60%, Rare 30%, Epic 10%
Devour 6 or more: Common 0%, Rare 70%, Epic 30%

Loki
Final Illusion: Reduce Doppelganger cooldown by 9s, increase the maximum number of illusions to 2, and boost healing coefficient by 50%.
Loki's Sanctuary: Reduce Regeneration Domain cooldown by 18s, and increase Force Field Core health by 100.

Luna Snow
Applause: Reduce Ice Arts cooldown by 10s, increase ice shards' firing speed by 50% and width by 1m.
Ice Shards Therapy: Ice Arts ice shards additionally heal for 20% of maximum health.

Mantis
Natural Protection: Grant an additional Unstoppable effect to the target when unleashing Healing Flower, Allied Inspiration, or Natural Anger.
Floral Flourish: Healing Flower and Allied Inspiration provide extra boost effects to teammates around the target.

Rocket Raccoon
Full-Time Medic: Increase Repair Mode fire rate and magazine capacity by 40%, extend Repair Mode duration by 3s, and raise healing limit to 10 times.
B.R.B.A.S.A.P.: Reduce B.R.B. cooldown by 38s and increase Beacon Limit by 4. The Beacons can also revive themself.

Ultron
One for All: Reduce Giant Drone's base healing efficiency; when releasing Imperative: Patch, all allies gain a Giant Drone.
Software Update: Reduce Imperative: Firewall cooldown by 6s.

133_MatchActivity_113_ST.Text_Activity_113_Rule_Popup:
Event Rules:
As the event unfolds, link your Epic account here and engage in 10 Marvel Rivals battles across any mode (excluding Custom Game) to unlock the Marvel Rivals | Fortnite exclusive [Rivaled Sailer Glider]. Once you log into Fortnite using the same EPIC account, this magnificent item becomes yours to enjoy within Fortnite!

Kindly reminder: 
Each EPIC account can only be linked to a single Marvel Rivals game account. Should you access this event through the EPIC platform, your currently active EPIC account will automatically linked.
