612_Bond_ST.TXT_BondSuggessAchieve: {SenderPlayerName} suggests choosing {BondHeroNames} as a Team-Up Hero.
612_Bond_ST.100008_Background:
It's not often that the king of an intergalactic empire invites the queen of a demonic netherworld to join him for a diplomatic meeting. So when Magik got the call to come visit Wakanda, she couldn't help but answer. If King T'Challa had known her better, however, he wouldn't have bothered to send the fancy spacecraft to pick her up…

<Slide>"Thanks for the lift, Panther, but my Mutant power can get me across the universe faster than any quantum drive!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100011_Background:
One minute, Luna Snow was performing a concert to a sold out crowd on Jeju Island. The next, she was battling Monstro, a massive creature from the ocean's depths, brought to the surface by Namor, the king of the seas! Namor noticed how the flashy young hero captured the hearts of her adoring public. Her ability to inspire only infuriated him more...
<Slide>ONE NIGHT ONLY: Luna Snow Rocks Jeju Island with Special Guests Namor and Monstro! The Coolest Show on Land!</>
612_Bond_ST.100002_Background:
They may have come from different corners of the Multiverse, but the bond between Magneto and the Scarlet Witch transcends realities. Magneto forged a deal with this variant of his long lost daughter: Help gather Mutants lost throughout space and time and bring them home to Krakoa, and he will lead them against the demonic forces that threaten Wanda’s dimension.
<Slide>"The army that you're about to gather may very well be the one that tips the balance in our favor. If you will be my sword, I will be your edge."</>
612_Bond_ST.100001_Background_1:
As revenge against the All-Father, Hela once dragged the souls of Odin's young heirs to her realm of the dead. Little did she realize how much chaos the brothers would cause in her domain! She should have expected as much from Loki, but prince Thor was equally as quarrelsome, earning both royal souls a ban from Hel for all eternity!
<Slide>"Begone with you, Odinsons! From hence forth, should you perish, may you be eternally reborn in your own personal Ragnaroks!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100010_Adam_Mantis_Star: Adam Warlock enhances the rebirth power of {104300}{000003}{102000}, granting them the power of cocooned revival.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100040_Desc: Adam Warlock imparts his mastery of quantum energy to Luna Snow, awakening her new ability <Orange>Light & Shadow Karma</>. When Luna uses <Orange>Light & Shadow Karma</>, she links to nearby enemies. Any damage she deals to linked enemies is converted into Light Energy, which is then transferred to Luna through the link, healing her Health.
612_Bond_ST.100004_Background:
On the surface, they're the galaxy's most unusual duo: A talking raccoon and a sentient tree. But together, Rocket and Groot have proven countless times that friendship is about more than what planet you come from or what you look like. It's about who you are on the inside. And these two bounty-hunting heroes couldn't be a more perfect pair!
<Slide>"Sure, he just says 'I am Groot.' But he doesn't need fancy words. I always know exactly what he means."</>
612_Bond_ST.100001_Background:
Asgardian souls are like treasures to Hela. Those who have not earned their place in Valhalla belong to her for eternity, yet she always covets more. All save for one. Loki's spirit has been imprisoned in Hel many times over the centuries, and each instance it created more chaos in Hela's domain than it was worth before finally breaking free. In short, he's more trouble dead than alive.
<Slide>"Your soul has been struck from my list, God of Mischief. Our dealings are best saved for the living realms..."</>
612_Bond_ST.100005_Background:
When a symbiote bonds with its host, it leaves behind a permanent remnant – a codex – in the host's body. Since both Peter and Peni Parker have experienced these alien bonds, it makes it easy for them tap into any symbiote's power – including Venom's. But it also puts these heroes in danger of falling under the influence of the Klyntar hivemind...
<Slide>"We do not worry about you using our powers, Parkers. What we worry about is Knull using yours against us."</>
612_Bond_ST.100021_Description: Inspired by Captain America's resolve, Winter Soldier can leap to the aid of a designated ally, slamming the ground with his mechanical arm to damage nearby foes and grant <Buff>Bonus Health</> to allies within range. Captain America and Winter Soldier can interact with each other once both parties confirm. The duo then collides and unleashes a shockwave that damages and <Debuff>slows</> enemies.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100021_BondGroupDes:
Winter Soldier: "…You know, this ain't exactly like the old days when I'd watch your six on the battlefield, is it?"
Captain America: "Of course not—back then, you hadn't endured all this suffering. You hadn't been captured and twisted by Hydra, and you definitely didn't have that doohickey making you an octopus."
Winter Soldier: "Hmph. You always had my back when we were younger. Definitely been more reckless lately."
Captain America: "Nothing wrong with a headlong charge. Just can't go losing yourself on a solo mission again, Buck."
Winter Soldier: "…All right then, Captain, what's our next move?"
Captain America: "I might not be your Steve, but I think we can get our teamwork in tip top shape."
Winter Soldier: "I just hope you've sharpened your skills a bit more since that time in Wakanda."
Captain America: "Been training in secret. What's that saying? Practice makes perfect?"
Winter Soldier: "…You really haven't changed a bit, old man."
Captain America: "Neither has the battlefield—No matter who we're up against, all we need is just the two of us, side by side like back in the day."
Winter Soldier: "Enough yapping. Come on, Cap! We've got work to do."
612_Bond_ST.100011_1031_1047_1045: Luna Snow infuses ice energy into {104700}, who then can tap into the ice energy to power up abilities at will.
612_Bond_ST.100011_Luna_Jeff_Namor: Luna Snow infuses ice energy into {104700}, who then can tap into the ice energy to power up abilities at will.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100030_Desc: Luna Snow grants Winter's Chill to Hawkeye and Iron Fist. Hawkeye can shoot an <Orange>Ice Arrow</> that <Debuff>Stuns</> enemies if it travels a certain distance; otherwise, it <Debuff>Slows</> the target. The farther the arrow flies, the more damage it deals. When Iron Fist activates <Orange>Harmony Recovery</>, he can heal nearby allies with <Orange>Lunar Chi</>.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100038_Desc: Luna Snow grants Winter's Chill to Hawkeye and Iron Fist. Hawkeye can shoot an <Orange>Ice Arrow</> that <Debuff>Stuns</> enemies if it travels a certain distance; otherwise, it <Debuff>Slows</> the target. The farther the arrow flies, the more damage it deals. When Iron Fist activates <Orange>Harmony Recovery</>, he can heal nearby allies with <Orange>Lunar Chi</>.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100030_BondGroupDes:
Luna Snow: Whoa, Hawkeye! That last arrow... did you see the ice trail it made? That was seriously cool, right?

Hawkeye: Oh, I saw it. Tell me straight. Did you mess with my quiver when I wasn't looking?

Luna Snow: Guilty! I just gave your arrow a little drip. Gotta keep things fresh for the fans! Plus, keep the bad guys on ice!

Hawkeye: Do you always talk like that? Don't go turning our missions into one of your concerts now.

Luna Snow: Please, I'm a legit hero first! But hey, a little style never hurt, right? You always look so serious. Gotta help you get rid of that icy exterior. Yeesh!

Hawkeye: I don't rely on style, I rely on precision. But… I'll admit, it was a nice touch. Thanks.

Luna Snow: Anytime! Even though you've been a hero for so long, your accuracy is still top of the charts! I'll just give it a little extra pop!

Hawkeye: ...Alright. But next time you want to "remix" my arrows, give me a heads up. I might look grumpy, but I'm not that scary.

Luna Snow: Deal! And hey, if you ever need to cool off, just call me—I'll be there in a flash!
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100040_BondGroupDes:
Luna Snow: This feels amazing, Adam! Almost as good as the rush of performing live in front of thousands of fans! 

Adam Warlock: The power cosmic can be quite intoxicating. Which is why it must be used with caution. 

Luna Snow: Yeah, I can definitely see how some people might go all in… and never come back out… 

Adam Warlock: A fate that many have succumbed to. One I will not let befall you. 

Luna Snow: So, what…? Are you gonna mentor me or something? 

Adam Warlock: If you will allow me the privilege. I see great potential in you. 

Luna Snow: That’s what my agent said. Then he took 10% of all my streaming revenue and ticket sales. 

Adam Warlock: I seek no compensation. My reward comes from knowing I have helped you harness your powers for the greater good. 

Luna Snow: Well, I can’t imagine the good getting much greater than this! Linking up to the competition and using their damage to heal me? That’s a multi-platinum move!  

Adam Warlock: And this is just the beginning of what my quantum energy can unlock in you, Luna Snow. 

Luna Snow: If this is just the intro, I can’t wait to get to the chorus! Glad to have you on board as my new producer, Golden Boy. Let’s get to work!
612_Bond_ST.BondInfo_1044_104401: Blade can unleash Swift Strike toward a targeted enemy.
612_Bond_ST.100007_Background:
When Rocket lifted a quantum circuit board from the Agents of the Cosmos Complex, he was planning to use it to get the Milano in the air again. But he quickly realized that kind of power could be put to much better use on the battlefield. Can you imagine a device that supplies unlimited ammo? Well, the Punisher certainly can…

<Slide>PUNISHER'S WAR JOURNAL: I'm used to eliminating vermin from the streets. But for endless rounds? I can handle a team-up.</>
612_Bond_ST.BondInfo_1015_101501: With an electrifying enhancement, Storm can unleash a lightning barrage.
612_Bond_ST.BondInfo_1022_102201: With an electrifying enhancement, Captain America gains a Movement Boost, and his shield is imbued with thunder power, electrocuting nearby enemies.
612_Bond_ST.100033_Description: When Storm unleashes her <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, if Jeff the Land Shark has <Orange>It's Jeff!</> ready, he can channel her power to conjure a ferocious <Orange>Jeff-nado</>! Additionally, a <Orange>Jeff-nado</> will form if Jeff encounters Storm's <Orange>Omega Hurricane</> after devouring enemies with <Orange>It's Jeff!</>. Enemies will be drawn into the swirling chaos after enduring sustained damage from the <Orange>Jeff-nado</> for some time.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100033_Desc: When Storm unleashes her <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, if Jeff the Land Shark has <Orange>It's Jeff!</> ready, he can channel her power to conjure a ferocious <Orange>Jeff-nado</>! Additionally, a <Orange>Jeff-nado</> will form if Jeff encounters Storm's <Orange>Omega Hurricane</> after devouring enemies with <Orange>It's Jeff!</>. Enemies will be drawn into the swirling chaos after enduring sustained damage from the <Orange>Jeff-nado</> for some time.
612_Bond_ST.100014_Fire_Storm: When the Human Torch activates <Orange>Supernova</>, Storm can summon an <Orange>Omega Fire</> by selecting a <Orange>Flame Tornado</> with <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>. Likewise, when Storm unleashes <Orange>Omega Hurricane</>, the Human Torch can transform it into a <Orange>Burning Hurricane</> with <Orange>Supernova</>. Any <Orange>Flame Tornado</> caught in a <Orange>Burning Hurricane</> will grow in size and damage.
612_Bond_ST.BondInfo_1018_101801: When Doctor Strange uses Maelstrom of Madness, he unleashes excess gamma energy.
612_Bond_ST.100020_Description: Doctor Strange shares his arcane mastery, replacing Scarlet Witch's <Orange>Chthonian Burst</> with <Orange>Mystic Burst</> upon activation. Hold down the attack button to unleash a rapid, relentless salvo of magical missiles in the target direction.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100020_BondGroupDes:
Doctor Strange: "Wanda, your magical potential is limitless, but why do you always rely on Chaos Energy? How about we try channeling the energy rather than simply unleashing it?"
Scarlet Witch: "I already exhibit impeccable control, but I do admit, I often let it erupt on its own..."
Doctor Strange: "Exactly. Chaos magic is wild and unpredictable, but I've been working on a proper spell to implement some precision and structure. Come on, lend me a hand."
Scarlet Witch: "Hmmm, this feels... different. The energy flows more smoothly through your focus... it seems almost more potent than my chaos magic?"
Doctor Strange: "The spell can't reach its potential on its own unlike your chaos magic; you have to actively command it. Now, channel more of your power forward."
Scarlet Witch: "Like this, Stephen?"
Doctor Strange: "Ah, you never cease to amaze me, Wanda—it's no wonder you're the Supreme Sorcerer of your timeline. I feel like I'm in the presence of an even greater master than the Ancient One."
Scarlet Witch: "This combination of spellwork... it does flow more gracefully than chaos magic... but controlling it is trickier!"
Doctor Strange: "With your exceptional knowledge, you'll master it in no time. It will become your new weapon. Now, adjust your rhythm and try again."
Scarlet Witch: "…Alright, but if I accidentally blow up the Sanctum Sanctorum, don't blame me."
Doctor Strange: "Trust me, after what Dracula and Khonshu did to the Sanctum, anything is an improvement."
612_Bond_ST.100013_background:
Natasha's long solo career didn't stop her from feeling joy at seeing Clint again. As elite spies, they kept their emotions under wraps. Clint felt it too. They challenged each other on the battlefield, rescued each other in critical moments, and shared a rivalry only they understood. Black Widow and Hawkeye, the legendary pair, were back and ready to make history again!

<Slide>"Nat, you're telling me you're HOW OLD?! You look even younger than you did during that Coney Island mission!"</>
612_Bond_ST.TXT_CharactersWhoEstablishBondsWillRecei: Team up with heroes to unlock exclusive Team-Up Abilities! Season Bonuses are always active.
612_Bond_ST.100018_background:
Peter never thought he'd run into a fellow Empire State University alumnus among the Super Hero crowd. But today, a class with Doctor Connors and an unexpected visit from a message-carrying squirrel sparked his creativity, even though he didn't catch the entire lecture. He crafted pinecone-sized web bombs using his extra web fluid and handed them to the squirrel, confident these nifty gadgets would prove invaluable in a pinch.

<Slide>"What you got there, Tippy? 'From your friendly alum'? Hmm, I don’t think these are for munching on. Let's take 'em for a spin—this is going to be fun!"</>
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100032_Desc: The Punisher upgrades Black Widow's arsenal, adding a Pulse Mode to her Red Room Rifle. While the ability is active, using <Orange>Straight Shooter</> fires a pulse beam that deals piercing damage.
612_Bond_ST.100009_Dagger_Moon_Blade: Cloak & Dagger can inject light and dark energy into Moon Knight and Blade to create a Light & Dark Realm where Moon Knight and Blade can become <Buff>invisible</> and gain <Buff>Healing Over Time</>. Blade can unleash Swift Strike toward a targeted enemy.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100037_BondGroupDes:
The duality of light and dark maintained by Cloak & Dagger had always drawn the curiosity of divine beings, particularly Khonshu. Seeing potential in their combined powers, Khonshu sends Moon Knight to work alongside them. During a fierce battle, Blade joins the fight.
Amidst the chaos, an unexpected phenomenon occurs: both Marc and Eric find themselves able to vanish completely into the interplay of Lightforce and Darkforce. Rather than simple disappearance, it’s a new kind of magical invisibility—one neither of them had ever experienced. In this state, even divine senses cannot detect them. Intrigued and impressed, Tandy and Tyrone realize this ability could redefine the balance of light and darkness.

<Slide>“Moon Knight and Daywalker, together? Funny. Guess these kids really know how to bring together the best of both worlds. Let's get this done before the sun comes up.”</>
612_Bond_ST.100009_background:
The duality of light and dark maintained by Cloak & Dagger has sparked the curiosity of several divine beings, particularly Khonshu. Seeing potential in their powers, Khonshu has entrusted Moon Knight with the task of accompanying them. During an intense battle, they discovered that Marc reacted uniquely to both the Lightforce and Darkforce, mysteriously disappearing in a completely new magical way. Now, if only Tandy and Tyrone could figure out how it works and apply it to the rest of him...

<Slide>"Just as the New Moon vanishes from sight, so shall you, my Fist. For new heroes illuminate our path forward in the trials ahead."</>
612_Bond_ST.100020_background:
It didn’t matter if this popular idol was the same ally he had from the Agents of Atlas, because Lin Lie was no longer the legendary Sword Master of old. But now wasn't the time to dwell on the past. To uphold the long-lost Atlas spirit, they needed to harmonize their efforts like before. With perfect timing, they unleashed their Chi and ice energy together, and in that explosive moment, the two energies fused flawlessly! The colossal force launched the training robot, propelling it several meters into the air!
<Slide>"Awesome! All our hard work is really paying off. If Jimmy Woo were here, he'd be totally blown away by our teamwork!"</>
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100041_Desc: Mantis enhances Groot's wooden walls and Loki's Rune Stones with life energy. Groot can additionally unleash a Wild Wall, which, when in <Orange>Flora Colossus</> state, restores health to random nearby allies. Loki's Rune Stones grant allies within <Orange>Regeneration Domain</> a <Buff>Damage Boost</>.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100041_BondGroupDes:
Mantis: You seem on edge, Loki. 

Loki: To be fair, I am always on edge. But yes, I suppose I am a bit unnerved by current circumstances. 

Mantis: I can use my empathic powers to calm your emotions, if you wish. 

Loki: No no, that's not necessary. It's just that present company has put me on edge.

Groot: I am Groot. 

Loki: Not you, you dolt. But yes, she does look great in green.

Mantis: You think so? You do too! Wait, wait, you understood him?

Loki: All-Speak is a language of gods, my dear. We are of the same cloth.

Groot: I am Groot.

Mantis: Whaaaaa?! A divine connection? That's a bit much, Groot!  I–I–I–

Loki: The tree speaks true. Our auras are perfectly aligned between your cosmic touch and my mastery of magic.

Mantis: Eh?! Loki, what are you talking about?!

Loki: Our energies combined can prove stronger than each of us alone. 'Tis my nature to use others, but your purity speaks to me. Perhaps we can be...more...

Groot: I am Groot…?

Mantis: No, no, no, he HAS to be talking to you. And no I'm not blushing!
612_Bond_ST.100010_Background:
Mantis once transcended her physical form, becoming pure energy when her time as the Celestial Madonna concluded. Peter Quill once became Master of the Sun, unlocking even deeper power through his alien physiology. Now, Adam Warlock has found these two to be the perfect vessels for his rebirth abilities, for their ancestry bears greater power than they may ever know. 
<Slide>"So I get to come back to life now? That's totally sweet! Like having my favorite song on endless replay!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100011_Background_1:
Jeff has made so many friends during his adventures across time. Even though he still loves spending time with Mantis and Psylocke, even in the lap of Emma Frost, he's struck up a lasting friendship with Luna Snow. Seol Hee's cool touch keeps Jeff in high spirits when he's missing the water. Together, they cheer one another up in the toughest of times with friendly snowball fights, though their foes tend to not like playing with ice as much as they do.

Luna Snow: Jeffy, I know you love to sing, but you're totally off-key! Ok, from the top.
Jeff the Land Shark: Mrrr rrr rrr!
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100031_BondGroupDes:
Jeff watched in terror as Hela removed a piece of the symbiote, claiming its abyssal power to allow her to release a dark, mystic sphere that ensnared her enemies. He cowered in the corner before the injured symbiote crawled over to him. And when he heard Venom call out to him, the little Land Shark did what any hero would: help those in need.

Jeff had already bonded with a symbiote once before, when the Guardians of the Galaxy first brought him to Klyntar... but this felt different. The Venom symbiote wasn't trying to form a bond with Jeff. It was perfectly content with its own partner, Eddie Brock. It just needed to get its energy back. As their minds connected, Jeff could sense this other being was mischievous, perhaps even a little playful — a kindred spirit in that regard. For a brief moment, Jeff and the Venom symbiote were perfectly in sync, their thoughts intertwining in a way Jeff had rarely experienced. 

"You feel it too, don't you, Jeff? We have more in common than just our love for chomping things with our giant mouths..."

Jeff knew that it wouldn't be long before the symbiote recovered and it would shift its full attention back to its true partner. And he was okay with that. But for this one glorious moment, he planned to enjoy the ride... and to make the entire world their feast!
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100036_BondGroupDes:
Jeff watched in terror as Hela removed a piece of the symbiote, claiming its abyssal power to allow her to release a dark, mystic sphere that ensnared her enemies. He cowered in the corner before the injured symbiote crawled over to him. And when he heard Venom call out to him, the little Land Shark did what any hero would: help those in need.

Jeff had already bonded with a symbiote once before, when the Guardians of the Galaxy first brought him to Klyntar... but this felt different. The Venom symbiote wasn't trying to form a bond with Jeff. It was perfectly content with its own partner, Eddie Brock. It just needed to get its energy back. As their minds connected, Jeff could sense this other being was mischievous, perhaps even a little playful — a kindred spirit in that regard. For a brief moment, Jeff and the Venom symbiote were perfectly in sync, their thoughts intertwining in a way Jeff had rarely experienced. 

"You feel it too, don't you, Jeff? We have more in common than just our love for chomping things with our giant mouths..."

Jeff knew that it wouldn't be long before the symbiote recovered and it would shift its full attention back to its true partner. And he was okay with that. But for this one glorious moment, he planned to enjoy the ride... and to make the entire world their feast!
612_Bond_ST.100004_Background_1:
When Groot's wooden body shatters into splinters during battle, it's usually up to Rocket to collect the pieces and nurture his partner back to health. But now that Jeff is in the mix, there's someone new to fetch Groot's twigs and even help with the watering! Rocket can never be replaced, but luckily, Groot's got room on his other shoulder!
<Slide>"These fellas may not exactly be the best at conversation, but there ain't no others I'd rather partner up with!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100005_Venem_Spider_Penny: Venom shares a part of his symbiotes with {103600}{000003}{104200}, activating their symbiote abilities. {103600}{000003}{104200} can convert the symbiotes into explosive spikes that inflict harm on nearby enemies and relentlessly drive them back.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100031_Desc: Venom shares his symbiotes with Jeff and Hela. Jeff's <Orange>Guardian of the Deep</> links with nearby allies for continuous healing, releasing a large healing burst that converts any excess into <Buff>Bonus Health</> when it ends. Hela's <Orange>Hel Tendrils</> unleash a symbiotic Hel Sphere that pulls in nearby enemies and links them, <Debuff>slowing</> those that try to escape.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100036_Desc: Venom shares his symbiotes with Jeff and Hela. Jeff's <Orange>Guardian of the Deep</> links with nearby allies for continuous healing, releasing a large healing burst that converts any excess into <Buff>Bonus Health</> when it ends. Hela's <Orange>Hel Tendrils</> unleash a symbiotic Hel Sphere that pulls in nearby enemies and links them, <Debuff>slowing</> those that try to escape.
612_Bond_ST.100032_Description: Hulk charges Iron Man and Namor with gamma radiation.
612_Bond_ST.100006_Hulk_Strange_Iron: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which, will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.
612_Bond_ST.100022_Description: Hulk charges Namor with gamma radiation. When Namor receives the radiation, he will summon an extra <Orange>Gamma Monstro</> which will continuously fire gamma rays at locked-on enemies. The longer the rays hit, the higher the damage.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100022_BondGroupDes:
Hulk and Fish Man have a long history. Hulk has smashed Fish Man more times than Hulk can count, even though Fish Man used to fight on the same team as Hulk — the Defenders. Or at least Hulk thinks so. Maybe it wasn't this Fish Man. This Fish Man doesn't look or sound like the one Hulk remembers. This Fish Man could be from another reality. Banner would know more about that than Hulk. What Hulk does know is that Fish Men are all the same. Bad attitudes, big egos, even bigger sea monsters. Hulk hopes this Fish Man calls one of his monsters out of the ocean to join the fight. Maybe Hulk will even share some of his gamma energy with it so it can be nearly as strong as Hulk. Because when this fight is over, Hulk is still gonna need something else to smash! The bigger the better...

<Slide>"Get ready, you brainless brute! My monstrous minion hungers for power... the kind that only you can provide!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100001_1024_1016_1039: When Hela lands a final hit in defeating an enemy, she can instantly resurrect Thor in the respawn phase, or grant him <Buff>Bonus Health</> if he is still alive.
612_Bond_ST.100043_Background: When Hela lands a final hit in defeating an enemy, she can instantly resurrect Thor in the respawn phase, or grant him <Buff>Bonus Health</> if he is still alive.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100039_BondGroupDes:
Peni Parker: My Cyber-Webs and your beacon are in perfect sync, Rocket-san…

Rocket Raccoon: Great! Our little Rocket Network is runnin’ at full speed, Peni. That means Arachno-Mines, Spider Drones, and Armor Packs galore! We make quite the team, kid!

Star-Lord: That’s what you used to say about us…

Rocket Raccoon: Oh… hey, Quill. It’s not what it looks like. I swear!

Star-Lord: It kinda looks like you teamed up with another hero to create an awesome techno-web full of super-useful weapons and power-ups… and then didn’t even bother to tell your fellow Guardians of the Galaxy.

Rocket Raccoon: Huh. I guess it is what it looks like. 

Peni Parker: I’m so sorry, Mr. Star-Lord, sir. I promise I wasn’t trying to steal your teammate away from you. 

Star-Lord: Rocket is more than a teammate, Peni. He’s family. Or at least I thought he was… 

Rocket Raccoon: Yeesh! Enough with the guilt trips. You want in on this action or not? 

Star-Lord: Thought you’d never ask! I promise I won’t take too much of your stuff. I’ll just teleport in and grab some goodies every now and then.

Rocket Raccoon: Fine by me. But when this is over, we should talk about makin’ Peni an honorary Guardian.

Star-Lord: We just drafted the Land Shark… but I suppose there’s room for one more on The Milano…
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100029_BondGroupDes:
Peni Parker: Wait... Rocket? Did you seriously just connect your beacon to my web system? Do you even know how many security alerts that triggered? Yabai!

Rocket Raccoon: With that firewall? Sure. That was some of the flimsiest security I've ever seen. So I gave it a full upgrade and even slapped on an auto-adapter. Your Spider-Nest is way smarter now. How about a little thanks, huh?

Peni Parker: Ugh. My nests were already smart, okay? And what's with all those weird new glowing things? They keep popping up everywhere. Totally your fault!

Rocket Raccoon: You gotta admit, they're useful. If you wanna win every fight, you need this kind of tech. I optimized a few things, and now my beacon can create "cyber-webs" too.

Peni Parker: So basically, you're just using me as your network node…? Mou, seriously?

Rocket Raccoon: Wrong, you're the main server. I'm just a satellite node. Now we can cover the whole battlefield. I'm callin' it the "Web Rocket Network." Nice name, right?

Peni Parker: Fine... but next time, don't mess with my system without asking, okay? Just because you're a genius doesn't mean everyone wants you touching their stuff...

Rocket Raccoon: Heh. Face it, kid. I just did the upgrade we were both gonna need anyway.
612_Bond_ST.BondInfo_1042_104201: Peni Parker gains the symbiote abilities.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100029_Desc: Rocket Raccoon upgrades his <Orange>B.R.B.</>, which now creates <Orange>Cyber-Webs</> upon placement and periodically spawns <Orange>Arachno-Mines</> and <Orange>Spider-Drones</>. Peni Parker can also deploy an <Orange>Armored Spider-Nest</> that drops <Orange>Armor Packs</> for <Buff>Bonus Health</>. Star-Lord gets a teleport to its deployment point from anywhere on the map.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100039_Desc: Rocket Raccoon upgrades his <Orange>B.R.B.</>, which now creates <Orange>Cyber-Webs</> upon placement and periodically spawns <Orange>Arachno-Mines</> and <Orange>Spider-Drones</>. Peni Parker can also deploy an <Orange>Armored Spider-Nest</> that drops <Orange>Armor Packs</> for <Buff>Bonus Health</>. Star-Lord gets a teleport to its deployment point from anywhere on the map.
612_Bond_ST.100007_1023_1014_1041: Rocket Raccoon throws an Ammo Overload Device in the target direction. Upon entering the device's range, {101400} receive the buffs of <Buff>Infinite Ammo</> and <Buff>Faster Firing</>.
612_Bond_ST.100007_Racoon_Punnisher_Winter: Rocket Raccoon throws an Ammo Overload Device in the target direction. Upon entering the device's range, {101400} receive the buffs of <Buff>Infinite Ammo</> and <Buff>Faster Firing</>.
612_Bond_ST.100014_background:
Fire, a crucial element in nature, usually can't be conjured by weather alone. But Johnny changed the game. He could ignite Ororo's hurricanes, turning them into fiery tempests with the power of a solar storm. This epic combination is reserved for only the most dire of situations, such as now—when they are on the brink of losing to Ben and Logan in a show-off competition.

<Slide>"In all of my battles alongside some of the most powerful beings imaginable, none have frustrated me as much as you, Jonathan. Quit giving my hair heat damage!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100002_Witch_Magnet: Scarlet Witch can infuse Chaos Energy into Magneto to enchant his greatsword. Upon receiving the Chaos Energy, Magneto can unleash its full force, striking down enemies with his enchanted greatsword.
612_Bond_ST.100024_Description: Jean Grey imbues Wolverine with the awe-inspiring Phoenix Force. With this power, Wolverine's <Orange>Feral Leap</> transforms into <Orange>Phoenix Warrior</>. While active, he is enveloped in Phoenix flames that continuously scorch nearby enemies, dealing Percentage Damage. In this state, Wolverine's abilities gain <Buff>Lifesteal</> when inflicting damage.
612_Bond_ST.100032_Background: For the collaborative background of Hulk and Iron Man/Namor, only for S2-1
612_Bond_ST.100003_1039_1015_1022: Thor infuses <Orange>Thorforce</> into {101500}{000003}{102200}, granting them an electrifying enhancement. {101501}{102201}
612_Bond_ST.100003_Background_1:
Few have proven capable of lifting the legendary hammer, Mjölnir, due to an ancient Asgardian enchantment that allows only those deemed worthy to wield it. Though that honor has most often belonged to the God of Thunder, Thor, a small handful of mortals – including Captain America and Storm – have managed to raise this mighty mallet high and call forth its fury in times of dire need.
<Slide>"Whosoever holds this hammer, if he be worthy, shall possess the power of Thor!"</>
612_Bond_ST.100023_1053_1037_1048: Emma Frost can form a mental link with Magneto and Psylocke, calling on her to create illusory projections. When together, Emma Frost will create a Mental Projection of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities on its own.
612_Bond_ST.100023_Magneto_Description: Emma Frost can form a mental link with Magneto and Psylocke, calling on her to create illusory projections. When together, Emma Frost will create a Mental Projection of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities on its own.
612_Bond_ST.100023_Psylocke_Description: Emma Frost can form a mental link with Magneto and Psylocke, calling on her to create illusory projections. When together, Emma Frost will create a Mental Projection of Magneto and Psylocke, forming a Duplicate Illusion in the enemy's perspective that confuses foes by moving and casting abilities on its own.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100023_BondGroupDes:
Emma Frost: "Erik, let me in. Through our mental link, I can project your likeness to confuse the enemy."
Magneto: "Emma, I appreciate your strategic insight. But why would I risk my mental safeguards when we could just crush them directly?"
Psylocke: "We must never underestimate our foes. Ever since I left home, every enemy I've faced has required strategy to defeat. To defeat Orochi, I risked everything in a direct confrontation. But in these battles, if the enemy can't pinpoint where the real me is, they'll be thrown off balance—and that gives us the opening we need."
Emma Frost: "Precisely, Sai. Our enemies always underestimate our true potential. We Mutants are far more formidable than they imagine. Your projections will flawlessly mirror your every movement, synchronizing even your powers to throw off their judgment."
Magneto: "Well reasoned, young one. The raw power we wield is merely the surface—the true strength lies in strategy. Let them witness my image yet never truly know where I stand. But you shall still have no access to my mind. The answer is no."
Emma Frost: "You are such a bore. I suppose I can disrupt their perception and shatter their mental defenses myself...Victory on the battlefield is not just about overwhelming force—it's about conquering their minds."
Psylocke: "They'll fool themselves into their own demise. But we need to work as a team."
Magneto: "Fine, only for a brief moment, I will lend you my mind, and together, we will instill a fear in our enemies they've never known before."
Emma Frost: "Excellent. Simply call upon the White Queen and we will show them what a true 'battle of wits' looks like.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100022_Desc: Spider-Man gives Squirrel Girl a web bomb. She can launch it to unleash an explosion upon contact with the environment or an enemy, briefly <Debuff>Immobilizing</> and damaging enemies caught in the blast.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100034_BondGroupDes:
Spider-Man: Hey! Not cool, Johnny! I just webbed up that spot, and you burned away all my hard work in, like, three seconds flat!

Human Torch: Sorry, Pete! Not my fault! Maybe steer clear of my fire stream next time, yeah? Honestly, you're lucky you didn't end up flame-grilled in the process, pal. 

Spider-Man: Wait... maybe that isn't a bad idea... 

Human Torch: Barbecued spider? Gross, dude.   

Spider-Man: No. I meant flaming webs! 

Human Torch: Well, when it comes to playing with fire, I'm the expert here. But with me as your mentor, your Spidey suit won't even get scorched!

Spider-Man: Y'know... If my suit was made of unstable molecules like yours, I wouldn't have to worry about that... 

Human Torch: Sorry. Trade secret. You know Reed. Super protective of his patents. 

Spider-Man: Whatever. I can probably tweak my web formula to be more flammable but also more durable. That way, when you light 'em up, they won't just burn away.

Human Torch: You mean, like this?

Spider-Man: Whoa! Hey! I didn't mean right now! That was all of my backup webbing! Wait... you totally did that on purpose!!!

Human Torch: Oops! Did I do that? Well... gotta fly, Pete! Enjoy the view from Liberty Island!

Spider-Man: Johnny! You jerk! Get back here! Now I'll have to take the ferry home... and this costume doesn't have pockets for change! >Sigh< Next time, I'm picking our meeting spot...
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100024_BondGroupDes:
To say that I've got a burnin' in me when it comes to Jean Grey would be an understatement. From the moment I first laid eyes on her, it felt like my heart was gonna beat its way right outta my Adamantium rib cage. But romance was never in the cards for the two of us. She loved Summers, and I wasn't the kinda fella who was gonna stand in the way of what she wanted... even if it wasn't me...

I found my own true love in the form of Mariko Yashida. But then time got all screwed up and I ended up gettin' ripped from my era and tossed into the far-flung future. Been searchin' for Mariko ever since... and luck ain't been on my side. It’s kinda funny. As fast as my body can heal, my heart's been takin' way longer than I ever coulda expected. 

But then I saw her, floatin' down from space like some sorta angel. Jeannie was back, and she brought the Phoenix Force along for the ride. All those old feelings started stirrin' inside of me, and my heart was full again. Sure, I knew that our love wasn't meant to be, but the bond we'd built over the years was just as deep. And I could finally feel that burnin' in my heart again. 

But that burnin' on the inside was just the beginnin'. When Jeannie passed a portion of the Phoenix Force along to me, it set more than just my heart aflame. My whole body was on fire... and so was everythin' — and everyone — in my path! We've always been a good combo, me and her, but with power like this, we could burn down the whole damn world! And as long as the two of us rise from the ashes together, I might be okay with that…
612_Bond_ST.100017_background:
This isn't Wolverine's first dance with the Hulk. In their initial tussle, they briefly united against a common foe, and it seems history may repeat itself. Logan, now with twice the experience and twice the scars, isn’t easily rattled. With practiced ease, he hunkered down, waiting for the big green behemoth's move. For the Hulk, though, it’s a whole new ballgame. Clumsily, he tossed Logan between floors, forcing Wolverine to dig his adamantium claws into the structure, leaving him stuck.

<Slide>"Don't tell Petey, but that's the hardest I've been thrown in over a decade. Never liked flying, but that was somethin'!"</>
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100015_BondGroupDes: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100025_BondGroupDes: Wolverine, Hulk{000003}{105100} can interact with each other. Once both parties confirm, Hulk{000003}{105100} can lift Wolverine and press the key to hurl him forward.
612_Bond_ST.BondInfo_1034_103401: When Iron Man uses Armor Overdrive, he will initiate a gamma upgrade.
612_Bond_ST.100019_Description: When Iron Man, Ultron, and Squirrel Girl team up, Ultron's <Orange>Encephalo-Ray</> upgrades to <Orange>Nano-Ray</>, firing a beam that pierces through all characters, dealing continuous damage to foes while healing allies; Squirrel Girl gains the <Orange>Squirrel Missile</> ability. She directs a squirrel to ride Iron Man's nanotech glove as a homing missile. Upon hit, the squirrel flees just before a fiery explosion!
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100035_Desc: When Iron Man, Ultron, and Squirrel Girl team up, Ultron's <Orange>Encephalo-Ray</> upgrades to <Orange>Nano-Ray</>, firing a beam that pierces through all characters, dealing continuous damage to foes while healing allies; Squirrel Girl gains the <Orange>Squirrel Missile</> ability. She directs a squirrel to ride Iron Man's nanotech glove as a homing missile. Upon hit, the squirrel flees just before a fiery explosion!
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100019_BondGroupDes:
Iron Man: I know you hate it when people mess with your tech, Ultron, but you've gotta admit: This energy enhancement module I installed is actually pretty useful. Stable, precise, and it even heals! Practically perfect.

Ultron: Practically? I was already the pinnacle of perfection long before you started your tinkering.

Squirrel Girl: Umm... I hate to butt in when you're busy writing the world's first thesis on robot arrogance.... But if you're so flawless, why're you teaming up with us fleshy mortals?

Iron Man: Long story. By the way, Doreen, whatever happened to that Nano Gauntlet I gave you to help you practice coding...?

Ultron: You didn't notice the rodents scurrying around your lab? Typical. Perhaps I'll just sit back and enjoy the show as they blow up your workspace...

Iron Man: I thought I saw something riding on my gauntlet... Okay, Doreen. You don't have to give it back yet, but promise me you and your furry pals won't cause any trouble.

Squirrel Girl: No problem, Mr. Stark! That was actually why I came. One of my little buddies hurt their leg in battle, so I reprogrammed the gauntlet to be squirrel-friendly. I really didn't think you'd be on board...

Ultron: Your communication is painfully inefficient. And I can't believe you'd hand over your technology to a mere child. 

Iron Man: Sounds like someone's jealous he can't keep my tech all to himself.

Squirrel Girl: Right? He complains non-stop, but he can't resist using the cool stuff we design. Classic Ultron.

Ultron: The time for conversation is over! When can I return to battle to show you what Ultron is truly capable of?

Iron Man: I was done a long time ago. I've just been stalling you for fun. You really need to learn how to play nice with others.

Squirrel Girl: Including squirrels! Your drones and my squirrels could be best friends!

Ultron: I highly doubt it. Tiresome mammals…

612_Bond_ST.100006_Background:
Iron Man: "Hulk, can you please not overcharge my suit this time? Last time, I nearly ended up as a walking firework!"
Hulk: "Suit too weak! NOT HULK'S FAULT!"
Namor: "Tony, spare the complaints. Your clunky shell is simply flawed. Monstro's spawn are built to consume radiation."
Iron Man: "Oh? So last time when it went rogue and attacked that research fleet was just 'normal behavior'?"
Namor: "Isn't it your kind that caused them to become like that? Besides, if those humans hadn't dared to trespass into its waters, my beast wouldn't have bothered them in the first place."
Hulk: "HULK TIRED OF TIN CAN AND FISHMAN FIGHTING! HULK LEAVING!"
Iron Man: "Sorry, Hulk—I'll figure out the circuitry. This time, I've got to control the intake. Gonna have to learn to be a Defender just like Stephen was..."
Namor: "You know nothing of our teamwork, Stark. One of the few teams I've been willing to join in my centuries alive."
Iron Man: "Namor, what are you talking about? You've joined everyone from the Invaders to the X-Men. You just like to whine about being alone for attention."
Namor: "And yet every time I do, you land dwellers always show your true colors. But soon, Monstro will feast on this gamma power and I won't need any of you any longer."
Hulk: "HULK SMASH SQUID—"
Iron Man: "Well, until that day comes, we'll make everyone else green with envy."
Hulk: "…EXACTLY. GREEN TEAM SMASH!"
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100016_Desc: Iron Fist channels the Chi of Shou-Lao into Luna Snow, transforming her ice power into a Chi-infused frosty ring that radiates from her. This ring can launch up enemies with chilling damage and applies a slowing effect, while simultaneously healing her allies.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100021_Desc: Invisible Woman grants psionic armor to the rest of the Fantastic Four
612_Bond_ST.100042_Description: Human Torch can lift The Thing into the air and slam him down, dealing damage, <Debuff>launching</> enemies, and creating a zone that disables mobility abilities.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100034_Desc: Human Torch stores <Orange>Pyrokinetic Energy</> in Spider-Man's suit, enabling him to unleash an <Orange>Inferno Blast</> that sprays a fiery web while performing a backflip to create distance. The flames damage enemies and apply a <Orange>Burn-Tracer</>. Detonating these <Orange>Burn-Tracers</> inflicts Damage Over Time.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100042_BondGroupDes:
HUMAN TORCH: Mmmm. They say we're NYC's greatest heroes, but I honestly think that title should go to the city's hot dog vendors! 

THING: Finally, somethin' we can agree on. It ain't exactly health food, but I won't tell Suzie if you don't. 

HUMAN TORCH: Deal. Though it's hard to hide anything from my sis. She tends to see right through us. 

THING: Ha! Good one! But you're right. We don't get away with nuthin' anymore. Between her and Reed --

MISTER FANTASTIC: Johnny? Ben? Come in! 

HUMAN TORCH: You just had to say his name out loud...

THING: Oops. What's the matter, Stretcho? 

MISTER FANTASTIC: We've got another crisis of Multiversal proportions. I need you back at the Baxter Building now! 

THING: You heard the fella, hot shot. Time to head home. How about a lift? 

HUMAN TORCH: Fine. But suddenly I'm wishing you'd ordered a few less hot dogs, Benjy Boy... 

THING: Yeah, yeah. Laugh it up, matchstick. Just don't drop me, unless you wanna take out half a city block! 

HUMAN TORCH: I'll do my best... but, come to think of it, that might actually come in handy some day...
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100033_BondGroupDes:
Wind roared, lightning crackled, and Jeff the Land Shark stood right in the middle of the storm! They say a shark shouldn't walk on land, but Jeff shreds that theory faster than Wolverine shreds foes. Now, he craved a new kind of thrill in this tempest. As her hurricane surged, a smile played on Ororo's lips. Despite she and this creature not having the best introduction, who was she to deny a simple creature a simple pleasure?

"Don’t you fear, little one." her voice as calm as a summer breeze. With the raising of her hand, Jeff lifted higher and higher. Storm’s time in the Sanctuary gave her much practice nurturing the small, but Jeff did not need protection like the other animals in her care. He responded with a wide-mouthed smile, as if to say he wasn't afraid; he would ride the wind just like her!

In that swirling chaos, no one could tell where Ororo’s hurricane ended and Jeff's insatiable appetite began. This new assistant was a tad mischievous but surprisingly…reliable. Storm chuckled with a devious grin. For starting now, the tornado had teeth.
612_Bond_ST.100008_1029_1026_1049_1048: When Magik is on the field, {102600} can tap into Limbo to rewind a few seconds back to a previous position; after passing through Limbo, {102600} will gain <Buff>Bonus Health</> based on missing health.
612_Bond_ST.100008_Magic_Panthon_Wolf_Butter: When Magik is on the field, {102600} can tap into Limbo to rewind a few seconds back to a previous position; after passing through Limbo, {102600} will gain <Buff>Bonus Health</> based on missing health.
612_Bond_ST.100013_Hawk_Widow: Hawkeye can share his Hunter's Sight with Black Widow, enabling her to catch sight of and damage afterimages of enemies.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100038_BondGroupDes:
Hawkeye: Got any more of those Ice Arrows for me, Luna? 

Luna Snow: One fresh and frosty batch of polar projectiles, coming up, Hawkeye! How’ve they been working for you so far? 

Hawkeye: Simply stunning. Literally. 

Iron Fist: I would expect no less from the one and only Luna Snow. 

Luna Snow: Lin Lie. Always the charmer. 

Hawkeye: I didn’t know you two had history… 

Iron Fist: We served as Agents of Atlas together, back in my Sword Master days. Then Luna went solo on us.

Luna Snow: Hey! Only after you got that fancy new fist and moved to K’un-Lun! 

Iron Fist: Maybe you should schedule your next tour stop there. I could use a sparring partner.

Luna Snow: Hmm. I bet my ice powers and your chi would make some pretty sweet harmonies… 

Hawkeye: Umm… should I go somewhere else and give you kids some space? 

Luna Snow: Nah. If we really wanna top the charts, it’s gonna take more than a duet. I say we get the band back together… and invite some brand new members! Whaddaya say, Lin Lie? 

Iron Fist: The more the merrier!
612_Bond_ST.MarvelBondGroupTable_100032_BondGroupDes:
Black Widow: You know, nobody customizes firearms like this anymore. It's almost nostalgic. And every shot; so precise, barely a hair off target.

The Punisher: Precision's not a luxury. It's survival. Especially when you're up against Mega-Corp scum and Doom.

Black Widow: Don't need to tell me twice. But seriously, where'd you pick up these customization skills?

The Punisher: Old acquaintance named David. Long time back. Helped me out more times than I can count, back before...

Black Widow: I think I've heard of him, a tech genius, right? I'm sorry. Cost of living this long...

The Punisher: Yeah. Thought we were fighting a war we'd win. Still hasn't ended...

Black Widow: So you're handing this to me now? Is this about making amends?

The Punisher: No. That's old blood. Our time is already a warzone and we can't afford another screw-up. I don't patch mistakes, Natasha. This pulse beam cuts through anything. Don't leave a mess.

Black Widow: Got it. Thanks. I won't let you — or the Red Room — down. So, what do we call this mission…? "Operation: Microchip"?

The Punisher: Sure. "Operation: Microchip." And don't thank me. Just get it done.
612_Bond_ST.MarvelCommonBuffDescTable_00_BuffDesc: (Season Bonuses are always in effect, even without active Team-Ups.)

613_HeroProficiency_ST.TXT_RuleContent:
1. After unlocking the KO Prompt and Avatar, they can be directly equipped. Once equipped, they will replace the default ones.
2. Spray rewards can be directly equipped or set on the Cosmetics page.

Modes: Conquest; Doom Match (matchmaking)
